T02TD1784E:1b-1: shr'i gu hya sa ma dza ta nta sya tantra t'i k'a n'a ma /
T02TD1784E:1b-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyud 'grel zhes bya ba /
T02TD1784E:1b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la [dd] phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1784E:1b-5: sna tshogs sprul pa'i rol pa spro ba'i tshogs kyis sems can ma lus don mdzad pa //
T02TD1784E:1b-6: rang snang longs spyod bde ba nyams myong bas ni ma lus rtog pa'i dra ba 'joms //
T02TD1784E:1b-7: sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs ldan lha yi 'khor lor lhan skyes ngo sku gang zhig bzhugs //
T02TD1784E:1b-8: srid pa'i 'jigs pa ma lus gcod mdzad rdor sems de ni khyed la srung bar shog / nyon mongs kyi tshogs rab rib snying gi mun pa'i skye bo yi //
T02TD1784E:1b-9: shin tu rno ba'i shes rab ral gri yis ni rnam par gcod //
T02TD1784E:1b-10: ma lus skye bo'i dpa' bo gang zhig dpal ldan 'jam rdo rje //
T02TD1784E:1b-11: lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis ni de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1784E:1b-12: gting med 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las //
T02TD1784E:1b-13: bskal pa brgya yis brgal mi 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:1b-14: gang gi drin gyis pha rol phyin //
T02TD1784E:1b-15: bla ma'i zhabs la rab btud de //
T02TD1784E:2a-2: man ngag gter gyi rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1784E:2a-3: de bzhin gshegs pas gsang ba'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:2a-4: rgyas btab gang zhig sngar yod pa //
T02TD1784E:2a-5: man ngag nor ni ma thob pas //
T02TD1784E:2a-6: dbul po rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:2a-7: byang chub rgyal srid thob phyir dang //
T02TD1784E:2a-8: 'grel pa'i lde mig gis grol bya //
T02TD1784E:2a-9: skyon tshogs yang dag spangs nas ni //
T02TD1784E:2a-10: yon tan cha la blo gdab bya //
T02TD1784E:2a-12: gang phyir skyes bu gzhan don mdzad //
T02TD1784E:2a-13: re zhig skyes bu chen po rnams //
T02TD1784E:2a-14: bdag nyid chung bar 'dod pa ste //
T02TD1784E:2a-15: gzhan don gzhan ni rab mdzad pa //
T02TD1784E:2a-16: dam pa'i rang bzhin zla ba bzhin //
T02TD1784E:2a-17: 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas rgyud la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi yi rigs pas rang dang gzhan gyi don mdzad la /
T02TD1784E:2a-18: bya ba dang spyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams 'dul te /
T02TD1784E:2a-19: de la mos pa dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi khams la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshig bshad la /
T02TD1784E:2a-20: de'i rjes la dbang po dman pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba la brten te /
T02TD1784E:2b-0: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir rim gyis @2b gong nas gong du khyad par dang ldan pa /
T02TD1784E:2b-3: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02TD1784E:2b-4: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi dbye bas sngags kyi theg pa chen po rnam pa lnga bstan to //
T02TD1784E:2b-5: de la gti mug gi rigs can gyi sems can la brten te dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1784E:2b-12: brtul zhugs dang sdom pa la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa'i bya ba'i rgyud bka' stsal te /
T02TD1784E:2b-13: dper na sgron ma 'byung ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:2b-14: de'i rjes la dbang po dman pa dang par pa'i gti mug gi rigs can gyi sems can gyi khams la brten te dngos grub dang ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa dang mthu dang ldan pa dpal mchog dang po la sogs pa spyod pa'i rgyud gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:2b-15: de'i rjes la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dman pa'i rigs can gyi sems can la brten te de rnam par dag pa'i thabs su gyur pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:2b-16: de bzhin du bar pa dang lhag pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi rigs can la brten te rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:2b-17: 'ba' zhig lhag pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi rigs can la brten te rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:2b-18: de la bya ba'i phyogs ni dbang po dman pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1784E:2b-19: spyod pa'i phyogs ni dbang po bar pa rnams la'o //
T02TD1784E:2b-20: rnal 'byor chen po dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi phyogs ni dbang po rab kyi rab rnams la bstan te /
T02TD1784E:2b-21: dbang po dbye ba'i rim pa dang yul gyi rnam par dbye ba rab tu bstan to //
T02TD1784E:2b-22: de la rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi phyogs 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi gdul bya sems can gyi rigs rnam pa bzhi la brten te bskal pa bzang po la lag na rdo rje la brten te snyigs ma lnga'i dus 'di la sems can rnams kyi tshe dang /
T02TD1784E:2b-23: brtson 'grus dang stobs chung ba nyid du gzigs te /
T02TD1784E:3a-0: de rnams gdon par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la sogs pas thugs dbang du mdzad nas spyod pa gsum spyod pas bde ba'i thabs kyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig ting nge 'dzin @3a * //
T02TD1784E:3a-1: tsam gtso bor gyur pa spros pa dang bral ba dpal gsang ba 'dus pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:3a-2: de la 'di'i re zhig dang po brjod pa la sogs pa lnga bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:3a-3: gang gi phyir de med pas nyan pa po rnams mi 'jug pa'i phyir de rnams bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:3a-10: bstan bcos rnams ni thams cad dang //
T02TD1784E:3a-11: rgyud sogs gang yang rung ba yi //
T02TD1784E:3a-15: brjod par bya ba med pa'i tshig ni le'u bcu la sogs pa'i tshig bzhin du don med par bstan bcos 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:3a-16: ji skad du nyan pa po 'jug 'grub pa ni /
T02TD1784E:3a-17: gang phyir 'brel pa bstan pa ste //
T02TD1784E:3a-18: de phyir bstan bcos rnam kun la //
T02TD1784E:3a-19: 'brel pa sngon du brjod par bya //
T02TD1784E:3a-20: de la 'di'i brjod pa ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1784E:3a-21: brjod par bya ba ni le'u bco brgyad kyi rim pas rdzogs pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po dang de'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1784E:3a-22: yang na dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum ma ma /
T02TD1784E:3a-24: 'ba' zhig pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa gtso bor gyur pa ni rim pa lnga'am rang bzhin la sogs pa'i dbye bas gnas pa don drug ste /
T02TD1784E:3a-25: brjod par bya ba med pa'i tshig ni le'u bcu pa la sogs pa'i tshig bzhin du /
T02TD1784E:3a-26: don med par bstan bcos 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:3a-29: gang phyir 'brel pa bstan pa ste //
T02TD1784E:3a-30: de phyir bstan bcos rnam kun la ;
T02TD1784E:3a-31: /'brel pa sngon du brjod par bya //
T02TD1784E:3a-32: zhes thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyid can nam brjod pa dang brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid can sgra dang don dag la 'brel bar bstan to //
T02TD1784E:3a-33: gal te sgra dang don la don dam pa'i 'brel pa med na yang blos byas pa ni yod pa kho na yin te /
T02TD1784E:3a-34: rnam par rtog pa la phal cher du rnam par dpyad do //
T02TD1784E:3a-35: 'brel pa de yang rnam pa drug yin te /
T02TD1784E:3a-42: de la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po don dam pa'i ngo bo gzugs dang ldan pa bshad mi nus te /
T02TD1784E:3b-0: de dang @3b ldan pas na lam po che'i skyes bu bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1784E:3b-1: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po la 'jig pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:3b-2: gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin na ri bong gi rva bzhin shin tu med pa la mi dmigs pa'i phyir bsnyen pa kur byed pa med pas lkugs pa dang ;
T02TD1784E:3b-3: long ba dang 'dra ba bla ma dang slob ma med par grol bar thal bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:3b-4: med pa la don bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:3b-5: de bas na 'dir ji ltar gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:3b-6: de'i lan 'di yin te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ni rnam pa dang bcas pa yin la rnam pa med pa yang yin no //
T02TD1784E:3b-7: 'o na grib ma dang nyi ma bzhin du 'gal ba'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:3b-8: mi 'gyur te gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal ba las gcig tu ldang bar mdzad la /
T02TD1784E:3b-9: brgya byin gyi gzhu bzhin du sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir sku sprul pa ste /
T02TD1784E:3b-11: skye ba dang rga ba dang /
T02TD1784E:3b-12: mi rtag pa la sogs pas 'dus byas pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:3b-13: ye shes kyi sku nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:3b-14: rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:3b-15: de bas na rnam pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das rigs pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:3b-16: rnam pa med pa yang bcom ldan 'das ni 'od gsal ba la bzhugs pa'i dus su pho mo ma ning ni rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pas phung po dang /
T02TD1784E:3b-18: skye mched ma lus pa la stong pa nyid kyi mes bsregs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:3b-20: gos bzhin dngos po rnams la ni //
T02TD1784E:3b-21: rnam pa du mas tha dad la //
T02TD1784E:3b-22: stong nyid me yis bsregs pa la //
T02TD1784E:3b-23: thal ba'i dbye ba gang yang med//
T02TD1784E:3b-25: de bas na rnam pa med pa yang ngo //
T02TD1784E:3b-27: tha dad pa'i bya ba la brten pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:3b-28: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po de lta bus rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las sam /
T02TD1784E:3b-29: nang gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rim pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga spros te /
T02TD1784E:3b-30: de rnams la de kho na nyid gang bstan pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brel pa'o //
T02TD1784E:3b-31: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis 'dod chags kyi rigs can gyi sems can rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir rang gi sa bon de nyid las lha mo bzhi spros te /
T02TD1784E:4a-0: de rnams la gang chos kyi de kho na nyid gsungs pa de ni lha mo'i 'brel @4a * //
T02TD1784E:4a-2: dper na lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rgyud la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:4a-3: de la ni rdo rje 'chang chen po kho na gdul bya'i phyir bud med kyi gzugs can te /
T02TD1784E:4a-4: gang gi phyir de kho na nyid la bud med dang skyes bu'i dbye ba med pa ste /
T02TD1784E:4a-5: rnam pa med pas nam mkha' bzhin du mi phyed pa'i phyir ro ;
T02TD1784E:4a-6: / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa la brten te dpal kye rdo rje la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams las gang zhig de kho na nyid gsungs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'brel pa'o //
T02TD1784E:4a-7: brgya byin gyis yongs su zhus pa la sogs pa la gang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa de ni lha'i 'brel pa'o //
T02TD1784E:4a-8: lha dang klu dang drang srong la brten te gang zhig de kho na nyid bstan pa de ni lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'brel pa ste /
T02TD1784E:4a-9: dper na mi sbyin gyis bu la brten te /
T02TD1784E:4a-10: sgron ma'i rtog pa la sogs pa la'o //
T02TD1784E:4a-11: rgyal po rab gsal la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de ni mi'i 'brel pa'o //
T02TD1784E:4a-12: la la na re rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:4a-13: de rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnams la gsungs so zhes zer ro //
T02TD1784E:4a-14: bems po bems po mi rten pas //
T02TD1784E:4a-16: bems po sgra dang don 'brel pas //
T02TD1784E:4a-17: gnyis pa rjod byed nyan pa po'o //
T02TD1784E:4a-18: gnyis pa'i rnam pa drug yin te //
T02TD1784E:4a-19: zhal nas zhal gyi rim pas byung //
T02TD1784E:4a-20: de bzhin gshegs sogs dbye ba yis //
T02TD1784E:4a-21: blo ldan rnams kyis bshad pa yin //
T02TD1784E:4a-22: zhes bya ba mdor bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so //
T02TD1784E:4a-23: 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brel pa ste /
T02TD1784E:4a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bskyed de /
T02TD1784E:4a-25: de rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:4a-26: dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa don bcu drug la thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas rnal 'byor bas gang zhig rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pa de ni dgos pa'o //
T02TD1784E:4a-27: rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas dbugs dbyung ba rnam pa gnyis kyi rim pas gang zhig gzhan ma rnams rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du mdzad pa de ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02TD1784E:4a-28: de nas 'dir ni rnam par dpyad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:4a-29: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:4b-9: chos gtan la phab pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD1784E:4b-10: de rnams kyi nang nas 'di gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1784E:4b-11: 'dir lan smras pa mdo sde zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1784E:4b-13: sna tshogs don dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1784E:4b-14: tshig nyung yang dag ldan pa ste //
T02TD1784E:4b-15: gtan tshigs dpe rnams kyis grub pa //
T02TD1784E:4b-16: mdo sde mkhan gyis brjod de bzhin //
T02TD1784E:4b-17: zab pa'i don gsal bar byed pas na mdo sde zhes bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:4b-18: gal te de lta bu yin na /
T02TD1784E:4b-19: dgos pa bsdus dang bcas pa dang //
T02TD1784E:4b-20: tshig don bcas dang dgos par ldan //
T02TD1784E:4b-21: the tshom lan dang bcas pa ste //
T02TD1784E:4b-22: mdo sde'i don la mkhas pas brjod //
T02TD1784E:4b-23: ces bya bas dgos pa la sogs pa bshad du rung ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:4b-24: de ni bden pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:4b-25: 'on kyang brjod pa la sogs pa lngas de rnams bshad zin te /
T02TD1784E:4b-27: 'di lta ste dgos pas ni dgos pa bshad zin to //
T02TD1784E:4b-28: brjod par bya bas ni tshig gi don dang don bsdus pa dang dgongs pa rnams te tshig gi don kho na brjod par bya ba ste /
T02TD1784E:4b-29: de ji srid dum dor bsdus pa ma byas pa'am /
T02TD1784E:4b-30: dgongs pa dang bcas pa ma bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:4b-31: de srid du sus len par byed de /
T02TD1784E:4b-32: de bzhin du 'brel pas ni the tshom dang ldan bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:4b-33: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas gang zhig sngar 'brel ba bshad pa de la nges par the tshom dang ldan gyi sgo nas chos kyi bstan pa byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:4b-34: de bas na dgos pa la sogs pa drug brjod pa la sogs pa'i nang du bsdus pa ste logs su mi bstan to //
T02TD1784E:4b-35: da ni byis pa'i blo grub par bya ba'i phyir mdor bsdus pas le'u bco brgyad kyi don bsdus pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:4b-36: de la re zhig le'u dang po las rnam pa gnyis kyis lha'i rnal 'byor sgom pas sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor spros te /
T02TD1784E:4b-37: rgyud ma lus pa'i don gyis 'bras bur gyur pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa byung ba'i rjes su zhugs pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal to //
T02TD1784E:5a-0: rnam pa gnyis kyi rim pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis dgod pa byung bas de bzlog par bya ba'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa la bzhugs pa'i rdzogs pa'i @5a * //
T02TD1784E:5a-1: rim pa 'ba' zhig gtso bor gyur pa byang chub kyi sems kyi le'u bstan to //
T02TD1784E:5a-2: don dam pa la zhugs pas gzhan gyi don med pa'i phyir smon lam gyi 'bras bu med pas de'i skyon sel bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su dag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i le'u gsum pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5a-3: yongs su dag pa'i sbra ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD1784E:5a-4: gcig ni bskyed pa'i rim pa rjod par byed pa dang /
T02TD1784E:5a-5: gnyis pa ni rang la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rjod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5a-6: 'dir ni gnyis ka yang gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:5a-7: rig ma'i dbang thob pas phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir le'u bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5a-8: dbang thob pas spyod pa spyod de le'u lnga pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5a-9: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa med pas spyod pa 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:5a-10: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa ston par byed pa le'u drug pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5a-11: de yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin la /
T02TD1784E:5a-12: gzhan yang phra mo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:5a-14: le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa'i spyod pa le'u bdun pa las rgyas par bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:5a-15: khyad par ni ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:5a-16: rgyas pa'i don shes nas bde bas go ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:5a-17: ji skad du cho ga de rnams ni legs par bsdus pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:5a-18: gang gi mtshan nyid dang spros pa bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:5a-19: de ltar na yang dngos grub med pas gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba'i rnam par rtog pa zhi bar mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:5a-20: de'i phyir gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u brgyad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5a-21: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob pas de'i dus grub pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po'i stobs kyis rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir le'u dgu pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5a-22: sngags la mos pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas gsang ba'i dbang thob pas phyi nas sngags kyis bskul pas rdo rje 'chang chen po grub pa'i phyir le'u bcu pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5a-23: de ltar na le'u dgu pa dang bcu pa ni brgyad pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:5a-24: myur ba dang ring par dpyod par byed pa'i slob ma'i dbye bas so //
T02TD1784E:5a-25: drag shul gyi rnal 'byor dang snying po bskul bdag gis gang zhig rdo rje 'chang chen po thob pa de ni de'i dbye ba gnyis pa ste /
T02TD1784E:5a-26: sngags kyi sku rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:5a-27: ye shes kyi sku rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5a-28: sngags kyi sku ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD1784E:5a-29: ye shes kyi sku ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste /
T02TD1784E:5a-30: de'i phyir le'u bcu gcig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5b-0: ye shes kyi sku la zhugs pas sems can gyi don bya ba'i @5b phyir rigs kyi dbye bas phyag rgya chen por yongs su 'gyur pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5b-1: sems can gyi don de yang rigs kyi dbye bas las kyi tshogs pas 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:5b-2: de'i phyir le'u bcu gsum pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5b-3: lha'i 'khor lo'i dbye bas las kyi tshogs grub par bya ba'i phyir le'u bcu bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5b-4: gal te las kyi tshogs kyi sgo nas zhe na pa rags pa skye bar 'gyur pa de'i skyon sel bar bya ba'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byed pa'i le'u bcom ldan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5b-5: le'u bcu drug pa ni le'u bzhi pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:5b-6: de la le'u bzhi pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa bstan to ;
T02TD1784E:5b-7: / khyad par ni rgyas pa dang mdor bsdus pas byas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5b-8: de yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
T02TD1784E:5b-9: le'u thams cad kyi yang na de yan lag yin pas de nyid kyi phyir phyis bstan to //
T02TD1784E:5b-10: de ltar na rang gi don sgrub pa dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa bstan to //
T02TD1784E:5b-11: de dag kyang dam tshig dang sdom pa'i sgo nas 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:5b-12: de'i don ston par byed pa le'u bcu bdun pa'o //
T02TD1784E:5b-13: de'i 'og ma le'u gzhan med de bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:5b-14: 'o na le'u bco brgyad pa yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T02TD1784E:5b-16: de ni gzhan ma rnams kyi 'grel ba dang 'dra ba yin te /
T02TD1784E:5b-18: de nyid kyi phyir de'i ming ni rgyud phyi ma dang 'dus pa phyi ma zhes so //
T02TD1784E:5b-19: de'i don gyi rnam par dbye ba ni de nyid du bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:5b-20: da ni brjod pa la sogs pa lnga'i nang nas gnyis pa brjod bya rnam pa bcu drug pa gang yin pa de'i dbye ba bshad pa'i rgyud rnams las bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:5b-21: de la re zhig dang po tshig gi don bcu drug ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:5b-28: sems rnams par dag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:5b-29: rang byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1784E:5b-30: mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD1784E:5b-31: zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa dang rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:5b-35: sgrub pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid shes pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:5b-36: mdor bstan pa'i tshig 'di rnams kyi rgyas par bshad pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje phreng ba las bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:5b-37: de nas rdo rje 'chang ba bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1784E:6a-2: phyag na rdo rje yid dga'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:6a-3: lha yi rnam pa 'grub pa bstan //
T02TD1784E:6a-4: byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas ni //
T02TD1784E:6a-5: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs te //
T02TD1784E:6a-6: tshad med pa rnams bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD1784E:6a-7: bsod nams kyi ni 'phel bya'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:6a-8: bla ma sangs rgyas sogs dge slong //
T02TD1784E:6a-9: yang dag mchod cing 'gro don bya //
T02TD1784E:6a-10: sngags ni rjes su dran byas nas //
T02TD1784E:6a-11: thams cad stong pa rjes dran bya //
T02TD1784E:6a-12: lus ngag yid ni stong nyid du //
T02TD1784E:6a-13: de bzhin du ni khams gsum pa //
T02TD1784E:6a-14: bsgoms nas de ltar rnal 'byor ni //
T02TD1784E:6a-15: dang po sbyor ba zhes 'dod do //
T02TD1784E:6a-16: de nas gzhan don grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:6a-17: stong nyid rang bzhin spang ba'i phyir//
T02TD1784E:6a-18: blo ldan lha mos bskul ba ni //
T02TD1784E:6a-19: gzugs brnyan bzung bar bya ba'o //
T02TD1784E:6a-20: nyon mongs nye nyon gzhig bya'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:6a-21: rim pa ji bzhin gnas ji bzhin //
T02TD1784E:6a-22: phung po khams la sogs las 'byung //
T02TD1784E:6a-23: dkyil 'khor pa rnams spro bar bya //
T02TD1784E:6a-24: bsgom pa'i lam ni de lta bu //
T02TD1784E:6a-25: rnal 'byor pas gang bsgom pa ste //
T02TD1784E:6a-26: de ni dkyil 'khor rgyal pa mchog / rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:6a-27: sku gsung thugs la dgod pa dang //
T02TD1784E:6a-28: ye shes sems sogs sbyor ba ste //
T02TD1784E:6a-29: bstod mchod bdud rtsi myang ba ni //
T02TD1784E:6a-30: las kyi rgyal mchog bstan pa yin //
T02TD1784E:6a-31: de nyid tha mal pa'i yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor sgom pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:6a-32: don yod grub pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD1784E:6a-33: gzhal yas khang ni rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1784E:6a-34: dbang ni mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1784E:6a-35: bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med //
T02TD1784E:6a-36: bstod pa dpal ldan rin chen 'byung //
T02TD1784E:6a-37: mchod pa don yod grub yin te //
T02TD1784E:6a-38: rdor sems rjes su chags pa yin //
T02TD1784E:6a-39: rdo rje rjes su chags pa dang //
T02TD1784E:6a-40: sangs rgyas gnas ni rnam bsgom dang ;
T02TD1784E:6a-41: / dbang dang bdud rtsi myang ba dang //
T02TD1784E:6a-42: mchod pa bstod pa yan lag drug / yan lag drug ni rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1784E:6a-43: bsgoms na dngos grub brnyes par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:6a-44: de ni dang por sbyor ba po la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i lam mo //
T02TD1784E:6a-45: de bzhin du 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las kyang /
T02TD1784E:6a-46: bskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang //
T02TD1784E:6a-47: rdzogs pa'i rim pa de bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:6a-48: rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //
T02TD1784E:6a-49: rdor 'chang rnams kyis chos bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:6a-50: dang po stong nyid byang chub dang //
T02TD1784E:6a-51: gnyis pa sa bon bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1784E:6a-52: gsum pa gzugs brnyan 'grub pa ste //
T02TD1784E:6a-53: bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa yin //
T02TD1784E:6b-0: de tsam gyis bskyed pa'i rim @6b pa bstan to //
T02TD1784E:6b-1: gzhan du yang khyad par gyis bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:6b-2: dper na rnal 'byor ma'i snying po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1784E:6b-3: da ni bshad par bya ba ste //
T02TD1784E:6b-4: dam tshig rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1784E:6b-5: dngos grub rnams kyi rgyud nyid dang //
T02TD1784E:6b-6: dam tshig rnams ni bsrung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:6b-7: dam tshig dang ni sgrub pa dang //
T02TD1784E:6b-8: de bzhin sgrub pa chen po ste //
T02TD1784E:6b-9: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
T02TD1784E:6b-10: de phyir gsum po rtag tu bya //
T02TD1784E:6b-11: dam tshig bdud rtsi lnga nyid dang //
T02TD1784E:6b-12: sgrub pa sha ni lnga po ste //
T02TD1784E:6b-13: bla ma dang bcas dga' ba ni //
T02TD1784E:6b-14: sgrub pa chen po de nyid yin //
T02TD1784E:6b-15: the tshom yang dag yongs spangs nas //
T02TD1784E:6b-16: dgod pa rol pa de bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:6b-17: gtso bo bla mas lha mo kye //
T02TD1784E:6b-18: dga' ba'i rol pa sba mi bya //
T02TD1784E:6b-19: mchan khung nas ni de bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:6b-20: bla ma dga' bar gyur pa na //
T02TD1784E:6b-21: des kyang thar pa'i 'bras bu ster //
T02TD1784E:6b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:6b-23: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:6b-24: lha mo nyon cig rab bshad bya //
T02TD1784E:6b-25: chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa ste //
T02TD1784E:6b-26: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni //
T02TD1784E:6b-27: ro dang reg pa de bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:6b-28: chos kyi khams dag bshad pa ni //
T02TD1784E:6b-29: khams ni bco brgyad de bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:6b-30: de rnams las ni yang dag byung //
T02TD1784E:6b-31: shu kra zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD1784E:6b-32: shu kra las kyang gong bu skye //
T02TD1784E:6b-33: gong bu las kyang yid byung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:6b-34: nam mkha'i khams dang chu yi khams //
T02TD1784E:6b-35: chos kyi khams dang skye mched rnams//
T02TD1784E:6b-36: dbang po phung po 'byung ba rnams //
T02TD1784E:6b-37: chu yi khams ni pha las skye //
T02TD1784E:6b-38: me khams ma las skyes pa yin //
T02TD1784E:6b-39: pags pa sha dang khrag dag ni //
T02TD1784E:6b-40: ma las skyes zhes bshad pa yin //
T02TD1784E:6b-41: tsa rgyus glad pa shu kra dang //
T02TD1784E:6b-42: de ni pha las skyes pa yin //
T02TD1784E:6b-43: de dag cha rnams thams cad ni //
T02TD1784E:6b-44: gong bu sdud par byed pa yin //
T02TD1784E:6b-45: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
T02TD1784E:6b-46: 'du byed rnam par shes pa dang //
T02TD1784E:6b-47: sangs rgyas lnga po gzugs brnyan ni //
T02TD1784E:6b-48: phung po la sogs bshad pa yin //
T02TD1784E:6b-50: de bzhin du rdo rje bdud rtsi las kyang /
T02TD1784E:6b-51: bha ga'i dbus su nam mkha' gang //
T02TD1784E:6b-52: nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1784E:6b-53: lte ba ge sar dang bcas pa //
T02TD1784E:6b-54: 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1784E:6b-55: thig le'i ngo bo bdud rtsi ni //
T02TD1784E:6b-56: de la gnas pa rtag tu 'dzag / gang zhig bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i rtsa //
T02TD1784E:6b-57: bha ga'i dbus su rab gnas pa //
T02TD1784E:6b-58: sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa gzhan dag / de rnams kyi nang gtso bo ste //
T02TD1784E:6b-60: de lta'i rim pa ni a'a li dang /
T02TD1784E:7a-4: rtsa lnga las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems las nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa'am /
T02TD1784E:7a-6: bu dang tsha bo la sogs pa'i rim pas khams gsum pa gang skyed par gyur pa de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:7a-7: rnam pa de lta bu gzhan ma yang bla ma'i zhal nas thob nas dpyad par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:7a-8: de bzhin du phra mo'i thig le'i rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD1784E:7a-9: de kho na nyid bzhi pa mngon du bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:7a-10: dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1784E:7a-11: cha gnyis pa dang dgu pa nyid du bshad //
T02TD1784E:7a-12: sum cu bcu pa lnga pa'i sa bon nyid ;
T02TD1784E:7a-13: / cha gnyis pa dang lnga pa drug pa phye //
T02TD1784E:7a-14: de ni thig le nges par 'byung bar bshad //
T02TD1784E:7a-16: de bzhin du kha sbyor thig le las kyang /
T02TD1784E:7a-17: cha bzhi yang dag ldan pa ni //
T02TD1784E:7a-18: padma bzhi la rnam par gnas //
T02TD1784E:7a-19: mgo med snying ga'i padmar gnas //
T02TD1784E:7a-20: lkog ma'i padmar mgo bo gnas //
T02TD1784E:7a-21: lte ba'i padmar sgra gnas pa //
T02TD1784E:7a-24: thig le'i rnal 'byor rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1784E:7a-25: snom pa dang ni nyan pa dang //
T02TD1784E:7a-26: blta ba de bzhin mdzes pa dang //
T02TD1784E:7a-27: reg pa la ni zhugs pa dang //
T02TD1784E:7a-28: bde ba sdug bsngal la sogs tshor //
T02TD1784E:7a-29: glo bur dgos pa smra ba dang //
T02TD1784E:7a-30: du ba smre sngags byed pa dang //
T02TD1784E:7a-31: gcod pa dang ni phye ba dang //
T02TD1784E:7a-32: de bcings pa dang grol 'gyur ba //
T02TD1784E:7a-33: rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa dang //
T02TD1784E:7a-34: de bzhin du ni phyug po nyid //
T02TD1784E:7a-35: bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang //
T02TD1784E:7a-36: dmangs rigs la sogs rigs rnams ni //
T02TD1784E:7a-37: bud med sgyu ma mang byas nas //
T02TD1784E:7a-38: dud 'gro yi dgas la sogs pa ;
T02TD1784E:7a-39: / gzugs ldan gzugs ni mi ldan pa //
T02TD1784E:7a-40: nam mkha' gzugs can gyur pa 'am //
T02TD1784E:7a-41: de nyid sgyu ma la gnas pa //
T02TD1784E:7a-42: sems can thams cad skye bar byed //
T02TD1784E:7a-43: bud med gzugs can skyes bu gzugs //
T02TD1784E:7a-44: bde chen go 'phang la gnas pa //
T02TD1784E:7a-45: de ltar de nyid gang gis shes //
T02TD1784E:7a-46: mchog gi yi ger tshor ba ste //
T02TD1784E:7a-47: thams cad bdag nyid gnas pa gang //
T02TD1784E:7a-48: gsang ba zhes ni des tshor ba'o //
T02TD1784E:7a-49: kha dog med pa kha dog dmar //
T02TD1784E:7a-50: kha dog dkar po ser po dang //
T02TD1784E:7a-51: thig le'i ngo bo de yin pa //
T02TD1784E:7a-53: gang zhig rig ma sgyu ma che //
T02TD1784E:7a-54: mtha' yas sna tshogs gzugs ldan ma //
T02TD1784E:7b-0: skye @7b dang 'jig pa'i gnas su ni //
T02TD1784E:7b-1: thig le'i ngo bo rab tu 'jug / chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang //
T02TD1784E:7b-2: bzhi stong yang ni shes pas na //
T02TD1784E:7b-3: de nyid gang gis mi shes na //
T02TD1784E:7b-4: de ni thams cad 'bras bu med //
T02TD1784E:7b-5: bcu gnyis lnga pa brgyad pa mtha' //
T02TD1784E:7b-6: thams cad 'byung ba bsdus pa ste //
T02TD1784E:7b-7: aa sogs yi ge rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1784E:7b-8: lnga pa'i gdan du byas pa ste //
T02TD1784E:7b-9: de ni snying rje che ri mo //
T02TD1784E:7b-10: drug ldan 'og tu kha bltas pa //
T02TD1784E:7b-11: thog med mtha' ma med pa'i lha //
T02TD1784E:7b-12: de yi mgo bor gdab par bya //
T02TD1784E:7b-13: de ltar gsang ba mchog yin te //
T02TD1784E:7b-14: lha mo bdag gis rab tu bshad //
T02TD1784E:7b-16: 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las kyang /
T02TD1784E:7b-17: dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa gsum //
T02TD1784E:7b-18: rgyud 'di la ni rab tu gsal //
T02TD1784E:7b-19: dang po bum pa'i dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1784E:7b-20: gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1784E:7b-21: gsum pa shes rab ye shes te //
T02TD1784E:7b-22: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1784E:7b-24: de nyid yang bshad pa ni dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1784E:7b-25: chos dbyings 'di ni dag pa ste //
T02TD1784E:7b-26: sems can khams ni grol bar byed //
T02TD1784E:7b-27: bde chen rgyal po nyid 'di ru //
T02TD1784E:7b-28: dngos po kun gyis yang dag gnas //
T02TD1784E:7b-29: pha rol phyin pa bcu rdzogs nas //
T02TD1784E:7b-30: stobs dang dbang rnams de bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:7b-31: sa ni bcu pa 'das nas ni //
T02TD1784E:7b-34: de bzhin du gnyis su med par grub pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:7b-35: srid gsum gnas ni thams cad du //
T02TD1784E:7b-36: g-yo dang mi g-yo dngos po gang //
T02TD1784E:7b-37: de rnams de nyid rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1784E:7b-38: rdo rje 'dzin bzhin blta bar bya //
T02TD1784E:7b-39: pha rol rgol ba gang yang rung //
T02TD1784E:7b-40: rtags kyi dbye bas rnam gnas pa //
T02TD1784E:7b-41: de dag yang ni smad mi bya //
T02TD1784E:7b-42: rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa yin //
T02TD1784E:7b-45: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02TD1784E:7b-46: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu gnas //
T02TD1784E:7b-47: sangs rgyas thams cad dngos sems dpa' //
T02TD1784E:7b-48: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02TD1784E:7b-51: phra mo rdo rje rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1784E:7b-52: sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:7b-55: lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:7b-56: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
T02TD1784E:8a-0: ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'di @8a * //
T02TD1784E:8a-2: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so //
T02TD1784E:8a-3: sems rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:8a-4: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:8a-7: rigs kyi bu nam mkha' ni thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD1784E:8a-8: rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la //
T02TD1784E:8a-9: kun rdzob yang ni rab tu brjod //
T02TD1784E:8a-10: ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa kho nar bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:8a-12: da ni rdo rje bzlas pa bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:8a-13: dper na rab tu byed pa las ni /
T02TD1784E:8a-14: rlung gi de nyid rim gyis ni ;
T02TD1784E:8a-15: / sngags kyi de nyid la zhugs bya //
T02TD1784E:8a-16: sngags kyi grub pa thob nas ni //
T02TD1784E:8a-17: rdo rje bzlas pa la bslab bya //
T02TD1784E:8a-19: de la rdo rje bzlas pa 'di'i thabs bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:8a-20: snying ga'i gnas las gang zhig srog ces bya ba'i rlung phung po dang dbang po la gnas pa /
T02TD1784E:8a-21: rnam pa bcus nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor gyi rim pas gyen du rgyu ba kha dang sna las srog dang rtsol ba'i ngo bos 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang bar byed pa 'khor ba'i 'khor lor thams cad 'jug par byed de /
T02TD1784E:8a-22: yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis de nyid ni rnal 'byor pas spyi bo dang lkog ma dang snying gar nye bar bsdus nas rdo rje bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:8a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi rim pas 'khor lo la sogs pa'i gzhi la gnas pa spro ba dang sdud par byed pa spyi bo la sogs par yi ge gsum bkod la /
T02TD1784E:8a-25: cha phyed dang gsum dang ldan pa'i yi ge aom rim gyis thig le'i nang du bsdus te /
T02TD1784E:8a-26: thig le de yang gsung gi sa bon gyi thig le gnyis la bsdus te /
T02TD1784E:8a-27: gsung gi sa bon de yang cha gnyis pa rang gi thig le gnyis po la nye bar bsdus te /
T02TD1784E:8a-28: thig le yang thugs rdo rje sa bon gyi thig le la zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:8a-29: thugs kyi sa bon ni cha bzhi pa ste /
T02TD1784E:8a-30: dper na ha au mgo bo la sogs pa de rnams ni gcig la gcig zhugs pas thig le'i nang du bsdu bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:8a-32: mi gsal ba'i ngo bo dang /
T02TD1784E:8a-35: phyag rgya ma lus pa'i ngo bo kha dog lnga pa de srid du bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:8a-36: ji srid du de la dmigs pa yang rnal 'byor pa la ldog par 'gyur ro//
T02TD1784E:8b-0: @8b dmigs pa ldog pas dag rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:8b-1: de bzhin du dbus kyi lam las thig le de nyid padma'i sna ru 'gag par byas te /
T02TD1784E:8b-2: snga ma bzhin du spro ba pa la sogs pa byas la rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bsgom pas gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:8b-3: de bzhin du thig le de nyid yang gyen du drangs pa kun rdzob sna la tsa sna ka'i tshad tsam spro ba la sogs pa'i rim pas bsam par byas la rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal skyed par byed de /
T02TD1784E:8b-4: zhe sdang dang 'dod chags dang gti mug gi rigs can gyi sems can la brten te sna gsum brtag pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:8b-5: 'o na kun rdzob kyi sna dang /
T02TD1784E:8b-8: padma'i phyi'i sna yang gzhan du bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:8b-9: ji ltar rigs gsum gyi sems can gtso bor gyur pa 'grub po zhe na /
T02TD1784E:8b-11: 'on kyang phyi rol gyi sna la thig le dgod pa mi rigs te /
T02TD1784E:8b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la ni char rengs pa'i sngags gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:8b-14: h'um phat yang dag ldan pa ni //
T02TD1784E:8b-15: g-yo ba grub par rab tu bshad //
T02TD1784E:8b-17: de lta bu'i bzlas pa la goms pa'i rnal 'byor pa skad cig mas rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:8b-18: rlung gi de kho na nyid bstan to //
T02TD1784E:8b-20: sna'i rtse mor yungs kar bsam //
T02TD1784E:8b-21: g-yo dang mi g-yo yungs kar la //
T02TD1784E:8b-22: gsang ba'i ye shes kyis brtags pa //
T02TD1784E:8b-23: dgyes pa'i ye shes gnas bsgom bya //
T02TD1784E:8b-24: kha dog lnga pa nor bu che //
T02TD1784E:8b-25: yungs kar tsam ni rags pa ste //
T02TD1784E:8b-26: rtsol bas sna yi rtse mo ru //
T02TD1784E:8b-27: rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bsgom bya //
T02TD1784E:8b-29: de bzhin du gsang ba dang lte ba dang snying ga dang lkog ma'i gnas rnams la 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin can 'khor lo bzhi ste /
T02TD1784E:8b-30: de rnams las rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog dmar po 'od zer g-yas pa las spro zhing sna'i rtse mor thun phyed phyed kyi dus su gnas pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:8b-31: de bzhin du g-yon pa las 'byung pa ljang ser gnas pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:8b-32: sna khung gnyis ka las kha dog ser po gnas pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:8b-33: de bzhin du dal bus dman par rgyu ba kha dog dkar po rlung gi gnas pa 'jug go //
T02TD1784E:9a-1: gi bdag po nyid du dmigs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:9a-2: de ltar na 'bad pa med par rnal 'byor pa la zhi ba la sogs pa 'grub ste /
T02TD1784E:9a-3: de kho na nyid yongs su shes pas so //
T02TD1784E:9a-5: don dam par ni don gcig mthong ba na //
T02TD1784E:9a-6: 'gro ba ma lus don gcig mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:9a-7: 'gram gyi phyogs su chu ni 'thung bas kyang //
T02TD1784E:9a-8: rgya mtsho ma lus pa ni shes par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:9a-10: lus thams cad khyab par byed pa'i rlung gang yin pa de rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin shi pa'i lus las 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:9a-11: de la las gzhan ni ma mthong ste rlung gi de kho na nyid do sngags kyi de kho na nyid ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1784E:9a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba sngags thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba shin tu zab pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las ngag gi lam gyi nges par tshig gis phyung ngo //
T02TD1784E:9a-13: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02TD1784E:9a-14: re zhig dang po nam mkha' las rlung byung ste /
T02TD1784E:9a-15: de yang g-yon dang g-yas pa'i lam gyis brgyud bzhin lus las 'byung zhing khar phyin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:9a-16: de nas gnas brgyad du reg par byed de /
T02TD1784E:9a-18: yi ge rnams kyi gnas brgyad de ;
T02TD1784E:9a-19: / brang dang lkog ma spyi bo ste //
T02TD1784E:9a-20: lce rtsa dang ni so rnams dang //
T02TD1784E:9a-21: sna dang mchu dang rkan rnams so //
T02TD1784E:9a-23: de rnams su reg cing a'a li k'a li'i yi ge'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid can yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'i rang bzhin can thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo yi ge'i phyi mo skyed par byed de ;
T02TD1784E:9a-24: yi ge'i phyi mo de yang shing la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin du tshig rnams skyed par byed de /
T02TD1784E:9a-25: de rnams kyis kyang 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag dang ngag chen po dang /
T02TD1784E:9a-26: ji srid rig pa'i gnas rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD1784E:9a-27: 'jig rten pa'i rnam pa bcu bzhi dang /
T02TD1784E:9a-29: sna tshogs pa'i rol mo la sogs pa skyed par byed de /
T02TD1784E:9a-30: de bas na de rnams thams cad dang /
T02TD1784E:9a-31: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad yi ge phyi mo nyid las 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:9a-33: gal te sgra zhes sgron ma 'di //
T02TD1784E:9a-35: khams gsum pa ni thams cad 'di //
T02TD1784E:9b-0: @9b mun nag nyid du skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:9b-1: dang po rgyal po'i grags gzugs kyis //
T02TD1784E:9b-2: ngag dngos me long la brten te //
T02TD1784E:9b-3: de rnams gnas par mi 'gyur yang //
T02TD1784E:9b-4: ltos shig rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD1784E:9b-5: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang a'a li dang k'a li'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan to //
T02TD1784E:9b-6: bsdu ba'i rim pa yang bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:9b-7: dper na a'a li la sogs pa'i sde tshan brgyad ni rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi ngo bo yin no //
T02TD1784E:9b-8: de rnams kyang dang po'i yi ge rnams la thim pa ste yi ge brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:9b-9: yi ge brgyad po de rnams kyang dbyangs dang gsal byed dang yi ge'i dbye bas gsum du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:9b-10: dper na dbyangs ni shes rab kyi ngo bo yin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:9b-11: gsal byed ni thabs kyi ngo bo yin no //
T02TD1784E:9b-12: ya la sogs pa ni gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yin no //
T02TD1784E:9b-13: de nyid kyi phyir de rnams ni bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning gi ngo bor shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:9b-14: de bas ni a'a: ni dbyangs sdud par byed pa ste shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:9b-15: h'um ni gsal byed sdud par byed pa ste thabs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:9b-16: aom ni ya ra la wa la sogs pa sdud par byed pa ste ma ning gi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:9b-17: yi ge gsum po de yang khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1784E:9b-18: sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo dang /
T02TD1784E:9b-19: zla ba dang nyi ma dang me'i ngo bo rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1784E:9b-21: mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:9b-22: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:9b-23: 'chi ba la sogs pa srid pa gsum gyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:9b-24: de rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du nye bar bsdus te lte ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi yi ge la zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:9b-25: tshig thams cad skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang bral ba dam pa'i yi ge thung ba la zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:9b-26: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor pas gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:9b-27: dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor chen po las kyang /
T02TD1784E:9b-28: gang zhig yi ge kun gyi mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:9b-29: de bzhin du gzhan yang sngags kyi ngo bo rnam pa bzhi yin te /
T02TD1784E:9b-33: sngags kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1784E:10a-0: @10a * // de la re zhig sngags btu ba ni sngar bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:10a-1: rnam pa gzhan gyis bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-2: 'dir ni lte bar gnas pa'i rtsibs brgyad pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i yi ge aa las rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis kha dog dkar po'i 'od spros te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khor lo'i steng du yi ge aom gyi ngo bos spyi bo'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-3: de bzhin du gsung rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis lkog mar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la padma'i steng du kha dog dmar po yi ge a'a: dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-4: de bzhin du snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i steng du thugs rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis nam mkha'i kha dog dang 'dra ba'i yi ge h'um dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-5: de nas bzlas par byas te /
T02TD1784E:10a-6: nang gi bdag nyid kyi rim pas sngags btu ba'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-7: sngags kyi brnga ni dper na sprul lta bu'i sngags ni /
T02TD1784E:10a-8: aom dang sv'a h'a dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-9: mgo med sngags ni aom med pa'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-10: mtha' med sngags ni sv'a h'a med pa'o//
T02TD1784E:10a-11: btu ba'i sngags ni gnyi ga med pa'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-12: rigs de dang mthun pa brnga gzhan ma rnams kyang las kyi tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang bar shes par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:10a-13: dper na snying po ni bcom ldan 'das la mngon du rjod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-14: nye ba'i snying po ni yan lag gi sgo nas so //
T02TD1784E:10a-15: snying po skul bar byed pa ni gzhan las dngos grub mngon du byed phar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:10a-16: rtsa ba'i sngags ni bzlas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:10a-17: phreng ba'i sngags ni mchod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:10a-18: rig sngags ni las kyi chogs grub par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-19: gzung sngags ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub 'grub par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-20: sa bon rnams ni lha'i sku rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:10a-21: de la sogs pa'i brnga rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mos pa dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi don du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:10a-22: sngags kyi don ni dper na sku gsung thugs kyi rigs kyi gtso bor gyur pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa yi ge gsum po'i don yin no //
T02TD1784E:10a-23: aa'i don ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i yin no //
T02TD1784E:10a-25: aa yig bstan pa'i ye shes ni //
T02TD1784E:10a-26: sangs rgyas kyi ni snying po yin //
T02TD1784E:10a-28: de lta bu'i don gyi sgo nas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD1784E:10a-30: don rtogs pa yi bzlas pa ni //
T02TD1784E:10b-0: ngo bo nyid med bzang po @10b yis ;
T02TD1784E:10b-1: / dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams brtag pa //
T02TD1784E:10b-2: de ni rdo rje bzlas par bshad //
T02TD1784E:10b-4: sngags kyi de kho na nyid ni de bzhin nyid yin te /
T02TD1784E:10b-5: gang gi phyir sngags thams cad ni 'od gsal ba las 'byung zhing de nyid du thim par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:10b-6: 'od gsal ba yang gang zhig rnal 'byor pas thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bor shes na de ni khams gsum pa'i bla ma lta dang mi rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:10b-7: de nyid kyi phyir gang gis sngags kyi de kho na nyid mi shes na /
T02TD1784E:10b-8: de las kun rtsom pa ni 'bras bu med pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:10b-10: so mchu rkan dang lce rnams kyis //
T02TD1784E:10b-11: gang zhig g-yo bar gyur pa na //
T02TD1784E:10b-12: 'gyur ba nyid du gang gnas pa //
T02TD1784E:10b-13: de ni yi ge ga la yin //
T02TD1784E:10b-14: de phyir yi ge ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1784E:10b-15: sngags rnams 'dod pa ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:10b-16: gang phyir rtsa mchog dag kyang ni //
T02TD1784E:10b-17: 'gugs par byed par mi nus so //
T02TD1784E:10b-19: 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las kyang /
T02TD1784E:10b-20: dbang po rnams dang yul rnams la //
T02TD1784E:10b-21: brten dang yid ni gang byung ba //
T02TD1784E:10b-22: de ni man zhes bshad pa yin //
T02TD1784E:10b-23: tra ni skyob pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1784E:10b-24: brjod pa bzlas pa zhes bshad pa //
T02TD1784E:10b-25: ngag ni thams cad sngags su brjod //
T02TD1784E:10b-26: sngags ni yid skyob bshad pa ste //
T02TD1784E:10b-27: de nyid dbye pas brjod pa yin //
T02TD1784E:10b-29: don 'di nyid la dgongs nas dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i 'dus pa bshad pa'i rgyud las kyang //
T02TD1784E:10b-30: dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na //
T02TD1784E:10b-31: gang zhig bcu yis ma bcings na //
T02TD1784E:10b-32: de ni bcings med ces bya ste //
T02TD1784E:10b-33: de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas ;
T02TD1784E:10b-34: / dbyangs dang gsal bya'i yi ge ste //
T02TD1784E:10b-35: grangs dku yi ni rjes 'jug pa //
T02TD1784E:10b-36: aas bcings phan tshun yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1784E:10b-37: gang gis shes de 'gro ba'i bla //
T02TD1784E:10b-38: gang zhig shes nas dngos grub 'dod //
T02TD1784E:10b-39: gzugs med gzugs dang bral ba ste //
T02TD1784E:10b-40: rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1784E:10b-41: de tshe des ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:10b-42: 'byung po'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1784E:10b-43: cha la sogs te bcu drug gnas //
T02TD1784E:10b-44: lnga pa lnga ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD1784E:10b-45: bzhi ni gsum du nges par sbyar //
T02TD1784E:10b-46: yi ge aom bcas reng por bcas //
T02TD1784E:10b-47: yon tan sbyor sogs byis dang mtshungs //
T02TD1784E:10b-48: thung du ma lus ngag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:11a-2: ya yi don gyis gang yang rung //
T02TD1784E:11a-3: dngos grub 'dod par bya ba ste //
T02TD1784E:11a-4: ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis //
T02TD1784E:11a-5: 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug / yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad dang //
T02TD1784E:11a-6: gang yang mngon par phyogs pa rnams //
T02TD1784E:11a-7: bud med skyes pa ma ning ste ;
T02TD1784E:11a-8: / khams la sogs pa rab tu brtag /'og nas steng du bcas par ni //
T02TD1784E:11a-9: shes nas blo ni nges par sbyar //
T02TD1784E:11a-10: drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang gcig / ngo med ngo bo las skyes pa //
T02TD1784E:11a-11: de rnams ya sogs don sbyar na //
T02TD1784E:11a-12: dus gsum ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:11a-13: 'gro ba dag ni dgu mthar na //
T02TD1784E:11a-15: 'di ni brjod pa'i sngags rnams te //
T02TD1784E:11a-16: ngo med ngo bo las skyes pa //
T02TD1784E:11a-17: de nas yongs su 'gyur pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1784E:11a-18: gang zhig lha ni nyer dmigs pa //
T02TD1784E:11a-19: de nyid gsum gnas brda yin te //
T02TD1784E:11a-20: rang bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1784E:11a-21: brjod du med cing bstan du med //
T02TD1784E:11a-22: 'di ni byang chub sems kyi mchog / de ni gsum po gcig 'gyur te //
T02TD1784E:11a-24: 'gog pa med cing rang bzhi pa //
T02TD1784E:11a-25: rtag dang chad pa rnam par spangs //
T02TD1784E:11a-26: dus gsum rig pas brda byas pa //
T02TD1784E:11a-27: nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1784E:11a-28: 'di ni don dam las byung ba //
T02TD1784E:11a-29: so sor rang rig mtshan nyid do//
T02TD1784E:11a-30: 'dug pa la sogs thams cad ni //
T02TD1784E:11a-31: bya ba kun la rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1784E:11a-32: brjod du med cing bstan du med //
T02TD1784E:11a-33: dus gsum las 'das rtag tu bzlas //
T02TD1784E:11a-34: gos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa //
T02TD1784E:11a-35: brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga //
T02TD1784E:11a-36: bzhi po legs par bsgres nas ni //
T02TD1784E:11a-37: sbyor bzhi bsdus pas brgya phrag dgu //
T02TD1784E:11a-38: dgu brgyad dag tu gang bstan pa //
T02TD1784E:11a-39: nyi shu rtsa bzhi rim gyis ni //
T02TD1784E:11a-40: de ni so sor byung ba las //
T02TD1784E:11a-41: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o //
T02TD1784E:11a-42: de ltar gsang ba'i dgos pa las //
T02TD1784E:11a-43: phra mo'i rnal 'byor rab tu brtan //
T02TD1784E:11a-44: bsam gtan kha don med pa ni //
T02TD1784E:11a-45: de ltar yin yang bzlas par bshad //
T02TD1784E:11a-47: de lta bu'i rim pas ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa bstan to /
T02TD1784E:11a-49: // / da ni sems la dmigs pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:11a-51: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1784E:11a-52: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1784E:11a-53: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa drug ste /
T02TD1784E:11b-0: rnam par @11b shes pa brgyad kyi bdag nyid can khams gsum pa 'di bzang 'gro dang ngan 'gro la nyon mongs pa dang rnam par smin pa'i bag chags rnams kyi shing rta'i 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor bar byed pa yang dang yang du skye ba len par byed pa ste de srid du 'khor ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:11b-1: rnam par shes ba brgyad kyi bdag nyid kyi sems de yang gsum gyis bsdus par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:11b-3: rnam par smin pa kun gzhi ste //
T02TD1784E:11b-4: 'gro ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu //
T02TD1784E:11b-5: bdag lta sogs pa'i 'brel ba yis //
T02TD1784E:11b-6: nyon mongs pa can yid bshad do //
T02TD1784E:11b-7: don bzung ba yi rtsol ba yin //
T02TD1784E:11b-8: rnam shes mig la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:11b-9: zhes 'phags pa byams pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:11b-10: sems rnam pa gsum po de lta bu rnam par shes pa gsum po nyid du bshad do //
T02TD1784E:11b-12: rnam shes shes pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1784E:11b-13: zhes mdzod las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:11b-14: de la re zhig 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa ni snang ba dang stong pa dang /
T02TD1784E:11b-16: sems dang gzhan dbang gi rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1784E:11b-17: de'i rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:11b-18: kun rdzob kyi bden pas mtshan mo dang /
T02TD1784E:11b-25: zla ba snang ba'i rang bzhin can rang rig pa'i mtshan mas rtogs par shes bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:11b-26: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni snang ba mched pa dang /
T02TD1784E:11b-30: sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin can yin no ;
T02TD1784E:11b-31: / de'i rang bzhin ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bzhi bcu ste /
T02TD1784E:11b-39: nyi ma'i snang ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:11b-40: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni snang ba nye bar thob pa dang //
T02TD1784E:11b-44: ma rig pa'i ngo bo yin no //
T02TD1784E:11b-45: de'i rang bzhin ni chags pa par pa la sogs pa bdun te /
T02TD1784E:11b-47: sa bon dang bral ba dus ma tshams kyi snang ba'i ngo bo nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:12a-0: sems de rnams dang rang bzhin rnams kyi nyin mo dang @12a * //
T02TD1784E:12a-1: mtshan mo'i byed pas rnam pa ni brgyad dang bcu drug yin no //
T02TD1784E:12a-2: de rnams kho na ni 'gro ba drug srid pa'i 'khor lor 'gro ba rnams 'khor bar byed de /
T02TD1784E:12a-3: skad cig ma la sogs pa'i dbye bas khams gsum la khyab cing mngon pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis ni nyon mongs pa dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:12a-4: dbu ma pa'i tshul gyi ni rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin du rang bzhin de rnams shes par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:12a-5: de rnams rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:12a-6: thabs kyi rim pa gnyis yin te /
T02TD1784E:12a-7: gcig ni sngags kyi rim pa dang gnyis pa ni phyag rgya'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:12a-8: de la sngags kyi rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:12a-9: re zhig dang po sngar bshad pa'i gdan la gnas pa aom la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum po ni spyi bo la sogs par bsams te /
T02TD1784E:12a-10: de las spro ba dang bsdu ba bya ste de la yi ge aom ni 'jug pa'i rnam par gnas pa'i bdag nyid du bsams te /
T02TD1784E:12a-11: thig les brgyan pa'i ye ge gtso bo ni zhi ba'i phyir 'jam pa'i ngo bo aa la sogs pa'i yi ge bcu drug nye bar sdud par byed pa'i phyir bud med dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir kun rdzob kyi bdag nyid can nang dang phyi nang gnyig dang gsum gyi stong ba nyid de /
T02TD1784E:12a-12: stong pa nyid bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir stong pa nyid dang shes rab de kho na nyid yin te /
T02TD1784E:12a-13: shes rab kyi ngo bo de nyid kyi phyir rnam par rtog pa'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral bas mtshan mo'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:12a-14: rnam par shes pa drug la /
T02TD1784E:12a-15: bya ba bar byed pa'i phyir sems gcig gi ngo bo yul dang dbang po snang ba'i yid la byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:12a-16: gzhan ma rnams kyis skyed par byas pa'i phyir gzhan dbang gi ngo bo lte bar gnas pa'i rtsibs brgyad pa chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo la padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rnam par bkod la /
T02TD1784E:12a-17: de las byung ba'i snang ba dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor lo rtsa g-yon pa las zhugs pa gang yin pa ni spyi bo'i gnas la gdan dang bcas pa'i yi ge aom bkug la /
T02TD1784E:12a-18: de nyid kha dog tu bltas pa gtso bo'i yi ge'i thig le la thim par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:12a-19: de nas 'ba' zhig pa rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs ni zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu bsams la /
T02TD1784E:12b-0: 'jug pa'i @12b rnam par shes pa dang de'i rang bzhin rnams zhi bar gyur te /
T02TD1784E:12b-1: de'i tshe snang bzlog pas zla ba'i snang ba dang 'dra ba'i snang ba'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:12b-2: de bzhin du lte ba'i 'khor lo la chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i lte bar nyi ma shar ba'i 'od lta bu de nyid kyi phyir /
T02TD1784E:12b-3: nyin mo'i rang bzhin stong pa 'di chen po la sogs pa stong pa nyid bzhi'i rang bzhin can shin tu stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyi ma la gsal ba nyid kyi phyir /
T02TD1784E:12b-4: mun pa 'jig par byed pa'i phyir rno ba dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir kun brtags kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir sems las byung ba dang /
T02TD1784E:12b-5: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang tha mi dad pas sems las byung ba dang /
T02TD1784E:12b-7: rdo rje la gnas pa thig le gnyis dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i gtso bo rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:12b-8: de las byung ba'i g-yon pa'i lam nas zhugs pa nyi ma'i snang ba dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor lo thabs kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir skyes pa'i rang bzhin can gyis lkog mar gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa can yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gsung gi dbang phyug bkug la /
T02TD1784E:12b-9: gtso bo'i yi ge'i thig le gnyis la thim pa ste /
T02TD1784E:12b-10: de'i tshe nyon mongs pa can gyi yid snang ba mched pa'i rnam par shes pa ldog cing snang ba mched pa'i ye shes nyi ma'i snang ba dang 'dra ba skya bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:12b-11: de bzhin du lte bar 'khor lo dang sa bon dang /
T02TD1784E:12b-12: thig le bsgom pa spangs la /
T02TD1784E:12b-13: nyon mongs pa kun gyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir ma rig pa'i ngo bo rnam pa dang bcas pa'i bsgom ba dang bral bas yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin snang ba gnyis spangs pa'i phyir snang ba nye bar 'thob pa de bzhin du shin tu stod pa nyid las brtsams te /
T02TD1784E:12b-14: chos thams cad stong ba nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin can gyi stong ba nyid chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de nyid ni nam mkha' nyid du bsams te /
T02TD1784E:12b-15: de las byung ba'i dbus kyi lam nas zhugs pa'i dus mtshams kyi snang ba dang 'dra ba'i snang bas /
T02TD1784E:12b-16: snga ma bzhin snying gar gnas pa'i yi ge h'um bkug la mar la mar bzhin du ro gcig par gyur par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:13a-0: de'i tshe snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ngo bo kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ldog la dus mtshams kyi snang ba dang @13a * //
T02TD1784E:13a-1: 'dra ba'i snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:13a-2: de'i rjes la nam mkha'i rnam par rtog pa yang spangs la rang gi mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid bzhi'i ngo bo thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid 'od gsal ba rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang rnal 'byor pas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:13a-3: dgongs pa de nyid la brten te rab tu byed pa las kyang //
T02TD1784E:13a-4: stong pa shin tu stong pa dang //
T02TD1784E:13a-5: stong pa chen po gsum pa ste //
T02TD1784E:13a-6: bzhi pa thams cad stong pa dang //
T02TD1784E:13a-7: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas so //
T02TD1784E:13a-8: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi //
T02TD1784E:13a-9: nye bar thob pa grub pa ste //
T02TD1784E:13a-10: nye bar thob pa grub pa las //
T02TD1784E:13a-11: thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1784E:13a-12: rnam par shes pa gsum sbyor bas //
T02TD1784E:13a-13: rgyu yi rim pas rnam dag pa //
T02TD1784E:13a-14: stong pa gsum gyi sku sbyor bas //
T02TD1784E:13a-17: sngags kyi rim pas sems rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:13a-18: phyag rgya'i rim pas kyang bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:13a-19: re zhig dang po bla ma la slob mas dad pa mchog gis mchod pa byas la /
T02TD1784E:13a-21: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis yang dag par bstod la shin tu bslabs ba'i phyag rgya ma de nyid la phul te /
T02TD1784E:13a-22: phyi nas kyang sa phyogs su pus mo gnyis btsugs pa'i slob ma de la phyag rgya ma de nyid bla mas sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:13a-23: de dag kyang rnam par snang mdzad chen po dang chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i ngo bor bla mas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:13a-24: de'i rjes la slob mas kyang rdo rje dang padma snyoms par 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:13a-28: so dang sen mos 'debs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:13a-30: drang po'i stang stabs kyis lus kyi spyod pa dang /
T02TD1784E:13a-31: de bzhin du bde pa'i sgra dang /
T02TD1784E:13a-36: chu la lhung ba'i 'bras bu'i skad de dag gi bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:13b-0: thim pa ste sems kyi bya ba brgyad kyis dang po'i dga' ba nyams su myong zhing 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'gog pas de las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs yongs @13b su zad cing ye shes byung ba gang yin pa de ni snang ba'i ye shes so //
T02TD1784E:13b-1: de nas rtsa bdun khri nyis stong byang chub kyi sems kyis khyab par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:13b-2: de'i tshe mchog tu dga' ba nyams su myong zhing nyon mongs pa can gyi yid 'gags pas de las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs zad par gyur nas ye shes gang zhig shar ba de ni snang ba mched pa'i ye shes te gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1784E:13b-3: de'i rjes la dga' ba'i 'khor lo byung ba'i dus gsum rtse mo rnams las byang chub kyi sems 'dzag cing rdo rje nor bu'i chang gzungs la ma phyin par gnas sa dbus ma'i gnas su kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ldog pas /
T02TD1784E:13b-4: de las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshogs kyang zad par 'gyur zhing ye shes gang byung ba de ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes te gsum pa'o //
T02TD1784E:13b-5: dus de rnams su yang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma dang /
T02TD1784E:13b-6: dus mtshams kyi snang ba dang 'dra ba snang ba rnams gsal bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:13b-7: bag chags phra mo ma lus pa ni zad par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:13b-8: rags pa'i rang bzhin rnams med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:13b-9: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir ni sa brgyad pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:13b-10: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:13b-11: dang po'i las kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:13b-12: sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:13b-14: gang gi tshe rdo rje'i rtse mo'i chang gzungs su byang chub kyi sems phyin la /
T02TD1784E:13b-15: srog dang rtsol ba skam pa'i rigs pa'am /
T02TD1784E:13b-16: sa bon dgod pa'i rigs pas byang chub kyi sems de nyid rengs pa dang brtan par 'gyur na /
T02TD1784E:13b-17: g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams zad pas ma lus pa'i sgo rnams 'gag par 'gyur zhing g-yon pa dang g-yas pa rus sbal ma dang zla ba ma ste /
T02TD1784E:13b-18: rtsa gnyis 'dod pa'i gdugs rtsa dbus ma dang lhan cig ro gcig par gyur na de'i tshe rang rig pa'i mngon gsum gyis brtag par bya ba brjod du mi nus pa rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du yod pa dang med pa dag gis rnam par grol ba dpe'i ngo bo gang zhig ye shes shar bar 'gyur ba de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba 'od gsal ba bzhi pa zhes bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:13b-19: de nyid ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD1784E:13b-20: las dang ye shes kyi dbang nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:13b-21: kun du 'od kyis bcu gcig pa ste /
T02TD1784E:14a-0: de ni dpe las byung ba'i rim pa bzhi pa la @14a * //
T02TD1784E:14a-2: 'dir ni chos kyi sprin te sa bcu pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:14a-3: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:14a-4: snang ba gsum ni mthong ba yis //
T02TD1784E:14a-5: sa bcu pa la rab tu gnas //
T02TD1784E:14a-7: rigs pa 'di nyid kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba ming gi rnam grangs gzhan yod pa snang ba gsum gyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin bral du bcug pa dgongs pa gcig dang gsung gcig gis 'od gsal ba nyan du bcug ste /
T02TD1784E:14a-8: de thos pa tsam gyis ni thams cad mkhyen par gyur cig / sangs rgyas kyi zhing la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing sems can gyi don mdzad do //
T02TD1784E:14a-9: de'i phyir de kho na nyid 'di la rgyud thams cad las bcom ldan 'das kyi phan yon bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:14a-10: gal te kun rdzob kyi phyag rgya ma rnyed na de'i tshe sngar nyams su myong ba'i dpe dang 'dra bas ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma'i rim pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:14a-11: phyag rgya'i rim pas sems rnam par dag par bstan to //
T02TD1784E:14a-12: da ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:14a-13: re zhig dang po 'dir sngar bshad pa'i rim pas sems rnam par dag par byas te /
T02TD1784E:14a-14: don dam pa la mngon par zhen pa spang pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:14a-15: sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:14a-18: bsgom pa la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams sgyu ma bzhin du tha snyad bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba'i rim pa brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:14a-19: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:14a-20: 'od gsal ba de nyid las kyang cig car ldan par byas la ;
T02TD1784E:14a-21: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD1784E:14a-22: dpe byad brgyad cus sku brgyan pas phung po dang khams dang /
T02TD1784E:14a-23: skye mched ma lus pa rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dri za'i grong khyer dang /
T02TD1784E:14a-31: sbrul pa rnams la sogs pa'i dpe rnams kyis dper byas pa brgya byin gyi gzhu lta bu kha dog lnga pa 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro bar byed pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku gang zhig rnal 'byor bas 'dzin pa de ni sgyu ma'i sku ste /
T02TD1784E:14b-1: sbrul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid bdag la byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1784E:14b-2: de ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi sku kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba rdo rje'i sku ste rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1784E:14b-3: de'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo de nyid mchod par bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:14b-5: phyi rol du yang mthong ba dang /
T02TD1784E:14b-6: reg pa gang yin pa de thams cad snga ma bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:14b-12: bsam gtan brtsam pa'i spyod pa gtso bor gyur pa dngos po gang yin pa de rnams kyang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:14b-13: de bas ting nge 'dzin 'di mi shes pas gang zhig las byed pa de la thal bar sbyin sreg bzhin du thams cad 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:14b-14: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsdu pa 'di nyid las thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:14b-15: spyod lam thams cad la yang ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyis spyod cing rdo rje 'chang bzhin du khams gsum pa yang de'i ngo bor bya ste /
T02TD1784E:14b-16: bdag byin gyis brlab ba'i rim pa gcig yin no //
T02TD1784E:14b-17: gnyis pa yang dper na re zhig dang po snga ma bzhin du nye bar bsdu ba'i rim pas 'od gsal ba las lang te dus mtshams kyi snang ba dang 'dra ba mthong bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:14b-18: de'i tshe snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes la 'jug go //
T02TD1784E:14b-19: de'i rjes la skad cig ma gzhan la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:14b-20: de'i steng du thig le gnyis kyi rnam par brgyan pa yi ge'i gtso bo bkod la /
T02TD1784E:14b-21: nyi ma'i snang ba dang 'dra bas snang ba mthong bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:14b-22: de'i tshe snang ba mched pa'i ye shes la 'jug go //
T02TD1784E:14b-23: de'i tshig tu padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs zla ba'i snang ba dang 'dra ba mthong bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:14b-24: de'i tshe snang ba'i ye shes 'jug go //
T02TD1784E:14b-25: de ltar na thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo bla ba dang /
T02TD1784E:14b-26: nyi ma dang padma dang rdo rje'i ye ge gnyis kyi 'od zer gnyis yang dag par sbyor bas lta'i sku skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:14b-27: lha'i sku de la yang 'gugs pa la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi pos rgyas btab par byas la rdo rje 'chang chen po'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:15a-0: kun du brtags pa'i lha'i sku de'ang gal te 'od gsal ba las byung ba sgyu ma lta bu yin @15a * //
T02TD1784E:15a-1: pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:15a-2: snga ma yang yongs su dag pa ste /
T02TD1784E:15a-3: rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:15a-4: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:15a-5: da ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:15a-7: gcig ni phyag rgya'i rim pas thob pas de kho na nyid kyi dus su bla mas man ngag gi sgo nas gang bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:15a-8: gnyis pa ni ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag gis so //
T02TD1784E:15a-9: de la dang po dang pa dang gus pa dang bcas pas thos pa dang bsam pa dang /
T02TD1784E:15a-10: bsgom pa la mngon par brtson ba'i slob mas bla ma la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin gyi mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la phyag rgya yang phul te /
T02TD1784E:15a-11: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa la gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa rnams brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:15a-12: rdo rje slob dpon gyis de dag thos nas thugs rje'i dbang du gyur pa dang bas sngar nyams su myong bas gsal bar bya ba'i phyir slob ma la de kho na nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:15a-13: kye skal ba dang ldan pa snang ba la sogs pa snang ba gsum dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis khyod kyis nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de dag ni mtshan mo dang nyin mo dang mtshams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba yin yang de bzhin du phra ba'i ngo bo de rnams dang sbyar bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:15a-14: ldang ba'i dus dang bag chags la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:15a-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid khyod kyis myong ba gang yin pa ni mtshan mo dang nyin mo dang mchan mo dang bral bas rang bzhin dang bral pa de ni kho na'o //
T02TD1784E:15a-16: 'dir phyi rol gyi dpe ni ji ltar nyi ma ma shar ba dang mtshams kyi cha nub cing /
T02TD1784E:15a-17: mtshan mo'i snang ba 'byung ba blo rno bas skad cig ma'i khyad par mtshon pas de bzhin du dga' ba'i mtshan nyid kyi snang ba'i ye shes 'das ba dang /
T02TD1784E:15a-18: dga' bral gyi mtshan nyid snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes ma byung ba dang /
T02TD1784E:15a-19: mchog gi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid can snang ba mched pa'i ye shes zad pas glog gi snang ba ltar mtshon par dka' ba skad cig ma'i khyad par gang yin pa de la khyod kyis bsgom pa nyams su myong ba la brtsam pa lhur blang bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:15a-20: gang gi phyir bu de kho na nyid de thog ma dang bar ma dang tha ma dang bral ba yang /
T02TD1784E:15a-21: tha ma'i rang bzhin 'gro ba dang /
T02TD1784E:15b-2: bsod nams dang sdig ba dang /
T02TD1784E:15b-3: yod pa dang med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:15b-6: ngo mi mtshar ba thams cad stong pa nyid thob la mig btsums pa'am sad pa /
T02TD1784E:15b-7: gdan dang bcas pa'am de med pa /
T02TD1784E:15b-9: ngag sdom pa'am de rjod par byed pa /
T02TD1784E:15b-10: lus dang bcas pa'am lus med pa /
T02TD1784E:15b-11: rgyal po'am 'bangs gang yang rung bar gnas pa khyod ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes brjod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:15b-12: phyi'i mngon par byang chub pa'i lta bas nang gi mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan to //
T02TD1784E:15b-13: thabs gnyis pa ni dper na de nas slob ma de nyid man ngag thob pas de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:15b-14: dang po ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:15b-15: de la rim pa 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:15b-16: rtsibs brgyad pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs dbus ma la bskal ba'i me 'bar ba dang 'dra ba'i yi ge rnam par bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:15b-17: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i bar bsregs la me long la thim pa'i dbugs bzhin du 'od gsal ba'i ngo bor rang gi lus po mthong par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:15b-18: ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02TD1784E:15b-19: de bzhin du de nyid las 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spros te /
T02TD1784E:15b-20: des kyang dang po snod dang 'jig rten gyi khams bsregs la /
T02TD1784E:15b-21: yang de bzhin du rang gi lus po mi snang bar byas nas dag pa'i chu'i nang du thim pa'i zla ba bzhin du rang dang gzhan rnams blta bar bya ste /
T02TD1784E:15b-22: rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin te /
T02TD1784E:15b-23: mngon par byang chub thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:15b-24: de ni bla na med pa'i dgongs pa'i rim pa ste bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1784E:15b-25: de'i rjes la 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te /
T02TD1784E:15b-26: bde ba gnyis dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can 'bras bur gyur pa zung 'jug gi rim pa 'dis bsgom par bya ste //
T02TD1784E:15b-27: re zhig dang po bzhi pa'i man ngag gi rim pas 'od gsal ba mngon du byas la smig rgyu la sogs pa'i rtags lnga pos lhun gyis grub pas bstan pa nyid du nye bar mtshon te /
T02TD1784E:15b-28: gzhan yang mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:15b-29: sna tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bya ba yang byed pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:15b-30: smon lam rnams kyang 'bras bu dang bcas pa byed pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:15b-31: de nyid kyis cig car du langs te /
T02TD1784E:16a-1: ngo bor yang 'gro pa bltas te zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin dmigs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:16a-2: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:16a-3: dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:16a-5: stong pa dang stong pa ma yin pa /
T02TD1784E:16a-7: rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa /
T02TD1784E:16a-10: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa /
T02TD1784E:16a-12: dge ba dang mi dge ba /
T02TD1784E:16a-13: las dang las ma yin pa /
T02TD1784E:16a-15: stong pa nyid dang snying rje la sogs pa tha mi dad pa'i blos ro gcig par gyur pas 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
T02TD1784E:16a-16: dpag bsam gyi shing lta bu spro ba dang sdud par byed pa /
T02TD1784E:16a-17: dbang phyug mchog dang ldan pa /
T02TD1784E:16a-18: phra ba dang rags pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye bar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul brgyad dang ldan pa /
T02TD1784E:16a-19: zla ba dang nyi ma dang me'i snang ba 'jig par byed pa /
T02TD1784E:16a-20: phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku rnal 'byor pas gang bsgom par bya ba de ni zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02TD1784E:16a-21: 'o na ldang ba dang sems can gyi don dang ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD1784E:16a-22: phan tshun 'gal ba ma yin nam zhe na /
T02TD1784E:16a-23: de ltar ma zer cig / gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnams ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:16a-24: de rnams kyi bzhugs pa ni gzhi yin te /
T02TD1784E:16a-25: spyod lam gyi bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:16a-27: ting nge 'dzin gyi bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:16a-28: nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhugs pa'i bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:16a-29: bzhugs pa de rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gsung thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul la mnyam par gzhag pa'i spyod pa nyid shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:16a-30: de lta bas na ldang ba'am ting nge 'dzin la bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo yin no //
T02TD1784E:16a-31: de rnams kyi yang bstan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:16a-32: smin pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni lhun gyis grub par 'byung ba yin te /
T02TD1784E:16a-33: dper na kun du 'od kyi sa la gzhal yas khang pa dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa la sogs pa las dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje'i nus pa dang sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin du chos bstan pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:16a-35: skyes bu yid bzhin nor bu bzhin //
T02TD1784E:16a-36: de yi gnas pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1784E:16a-37: rtsig pa la sogs bstan pa rnams //
T02TD1784E:16b-1: de ltar na zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i spyod pa gang yin pa de ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:16b-2: dper na bu dang dgra dang /
T02TD1784E:16b-5: gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba dang /
T02TD1784E:16b-6: bram ze dang rigs ngan la sogs pa la blo mnyam pa 'dod chags dang /
T02TD1784E:16b-7: zhe sdang dang bral ba ji srid du 'khor ba'i bar du sems can gyi don ma chad par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:16b-8: rnal 'byor de nyid kyi sku ni shi ba dang /
T02TD1784E:16b-9: rgas pa la sogs pa'i skyon rnams dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i skyon gyis kyang 'dom gyis padma bzhin du mi gos te zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:16b-10: re zhig ni rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi po'i mdor bstan pa ni rdo rje phreng rgyud la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:16b-11: rang bzhin bsnyen par bshad pa ste //
T02TD1784E:16b-12: rgyu ni nye bar sgrub pa yin //
T02TD1784E:16b-13: las ni sgrub pa zhes bshad pa //
T02TD1784E:16b-14: 'bras bu sgrub pa chen po yin /
T02TD1784E:16b-15: mdor bstan pa'i tshig 'di rnams kyi rgyas par bshad pa'i tshig 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las ni /
T02TD1784E:16b-16: bsgrub bya sgrub byed sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:16b-17: gang phyir bsnyen pa zhes bshad pa //
T02TD1784E:16b-18: rdo rje padma yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1784E:16b-19: nya bar bsgrub pa bshad pa yin //
T02TD1784E:16b-20: h'um phat yang dag ldan pa ni //
T02TD1784E:16b-21: sgrub pa bskyod par rab tu bshad ;
T02TD1784E:16b-22: / rang bzhin rang bde zhi ba dang //
T02TD1784E:16b-23: de ni sgrub pa chen por bshad //
T02TD1784E:16b-24: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / rdor 'chad chen po'i go 'phang ste //
T02TD1784E:16b-25: sangs rgyas thams cad rnams kyi thabs //
T02TD1784E:16b-26: de ni chos kun chos nyid do //
T02TD1784E:16b-29: rigs lnga'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu dgod pa dang /
T02TD1784E:16b-30: 'o byed pa la sogs pa phyi rol gyi byed pa dang ldan pa'i bya ba gang yin pa de ni bsnyen pa ste /
T02TD1784E:16b-31: de nyid rang bzhin yin te /
T02TD1784E:16b-32: rang bzhin ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:16b-34: lcags kyu dang ba dan ni mdzub mo gnyis drang bo ste /
T02TD1784E:16b-35: bha gar rab tu zhugs pa la 'dod pa'i gdugs kyi steng du mi'i sna dang 'dra ba'i pags pas g-yogs pa mchod rten gyi rnam pa can bde ba chen po'i gzhi ji srid dro ba'i reg pa rnyed pa de srid du bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:16b-36: de'i rjes la aom sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02TD1784E:17a-0: aa nu r'a ga ya mi @17a * //
T02TD1784E:17a-1: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rdo rje dang padma sbyar bar bya ste nye bar sgrub pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:17a-2: de kho na nyid nye bar sgrub pa'i phyir de nyid rgyu yin te /
T02TD1784E:17a-3: 'og nas 'chad bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu gsal par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:17a-4: de nas rdo rje dang mtsho skyes yang dag par sbyor bas shin tu g-yo ba'i khams tha ma'i rgyu ba 'gags pa'i phyir rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du nor bu'i rtse mo dang /
T02TD1784E:17a-5: sna'i rtse mo ru thugs rdo rje'i sa bon dag rnam par bkod la rtog pa med cing sna tshogs pa'i byed pa'i bya ba rnams kyis gang zhig skyod par byed pa de ni sgrub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:17a-6: khams bdun pa'i rgyu ba 'gags pa sgrub par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:17a-7: de nyid las de rengs pa'i bya ba mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:17a-8: de'i rjes la lhan cig skyes pa thob pas rigs mi mthun pa'i yid la byed pa rnams ldog pas ye shes gang gsal bar gyur pa de ni sgrub pa chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:17a-9: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang chen po 'grub par byed pas na de nyid kyang 'bras bu yin te /
T02TD1784E:17a-10: rang bzhin la sogs pa bzhi po bstan to //
T02TD1784E:17a-11: da ni rnal 'byor bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:17a-12: de yang yan lag drug gi mtshan nyid can yin la /
T02TD1784E:17a-20: de nyid ni mchog gi bsnyen pa'o//
T02TD1784E:17a-22: tha mal mchog gi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1784E:17a-23: bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis su 'dod //
T02TD1784E:17a-24: rdo rje bzhi pos tha mal pa //
T02TD1784E:17a-25: mchog ni yan lag drug gis so //
T02TD1784E:17a-26: dang po stong nyid byang chub ste //
T02TD1784E:17a-27: gnyis pa sa bon bsdus pa dang //
T02TD1784E:17a-28: gsum pa sku ni grub pa ste //
T02TD1784E:17a-29: bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:17a-30: rdo rje bzhi pos bsnyen pa 'di //
T02TD1784E:17a-31: tha mal pa yi sgrub pa yin //
T02TD1784E:17a-32: mchog ni ye shes bdud rtsi yis //
T02TD1784E:17a-33: rnal 'byor rtsol ba rnams kyis bya //
T02TD1784E:17a-34: bsnyen pa yan lag drug pa yis //
T02TD1784E:17a-35: mchog gi sgrub pa byas nas ni //
T02TD1784E:17a-36: sgrub pa bya ste gzhan du ni //
T02TD1784E:17a-38: so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang //
T02TD1784E:17a-39: srog dang rtsol ba 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD1784E:17a-40: rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te //
T02TD1784E:17a-41: yan lag drug pa'i rnal 'byor bshad //
T02TD1784E:17a-42: dbang po rnams dang don rnams bcu //
T02TD1784E:17a-43: rang rang yul la thams cad gnas //
T02TD1784E:17a-44: 'dod pa re re kun spyod pa //
T02TD1784E:17a-45: de ni so sor bsdus par bshad //
T02TD1784E:17b-0: 'dod pa lta ni mdor @17b bsdus pas //
T02TD1784E:17b-1: sangs rgyas lnga ru rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1784E:17b-2: brtag pa bsam gtan bshad pa ste //
T02TD1784E:17b-3: bsam gtan de yang rnam lngar 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:17b-4: rtog pa dang ni dpyod pa dang //
T02TD1784E:17b-5: dga' ba de bzhin bde ba dang //
T02TD1784E:17b-6: sems ni rtse gcig pa nyid de //
T02TD1784E:17b-7: lnga po des ni bsam gtan bsdus //
T02TD1784E:17b-8: rtog pa gsang ba gsum byung pa //
T02TD1784E:17b-9: dpyod pa de yis sbyor ba ste //
T02TD1784E:17b-10: gsum pa dga' pa dang 'dra ba //
T02TD1784E:17b-11: bzhi pa bde ba sdud par byed //
T02TD1784E:17b-12: shes dang shes bya byung mdzad pa //
T02TD1784E:17b-13: rang sems lnga par shes pa bya //
T02TD1784E:17b-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02TD1784E:17b-15: nam mkha' kun la rab gnas pa //
T02TD1784E:17b-16: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02TD1784E:17b-17: 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1784E:17b-18: padma'i sna rtser byung nas ni //
T02TD1784E:17b-19: gong bu'i gzugs su brtag par bya //
T02TD1784E:17b-20: rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa //
T02TD1784E:17b-21: srog dang rtsol ba zhes su bshad //
T02TD1784E:17b-22: rang rtags snying gar bsams nas ni //
T02TD1784E:17b-23: srog gi thig le la gnas dgod //
T02TD1784E:17b-24: dbang po 'gags nas rin chen ni //
T02TD1784E:17b-26: 'gog pa rdo rjer sems gnas na //
T02TD1784E:17b-28: mtshan ma de yang rnam pa lnga //
T02TD1784E:17b-29: byang chub rdo rjes bka' stsal to //
T02TD1784E:17b-30: dang po smig rgyu lta bu ste //
T02TD1784E:17b-31: gnyis pa du ba dang 'dra ba //
T02TD1784E:17b-32: gsum pa srin bu me khyer mtshungs //
T02TD1784E:17b-33: bzhi ba mar me bzhin 'bar ba //
T02TD1784E:17b-34: lnga pa rtag tu gsal ba ste //
T02TD1784E:17b-36: bstan pa rdo rje lam nas ni //
T02TD1784E:17b-37: nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya //
T02TD1784E:17b-38: bsgoms nas gang zhig rjes dran pas //
T02TD1784E:17b-39: de dang 'dra ba spro bar bya //
T02TD1784E:17b-40: de ni rjes dran zhes bya ste //
T02TD1784E:17b-41: so sor snang ba ma skyes so //
T02TD1784E:17b-42: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas //
T02TD1784E:17b-43: dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pas //
T02TD1784E:17b-44: gong bu'i sbyor ba bsdus nas ni //
T02TD1784E:17b-45: sku ni dbus su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1784E:17b-46: cig car ye shes rdzogs pa ni //
T02TD1784E:17b-47: ting 'dzin zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD1784E:17b-48: so sor sdud pa snyoms 'jug pas //
T02TD1784E:17b-49: sngags thams cad kyis byin rlob 'gyur ;
T02TD1784E:17b-50: / bsam gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug pas //
T02TD1784E:17b-51: mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:17b-52: srog dang rtsol bas nges par ni //
T02TD1784E:17b-53: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs //
T02TD1784E:17b-54: 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis gtan du ni //
T02TD1784E:17b-56: rjes dran yang dag sbyor ba yin //
T02TD1784E:18a-1: ting 'dzin dbang ba tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1784E:18a-2: sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1784E:18a-4: de rnams kyi don 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:18a-5: yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i lha'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1784E:18a-6: lha mos rjes su 'brang ba dang phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga mig la sogs pa'i dbang po lngas stong par byed pa gang yin pa de ni so sor sdud pa zhes bstan to //
T02TD1784E:18a-7: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul de rnams kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan no //
T02TD1784E:18a-8: bsam gtan de yang rtog pa dang /
T02TD1784E:18a-12: sems rtse gcig pa'i dbye bas rnam pa lnga yin no //
T02TD1784E:18a-13: de la 'dod par bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:18a-14: 'dod pa dang 'dod par byed pa rnams 'byung ba ni rtog pa'o //
T02TD1784E:18a-15: de rnams longs spyod pa'i bya ba ni dpyod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:18a-16: chags pa yod na dga' ba byung ba'o //
