T02TD1784E:18a-17: de las kyang dga' ba'i bde ba'o //
T02TD1784E:18a-18: de las kyang mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba ni sems rtse gcig par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:18a-19: me long la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can dang /
T02TD1784E:18a-20: sa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bo'i yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshang tsam kha dog lnga pa'i rin chen dbugs kyi sbyor bas snying ga las spros te /
T02TD1784E:18a-21: padma'i sna'i rtse mor bsam par bya ba gang yin pa de ni srog dang rtsol ba'o //
T02TD1784E:18a-22: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas rang gi snying ga'i sngags kyi thig ler gnas pa'i sems mtshan ma lnga byung ba'i bar du yang dang yang du 'dzin par bya ba gang yin pa de ni 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1784E:18a-23: de la mchan ma lnga ni smig rgyu dang /
T02TD1784E:18a-24: du ba dang srin bu me khyer dang mar me dang sprin med pa'i nyi ma phyed kyi nam mkha' dang 'dra bar thams cad du rtag tu snang ba ste /
T02TD1784E:18a-25: mtshan ma de rnams kyis sngags dam pa'i thig le'i ngo bor rang gi sems brtan par gyur par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:18a-26: de nas byang chub kyi sems de ni rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje'i lam nas btsun mo'i nam mkha'i khams su spros te /
T02TD1784E:18a-27: de nyid kyis kyang ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i khams rdo rje'i chu'i bum pa bzhin du yongs su gang ba bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni rjes su dran pa'o //
T02TD1784E:18b-0: rjes su dran @18b pa de nyid kyi mthar ni nam mkha' rdo rje la gnas pa'i sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang bskur ba'i reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang por gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:18b-2: de'i rjes la dngos po thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems re re'i rdul phra rab bzhin du rang rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa lha thams cad kyi rnam par bsams te /
T02TD1784E:18b-3: bsdus la de'i rdul phra rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid lha'i gzugs su rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje dkyil 'khor du gnas pa bsgom par bya ba gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ste /
T02TD1784E:18b-4: yan lag drug po de dag gis ye shes bdud rtsis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mchog gi rnal 'byor bstan to //
T02TD1784E:18b-5: da ni bsgrub pa rnam par dpyad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:18b-6: de yang dam tshig dang sdom pa gtso bor gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:18b-7: dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba gnyis yin no //
T02TD1784E:18b-8: sdom pa la ni zhi ba la sogs pa dngos grub brgyad sgrub par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:18b-9: bshad pa'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:18b-10: de la bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang /
T02TD1784E:18b-11: kha na ma tho ba sbom po bcu yin te /
T02TD1784E:18b-13: slob dpon la ni smod pa dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-14: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-15: sdang bas spun rnams yod min bshad //
T02TD1784E:18b-16: byams pa chen po rnams spangs dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-17: byang chub sems ni yongs spong dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-18: theg pa gsum la smod pa dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-19: skal min gsang ba bshad pa dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-20: rgyal ba'i bdag nyid phung po smod //
T02TD1784E:18b-21: chos rnams mtha' gnyis sgro 'dogs dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-22: dad pa'i sems ni mi smod dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-23: dang pa'i chos la som nyi dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-24: gdug la byams pa chags bral dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-25: ji snyed dam tshig mi brten dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-26: shes rab rang bzhin bud med smod //
T02TD1784E:18b-27: de ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnams so //
T02TD1784E:18b-29: rig ma brten par mi dga' dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-30: dam tshig rnams ni mi sbyor dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-31: tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-32: gsang ba'i chos ni bstan pa dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-33: dad dang ldan pa'i sems can la //
T02TD1784E:18b-34: dam pa'i chos ni log ston dang //
T02TD1784E:18b-35: zhag bdun bar du nyan thos pa'i //
T02TD1784E:19a-2: ma nges mi sbyor snod min la //
T02TD1784E:19a-3: gsang ba'i chos ni bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:19a-4: des ni kha na mtho sbom //
T02TD1784E:19a-6: zhes bya ba ni kha na ma tho ba sbom po rnams so //
T02TD1784E:19a-7: bza' ba'i dam tshig rnams ni lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:19a-8: chos rnams bsgrub pa bshad byas nas //
T02TD1784E:19a-9: yan lag brgyad pa rdzas bsgrub bya //
T02TD1784E:19a-10: mi dang glang po rta dang ni //
T02TD1784E:19a-11: ba glang khyi dang bong bu dang //
T02TD1784E:19a-12: rnga mo dang ni ma he dang //
T02TD1784E:19a-13: cha ni mnyam par bya ba ste //
T02TD1784E:19a-14: mthe bong gi ni tshigs tshad tsam //
T02TD1784E:19a-15: mnyam par bzhag pas sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1784E:19a-16: bshad gci dang ni khrag khu dang //
T02TD1784E:19a-17: nas kyi 'bru ni tshad tsam ste //
T02TD1784E:19a-18: sngags kyi gtso bor sbyar byas te //
T02TD1784E:19a-19: gzhan yang byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02TD1784E:19a-20: yi ge aom dang a'a: dang ni //
T02TD1784E:19a-21: bar du yi ge h'um nyid dang //
T02TD1784E:19a-22: dzva la dzva la yi ge hri //
T02TD1784E:19a-23: dgu po 'dis ni rab tu grub //
T02TD1784E:19a-24: lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gi /
T02TD1784E:19a-25: sngags 'di nyid kyis ngag par bya //
T02TD1784E:19a-26: yungs kar lnga yi tshad tsam ni //
T02TD1784E:19a-27: lnga dang lnga gnyis bsre bar bya //
T02TD1784E:19a-28: bdud rtsi dbang po lnga dri ma //
T02TD1784E:19a-29: de nas ri lu bya ba ni //
T02TD1784E:19a-30: tshes brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi la //
T02TD1784E:19a-31: padma'i snod du bzhag nas ni //
T02TD1784E:19a-32: stong phrag brgyad ni bza' bar bya //
T02TD1784E:19a-33: nyin dang nyin re bza' ba dang ;
T02TD1784E:19a-34: / thun bzhi yang ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1784E:19a-35: ji ltar bskal pa'i mthar thug par //
T02TD1784E:19a-36: rgya chen dngos grub des thob 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:19a-37: gzi brjid mdog dang stobs brtson 'grus //
T02TD1784E:19a-38: smon lam dag ni lnga pa ste //
T02TD1784E:19a-39: ril bu chen po spyod pa yis //
T02TD1784E:19a-40: mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:19a-41: zhes bya ba'i dam tshig go //
T02TD1784E:19a-42: da ni sdom pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:19a-43: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
T02TD1784E:19a-44: dbang nyid dang ni mngon spyod dang //
T02TD1784E:19a-45: rnam par snang dang dgug pa dang //
T02TD1784E:19a-46: rengs pa dang ni gnas spro ba'o //
T02TD1784E:19a-47: de la ri zhig las kyi tshogs kyi go rims bshad pa'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:19a-48: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dag / yar ngo'i dus su bya ba yin //
T02TD1784E:19a-49: dbang dang mngon spyod la sogs pa //
T02TD1784E:19a-50: mar ngo yi ni dus su bya //
T02TD1784E:19a-51: zhi ba byang phyogs kha bltas pas //
T02TD1784E:19a-52: shar ru kha bltas rgyas pa bya //
T02TD1784E:19a-53: gshin rje'i phyogs su drag po'i las //
T02TD1784E:19a-54: dbang dang dgug pa nub phyogs su //
T02TD1784E:19a-55: me yi mtshams su gsod pa dang //
T02TD1784E:19b-0: bden bral @19b phyogs su de bzhin sdang //
T02TD1784E:19b-1: rlung gi mtshams su gnas las so //
T02TD1784E:19b-2: dbang ldan mtshams su rengs par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:19b-3: zhi ba la ni kha dog dkar //
T02TD1784E:19b-4: rgyas pa la ni kha dog ser //
T02TD1784E:19b-5: dbang dang dgug pa dag la dmar //
T02TD1784E:19b-6: gsod pa la ni mdog nag po'o //
T02TD1784E:19b-7: byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba dang //
T02TD1784E:19b-8: dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa dang //
T02TD1784E:19b-9: chags pa'i sems kyis dbang ba dang //
T02TD1784E:19b-10: khro bo'i sems kyis gsad par bya //
T02TD1784E:19b-11: tho rangs su ni rgyas pa yi //
T02TD1784E:19b-12: dbang dang mngon spyod lam dag ni //
T02TD1784E:19b-13: nyin phyed mtshan phyed dag la'o //
T02TD1784E:19b-14: zhi la zhi ba'i mtha' can gyis //
T02TD1784E:19b-15: rgyas pa boo sha ta mtha' can gyis //
T02TD1784E:19b-16: gsod pa h'um phat mtha' can gyis //
T02TD1784E:19b-17: dgug pa ni ba dza:hris so //
T02TD1784E:19b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan rnams la yang bshad pa'i rgyud rnams las brtag par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:19b-19: de ni sdom pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:19b-20: de ltar na sgrub pa bstan to //
T02TD1784E:19b-21: de bas ni don bcu drug po de dag gis dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud ma lus pa gang gis rtogs par gyur pa de ni 'gro ba'i bla ma bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:19b-22: gzhan du na 'ba' zhig ba tshig gi don tsam gzung bas rang gi mos pa tsam la rjes su 'brang zhing rang dbang gis glegs bam klog cing bla ma rnams la smod la kho bo cag gis rtogs par 'gyur zhes rmongs pa rnams sems so //
T02TD1784E:19b-23: dgongs pa lung du bstan pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:19b-24: rgyud dag la ni mi mkhas pa //
T02TD1784E:19b-25: sgrub pa'i thabs tsam shes nas ni //
T02TD1784E:19b-26: kho bo cag gi slob dpon zhes //
T02TD1784E:19b-27: lung las mkhas pa yin zhes zer //
T02TD1784E:19b-28: nga yi tshig ni ngas nying ces //
T02TD1784E:19b-29: rmongs pas ji ltar brjod cing smod //
T02TD1784E:19b-30: dgongs pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni //
T02TD1784E:19b-31: don bzhin de rnams mi shes so //
T02TD1784E:19b-33: de ltar rnam par dpyad la bla ma'i zhal snga la bsnyen ba'i rtsol ba la rtsol bar bya ba ste /
T02TD1784E:19b-34: gang gi drin gyis de kho na nyid thob par gyur pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub rnyed par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1784E:19b-35: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //
T02TD1784E:19b-36: da ni don rnal ma rnam par dpyad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:19b-37: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs par chos bstan par mdzad pa de'i tshe tshad med pa'i chos kyi phung po bsrung ba'i phyir phyag na rdo rje la gtad pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:20a-0: kye rdo rje chos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid 'di khyod kyis @20a * //
T02TD1784E:20a-1: gzung bar gyis shig / ces gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:20a-2: de'i tshe phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis sdud pa por gyur cing bcom ldan 'das las ji ltar thos pa'i rgyud bstan par bya ba'i phyir gleng gzhi'i tshig bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:20a-3: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyud 'di la ni dngos po bzhi yin te /
T02TD1784E:20a-6: skabs dang bstan bcos kyi lus rnams so //
T02TD1784E:20a-7: de la nye bar bsdu ba ni mtha' ru bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:20a-8: skabs ni dper na de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te /
T02TD1784E:20a-9: bstan bcos kyi lus ni don bcu drug go //
T02TD1784E:20a-10: gleng gzhi dang po'i tshig ste /
T02TD1784E:20a-12: 'khor dang dus dang gnas phun sum tshogs pa gtso bor gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:20a-13: 'di skad ces bya ba'i tshig phrad kyis ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:20a-14: bdag gi zhes pas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T02TD1784E:20a-15: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni dus gcig la ste gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi tshul bstan pa ste dus gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:20a-16: yang na dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma gcig la ste /
T02TD1784E:20a-17: de nyid kyis ni mngon par shes pa thob pa nyid bdag nyid la bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:20a-18: gang las dang gang du thos pa ste ston pa po dang gnas kyi phun sum tshogs pa bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:20a-19: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ni bha ga wan yin te /
T02TD1784E:20a-22: bha dang ga dag ni bha ga ste /
T02TD1784E:20a-23: gsal ba dang 'gro ba'i rang bzhin can srog dang rtsol ba'i rlung ngo //
T02TD1784E:20a-24: de dag byang chub kyi sems gang la yod pa de ni bha ga w'a na te bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD1784E:20a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rlung bcu ste /
T02TD1784E:20a-26: de rnams kyi nang du sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni srog dang rtsol ba dang mnyam pa ste rlung gsum mo //
T02TD1784E:20a-27: de rnams kyi snying po ni srog gi rlung ste de'i rdo rje'i btsun mo ni thams cad stong pa nyid de /
T02TD1784E:20a-28: de'i bha ga ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:20a-29: de la zhugs pa ni ting nge 'dzin de la dmigs la gnas par 'gyur zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:20a-30: des ni don 'di bshad pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:20b-0: dang po sems @20b can gyi don bya ba'i phyir khams gsum pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nye bar bsdus la rlung bcu'i bdag nyid can longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gcig dang /
T02TD1784E:20b-1: du ma'i bsgom pas mi snang bar byas la /
T02TD1784E:20b-2: rnam par thar pa bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis stong pa nyid kyi de nyid la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:20b-3: de ni dang po sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1784E:20b-4: de bzhin du bdag gis shes pa ni ae wam ma y'a ste spyan la sogs pa'i rigs kyi lha mo bzhi yin te /
T02TD1784E:20b-5: de rnams kyis ni khyod ni rdor sems sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pos bcom ldan 'das bskul bas de nyid thob pa ni rmi lam bzhin du gsan cing /
T02TD1784E:20b-6: dus gcig na zhes pa ni gsan pa'i dus de nyid du stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo'i bcom ldan 'das kyis ci mdzad ce na /
T02TD1784E:20b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phung po lnga dang /
T02TD1784E:20b-8: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni gsum ste ;
T02TD1784E:20b-9: de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin no //
T02TD1784E:20b-10: snying po zhes pa ni dzin dzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang rdo rje btsun mo ni spyan la sogs pa spros te /
T02TD1784E:20b-11: de rnams thams cad kyi bha ga ni dkyil 'khor gyi gzhir gyur pa'i chos 'byung gi gzhal yas khang par bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:20b-12: de la dgongs pa 'di yin te lha mos bskul ma thag tu zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i rim pas rang gi sku la dmigs te /
T02TD1784E:20b-13: rang rang gi sngags kyis dkyil 'khor pa rnams spros te /
T02TD1784E:20b-14: chos 'byung gzhir gyur pa'i sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i gzhal yas khang pa la gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa yin zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:20b-15: de ni dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog go //
T02TD1784E:20b-16: de bzhin du ae wam m'a ya bzhi po ni dgongs pa'i bshad pas dgug pa dang /
T02TD1784E:20b-17: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02TD1784E:20b-18: dbang du bya ba bzhi po ste /
T02TD1784E:20b-19: de rnams kyis thos pa zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu dbyer med par byas la /
T02TD1784E:20b-20: de'i rjes la dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni ye shes sems dpa' zhugs pa'i dus de nyid la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1784E:21a-1: kyis nye bar mtshon pa ni yi ge aom a'a:h'um de rnams rang gi sku gsung thugs dang /
T02TD1784E:21a-2: dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs la dgod par byas la /
T02TD1784E:21a-3: snying po zhes pa ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams te /
T02TD1784E:21a-4: de dag ni skye mched rnams la dgod de tha mi dad pa'i sgo nas rdo rje ni bstod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:21a-5: bla na med pa'i phyir rdo rje'i btsun mo zhes bya ba ni mchod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:21a-6: bha ga zhes bya ba ni bha ga las 'byung ba'i phyir bdud rtsi myang ba byas la bzhugs pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02TD1784E:21a-7: des ni 'di bshad pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:21a-8: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bltas la ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:21a-9: sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1784E:21a-10: skye mched rnam par dag pa byas la bstod pa dang mchod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba byas la 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:21a-11: de ni las kyi rgyal ba mchog go ;
T02TD1784E:21a-12: / de bzhin du ae wam ma y'a zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs yin no //
T02TD1784E:21a-14: ae ni shes rab yin pa ste //
T02TD1784E:21a-15: wam yig 'di ni thabs su bshad //
T02TD1784E:21a-16: thig le sa bon mi 'jigs pa //
T02TD1784E:21a-18: bdag gis shes pa ni bdag go //
T02TD1784E:21a-19: de bas na shes rab dang thabs bdag nyid kyi thig le nga bdag yin te /
T02TD1784E:21a-20: de lta bu'i nga ni thig le /
T02TD1784E:21a-23: dus gcig na zhes pa ni mchog tu dga' ba'i skad cig ma la'o //
T02TD1784E:21a-24: thig le de nyid kyang rigs mi mthun pa'i yid la byed pa rnams 'joms par byed pas na bcom ldan 'das te /
T02TD1784E:21a-25: des ni thig le rdo rje dang padma'i mtha' ru gnas pa nyid bstan to //
T02TD1784E:21a-26: de nas thig le de nyid mtsho skyes kyi nang du zhugs pas ci byed pa yin zhe na /
T02TD1784E:21a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rigs lnga'i rgyal ba rnams sam /
T02TD1784E:21a-28: phyi rol gyi kun rdzob kyi rigs lnga'i sems can rnams so //
T02TD1784E:21a-31: thugs zhes pa ni rigs gsum gyi bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning rnams sam khams gsum la'o //
T02TD1784E:21a-32: snying po zhes pa ni sngags thams cad dam /
T02TD1784E:21a-33: rnam par shes pa brgyad do //
T02TD1784E:21a-34: rdo rje btsun mo ni spyan la sogs pa'am /
T02TD1784E:21a-35: de rnams rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo la sogs pa'i khams so //
T02TD1784E:21b-0: de'i rim pas gang zhig bha ga zhes pa ni @21b spros pa ste /
T02TD1784E:21b-1: spros pa de ru 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul du skyes pas bzhugs pa zhes pa ni gnas pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:21b-2: des ni 'di bshad pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:21b-3: byang chub sems kyi thig le ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo gcig pu gang yin pa des lha'i 'khor lo dang sngags kyi phung po dang rnam par shes pa rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:21b-4: sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin khams gsum skyed par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:21b-5: gzhan la bskyed pa'i nus pa med pa zhes tshig gi don to //
T02TD1784E:21b-6: des ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:21b-7: de bzhin du ae wam ma y'a zhes pa ni ae ni shes rab kyi padma dang /
T02TD1784E:21b-9: thig le ni byang chub kyi sems te de nyid mi 'jig pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:21b-10: bdag gis thos pa ni de nyid sku gnyis tha mi dad pas nyams su myong ba'o //
T02TD1784E:21b-12: dus gcig na zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su'o /
T02TD1784E:21b-13: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:21b-14: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni bha ga'i nam mkha' la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:21b-15: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa ni rtsa lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:21b-16: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes pa ni 'dod pa'i gdugs dang rus sbal ma dang /
T02TD1784E:21b-18: de rnams kyi snying po zhes pa ni dbus ma ste /
T02TD1784E:21b-19: chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma kun du bzang mo'o //
T02TD1784E:21b-20: nyid kyi rdo rje btsun mo zhes pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ste /
T02TD1784E:21b-22: de'i bha ga zhes pa ni sgrib pa med pa'i phyogs te nam mkha'o //
T02TD1784E:21b-23: de la zhugs pa zhes pa ni gnas pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:21b-25: gang gi tshe nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das sh'akya'i seng ge skul ba de'i tshe des mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin spangs la 'od kyi sprul pa'i phyag rgya ma dang /
T02TD1784E:21b-26: yang dag par sbyor zhing 'od gsal ba rtogs te /
T02TD1784E:21b-27: shes rab kyi padmar rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la /
T02TD1784E:21b-28: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bos rdo rje'i skyil mo krung la bzhugs pa'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:21b-29: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:21b-30: de bzhin du ae wam ma y'a zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:21b-31: bdag gis zhes pa ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02TD1784E:22a-2: de rnams kyis nye bar mtshon pas sa bon rnams dang de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:22a-4: dus gcig na zhes pa ni yan lag ma nyams pa'i dus su rdo rje 'chang chen po nyams su myong ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD1784E:22a-5: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa de rnams tha mi dad pa'i blos 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:22a-6: de rnams kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nye bar bsdus pas sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
T02TD1784E:22a-7: de dag snying po ni snying ga'i sna dang /
T02TD1784E:22a-9: btsun mo'i bha ga ni tshangs pa'i rtsa'i mtha' ru rnam par dgod cing tha mi dad pa'i blo rlung tsam gyis bzhugs pa ni khyad par gyis bzlas so //
T02TD1784E:22a-11: snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas gsum du yi ge dgod cing rdo rje 'chang chen po'i nga rgyal byas la sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi rnam par rtog pa spangs te /
T02TD1784E:22a-12: yan lag ma nyams pa bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor pas de srid du bzlas pa bya ste /
T02TD1784E:22a-13: ji srid du 'od gsal ba mthong ba'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:22a-14: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:22a-15: slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te //
T02TD1784E:22a-16: ma bslangs pa la'ang chags mi bya //
T02TD1784E:22a-17: 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod byed //
T02TD1784E:22a-18: yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bya //
T02TD1784E:22a-20: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:22a-22: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes pa ni 'di skad ni 'di lta bu ste /
T02TD1784E:22a-23: bdag gis sems rnam par dag pa'i de kho na nyid thos pa ni rnyed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:22a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sems can thams cad de de rnams kyi gang zhig sku dang gsung dang thugs ni snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba nye bar thob pa ste /
T02TD1784E:22a-26: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid 'gro ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:22a-27: snying po ni de rnams kyi snying po ste /
T02TD1784E:22a-28: mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i dbye bas rgyu ba rang bzhin brgya drug cu'o //
T02TD1784E:22a-29: de yang gang gi tshe rgyu ba zhe na /
T02TD1784E:22a-30: dus gcig na zhes pa ni skad cig ma gcig la'o //
T02TD1784E:22a-31: de yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin la /
T02TD1784E:22a-32: skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam dang mig btsums pa la sogs pa la rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1784E:22a-33: rdo rje btsun mo ni dmigs pa med pa'i shes rab ste /
T02TD1784E:22b-0: des byas pa rang bzhin de rnams la gang zhig bha @22b ga ni 'joms pa ste /
T02TD1784E:22b-1: 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa thams cad stong pa nyid rdzogs pa de la bzhugs pa ni 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:22b-3: sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas rnam par shes pa gsum dang /
T02TD1784E:22b-4: de rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi tshogs rnam par dag cing 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang de nyid la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so zhas ston to //
T02TD1784E:22b-5: de ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:22b-6: de bzhin du ae wam ma y'a zhes pa ni /
T02TD1784E:22b-7: ae ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1784E:22b-8: wam ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1784E:22b-9: ma ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:22b-10: y'a ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD1784E:22b-11: phyag rgya bzhi po de dag gis thos pa ni byin gyis brlab pa'o ;
T02TD1784E:22b-12: / dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni cig car du bskyed pa yin gyi /
T02TD1784E:22b-13: bskyed pa'i rim pas bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:22b-14: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das te rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:22b-15: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thabs kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:22b-16: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa dang ro gcig par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1784E:22b-17: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:22b-18: btsun mo ni lha mo rnams kyi /
T02TD1784E:22b-19: bha ga ni dbang phyug la sogs pa yon tan drug dang ldan pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gang yin pa'o //
T02TD1784E:22b-20: de la bzhugs pa ni 'ja' tshon la sogs pa dang 'dra ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi skus bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:22b-22: bcom ldan 'das 'od gsal ba las langs te /
T02TD1784E:22b-23: dkyil 'khor pa'i dbus su gnas pa gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba phyag rgya chen po'i sku bzhengs nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1784E:22b-24: phyag rgya'i dbye ba ni dpal thams cad mkhyen pa 'jigs byed kyi rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD1784E:22b-25: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02TD1784E:22b-26: gsang ba yi ni rnal 'byor mchog / ye shes sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas //
T02TD1784E:22b-27: phyag rgya chen po 'dzin pa yin //
T02TD1784E:22b-29: byang chub sems ni snying gar gnas //
T02TD1784E:22b-30: yi ge phyi mo'i yi ger ldan //
T02TD1784E:22b-31: cung zad 'jig rten gcig mtshungs pa //
T02TD1784E:22b-32: rnal 'byor chen pos bltas nas ni //
T02TD1784E:22b-33: dam tshig tu grangs 'dzin par bya //
T02TD1784E:22b-34: sna tshogs rdo rje snying gar gnas //
T02TD1784E:22b-35: las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu bcings //
T02TD1784E:23a-2: de bzhin nges par yang dag 'grub //
T02TD1784E:23a-3: lce ni rdo rjer rnam bsgoms nas //
T02TD1784E:23a-4: chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag brjod //
T02TD1784E:23a-5: las thams cad ni ci 'dod pas //
T02TD1784E:23a-6: myur du grub ste the tshom med //
T02TD1784E:23a-7: de ltar phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1784E:23a-8: blo ldan gang zhig mi shes pas //
T02TD1784E:23a-9: sdom pa'i rnal 'byor mchog dag ni //
T02TD1784E:23a-11: bde ba'i thabs ni rnyed dka' ba //
T02TD1784E:23a-12: sangs rgyas rol mo gsang ba ni //
T02TD1784E:23a-13: byang chub sems zhes grags pa ste //
T02TD1784E:23a-14: shes rab rgya mtshor rtag tu gnas //
T02TD1784E:23a-16: de ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o//
T02TD1784E:23a-17: de bzhin du ae wam ma y'a zhes pa ni ae ni shes rab ste mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1784E:23a-18: wam ni thabs te nyi ma'o //
T02TD1784E:23a-19: thig le ni de dag gi nang du gnas pa'i mtshan mo'i dus mtshams sam /
T02TD1784E:23a-21: bdag gis thos pa ni de rnams man ngag gi dbang bskur ba'i rim pas nyan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:23a-22: dus gcig na zhes pa ni dus gsum po de dag med pa'i skad cig ma la'o //
T02TD1784E:23a-23: thos pa de ci yin zhe na /
T02TD1784E:23a-24: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1784E:23a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa thams cad ni dpe nyid du gnas pa phyi rol gyi smig rgyu la gnas pa'i snang ba lnga'o //
T02TD1784E:23a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpe las byung ba'i ngo bo nang gi stong pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:23a-28: de'i rang bzhin can yin no //
T02TD1784E:23a-29: de bzhin du sku dang gsung dang thugs ni bdag nyid kyi gang yin pa de rnams dang snying po ni khams gsum pa ste rdo rje ni ril bor 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1784E:23a-30: btsun mo ni rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gang zhig bha ga ni mi snang bar byed pa /
T02TD1784E:23a-31: de la bzhugs pa ni ting nge 'dzin de mngon du byas pa la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:23a-32: 'dir ni mdor bsdus pa'i don 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:23a-33: phyi rol gyi mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas nang gi bdag nyid mngon par byang chub thob la de bstan par bya ba'i phyir ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pos bcom ldan 'das 'od gsal bar zhugs zhes tshig gi don to //
T02TD1784E:23a-34: de ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:23b-0: de bzhin du 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud la 'jug par bya @23b ste ;
T02TD1784E:23b-1: 'di skad bdag gis thos de nyid //
T02TD1784E:23b-2: dus ni gcig tu gsungs pa nyid //
T02TD1784E:23b-3: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i rdor dbang phyug / rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog / de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni //
T02TD1784E:23b-4: bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan tshogs /
T02TD1784E:23b-5: yod med gnyis ka las 'das pa //
T02TD1784E:23b-6: gnas min gnas na brdar byas pa //
T02TD1784E:23b-7: nam mkha' gcig gi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1784E:23b-8: kun mkhyen ye shes rang bzhin ldan //
T02TD1784E:23b-9: rnam dag grags pa'i 'gro snying gar //
T02TD1784E:23b-10: thub pa chen po bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:23b-12: de ni zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:23b-13: gzhan yang ae wam ma y'a zhes pa ni lha'i dbang pos zhus pa las ;
T02TD1784E:23b-14: ae ni ma nyid yin pa ste //
T02TD1784E:23b-15: wam yig yang ni pha ru dran //
T02TD1784E:23b-16: thig le de ru rnal 'byor yin //
T02TD1784E:23b-17: rnal 'byor de ni rmad byung mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:23b-18: da bas na bsgrub bya sgrub byed yang dag par sbyor ba ni ae wam gyi don yin no //
T02TD1784E:23b-19: bdag ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:23b-20: thos pa ni des 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i bya bas nyams su myong ba'o //
T02TD1784E:23b-21: dus gcig na zhes ba ni 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs ma'i skad cig ma la'o //
T02TD1784E:23b-22: de dag ni pha dang ma dag yin no //
T02TD1784E:23b-23: bcom ldan 'das ni sgrub byed do //
T02TD1784E:23b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phung po lnga'o //
T02TD1784E:23b-25: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni rnam par shes pa gsum mo //
T02TD1784E:23b-26: snying po ni de rnams kyi snying por gyur pa gang zhig mchog tu dga' bskyed par byed pa rdo rje btsun mo ni bsgrub bya shes rab ma /
T02TD1784E:23b-27: de dag gi bha ga ni yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
T02TD1784E:23b-28: bzhugs pa ni de nyid du gnas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:23b-29: de bas na bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid can bsnyen par bstan to //
T02TD1784E:23b-31: de bzhin du ae wam ma y'a zhes pa ni ae ni padma zhes bshad pa /
T02TD1784E:23b-32: wam ni rdo rje nyid du bshad //
T02TD1784E:23b-33: thig le der ni sa bon yin //
T02TD1784E:23b-34: de las skyes pa khams gsum pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:23b-36: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba ni ae wam yin te /
T02TD1784E:23b-37: bdag gis thos pa ni de nyid bdag gis bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1784E:23b-42: bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phung po lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:24a-1: dang thugs ni sku gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:24a-2: snying po ni de rnams chos kyi dbyings dang ro gcig par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:24a-3: de bzhin du rdo rje btsun mo ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can ye shes kyi bha ga ni de'i rjes las thob pa'i dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes gang thob pa de'i phyir bzhugs pa ni gnas pa'o zhes bstan to //
T02TD1784E:24a-4: bha ga la zhes bya ba 'di rgyu mtshan gyi bdun pa'o //
T02TD1784E:24a-5: de ltar na rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid can nye bar bsgrub pa bstan to //
T02TD1784E:24a-7: de bzhin du ae wam ma y'a zhes pa ni ae ni shes rab nyid yin te /
T02TD1784E:24a-8: wam ni dga' pa'i bdag po nyid ;
T02TD1784E:24a-9: / thig le mi 'jig de nyid ni //
T02TD1784E:24a-10: yi ge rnams ni de las skyes //
T02TD1784E:24a-11: de bas na don 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:24a-12: yi ge ae dang wam dag ni shes rab dang thabs te /
T02TD1784E:24a-13: de dag gis yang dag par sbyor zhing ma y'a zhes yi ge gnyis rdo rje dang padma ste /
T02TD1784E:24a-14: thos pa ni de dag skyod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:24a-18: de bcom ldan 'das ni gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po ni yi ge gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:24a-19: de rnams rdo rje ni mtshan ma dang rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga ni shes rab kyi padma ste /
T02TD1784E:24a-21: rnam par dgod cing gnas pa'o zhes ston to ;
T02TD1784E:24a-23: yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtsa lnga pa yi ge aom gyis nor bu'i char byin gyis brlab pa rdzogs te /
T02TD1784E:24a-24: yi ge tri yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa padma'i lte bar aom gyis byin gyis brlab pa rnam par bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:24a-25: de nyid du yang char rengs pa'i sngags rnam par dgod la yang dag par bskul bar bya ste sgrub pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:24a-28: ae wam ma y'a zhes pa ni ae ni snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T02TD1784E:24a-29: wam ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no //
T02TD1784E:24a-30: ma ni 'byung ba chen po rnams so //
T02TD1784E:24a-31: y'a ni skye mched rnams so //
T02TD1784E:24a-32: thos pa ni phung po rnams so //
T02TD1784E:24a-33: bcom ldan 'das ni dus gsum mo //
T02TD1784E:24a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni ye shes lnga'o //
T02TD1784E:24a-35: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni khams gsum pa'am /
T02TD1784E:24a-39: 'dod pa la sogs pa gsum po yin no //
T02TD1784E:24a-40: snying po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02TD1784E:24b-0: rdo rje btsun mo ni @24b stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1784E:24b-1: bha ga ni de rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:24b-2: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'o //
T02TD1784E:24b-3: dus gcig ni mtshon par dka' ba skad cig ma de nyid de /
T02TD1784E:24b-4: de nyid du zhugs pa ni gnas pa'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:24b-6: phyi dang nang gi rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa dang bral ba'i bde ba chen por rab tu bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:24b-7: sgrub pa chen po yin no //
T02TD1784E:24b-10: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'i don du ni 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba ni so sor sdud pa'o //
T02TD1784E:24b-11: thos pa ni bsam gtan no //
T02TD1784E:24b-12: dus gcig na zhes pa ni srog dang rtsol ba'o ;
T02TD1784E:24b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po 'di rjes su dran pa'o //
T02TD1784E:24b-15: rdo rje btsun mo ni phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1784E:24b-16: bha ga ni de rnams rim pas bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:24b-21: 'di skad bdag gis zhes pa ni 'di skad ni 'di'o //
T02TD1784E:24b-22: bdag gis thos pa ni zos pa ste myang ba'o //
T02TD1784E:24b-23: dus gcig na zhes pa ni dam tshig gi dus na ste /
T02TD1784E:24b-24: bstan bcos las gsungs pa'i zhag rnams la'o //
T02TD1784E:24b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sha'o //
T02TD1784E:24b-28: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni khrag go //
T02TD1784E:24b-29: snying po ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD1784E:24b-30: rdo rje dang btsun mo'i bha ga las 'byung ba gci ba'o //
T02TD1784E:24b-31: de nyid du bzhugs pa bdud rtsi myang ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnal 'byor des bzhugs pa ste sgrub pa bstan to //
T02TD1784E:24b-32: de lta bu'i dang po'i gleng gzhi'i tshig gis rgyud ma lus pa'i don rab tu gsal bar byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:24b-33: gang zhig gzhan yang bshad pa de ni spros pa ste /
T02TD1784E:24b-34: byis pa'i blo rnams kyis bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:24b-36: gleng gzhi dbang du byas nas ni //
T02TD1784E:24b-37: gang zhig don ni rab bstan pa //
T02TD1784E:24b-38: rgyud kyi don ni de nyid bshad //
T02TD1784E:24b-39: lhag ma skabs kyis gyur ba yin //
T02TD1784E:24b-41: da ni bcom ldan 'das gang zhig dang lhan cig bzhugs pa de rnams kyis bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:25a-0: brjod kyis mi lang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sbrul pa'i sku la tshad med pa'i phyir grangs med pas brjod du mi nus @25a * //
T02TD1784E:25a-2: sgyu 'phrul gyi mthu mtha' yas pa'i phyir yang brjod kyis mi lang pa'o //
T02TD1784E:25a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdu phra rab snyed kyis zhes pa ni dpe yin no //
T02TD1784E:25a-4: yang na rdul phra rab kyi cha shas kyis yongs su rtog pas rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de bzhin du rang bzhin med pa ste /
T02TD1784E:25a-5: dang por ma skyes pa'i de kho na nyid la rnam par gnas pa rnams lhan cig tu zhes ston te /
T02TD1784E:25a-7: gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor pa rnams bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:25a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dam tshig gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir dam tshig rdo rje ni don yod grub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:25a-9: 'dir ni de'i rigs can sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
T02TD1784E:25a-10: sku gsung thugs kyi rigs las byung ba'i phyir sku rdo rje dang gsung rdo rje ni sa'i snying po dang 'jig rten dbang phyug dang phyag na rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD1784E:25a-11: ting nge 'dzin sems rtse gcig pa de nyid de /
T02TD1784E:25a-12: de nyid ni rdo rje ste mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:25a-13: de gang la yod pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ste kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD1784E:25a-14: shes rab kyi mtshon chas nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag las rgyal bar byed pas na rgyal ba'i rdo rje dang 'jam dpal lo //
T02TD1784E:25a-15: de bzhen du sa la sogs pa bzhi po rnam par dag par byed pa'i phyir sa rdo rje dang chu rdo rje dang me rdo rje dang rlung rdo rje rnams ni lha mo spyan dang /
T02TD1784E:25a-16: m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar mo dang dam tshig sgrol ma ste /
T02TD1784E:25a-17: rigs kyi lha mo rnams so //
T02TD1784E:25a-18: nam mkha'i lding ni mi zad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:25a-19: rdo rje ni mdzod gang la yod pa de ni nam mkha' rdo rje nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02TD1784E:25a-20: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:25a-21: chos kyi dbyings ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T02TD1784E:25a-22: de la rdo rje ni chos kyi rgyal srid mi phyed par mdzad pas na /
T02TD1784E:25a-23: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ste byams pa'o //
T02TD1784E:25a-24: de rnams ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02TD1784E:25a-25: byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ste /
T02TD1784E:25a-26: de la sems dpa'i rang bzhin gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02TD1784E:25a-27: chen po ni khams gsum pa ste /
T02TD1784E:25a-28: de la byang chub sbyin pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:25a-29: 'dir yang lha mo rnams la yod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:25a-30: de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod do//
T02TD1784E:25b-0: @25b yang na byang chub sems dpa'i sgra ni 'bru mang po pa'i bsdu ba la mo rtags kyi ngo bor shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:25b-1: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang /
T02TD1784E:25b-2: rigs kyi lha mo bzhi dang /
T02TD1784E:25b-3: mchod pa'i lha mo lnga ste de rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:25b-4: gzhan ma rnams ni ma yin no zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:25b-5: de la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nam mkha'i khams bzhin du grangs las 'das pa'o //
T02TD1784E:25b-6: de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid de chos kyi dbyings so //
T02TD1784E:25b-7: de las gshegs pa ni chos kyi skus so //
T02TD1784E:25b-8: yang na de bzhin nyid de nyid las longs spyod rdzogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:25b-9: phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i gtso bor gyur pa lnga kho na bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:25b-10: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes thob pas sgrib pa gnyis kyis bskyod par mi 'gyur bas na mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:25b-11: de nyid kyi phyir ni rdo rje'o //
T02TD1784E:25b-12: de bzhin du me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis me long bzhin du khyad par du snang bas na rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1784E:25b-13: nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin ni bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed pas na rin chen te /
T02TD1784E:25b-14: de nyid dpal gang la yod pa de ni rin chen dpal lo //
T02TD1784E:25b-15: yang na rin chen ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te ;
T02TD1784E:25b-16: de nyid dpal gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD1784E:25b-17: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes nyid rgya mtsho bzhin du 'od dpag tu med pa gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje'i 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD1784E:25b-18: bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes de nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byed pa gdon mi za ba ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa de nyid kyi phyir rgyun ma chad pa'i rdo rje gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje gdon mi za ba'o //
T02TD1784E:25b-19: de dag la sogs pa zhes pa ni de rnams gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:25b-20: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang mnyam pa zhes pa ni mtha' yas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:25b-21: de rnams kyi mtha' yas pa de nyid dpe'i sgo nas bsgom par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:25b-22: dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:25b-24: til gyi gang bu gcig la til rnams phan tshun 'brel nas gnas pa de bzhin du rgyud kyi rgyal po nyan pa'i phyir thams cad nam mkha' yang dag par 'dus par gyur pa'o zhes stan to //
T02TD1784E:26a-0: yang na til 'bru gcig la gzugs @26a * //
T02TD1784E:26a-1: dang ro dang mdog mnyam pa'i til rnams gnas pa de bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po dang /
T02TD1784E:26a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa ro gcig par gyur pa'i gnas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:26a-4: sprul pa'i sku dang tha mi dad pas mdzad pa gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:26a-5: de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i don yin no //
T02TD1784E:26a-6: gleng bzhi bstan nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos 'dod chags kyi rigs can sems can rnams la brten te /
T02TD1784E:26a-7: de rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir de dang rjes su mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:26a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:26a-9: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga byang chub thob pa'i phyir sten par byed pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD1784E:26a-10: chen po ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas te /
T02TD1784E:26a-11: de rnams kyi nang na yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pas khyad par du snang bas na rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:26a-12: rdo rje 'chang chen po yin no //
T02TD1784E:26a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin brgya drug cu ste /
T02TD1784E:26a-14: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul ni de rnams sngar bshad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas 'od gsal ba nyid du bya ba'o //
T02TD1784E:26a-15: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni thugs rdo rje rtse gcig pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa de dag thams cad ces pa ni dkyil 'khor la lha'i 'khor lo ste /
T02TD1784E:26a-16: de dang de'i rang bzhin sku la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyid kyi sku la zhes pa ni 'od gsal bar zhugs par mdzad de sems rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:26a-17: sngar bshad pa'i 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:26a-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te gang zhig dkyil 'khor pa rnams sngar nye bar bsdus pa de rnams kho na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do//
T02TD1784E:26a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbang po ni rdo rje chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:26a-20: de nyid yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir shes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa 'grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:26a-21: nyid kyi sku ni rang gi sku ste /
T02TD1784E:26b-0: de rnams kyis bud med kyi gzugs su shes pa ni gdul bya'i dbang gis @26b lha mo'i gzugs su sprul te /
T02TD1784E:26b-1: don dam pas ni ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:26b-2: gang gi phyir de kho na nyid la bud med dang skyes pa'i dbye ba'i dgongs pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rol mo mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:26b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi de nyid kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor las mngon par byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams bud med kyi gzugs su phyi rol du byung zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02TD1784E:26b-4: gang zhig byung ba de rnams bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:26b-5: de la la la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:26b-6: sangs rgyas spyan ni sa'i khams kyi ngo bo ste /
T02TD1784E:26b-7: de rnams gzigs na de'i rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas spyan no //
T02TD1784E:26b-8: m'a ma k'i zhes pa ni m'a zhes pa ni zla ba ste /
T02TD1784E:26b-10: de rtogs pa dang 'joms pa'i phyir m'a ma k'i ste chu'i khams rnam par dag pa zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:26b-11: gos dkar mo zhes pa ni me'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:26b-12: rnam par rtog pa rnams bsreg cing don dam pa'i bdag nyid kyi gos dkar po dang ldan pas na gos dkar mo'o //
T02TD1784E:26b-13: rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir skye ba dang las dang nyon mongs pa'i bdag nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi srid pa'i 'khor lo las myur du sgrol bar byed pas na sgrol ma'o //
T02TD1784E:26b-14: de bzhin du la la gzugs kyi ngo bo lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sa la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo lha mo rnams gcig bu byung ba ma yin gyi /
T02TD1784E:26b-15: 'on kyang gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya ste /
T02TD1784E:26b-16: yul rnams rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i rdo rje ma rnams 'byung zhing gnas par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to /
T02TD1784E:26b-17: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:26b-18: de lta bu'i lha mo'i 'khor spros te /
T02TD1784E:26b-19: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:26b-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:26b-21: mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la rjes su zhugs pas thugs kyi rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:26b-22: 'dir ni de nyid gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro /
T02TD1784E:26b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo'am /
T02TD1784E:27a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig btsun mo rang snang gi shes @27a * //
T02TD1784E:27a-2: de nyid kyi bha ga ni chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'i gnas so //
T02TD1784E:27a-3: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa bzhis sa la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:27a-4: gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lnga po'i gzhir gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1784E:27a-5: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:27a-6: gru bzhir zhes pa ni gru bzhi'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:27a-7: de bzhin du rdul med pa ni rin po che la sogs pa'i ngo bor byin gyis brlabs pa ni zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi rim pa'o zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02TD1784E:27a-8: dam tshig gi 'khor lo de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:27a-9: gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsal ba ni rin po che'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gsal bar gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:27a-10: de'i ngo bo nyid ces pa ni nam yang dri ma nyid du mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1784E:27a-11: sna tshogs gzugs zhes bya ba ni kha dog sna lnga'o //
T02TD1784E:27a-12: sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab pa ste 'gro ba'i don du skyob pa du ma du ma spro ba'o //
T02TD1784E:27a-13: 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug / ces pa ni 'od kyi chogs kyis khyab pa dang phyi rol du yang de dag spro bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:27a-14: gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:27a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'og gnas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:27a-17: byin gyis brlab par mdzad do zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang sbyor ro //
T02TD1784E:27a-18: sprul nas ji ltar mdzad ce na ;
T02TD1784E:27a-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:27a-20: de nyid bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po ste /
T02TD1784E:27a-21: rdo rje 'chang chen po la rjes su zhugs pas mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:27a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus der bzhag par gyur to zhes bya ba ni rang gi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gtso bo nyid du bzhag par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1784E:27a-24: rim pa gcig gi phyogs la spyan la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:27b-0: rim pa gnyis pa'i grva ru gzugs rdo rje ma la @27b sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:27b-1: reg bya rdo rje ma la sogs pa rang snang ba'i shes rab dang tha mi dad pas 'khyud par gyur to zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog go //
T02TD1784E:27b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:27b-3: thams cad ni lkog ma dang /
T02TD1784E:27b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa ni snying ga dang /
T02TD1784E:27b-5: rdo rje ni lte pa dang /
T02TD1784E:27b-6: rdo rje btsun mo ni gsang ba la'o //
T02TD1784E:27b-7: gru bzhi pa ni sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1784E:27b-8: rdul med pa ni chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1784E:27b-9: dam tshig chen po ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1784E:27b-11: byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsams nas so //
T02TD1784E:27b-12: dkyil 'khor de rnams la gsal ba ni 'od zer gyi 'khor lo ste /
T02TD1784E:27b-13: de'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:27b-14: sna tshogs gzugs ni dmar po dang /
T02TD1784E:27b-17: kun du ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang gnyi ga las 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:27b-18: sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab pa ni padma dang rin po che dang las kyi rdo rje mgon po'i bdag pos khyab pa'o //
T02TD1784E:27b-19: 'od zer 'phro bas 'khrug pa ni sna'i rtse mor 'od zer gyi tshul gyis 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1784E:27b-20: gsal ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan pa ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i rang bzhin gyis rlung gnyis kyis zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor dang 'dra bar rgyu ba'o //
T02TD1784E:27b-21: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bzhi po'i gnas te gzhir gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1784E:27b-22: de ltar bsgoms nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag ni yi ge gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:27b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni lkog ma la sogs pa'i me la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de rnams kyi dbus su bzhag par gyur to zhes bya ba ni dgod par gyur pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1784E:27b-24: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:27b-25: de ltar dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das gnas par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa lnga gang du zhugs she na /
T02TD1784E:27b-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:27b-27: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ni byang chub sems kyi rdo rje ste dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i thugs kar bzhugs pa ni gnas par gyur te /
T02TD1784E:28a-0: 'dod chags kyi rigs can gdul bar bya ba'i phyir lha mo'i dbus @28a * //
T02TD1784E:28a-1: su bzhugs pas da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgos pa med pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:28a-2: las kyi rgyal po mchog go //
T02TD1784E:28a-3: yang na de nas zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:28a-4: bdud rtsi lnga de dag sbyong ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis bsgrubs la byang chub sems kyi rdo rje ni byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid du brtan par bya la /
T02TD1784E:28a-5: snying po ni sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1784E:28a-6: bzhugs pa ni nyams su myong bar mdzad pa ste sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:28a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi tshul ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:28a-8: chos bstan pa ji lta bu byung ba de'i dang por de dang 'dra ba ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:28a-9: 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor spro ba'i skabs yin na de'i tshe dang por stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byed pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:28a-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:28a-11: byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o//
T02TD1784E:28a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:28a-13: de rnams zil gyis gnon pa ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas mi snang bar mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD1784E:28a-14: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu ji srid nam mkha'i dbyings de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bo ni thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid du gnas par gyur to //
T02TD1784E:28a-15: don 'di nyid rgyas par bshad pa ji srid sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas pa ni nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin du grangs med par gnas pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyis bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni lus dang sems dang nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pas /
T02TD1784E:28a-16: rab tu zhi ba'i stong pa nyid kyi ro nyams su myong ba thob par gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:28a-17: dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1784E:28a-18: yang na rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dga' ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:28a-19: de rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ste /
T02TD1784E:28b-0: de zhes bya ba'i @28b ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la /
T02TD1784E:28b-1: de'i dus su nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ni khams bzhi'i ngo bo lus po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems te de'i sgo nas rdo rje'i ngo bo ni rdo rje'i nor bur gnas par gyur to //
T02TD1784E:28b-2: de bzhin du gang zhig sems can rnams ni padma'i nang du gnas pa'i 'dod pa'i gdugs la sogs pa'i rtsa ste /
T02TD1784E:28b-3: de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' ni lhan cig skyes pa ste /
T02TD1784E:28b-4: de'i byin gyis brlabs pa ni nus pa ste /
T02TD1784E:28b-5: de nyid kyi sgo nas bde ba dang yid bde ba ni byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD1784E:28b-6: de thob par gyur pa ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes rnyed par gyur te /
T02TD1784E:28b-9: // / da ni bstan par mdzad pa'i phyir bskyed pa'i rim pas mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:28b-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:28b-11: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:28b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngar bshad pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rim pas de nyid ni rnam par mi rtog pa nyid de /
T02TD1784E:28b-13: de la gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:28b-14: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD1784E:28b-15: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni sku la sogs pa rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:28b-16: dam tshig ni de rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02TD1784E:28b-17: 'byung ba ni sngags thams cad spro bas skyed par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:28b-18: de nyid 'khor ba'i bar sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir gnas pas na rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:28b-19: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni thugs rtse gcig pa nyid la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:28b-20: 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byan gyis brlabs so zhes tshig gi 'brel pa'o //
T02TD1784E:28b-21: byin gyis brlabs pa de gang yin zhe na /
T02TD1784E:28b-22: rig pa chen po ni lha mo spyan ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:28b-23: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:28b-24: skyes bu ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02TD1784E:28b-25: gzugs ni khro bo rnams kyi gzugs dang de'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:28b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:28b-27: sngags ni de rnams kyi sngags te /
T02TD1784E:28b-28: badzra dhri ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:29a-0: de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs @29a * //
T02TD1784E:29a-1: pa ni rang rang gi sngags rnams kyis skye ba ste /
T02TD1784E:29a-2: bdag nyid kyang byin gyis brlabs so zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:29a-3: ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:29a-4: de rnams kyis zhal gsum dang phyag drug la sogs pa'i sku mdog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid du bcom ldan 'das mthong ba ste /
T02TD1784E:29a-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:29a-7: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:29a-8: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:29a-9: dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang //
T02TD1784E:29a-10: 'bras bu me tog la sogs brgyan //
T02TD1784E:29a-11: skye bo med pa'i ri bo la //
T02TD1784E:29a-12: dngos grub kun bsdus bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1784E:29a-13: re zhig dang po gdan 'jam pa'i steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la rim pa 'dis rnal 'byor pa gnas bsrung bar bya ste rang gi snying gar padma nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa'i khro bo rdo rje'i h'um las phyi rol du phyogs bcu la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du khro bo bcu spros te /
T02TD1784E:29a-14: de'i rjes la de'i nang na gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po la bka' stsal te /
T02TD1784E:29a-15: phyogs bcu la gnas pa'i lha chen po dang khyab 'jug la sogs pa ji bzhin du dbyibs dang kha dog dang lag ca dang /
T02TD1784E:29a-16: stan dang ldan pa phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:29a-17: aom sum bha ni sum bha zhes pa la sogs pa tshig bzhi pos dgug par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:29a-18: de'i rjes la gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po rdo rje phung bu steng du bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i gzugs dang /
T02TD1784E:29a-19: 'og tu rtse gcig pa'i rnam pa ru bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:29a-20: 'phags pa rta mgrin gyi ngo bo rdo rje tho bas aom gha gha gh'a ta ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig bzhi pos sa 'og bdun la sogs pa bgegs de rnams phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:29a-21: de'i rdo rje'i thob mthong ba dang /
T02TD1784E:29a-22: 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spros pa gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po bltas te /
T02TD1784E:29a-23: gang yang rung ba'i bgegs ni phyogs bcur 'bros par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:29b-0: de'i rjes la dngos med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi stong @29b pa nyid mngon du byas la g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:29b-1: de'i rjes la ye shes kyi sa gzhi bskyed par bya ba'i phyir yi ge h'um dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:29b-2: sgra dang thig les mgo bor rnam par brgyan pa mthar gnas pa'i yi ge bzhi po bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:29b-3: de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa 'bar ba'i rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshan pa sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams bltas te /
T02TD1784E:29b-4: de'i steng gi yi ge bh'um yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa rig ma dang bcas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:29b-5: de'i yan lag las 'byung ba grva bzhi la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor te rin po che'i ngo bo gzhal yas khang ba blta bar bya'o /
T02TD1784E:29b-6: de'i dbus su ni thugs rdo rje'i sa bon las 'byung ba aindra n'i la'i mdog dang 'dra ba cho ga bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid mi bskyod par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:29b-7: de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs la zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:29b-8: de bzhin du mtshams rnams su spyan la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:29b-9: de bzhin du de'i phyi rol gyi mtshams bzhi po la gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:29b-10: reg bya rdo rje ma ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khyud par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:29b-11: de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i snam du bzhi la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du byams pa dang /
T02TD1784E:29b-17: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /
T02TD1784E:29b-18: kun du bzang po rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:29b-19: de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su gshin rje mthar byed dang /
T02TD1784E:29b-20: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
T02TD1784E:29b-23: de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i mtshan su mi g-yo ba dang /
T02TD1784E:29b-25: dbyig pa sngon pa can dang /
T02TD1784E:29b-27: de bzhin du steng dang 'og tu gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dag go //
T02TD1784E:29b-28: de lta bu'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la de nyid skyu'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba yin te /
T02TD1784E:30a-1: na gzugs kyi phung po la rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1784E:30a-2: de nyid ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02TD1784E:30a-4: mig la sa'i snying po dang byams ba dag go //
T02TD1784E:30a-5: gzugs la gzugs rdo rje ma'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-6: 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur ba dag la gshin rje mthar byed dang /
T02TD1784E:30a-8: tshor ba'i phung po la ni rin chen rgyal po /
T02TD1784E:30a-9: de nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02TD1784E:30a-10: chu'i khams la m'a ma k'i'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-11: rna ba'i dbang po la phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-12: sgra la sgra rdo rje ma'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-13: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
T02TD1784E:30a-15: khro bo gnyis po kha sbyar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-16: 'du shes la snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02TD1784E:30a-17: de nyid ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1784E:30a-18: me'i khams la gos dkar mo'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-19: sna la nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-20: dri la dri rdo rje ma'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-21: rta mgrin dang dbyug sngon can te /
T02TD1784E:30a-22: khro bo gnyis po kha sbyar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-23: 'du byed la don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-24: de nyid ni bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1784E:30a-25: rlung gi khams la sgrol m'a //
T02TD1784E:30a-26: lce la 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02TD1784E:30a-28: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang stobs po che dag gis kha sbyar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-29: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-30: de nyid ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02TD1784E:30a-31: lus la sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-33: yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad kyi mtshams rnams la kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-34: reg bya la reg bya rdo rje ma'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-35: gnod mdzes dang gtsug tor dag gis kha sbyar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:30a-36: de nas snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba nye bar thob pa'i rim pas rnam par shes pa mi snang bar byas la /
T02TD1784E:30a-37: ston ka'i nyi ma phyed pa sprin med pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra ba rang gi bdag nyid dang khams gsum pa rnam par bsgoms la de nyid brtan par bya ba'i sngags 'di dran par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:30a-38: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzh'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1784E:30a-39: nam mkha'i khams la h'um las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
T02TD1784E:30a-40: de'i steng du aom las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la de'i steng du yang aa:las byung ba'i padma bltas te /
T02TD1784E:30b-0: padma de nyid kyi steng du yang yi ge gsum bkod la spro ba dang bsdu ba byis la nyi ma dang padma yi ge @30b gsum po de rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la thim par byas te /
T02TD1784E:30b-1: aom dharm'a dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di brjod do //
T02TD1784E:30b-3: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la yi ge gsum yang bkod cing de yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje 'chang chen po rnam par bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:30b-4: de'i rjes la de nyid kyi thugs ka las mi bskyod pa spros nas rjes su zhugs pas /
T02TD1784E:30b-5: aindra n'i la dang 'dra ba zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa /
T02TD1784E:30b-6: phyag g-yas pa rnams la rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:30b-7: phyag g-yon pa rnams la dril bu dang ral gri dang rin chen bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:30b-8: rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:30b-10: de nas de nyid kyi spyi bo dang lkog ma dang thugs ka dang lte ba dang zhabs gnyis po la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog dkar po dang dmar po dang sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu ste /
T02TD1784E:30b-11: phung po rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo yi ge aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1784E:30b-12: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:30b-13: de nas mo ha ra ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyis sra ba dang snum pa dang dro ba dang g-yo ba'i ngo bos sa la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:30b-14: de bzhin du thlim aom aom aom h'um h'um mee sam zhes bya ba'i sa bon rnams kyis rim pa ji lta bya bzhin du mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang /
T02TD1784E:30b-15: rtsa rgyus dang yan lag thams cad kyi tshigs rnams byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:30b-16: de bzhin du lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i rtsa dang /
T02TD1784E:30b-17: kha dang gsang ba'i gnas dang /
T02TD1784E:30b-18: lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang /
T02TD1784E:30b-19: bus mo g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang /
T02TD1784E:30b-20: spyi bo dang rkang mthil rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge h'um bcu las 'byung ba'i gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa khro bo bcu dgod par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:30b-22: de'i rjes la spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge aom dkar po rnam par bkod la de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los rang gi bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha mo spyan gyi chogs spros te /
T02TD1784E:31a-0: de nyid kyis nam mkha' la gnas pa'i rnam par @31a * //
T02TD1784E:31a-1: snang mdzad bkug cing de'i mdun du gnas te /
T02TD1784E:31a-2: dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba //
T02TD1784E:31a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02TD1784E:31a-4: phyogs bcu la zhugs sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1784E:31a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i dkyil 'khor la yang gsol ba gdab par byas la /
T02TD1784E:31a-6: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod cing de nyid du zhugs te sku rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:31a-7: de bzhin du lce dang snying ga'i padma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge a'a:dang h'um dmar po dang nag po bsgoms la de dag las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los rang rang gi bdag mo dang bcas pa'i gos dkar mo dang m'a ma k'i'i tshigs spros te snga ma bzhin du gsung rdo rje dang thugs rdo rje de dag gis bkug cing de'i mdun du yang /
T02TD1784E:31a-8: dpal ldan chos ni gsung gi lam //
T02TD1784E:31a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab la /
T02TD1784E:31a-10: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta w'a ka badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:31a-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i sngags dag gis brtan par byas la /
T02TD1784E:31a-12: yi ge de dag gnyis pos rang rang gi bdag po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:31a-13: de'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:31a-14: de nas phyag mtshan drug dang ldan pa'i dam tshigs sems dpa' rdzogs par bltas te /
T02TD1784E:31a-15: de'i snying gar de dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' phra mo rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:31a-16: de'i snying gang yang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' yi ge h'um dgod par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:31a-18: de ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02TD1784E:31a-19: de'i rjes la dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa thos pa dang bsam pa la gnas pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas yid rdzogs pa'i khrus mkhan la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rigs can mdog ljang gu dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma blangs te /
T02TD1784E:31a-20: snga ma bzhin du de nyid kyi spyi po la sogs pa'i gnas lnga por yi ge aom la sogs pa bkod la /
T02TD1784E:31a-21: spyan la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyis khams bzhi po'i rang bzhin nu ma dang mchu dang /
T02TD1784E:31b-0: bha ga dang de'i nam @31b mkha' rnams byin gyis brlabs la gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i sa'i snying po la sogs pas skye mched rnams byin gyis brlabs shing snga ma bzhin du lag pa g-yas pa la sogs pa'i gnas bcu la rdo rje ro langs ma dang /
T02TD1784E:31b-1: gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang /
T02TD1784E:31b-2: khro gnyer ma dang ral pa gcig ma dang /
T02TD1784E:31b-3: sna tshogs rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1784E:31b-4: sna tshogs rin chen ma dang /
T02TD1784E:31b-7: nam mkha' rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1784E:31b-9: khro bo'i rgyal po'i btsun mo bcu dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:31b-10: de'i rjes la bdag nyid kyi yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams te /
T02TD1784E:31b-11: de nyid kyi rtse dbus ma la yi ge aom dgod cing de bzhin du lha mo'i padma dang /
T02TD1784E:31b-12: yi ge a'a:las byung ba bsams la /
T02TD1784E:31b-13: de nyid kyi lte bar aom byin gyis brlabs pa byas la /
T02TD1784E:31b-14: aom sarbba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod cing sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:31b-15: yi ge h'um gi rang bzhin gyi lus bde ba chen po'i de kho na nyid nyams su myong zhing /
T02TD1784E:31b-16: de nas phyung ba'i dus su yi ge phat kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par dmigs te /
T02TD1784E:31b-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod cing padma'i nang du spro bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:31b-18: de'i rjes la padma'i nang du badzra dhri ka ces bya ba'i sngags kyis rdzogs pa sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can ral pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa rang gi bdag pos spyi bor brgyan pa /
T02TD1784E:31b-19: sku mdog nag po zhal gzhan gnyis dmar po dang /
T02TD1784E:31b-21: phyag g-yas pa rnams la rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma 'chang ba /
T02TD1784E:31b-22: g-yon pa rnams la dril bu dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:31b-23: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02TD1784E:31b-24: rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa bsams te /
T02TD1784E:31b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid rdo rje'i steng gi lam nas gshegs te /
T02TD1784E:31b-26: ye shes sems dpa'i rdo rjer zhugs shing de'i steng gi lam nas yang gshegs la /
T02TD1784E:31b-27: de nyid kyi zhal nas byung ste lha mo'i zhal gyi lam nas de nyid kyi ye shes sems ma'i snying gar zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:32a-0: de las kyang phyi rol du byung la zhe sdang gi rigs can gyi @32a * //
T02TD1784E:32a-1: sems can rnams sa bcu'i dbang phyug tu mdzad cing yang tshur gshegs la mdun du gshegs te /
T02TD1784E:32a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po dang tha mi dad bar gyur cing nyi ma dang padma'i gdan gyi steng du rang gi rig mas 'khyud pa /
T02TD1784E:32a-3: drag po dang zhi ba dang chags pa chen po ste //
T02TD1784E:32a-4: ro gsum gyi bdag nyid can rnal 'byor pas rang gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:32a-5: de'i rjes la dzin dzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bzhi pos rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-8: don yod grub pa rnams zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa sku mdog dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-9: dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po dang nag po dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-10: dkar po dang ljang gu dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal mnga' ba /
T02TD1784E:32a-11: 'khor lo dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang padma dkar po dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-12: dril bu dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-13: ral gri dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-18: thugs kar padma kha phye ba dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-19: rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang ral gri dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-23: 'khor lo dang dril bu dang padma ljang gu dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-25: rim pa ji lta bu bzhin du phyag mtshan de rnams phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa rnams la bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:32a-26: 'khor lo dang rin po che dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-27: padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa snga ma bzhin du spros te /
T02TD1784E:32a-28: slar yang 'byung zhing gti mug dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-31: phrag dog gi rigs can gyi sems can rnams rnam par dag par mdzad la /
T02TD1784E:32a-32: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du shar dang lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su bzhugs pa /
T02TD1784E:32a-33: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par phyogs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:32a-34: de bzhin du mo ha ra ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyis lha mo spyan dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-35: m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar mo dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-36: sgrol ma rnams snga ma bzhin du zhal gsum pa dang /
T02TD1784E:32a-38: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD1784E:32a-39: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhin du sku mdog dang phyag mtshan mnga' ba ste /
T02TD1784E:32b-0: 'on kyang @32b autpala dkar po dang sngon po lha mo spyan dang m'a ma k'i dag la'o //
T02TD1784E:32b-1: autpala dmar po'i sdong bu kha phye ba ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02TD1784E:32b-2: sgrol ma'i g-yon par autpala dmar po'o //
T02TD1784E:32b-3: de bzhin du thugs ka nas 'byung zhing nad zhi ba dang /
T02TD1784E:32b-5: rgyas pa dang dbang gi las mdzad nas shar la sogs pa'i grva rnams su bzhugs pa rang rang gi bdag po'i cod pan can bcom ldan 'das la mngon par phyogs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:32b-6: de nas rim pa gnyis pa'i me'i mtshams nas brtsams te /
T02TD1784E:32b-7: dza:h'um bam to:zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi spyan la sogs pa sku mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dra ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i cod pan can /
T02TD1784E:32b-8: me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes bzhi po thob par mdzad nas me long dang /
T02TD1784E:32b-11: ro snod phyag gis bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:32b-12: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par phyogs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:32b-13: de nas sngar bshad pa'i sa bon las phyi rol gyi snom bu'i shar phyogs su byams pa dang /
T02TD1784E:32b-15: lho ru lag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po /
T02TD1784E:32b-16: nub phyogs su 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'jam dpal dbyangs so //
T02TD1784E:32b-17: byang phyogs su sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /
T02TD1784E:32b-19: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams ni phyag dang phyag mchan rnams ni rang gi mgon po dang 'dra ba dang de'i cod pan can /
T02TD1784E:32b-20: 'on kyang byams pa'i phyag g-yas pa la klu shing gi me tog gi yal ga'o //
T02TD1784E:32b-21: de rnams kyi se sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skye mched rnams dag cing lha'i mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du bskyed de lar yang byung zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par phyogs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:32b-22: de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog nag po dang /
T02TD1784E:32b-25: ljang gu mnga' ba nyi ma dang padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02TD1784E:32b-26: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa /
T02TD1784E:32b-28: rdo rje dang zhags pa dang /
T02TD1784E:32b-29: dril bu dang dgra sta dang /
T02TD1784E:32b-30: rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-0: @33a * // ral gri dang sdigs mdzub kyi zhags pa dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-1: dril bu dang dgra sta dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-2: tho ba dang dril bu dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-3: dgra sta dang zhags pa dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-7: sdigs mdzub kyi zhags pa dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-8: dril bu dang dgra sta bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-11: mi'u thung ba 'od zer gyi phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-12: spyan dang smin ma ser pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-13: rang rang gi bdag po'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-14: gnod sbyin dang srin po dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-16: klu dang lha la sogs pa dgug pa dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-17: rengs pa dang rmongs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-18: bskrad pa la sogs pa'i las mdzad pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-19: bcom ldan 'das mngon par phyogs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:33a-20: de bzhin du mtshams bzhi po la mi g-yo ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1784E:33a-21: aindra n'i la dang 'dra ba'i sku mdog mnga' ba /
T02TD1784E:33a-22: zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-24: rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-26: don yod grub pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-28: khro ba dang sgeg pa dang ldan par sngar bshad pa'i khro bo rnams kyi phyag mtshan rnams bsnams pa ste /
T02TD1784E:33a-29: 'on kyang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste ;
T02TD1784E:33a-30: char 'bebs pa dang char rengs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-32: dug sel ba la sogs pa'i las rnams mdzad cing snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:33a-33: de'i rjes la gtsug tor rgyal po ni sprin nag po dang 'dra ba'i sku mdog mnga' ba /
T02TD1784E:33a-34: thugs rdo rje'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-35: zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-36: spyan gsum pa phyag gnyis pos gtsug tor bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-37: phyag g-yas pa gnyis po la rdo rje dang padma /
T02TD1784E:33a-38: gzhan la sdigs mdzub dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-39: skyon thams cad ldog par mdzad cing tshangs pa'i gnas su zhugs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:33a-40: de bzhin du 'og tu ni gnod mdzes rgyal po ste /
T02TD1784E:33a-41: aindra n'i la'i sku mdog can mi bskyod pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02TD1784E:33a-42: phyag g-yas pa rnams la rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-44: phyag g-yon pa rnams la sdigs mdzub kyi zhags pa dang /
T02TD1784E:33a-45: padma dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:33b-0: dug rtsi nag po @33b la sogs pa 'jig par mdzad cing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par phyogs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:33b-1: de ni dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02TD1784E:33b-2: de'i rjes la phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1784E:33b-4: bsdu pa'i rim pas rdo rje'i bzlas pa byas pa /
T02TD1784E:33b-5: ro de nyid kyi dbang po gnyis dang snyoms par bzhugs pas reg bya rdo rje ma dang lhan cig thim par gyur cing /
T02TD1784E:33b-6: de bzhin du zhugs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje thig le'i ngo bor bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:33b-7: de dang 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das bltas la /
T02TD1784E:33b-8: tshad med pa bzhi'i ngo bo rigs kyi lha mo rnams kyis khyod ni rdo rje thugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bskul bas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis ldang bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:33b-9: ldang ba'i bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni /
T02TD1784E:33b-10: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02TD1784E:33b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa stod par mdzad pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:33b-12: de'i 'og tu gsum mi dmigs pas mchod pa byas la 'khor lo ni rang gi sku la snga ma bzhin zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:33b-13: bde ba chen po'i ngo bor gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:33b-14: ting nge 'dzin las skyo ba'i dus su spyi bor mtho gang tsam gyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge aom de las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis sku gsung thugs tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:33b-15: go ku da ha na'i sa bon rnams kyang bsdus te /
T02TD1784E:33b-16: de las byung ba'i bdud rtsi rnams yi ge gsum gyi sa sbyang ba la sogs pa byas la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la nang gi bdag nyid kyis sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD1784E:33b-17: yi ge hr'i:las byung ba'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa mgrin par bsams te /
T02TD1784E:33b-18: de'i lte bar yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:33b-19: de nyid kyi dbus ma'i rtse mo la yi ge aom bkod cing de'i rjes la snying gar yi ge h'um las byung ba'i me 'bar bar bsams te bdud rtsi de nyid kha'i padmar byin la snying ga'i padmar bzhugs te /
T02TD1784E:33b-20: lte ba'i padma kha sbyar byas la gsang ba'i padma las phyung ba thar par gyur pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:34a-0: de las kyang skyon g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i sna'i bu ga gnyis po las ye shes sems @34a * //
T02TD1784E:34a-1: dpa'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol du spros te /
T02TD1784E:34a-2: gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa rnam lngas mchod cing bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD1784E:34a-3: dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi sngags rnams ni thog mar aom dang yi ge gsum dang rang rang gi mtshan rnams dang tha mar sv'a h'a sa spel lo //
T02TD1784E:34a-4: bzlas pas kyang skyon dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD1784E:34a-5: aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyis 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma gtong bar bya'o /
T02TD1784E:34a-6: langs nas kyang smon lam btab la bsam gtan gyi khang par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:34a-7: las rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02TD1784E:34a-8: dgongs pa 'di nyid kyis sngar gsungs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur ces gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:34a-9: de nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsol ba sngon du 'gro ba bla ma dang /
T02TD1784E:34a-10: slob ma'i 'brel ba'i sgo nas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:34a-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:34a-12: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:34a-13: rnam par snang mdzad ni rdo rje 'chad chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:34a-14: thugs ka ni de nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon te /
T02TD1784E:34a-15: de las byung zhing 'di skad gsol to zhes ston to zhes gsungs so zhe na /
T02TD1784E:34a-16: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:34a-17: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba ste /
T02TD1784E:34a-18: gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams te de rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems ni bskyed pa'i rim pas bskyed par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:34a-19: de nyid rang byung ba ni zhal gsum la sogs pa'i rnam pas phyi rol du gsal ba'o //
T02TD1784E:34a-21: sku gsal ba tsam gcig pu yang ma yin gyi ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa kun ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:34a-22: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:34a-23: de bzhin du rab tu mi rtog pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:34a-24: gnas med pa zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par bzhugs pas thig le'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pha'o //
T02TD1784E:34b-0: de nyid las kyang ldang ba dang tshim pa @34b la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:34b-2: de ni dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum yin no //
T02TD1784E:34b-3: de ltar gsungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ci mdzad ce na /
T02TD1784E:34b-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:34b-5: yang gcig tu 'dus nas zhes pa ni /
T02TD1784E:34b-6: sngar ni re zhig gcig tu 'dus pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:34b-7: phyi nas de kho na nyid chen po gsol ba btab pa'i phyir 'dus nas so //
T02TD1784E:34b-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:34b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:34b-10: de rnams kyi sprin ni tshogs so //
T02TD1784E:34b-11: spros pa ni byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:34b-12: de rnams rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtag tu spyod pas na dam tshig go //
T02TD1784E:34b-13: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1784E:34b-14: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rdzogs par byed pas na rin po che'o //
T02TD1784E:34b-15: de rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing phyag 'chal nas 'di skad gsol te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:34b-16: 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bod pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD1784E:34b-17: kyee bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid ni de kho na nyid de don dam pa gnang du gsol zhes pa ni bka' stsal par mdzod cig ces ston to //
