T02TD1784E:202b-8: phyag rgya rnams kyi rgyal po ni gtso bo ste spro ba dang bsdu bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:202b-9: gzhan yang mchog tu rtag par ni mi 'jig pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:202b-10: de bas na de'i rnam par thob pas sngags thams cad kyi sku yin la /
T02TD1784E:202b-11: 'dres pa dang ma 'dres pa gang yang rung bar byed pa de ni gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:202b-12: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:202b-13: glang po rnyed nas 'phral du ni //
T02TD1784E:202b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:202b-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:202b-16: kun du ni thams cad rnam par 'khrul pa las thams cad pa nyid du /
T02TD1784E:202b-17: ye shes rdo rje ni bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:202b-18: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di zhes pa ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i btsun mo thor tshugs gcig ma ni ral pa gcig ma ste /
T02TD1784E:202b-19: dam tshig chen po'i rgyal po ni don yod grub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:202b-20: de nyid kyi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsung rdo rje ni sngags te /
T02TD1784E:202b-21: de nyid rdo rje mchog ni /
T02TD1784E:202b-22: rig sngags gtso bo nyid kyi sku //
T02TD1784E:202b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:202b-24: aom ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:202b-25: shu li ni zhes pa ni gdug pa rnams la nad skyed pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:202b-26: de nyid kyi bod pa ni shu li ni'o //
T02TD1784E:202b-27: sv'a h'a ni zhi ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:202b-28: sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis klu'i bu mo ni /
T02TD1784E:202b-29: 'jog po la sogs pa klu'i bu mo rnams te /
T02TD1784E:202b-30: de dag gi tshig par gyur pa ni 'dod chags kyi mes gdungs par gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:202b-31: gos dang bral ba ni rang gi ming rnams kyis gzung ba'i phyir gos bor zhing 'bros par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1784E:202b-32: sangs rgyas ni don yod grub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:202b-33: de nyid kyi byang chub ni rnam pa rjes su dran pa ni bsgoms pas so //
T02TD1784E:203a-0: klu'i bu mo gcig po ma yin gyi klu thams cad ni 'jog po la sogs pa yang rig sngags 'di @203a * //
T02TD1784E:203a-2: de nyid kyi phyir klu mo mig bzangs ni gzugs dang rgyan la sogs pa dang ldan pa de nyid bkug cing mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:203a-4: 'gegs nas shi ba'i bram ze mo'i thod par klu'i rgyal po dang de'i bu mo'i gzugs brnyan da du ra dang rgya skyigs kyi khu bas bris te /
T02TD1784E:203a-5: gdol pa mo'i rang byung gi me tog gis gos pa'i ras sngon pos bkab la ral pa gcig ma'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i sngags bzlas shing rdo rje dang lcags kyus mtshan pa'i rkang pa g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag gis rim gyis g-yas brkyang ba dang g-yon brkyang bas thod pa de nyid mnan cing ji srid du gnas par bya ba de srid du klu'i bu mo la sogs pa 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:203a-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nam mkha'i dam tshig ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02TD1784E:203a-7: de las 'byung ba de ni skye ba gang la yod pa de nam mkha'i dam tshig 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:203a-8: rdo rje ni khro gnyer ma'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:203a-9: dam tshig chen po ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02TD1784E:203a-10: de nyid kyi rdo rje ni khro gnyer ma ste /
T02TD1784E:203a-11: de nye bar btags pas rig sngags kyang de bzhin du bshad pa ste de nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:203a-12: aom ni rdo rje 'chang rjes su dran pa'o ;
T02TD1784E:203a-13: / bha ya ni srin po la sogs pas byas pa'am /
T02TD1784E:203a-14: 'jigs pa brgyad de de rnams na sha ni zhes pa ni 'jig par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:203a-15: gdug pa rnams la 'bru tshugs su blta bas na bhri ku ta ste khro gnyer ma'o //
T02TD1784E:203a-16: da shi zhes pa ni gdug pa gsod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:203a-17: w'i ti zhes pa ni khyad par du gsod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:203a-18: shve te zhes pa dkar po ste /
T02TD1784E:203a-19: 'ba' zhig pa'i dkar po'i phyogs la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:203a-20: shve ta dza ti ni zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems dkar po'i rang bzhin gyi snang ba mtha' yas kyis ral pa'i cod pan du brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:203a-21: sv'a h'a ni zhi ba'i don du'o //
T02TD1784E:203a-22: sngags 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams /
T02TD1784E:203a-23: 'dod pa'i lha'i tshogs kyis 'dar bar gyur nas /
T02TD1784E:203a-24: ye shes rdo rje ni snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa ni bsgoms so //
T02TD1784E:203a-25: de nyid kyi phyir sngags kyi rig pa 'di ni khro gnyer ma'i rig sngags kyi dam tshig la gtso bo ni sgrub pa pos /
T02TD1784E:203b-0: gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba ni @203b rgyan dang bcas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo dgug cing gnyer bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:203b-2: dur khrod kyi ras la thal chen gyis rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo bris te /
T02TD1784E:203b-3: de'i skye gnas la dzi hi dmar po bkod la /
T02TD1784E:203b-4: khro gnyer ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje lcags kyu byin gyis brlabs pa'i rkang pa g-yon pas nu ma gnyis kyi bar gnon cing rig sngags 'di nyid bzlas shing rnal 'byor pas ji srid du gnas pa'i bya ba de srid du de nyid 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:203b-5: de'i rjes la 'dod chags kyis gdungs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo des sgrub pa po la 'khyud par byed do //
T02TD1784E:203b-6: de ni sngar bshad pa'i sngags rnams kyi bzlas pa'i khyad par bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:203b-7: 'gog pa'i rdo rje rgyal po ni //
T02TD1784E:203b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:203b-9: 'gog pa rdo rje ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:203b-10: de nyid mdzes pa dang snang bas na rgyal po ste /
T02TD1784E:203b-11: de la yongs su gyur pa ni zhugs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:203b-12: mchog ni phul du byung ba dang mdzes pa ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin /
T02TD1784E:203b-13: rdo rje gsum ni yi ge gsum las byung ba'i bzlas pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:203b-14: ma ning gi bzlas pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:203b-15: de ma thag tu ni de'i sgo nas skad cig ma gcig gis sngar bshad pa'i de rnams thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:203b-16: de kho na nyid la zhugs pas thams cad dka' ba ma yin pa 'grub pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:203b-17: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:203b-18: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang na thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang khro bo rnams la 'bum bzlas pas /
T02TD1784E:203b-19: dgon pa chen po la sogs par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngar bshad pa'i las rnams thams cad ni zhi ba la sogs par 'grub par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:203b-20: de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyang gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzlas na /
T02TD1784E:203b-21: de'i tshe lha de nyid kyang yid kyis bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:203b-23: mngon spyod kyi yul bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:203b-24: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang //
T02TD1784E:203b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:203b-26: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa ni bla ma la sun 'byin pa'o //
T02TD1784E:203b-27: theg pa chen po smod pa ni gcer bu la sogs pa mu stegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:204a-0: de dag thams cad nan tan @204a * //
T02TD1784E:204a-2: gal te las byed par mi 'dod na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:204a-3: gnas nas spro ba ni bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:204a-4: las 'di nyid kyis snga ma bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa smod par byed pa rnams la byang chub mchog ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i zhing la skye ba bstan to //
T02TD1784E:204a-5: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:204a-7: yang rdo rje slob dpon ni 'khor ba'i spyod pa la 'jug par byed pa'i nyon mongs kyi yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
T02TD1784E:204a-8: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
T02TD1784E:204a-9: smod pa ni de dang 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin rnams so //
T02TD1784E:204a-10: chen po ni yul lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:204a-11: de rnams la 'gro bas na theg pa chen po ste dbang po rnams so //
T02TD1784E:204a-12: de rnams kyi mchog ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:204a-14: smod pa ni de'i rang bzhin rnams te /
T02TD1784E:204a-15: de dag thams cad bsad pa ni 'od gsal ba la zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:204a-17: nan tan du zhes pa ni snang pa la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
T02TD1784E:204a-18: yang na gnas ni 'od gsal ba de nyid las nye bar thob pa la sogs pa'i rim pas de rnams spro ba ni spro bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:204a-19: ting nge 'dzin 'dis byang chub mchog ni 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:204a-20: sngags ni ye shes kyi sku'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:204a-21: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:204a-22: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:204a-23: mngon spyod la snod du rung ba rnams phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi lus la sogs pa gsod pas /
T02TD1784E:204a-24: sdig pa chen po nyid du bsgoms pas /
T02TD1784E:204a-25: de'i tshe gdug sems ni dgra bo rnams gsod par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:204a-26: gzhan du na skyon med pa dang skyon phra mo'i sgo nas drag po'i las mi rigs so ;
T02TD1784E:204a-27: / mngon spyod byed pa'i cha lugs kyi khyad par bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:204a-28: khrag dang chu yis gsher ba'am //
T02TD1784E:204a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:204a-30: khrag dang chu ni byang chub kyi sems dang bshad pa dang /
T02TD1784E:204a-31: gci ba ni gsang ba'i rdo rje chu ste /
T02TD1784E:204b-0: gos ni mi'i pags pa ste sha'i rang bzhin @204b no ;
T02TD1784E:204b-1: / de bas na bdud rtsi lnga'i go gyon pa /
T02TD1784E:204b-2: snga ma bzhin du khro bo'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD1784E:204b-3: lingga ni gzugs brnyan rkang pa g-yon pas gnon cing /
T02TD1784E:204b-4: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas mngon spyod bya'o //
T02TD1784E:204b-5: de la gang gi tshe gos de nyid bskams pa de'i tshe dgra bo de shi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:204b-6: chu yis gos rnams gsher byas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:204b-7: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas chu ni rdo rje'i chus gsher ba'i gos gyon par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:204b-8: rin chen 'byung ldan dang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa dag gis /
T02TD1784E:204b-9: bshang ba dang gci ba ni ci bzhin du 'byung ba'i khrag gis gsher ba'i gos gyon par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:204b-10: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1784E:204b-11: rul pa ni rang gi dbang gis te /
T02TD1784E:204b-12: de nyid kyis dri ngan pa dang ldan pa'i gos gyon par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:204b-13: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor pas thal ba'i skyo ma ni /
T02TD1784E:204b-14: shin tu dkar ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis gsher ba'i gos gyon par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:204b-16: gcer bu dang skra bshig pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:204b-17: gzhan yang gtsigs pa ni khro bo'i rnam pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:204b-18: 'jigs pa'i tshul ni yid kyis khros pa dang /
T02TD1784E:204b-20: de rnams kyi lingga ni sngar bshad pa'i gzugs brnyan bya ba ste sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:204b-21: da ni gnas bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:204b-23: dur khrod dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:204b-24: ma mo ni 'jig rten gyi ma mo brgyad de /
T02TD1784E:204b-26: de rnams kyi gnas su rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas bya'o //
T02TD1784E:204b-27: dur khrod la mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
T02TD1784E:204b-28: khang stong la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas so //
T02TD1784E:204b-29: bzhi mdo la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas so //
T02TD1784E:204b-30: mtshan ma gcig la don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
T02TD1784E:204b-31: shing gcig drung gi gnas la snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor pas mngon spyod kyi las bya ste /
T02TD1784E:204b-32: yul gyi dbye ba bstan to //
T02TD1784E:204b-33: da ni phur bu gdab pa bshad par byas te /
T02TD1784E:204b-34: mi rus las byas phur bu ni //
T02TD1784E:204b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:204b-36: mi'i rkang sor brgyad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:204b-37: khro bo'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas shing dgra bo'i sgo ru brkos nas sbas na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:204b-38: sangs rgyas ni rgyal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:205a-1: sku gsum gyi rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:205a-2: mchog sbyin pa ni rjes su gzung bar mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1784E:205a-3: shes pa dang mi shes pa ni dngos po dang dngos po ma yin pa dag / rnam spangs ni rtog pa med pa yang /
T02TD1784E:205a-4: zla ba phyed ni yun ring ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:205a-5: sbyor ba'i khyad par bstan to ;
T02TD1784E:205a-6: / yang na thod par gang ba dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:205a-7: gdol pa mo'i ma chag pa'i thod pa la khro bo'i sngags kyis spel ba'i bsgrub bya'i ming bris te /
T02TD1784E:205a-8: de med na ta la'i lo ma la sogs pa la yang bris shing dgra bo'i sgo ru brkos nas sbas na mngon spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:205a-9: dam tshig chen po ni mngon spyod la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:205a-10: de rnams kyi dpal ni bskyed pa'i rgyu rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang gis de skad bka' stsal to zhes pa dang sbyor ba ni rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi las te /
T02TD1784E:205a-12: gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyi phyi ma bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:205a-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:205a-14: thams cad ni sems can thams cad de /
T02TD1784E:205a-15: de rnams la de bzhin ni bgegs nyid du gshegs pa ni 'gro bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:205a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams te /
T02TD1784E:205a-17: de dag gi sku la sogs pa ni lus la sogs pa nges par bcing ba ni pur bus gdab pa la /
T02TD1784E:205a-18: rdo rje ni phyed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:205a-19: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:205a-20: khams gsum pa thams cad kyi ngo bo 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi sku la sogs pa ni lus ngag yid gnon pa'i rdo rje ni /
T02TD1784E:205a-21: khro bo'i sngags kyi dum bu nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1784E:205a-22: de la sngar bshad pa'i dum bus ni 'gugs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:205a-23: phyi mas phur bu 'debs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:205a-24: aom ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:205a-25: gha gha zhes bya ba la ni khros pa la tshig gnyis so //
T02TD1784E:205a-26: gh'a ta ya zhes pa ni sod cig ces ston to //
T02TD1784E:205a-28: k'i la ya zhes pa ni phur bu btab pa'i sbyor bas so zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:205a-29: sarba p'a pa ni bgegs rnams so //
T02TD1784E:205a-30: yi ge h'um gsum po ni lus la sogs pa la bskul ba la'o //
T02TD1784E:205a-31: badzra dha ra a'adzny'a pa ya ti zhes pa ni bskur ste bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:205a-32: h'um dang phat ni khros pa la'o //
T02TD1784E:205a-33: sngags kyi dum bu 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kun ni brgya byin la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:205b-0: rdzu 'phrul @205b chen po ni rdzu 'phrul thob pa yang brgyal ba ni dran pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1784E:205b-1: 'jigs par 'gyur nas rdo rje thugs ni mi bskyod pa dran 'gyur ni bsgoms so //
T02TD1784E:205b-2: 'dir sbyor ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:205b-3: mi rus las byas phur bu 'am //
T02TD1784E:205b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:205b-5: mi'i rus pa'am seng ldeng la sogs pa rnams kyis phur bu byas te /
T02TD1784E:205b-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis de nyid 'od 'phro 'khrug pa ni 'od zer 'bar ba dang ldan par bsams te /
T02TD1784E:205b-7: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs la sogs pa ru /
T02TD1784E:205b-8: rdo rje gsum ni bgegs rnams kyi sku ni lus te mgo bo nas brtsams te /
T02TD1784E:205b-9: ji srid rkang pa'i bar du sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD1784E:205b-10: de'i tshe phur bu 'debs pa 'grub bo //
T02TD1784E:205b-11: rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen nam //
T02TD1784E:205b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:205b-13: rnam par snang mdzad dang snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la /
T02TD1784E:205b-14: gshin rje gshed dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i ngo bo'i phur bu bsams te /
T02TD1784E:205b-15: de yang steng du khro bo'i rnam pa dang 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i ngo bo snga ma bzhin du gdug pa rnams la zhugs par bsams na /
T02TD1784E:205b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes phul du byung ba'i tshig ste /
T02TD1784E:205b-18: dbye ba gzhan gyis phur bu gdab pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:205b-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:205b-20: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku ste /
T02TD1784E:205b-21: de nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsgrub bya'i lus la phur bu 'debs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:205b-22: de nyid rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:205b-23: sku'i dam tshig ni lus te /
T02TD1784E:205b-24: de nyid tsham dam 'gugs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:205b-25: de'i rjes la rdo rje gnon pa ni brtan par phur bu 'debs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:205b-26: de'i don du sngags 'di nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:205b-27: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1784E:205b-28: tstshinda zhes pa ni chod ces ston to //
T02TD1784E:205b-29: ha na zhes bya ba la bsgrub bya'i lus sod cig ces par ston to //
T02TD1784E:205b-30: dipta badzra zhes pa ni rdo rje 'bar ba ste /
T02TD1784E:205b-32: h'um dang phat ni khros pa la'o //
T02TD1784E:205b-33: sbyor ba bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:205b-34: phan tshun dkri ba'i tshul du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:205b-35: phan tshun dkri ba ni snyoms par zhugs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:206a-2: gzhi ni lha mo spyan gyi padma /
T02TD1784E:206a-3: bsdam pa de dag sbyar zhing rnam par snang mdzad tshul gnas ni yi ge aom ste /
T02TD1784E:206a-4: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i lus bkug cing /
T02TD1784E:206a-5: padma'i nang du zhugs te yi ge aom gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje phur bu ni rengs pa'i rdo rjes nges par btab ni phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:206a-6: btab ma thag tu sems dpa' che //
T02TD1784E:206a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02TD1784E:206a-8: phur bus btab ma thag tu sems dpa' che ni bsgrub bya'i lus te /
T02TD1784E:206a-9: rdo rje gsum las byung ba ni lus ngag yid kyi rang bzhin gyis khams rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:206a-10: ldang bar 'gyur ba ni nus pa dang bral bar gyur pa'am /
T02TD1784E:206a-11: 'chi ba'i gnas su gyur pa ni zad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:206a-12: ngag la phur bus gdab pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:206a-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:206a-14: 'jig rten dbang phyug ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD1784E:206a-15: des byas pa'i gsung rnam par 'phrul ba ni /
T02TD1784E:206a-16: ngag la phur bus gdab pa de nyid brtan pas na rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:206a-17: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:206a-18: gsung gi dam tshig ni lce de la gnon pa ni phur bus gdab pa /
T02TD1784E:206a-19: ngag dgug pa sngon du 'gro ba de'i sngags gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:206a-20: aom ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:206a-21: hr'i ni gsung gi sa bon no //
T02TD1784E:206a-22: bhur bhu wa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum gyi ngag ste /
T02TD1784E:206a-23: de le phur bus gdab par bya //
T02TD1784E:206a-25: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1784E:206a-26: gos dkar mo'i kha phye ba'i padmar rdo rje sor mo ni rdo rje rtse mo zhugs shing /
T02TD1784E:206a-27: 'dod chags rdo rje tshul ni de'i rtse mor yi ge aa dgod cing /
T02TD1784E:206a-28: de'i 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya'i lce dgug cing de'i nang du zhugs la /
T02TD1784E:206a-29: rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:206a-30: btab ma thag tu ni lce phur bus btab na sku gsum dri med ni rnam pa gsum gyi sgra ste /
T02TD1784E:206a-31: de 'byung ba ni skyed par byed pa'i sgra'o //
T02TD1784E:206a-32: ldang ba ni lkugs par 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD1784E:206a-33: yang na shi bar 'gyur te zad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:206a-34: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:206a-35: thugs ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:206a-36: des byas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsgrub bya'i sems la phur bus gdab pa de nyid rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:206a-37: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:206b-0: thugs kyi dam tshig ni @206b sems te de la tsham dam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:206b-4: h'um zhes bya ba ni kye thugs rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing la /
T02TD1784E:206b-5: dza: ni song shig ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1784E:206b-6: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor bas m'a ma k'i'i padmar rdo rje rtse lnga po 'od spro pa rang gi rdo rje bcings pa ni zhugs te rdo rje thugs kyi gnas ni /
T02TD1784E:206b-7: yi ge h'um de'i rtse mor bkod la de'i 'od zer gyis bsgrub bya'i snying gnas yi ge ho: gnyis kyis spel ba yi ge gsum gyi rnam pa'i sems dgug cing de la zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:206b-8: rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:206b-9: btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje che ni /
T02TD1784E:206b-10: de'i sems phur bus btab ma thag tu rdo rje gsum ni dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyis 'byung ba ni sems te /
T02TD1784E:206b-11: ldang ba ni smyo bar 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD1784E:206b-12: yang na 'chi ba ni bsgrub bya'i lus las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:206b-13: cho ga legs pa brjed mi ngas pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyis sku gsung thugs ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te bsgoms na /
T02TD1784E:206b-14: de'i tshe mkha' dbyings nam mkha' dbyings pa'i na du mtha' yas ba'i sems can rnams la phur bus 'debs par 'gyur na bsgrub bya la smos ci dgos zhes phul du byung ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:206b-15: chen po ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams te /
T02TD1784E:206b-16: de rnams rjes su phur bus 'debs pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:206b-17: rdo rje phur bus ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1784E:206b-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:206b-19: de nas zhes pa ni bstan pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:206b-20: sku gsum ni lha mo rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:206b-21: mchog ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:206b-22: sems can gyi khams bgegs 'dzoms pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:206b-23: sems can khams la phan mdzad pa ni khro bo rnams te /
T02TD1784E:206b-24: de rnams thams cad mnyes pa ni chos thos pa dang /
T02TD1784E:206b-25: rab tu dgyes 'gyur ba ni bsam pa dang sgom pa dag gis te /
T02TD1784E:206b-26: gsung pa de ni bskur sti'i tshig tu gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:206b-28: ae ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:206b-29: gsang ba'i gnas ni zhi ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:207a-1: ni sngags la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:207a-2: snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:207a-4: yi ge gsum bzlas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:207a-5: da bzhin du chos thams cad ni sngags rnams kyi gnas zhi ba ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa ste /
T02TD1784E:207a-6: de yang shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:207a-7: rdo rje ni lha'i bu mo la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:207a-8: de rnam par 'joms pa ni 'gugs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:207a-9: de yang shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:207a-10: sangs rgyas thams cad ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:207a-11: byang chub sems dpa' ni tha mal pa'i bsgrub bya rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:207a-12: grags chen ni rgyal po la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:207a-13: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje dang padma /
T02TD1784E:207a-14: snyoms par zhugs pas gang zhig phur bus 'debs par gsungs pa de yang shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:207a-15: 'dir yang sngags rnams thams cad ni khro bo la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyis /
T02TD1784E:207a-16: gang zhig phur bus 'debs pa de yang /
T02TD1784E:207a-17: de nyid las byung ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po rjes su dran pa las skyes pa dang /
T02TD1784E:207a-18: sku gsung thugs ni sgrub pa po rnams la mchog byin pa ni dngos grub ster ba ste /
T02TD1784E:207a-19: sngags de nyid kyi bsdus pa ni /
T02TD1784E:207a-20: rdo rje bzlas pa sngon du 'gro ba ste /
T02TD1784E:207a-21: de yang shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:207a-22: sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub bya rnams la rmad du byung ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa dang sngags ni rig sngags rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:207a-23: 'gugs pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni phur bus 'debs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:207a-24: de rnams nyid rgyal bo ni gtso bor gyur pa'i gzhung gi tshogs kyang de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:207a-25: rgyud 'grel las le'u bcu bzhi pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:207a-26: le'u bcu bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs sum brgya drug cu'o /
T02TD1784E:207a-28: // / gal te las kyi tshogs kyi sgo nas mngon par zhen par rags par gyur na /
T02TD1784E:207a-29: de'i tshe de spang bar bya ba'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du bya ste /
T02TD1784E:207a-30: de'i phyir le'u bco lnga pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:207a-31: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:207a-32: rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:207a-33: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:207a-34: rdo rje ni sgyu ma'i sku ste /
T02TD1784E:207a-35: de nyid 'dzin pa ni 'od gsal ba las spro bas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:207a-36: 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ba'i skus mdzes pas na rgyal po'o //
T02TD1784E:207b-0: thams @207b cad nam mkha' ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis te /
T02TD1784E:207b-1: de gzigs pas na thams cad nam mkha'o //
T02TD1784E:207b-2: che ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams te de dag gi nang na /
T02TD1784E:207b-3: mi 'gyur ni 'jig par mi 'gyur bas mi 'gyur che'o //
T02TD1784E:207b-4: thams cad dbang bskur ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa 'jug pas thams cad dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1784E:207b-5: kun ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags bar ma'i rang bzhin rnams te /
T02TD1784E:207b-6: de dag 'od gsal ba la zhugs par mkhyen pas na kun mkhyen no //
T02TD1784E:207b-7: rdo rje ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD1784E:207b-8: de'i tshul ni lam bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:207b-9: sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1784E:207b-10: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:207b-11: sme sha can ni bdag nyid che //
T02TD1784E:207b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:207b-13: lo grangs bcu gnyis pa ni lo de rnams lon pa /
T02TD1784E:207b-14: sme sha can ni rigs tha ma'i bu mo /
T02TD1784E:207b-15: sgrub pa ni sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas yon tan dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:207b-16: sme sha can ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:207b-17: rab tu grags pa'i gdol pa'i las byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:207b-19: dben pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang bral ba'i ri bo la sogs pa'i gnas su'o /
T02TD1784E:207b-21: khyad par du zhes pa ni dad pa la sogs pa'i sems las byung ba'i yon tan gyis te /
T02TD1784E:207b-22: ji srid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:207b-23: bshang gcis nye bar mtshon pa'i dam tshig ni dam tshig lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:207b-24: sogs pa'i sgras ni de dang mtshungs pa'i tsandan la sogs pas gnas de ru gru bzhi la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o//
T02TD1784E:207b-26: rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni rdo rje tshul gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la mkhas pa'i slob ma dang lhan cig tu'o //
T02TD1784E:207b-27: de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pas mchod pa byas te /
T02TD1784E:207b-28: bu mo de yang snga ma bzhin du rigs lngas byin gyis brlabs la bdag nyid mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo dang bu mo de yang m'a ma k'i'i ngo bor bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:207b-29: bu mo de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:207b-30: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
T02TD1784E:207b-31: byed pa dang yan lag 'khrud pa la sogs pa la mkhas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:208a-0: de dag dang ldan pa dang de bzhin du bzhin yungs mdzes pa ni dga' ba @208a * //
T02TD1784E:208a-2: rab tu bzang ba ni kha dog ljang gu'o //
T02TD1784E:208a-3: rgyan rnams thams cad ni brdungs pa dang bris pa dang /
T02TD1784E:208a-4: srog chags dang khams kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:208a-5: de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ni rgyan dang ldan par byas nas phang bar bzhag la /
T02TD1784E:208a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1784E:208a-8: sngags kyi 'khor lo can ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas pa yin no zhes bsams te /
T02TD1784E:208a-9: rnal 'byor pas gnas par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:208a-10: rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
T02TD1784E:208a-11: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:208a-12: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas 'od gsal ba las cig car du rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku spros te /
T02TD1784E:208a-13: sku gsung thugs rdo rje can ni sku la sogs pa de rnams rdo rje'i rnam pa sgyu ma lta bu bsam ste /
T02TD1784E:208a-14: bsam gtan sngags ni bsam gtan te 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:208a-15: sngags ni de nyid las ldang ba ste bsam gtan sngags ni zhugs pa dang spros pa ste /
T02TD1784E:208a-16: de'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:208a-18: autpala mthing ga'i mdog dang 'dra ba'i btso blag ma lan gyi bu mo bdag nyid che ba ni lo bcu drug lon ba blangs te /
T02TD1784E:208a-19: lha mo spyan gyi rnam pas /
T02TD1784E:208a-20: rigs lnga'i sa bon gyis byin gyis byin rlabs la /
T02TD1784E:208a-21: rdo rje ni rang gi rdo rje dang padma ni de'i gsang ba'i padma ste /
T02TD1784E:208a-22: de dag sbyor ba ni yang dag par sbyor zhing de'i rjes la cho ga de nyid ni sngags kyi yi ge dgod pas sbyor ba ni bskyod pa byas la /
T02TD1784E:208a-23: las rnams brtsams pa ni gsang ba'i mchod pa'i bya ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:208a-24: de nyid kyi phyir cho ga 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad de rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dam tshig ni mchod pa dang po ste 'da' dka' ni rtag tu spyod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:208a-25: de ltar byed na de ma thag tu ni snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rdo rje sems dpa' ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1784E:208a-26: de'i 'od 'dra ba ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:208a-27: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'dzin mas ni blo la bzhag pas ni chos rnams kun dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:208b-0: de bzhin du de kho na nyid kyi rin po ches mdzes @208b pas na rgyal po'o //
T02TD1784E:208b-1: 'dod dang thar pa ni 'od gsal ba dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ste //
T02TD1784E:208b-2: de dag rab tu byed pa ni mngon du byed pas na 'dod dang thar par sgrub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:208b-3: rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
T02TD1784E:208b-4: rdo rje'i chos ni rnams bsgoms pas //
T02TD1784E:208b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:208b-6: de bzhin du snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1784E:208b-7: snga ma bzhin du khru nyi shu'i dkyil 'khor shin tu 'dus byas pa la rang bzhin rang gi bdag nyid cig car du gsung rdo rjer bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:208b-8: gar mkhan gyi bu mo bzhin bzangs ni /
T02TD1784E:208b-9: lo nyi shu lon pa dang /
T02TD1784E:208b-10: rab mdzes ni kha dog dmar po dang ser po ste /
T02TD1784E:208b-11: mig dkyus ring ba ni padma shin tu rgya che ba'am /
T02TD1784E:208b-12: rgyas pa'i padma dang 'dra ba'i mig yangs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:208b-13: de nyid gos dkar mo'i ngo bo dang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:208b-14: rdo rje chos ni snga ma bzhin du rdo rje dang padma dag sngags dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba yang dag par sbyor zhing /
T02TD1784E:208b-15: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga n'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags rjes su dran pa sngon du 'gro ba'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i sgo nas gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:208b-16: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa de yang rdo rje chos ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02TD1784E:208b-17: de'i bdag ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa dang /
T02TD1784E:208b-18: sa bcu ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:208b-19: de rnams la yang gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:208b-20: gsung gi dam tshig ni snga tshogs pa'i bstan bcos sprul pa dang /
T02TD1784E:208b-21: 'dzin pa ni lan cig gis bstan bcos gzung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:208b-22: rgyal po ni smra ba'i seng ge'i nang nas rgyal po'o //
T02TD1784E:208b-23: kun ni gcer bu pa dang /
T02TD1784E:208b-27: dpyod pa pa la sogs pa rnams kyi mchog ni gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:208b-28: dam pa ni bud med dam rgyal po'i bud med rnams te /
T02TD1784E:208b-29: de rnams la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:208b-30: dbang phyug ni bdag po nyid du 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:208b-31: dag gi de nyid dang 'dod pa'i de nyid dang /
T02TD1784E:208b-32: spros pa med pa'i de dag ste /
T02TD1784E:208b-33: de kho na nyid gsum thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa tshig gi don to //
T02TD1784E:208b-34: rin chen dang las kyi rnal 'byor pa dag zhe sdang gi rigs kyi nang du bsdu ba ste /
T02TD1784E:209a-0: de dag gis snga ma bzhin du sme sha can gyi bu mo @209a * //
T02TD1784E:209a-2: rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
T02TD1784E:209a-3: da ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'i bsgrub ba bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:209a-4: bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang //
T02TD1784E:209a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:209a-6: bram ze la sogs pa bzhi po las gang yang rung ba thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir bu mo rnyed nas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje chos dag ni /
T02TD1784E:209a-7: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:209a-8: sgrub pa de lta bu gsang ba'i tshul 'di sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ni bzhi pa'i dbang bskur ba gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:209a-9: man ngag bzhi pa de nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:209a-10: rdo rje nyi ma nub nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:209a-11: nub pa ni dus mtshams kyi skad cig ma la rdo rje nyi ma ni nyi ma ma nub pa'i dus su bla ma la mchod pa chen po byas te /
T02TD1784E:209a-12: de nyid la phyag rgya ma phul zhing des gnang ba de nyid blangs te /
T02TD1784E:209a-13: mtshan phyed kyi dus su sgrub pa ni gsang ba'i mchod pa brtsams nas /
T02TD1784E:209a-14: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus ni nang par gyi dus la de kho na nyid /
T02TD1784E:209a-15: nyams su myong zhing sgom pa mchog ni rnal 'byor pa des 'grub par 'gyur ba ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:209a-16: yang na rdo rje ni dga' ba dang nyi ma'i ni mchog tu dga' ba dang /
T02TD1784E:209a-17: de dag nub pa ni zad par sgrub pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba'i phyir brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:209a-18: de'i rjes la skya rengs 'char ba'i dus ni snang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i dus te /
T02TD1784E:209a-19: dus re la bsgom pa mchog ni 'dzin pa'i de kho na nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'grub par 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya chen po dmigs par byed do //
T02TD1784E:209a-20: rab tu byed pa las kyang bla ma'i zhal gyi drin gyis ni //
T02TD1784E:209a-21: de nas de ni gsal mthong 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:209a-23: da ltar byung ba'i srid gsum ste //
T02TD1784E:209a-24: 'od gsal rnam par dag pa yis //
T02TD1784E:209a-25: skad cig gcig gis kun mthong 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:209a-26: chu zla smig rgyu la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1784E:209a-27: sgyu ma'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD1784E:209a-28: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1784E:209a-29: skya rengs shar ba'i dus su ni //
T02TD1784E:209a-30: byang chub shing drung rtsar bzhugs nas //
T02TD1784E:209a-31: des na bdud rnams 'joms par mdzad //
T02TD1784E:209b-0: @209b yang dag ye shes bla na med //
T02TD1784E:209b-1: sh'akya'i mgon pos thob nas ni //
T02TD1784E:209b-2: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:209b-3: de nyid 'dir ni rab tu bstan //
T02TD1784E:209b-4: mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1784E:209b-5: de nyid ye shes zhes bshad do //
T02TD1784E:209b-6: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang //
T02TD1784E:209b-7: bsod nams dman pa'i mi gang dang ;
T02TD1784E:209b-8: / yid bzhin nor bu gzhan 'dra ba //
T02TD1784E:209b-9: bla ma'i drin gyis thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:209b-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma 'ongs pa //
T02TD1784E:209b-12: chags dang chags pa bral ba min //
T02TD1784E:209b-13: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs te //
T02TD1784E:209b-14: stong dang stong pa ma yin min //
T02TD1784E:209b-15: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs so ;
T02TD1784E:209b-16: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste //
T02TD1784E:209b-17: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:209b-18: de'i rjes la gzhan gyi don bya ba'i phyir rgyan thams cad ni mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:209b-19: dri dang me tog ni sgyu ma'i dpe rnams kyis brgyan pa rdo rje sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:209b-20: de dag gi mchog ni rdo rje 'chang gi sku //
T02TD1784E:209b-21: sgom pa ni cig car du spros na grub pa myur du thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang /
T02TD1784E:209b-22: rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi dngos grub rnal 'byor pas myur du thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:209b-23: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:209b-24: rnal 'byor pa de ni sku gsum ni khams gsum pa rnams la mchog sbyin pa ni rjes su gzung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:209b-25: de bzhin du sangs rgyas mtshan ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:209b-26: de rnams kyis mtshan par gyur pa ni brgyan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:209b-27: de bzhin du rang gi lus las 'byung ba'i snang bas /
T02TD1784E:209b-28: dpag tshad brgya ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:209b-29: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang snang bar byed do //
T02TD1784E:209b-30: dbang po gnyis sbyor ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis su med pas /
T02TD1784E:209b-31: sbyor ba thams cad ni ldang ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba dang 'chag pa rnams brtsam par bya ba ni bya ba ste zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:209b-32: de nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor pa 'di dngos grub thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams kyi dam tshig go //
T02TD1784E:209b-33: de nas dam tshig ste de rnams so sor bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:209b-34: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:209b-35: brtul zhugs phreng ba sngangs pa dang //
T02TD1784E:209b-36: de la gang yang mi bshad de //
T02TD1784E:210a-0: @210a * // zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:210a-1: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa la rtag tu dam tshig ni bshang gcis nye bar mtshon pa'i rdzas lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:210a-3: ji ltar zhen rdo rje grub pa na ye ge gsum gyis brlabs nas so //
T02TD1784E:210a-4: dngos grub thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dngos grub pa'i phyir dam tshig ni sngags pa'i slob pa shin tu 'da' dka' ba ni spang bar mi bya'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:210a-6: bshang gci dam tshig la sogs la //
T02TD1784E:210a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:210a-8: bshang gci ni srog dang rtsol ba ste /
T02TD1784E:210a-9: de dag gi dam tshig ni yang dag par sbyor bas /
T02TD1784E:210a-10: dbang po gnyis sbyor ba ni 'og dang steng 'gog pa ste ma ning gi bzlas pas /
T02TD1784E:210a-11: bla na med pa'i phul du byung ba'i dam tshig de kho na nyid 'od gsal ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:210a-13: sangs rgyas ni phung po rnams te /
T02TD1784E:210a-14: de dag gi byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa de nyid de /
T02TD1784E:210a-16: / zhi ba ni rang bzhin gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:210a-17: 'dod pa ni snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:210a-18: thar pa ni bla na med pa'i mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD1784E:210a-19: dam tshig ni bdud rtsi myong ba dang /
T02TD1784E:210a-20: rdo rje ni rdo rje bzlas pa gang las 'byung ba de ni de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:210a-22: / de ni bsgrub pa dang rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:210a-23: da ni gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don byas pa'i phyir las kyi chogs bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:210a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:210a-25: dam tshig chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1784E:210a-26: de'i khro ba ni 'phags pa gshin rje gshed do //
T02TD1784E:210a-27: de nyid kyi rdo rje ni sngags te /
T02TD1784E:210a-28: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:210a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sems can thams cad de /
T02TD1784E:210a-30: de rnams skrag par byed pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams so //
T02TD1784E:210a-31: de rnams kyi yang khro bo ni gshin rje mthar byed de /
T02TD1784E:210a-32: de dang dbyer med pas sngags kyang de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:210a-33: de nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:210a-34: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rjes su dran pa'o //
T02TD1784E:210a-35: hr'i: ni sgyu ma'i sa bon te gsung gi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:210a-36: shanri zhes pa ni rnam par gcig pa'i phyir thugs kyi sa bon no //
T02TD1784E:210b-0: de bas na sku gsung thugs kyi rang @210b bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:210b-1: bi kri t'a na na zhes pa ni zhal drag po'o //
T02TD1784E:210b-2: sarbba sha tr'u na zhes pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams /
T02TD1784E:210b-3: n'a sha ya zhes pa 'jigs shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:210b-5: stvam bha ya zhes pa ni rengs shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:210b-8: sv'a h'a ni mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:210b-9: da ni sbyor ba bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:210b-10: dug ni khrag dang kun du sbyar //
T02TD1784E:210b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:210b-12: gru gsum pa'i me thab la tsher ma'i me sbar zhing me de yang dang po rgyal rigs sam rje'u'i rigs kyi khang ba nas blangs te /
T02TD1784E:210b-13: gcer bu dang skra dkrol zhing gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang lan tshva rnams nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed na brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te /
T02TD1784E:210b-14: che ge mo 'di zhes bya ba wa sha m'a n'a ya hr'i:/
T02TD1784E:210b-15: zhes pa bu mo'i ming la brten te brjod cing zhag gsum bsregs na de'i tshe bu mo de rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:210b-16: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du yang zhes pa ni gal te rnal 'byor pa dus de tsam gyis 'chi bar mi 'gyur na de'i tshe bskal pa de tsam gyi bar du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes phul du byung ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:210b-17: sangs rgyas ni tshangs pa dang chos 'dzin pa ni khyab 'jug dang /
T02TD1784E:210b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' ni drag po ste /
T02TD1784E:210b-19: gal te lha rnams bu mo de rnams kyi bdag po yin pas sgrub pa po'i sbyor ba las 'das par byed na de'i tshe de rnams kyi srog sbyor ba de nyid kyis zad par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:210b-20: mi 'jig pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i sngags 'di yin no zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:210b-21: 'di nyid kyi sbyor ba gzhan bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:210b-22: bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyad la //
T02TD1784E:210b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:210b-24: mar ngo'i tshes brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi la bud med kyis rjes su 'brang ba'i skyes bu bsregs pa'i sol ba'i dum bu blangs te /
T02TD1784E:210b-25: de nyid sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs nas brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te /
T02TD1784E:210b-26: gshin rje gshed kyi dmigs pas sol ba de'i cha mgo bo la btab ma des ni sgrub pa po de la ster bar 'gyur ba ni nor dang 'bru la sogs pa ster bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:211a-0: de bzhin du sngags 'di nyid kyis dur khrod kyi sol ba'i dum bu byin gyis brlabs la bsgrub bya'i gzugs @211a * //
T02TD1784E:211a-2: 'byung po'i zhag gi nyi ma phyed dang mtshan la /
T02TD1784E:211a-3: sems drag pos bsgrub bya'i mgo bo la sol ba'i dum bu des sog le'i tshul gyi ri mo bris na dgra bo de de ma thag tu gnyis su phye zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:211a-4: sngags 'di nyid kyis sal sogs pa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan la /
T02TD1784E:211a-5: thob ni rdo rje thob ste brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas la /
T02TD1784E:211a-6: de nyid h'um ni rab tu 'bar dang bcas //
T02TD1784E:211a-7: zhes pa ni 'bar ba'i rdo rjes mtshan par bsams te /
T02TD1784E:211a-8: de'i mgo bo la drag po'i sems kyis mngon spyod kyi zhag la phab na bsgrub bya shi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:211a-9: de nyid kyi phyir gdug pa thams cad ni bla ma la sogs pa smod pa rnams rdo rje tho pa 'dis 'jig par byed do //
T02TD1784E:211a-10: phyag na rdo rje'i rigs ni gal te de'i rigs la gdug pa yod na de yang 'jig par 'gyur to /
T02TD1784E:211a-12: de bzhin du sngags 'di nyid kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i sta re byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs te /
T02TD1784E:211a-13: mngon spyod kyi rdzas rnams kyis dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan bris te /
T02TD1784E:211a-14: dmar po la sogs pa'i rdo rgyus kyi sta res skyes pa'am bud med kyi mgrin pa bcad na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:211a-15: sbyor ba 'dis sangs rgyas ni gzhan gyi sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:211a-16: sku gsum ni lus ngag yid kyi rin chen mchog ni phul du byung pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:211a-17: sems can kun la phan 'dod pa ni sems can kun ni nor phrogs te bdag la phan 'dod pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gdug pa rgyal po la sogs pa gal te yin na de'i tshe gnad par 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD1784E:211a-18: shi bar 'gyur ro zhes 'dir the tshom med do //
T02TD1784E:211a-19: sngags 'di nyid kyis gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas las kyi rdo rje ni sna tshogs rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:211a-20: me stag mang po 'khrig pa can ni 'od zer gyi tshogs spro bar bsams te /
T02TD1784E:211a-21: de'i dbus su yang yi ge h'um las byung ba'i nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi 'od dang 'dra ba'i khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom zhing de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los sprin gyi rgyun rnams bskams na chu rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:211b-0: de bzhin du slob dpon gyi rigs gang yang rung bas dkyil 'khor bri bar brtsams na de la gal te rlung la sogs @211b pa'i bgegs rnams 'byung na 'dir mche ba'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD1784E:211b-1: gdug pa'i dgra ni gshin rje gshed de nyid dran par bya ba ni de'i bsam gtan dmigs par bya zhing de nyid kyi sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:211b-2: de ltar byas na gal te sangs rgyas ni lha rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:211b-3: byang chub sems dpa' ni lha ma yin rnams kyis bgegs de sprul par gyur na yang de'i tshe mthong ba tsam gyis ni rnal 'byor pas bltas pa tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:211b-4: gzhan yang gal te 'bigs byed la sogs pa'i dgon pa rnams su 'gro ba yin na /
T02TD1784E:211b-5: de'i tshe sangs rgyas ni gzhan gsod pa la mkhas ba seng ge la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:211b-6: byang chub ni mi snang bar byed pa /
T02TD1784E:211b-7: sems ni bsam pa gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1784E:211b-8: phra men ma la sogs pa dang de bzhin gzhan gdug pa ni sprul dang sbyang ki dang chu srin la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:211b-9: de rnams sngags 'di dang bsam gtan gyis skrag par byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:211b-10: khyad par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:211b-11: sngags thams cad ni kho bo'i sngags rnams kyi sa gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:211b-12: snying po ni dga' bar byed pas na nus pa skyed par byed pa phat to //
T02TD1784E:211b-13: 'di dang po brjod la phyi nas aom hri zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod na gdug pa 'chi bar 'gyur te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:211b-14: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:211b-15: ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:211b-16: ye shes ni 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i sems dpa' ni ye shes sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1784E:211b-17: ye shes kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1784E:211b-18: don sbyor ba ni de la dmigs shing /
T02TD1784E:211b-19: dbus su ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sku'i rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la gang yang rung ba'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:211b-20: gnas bzhi ni lkog ma dang snying ga dang lte ba dang /
T02TD1784E:211b-22: sngags zhes pa ni sngags kyi ngo bo'i dbye ba shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1784E:211b-23: bud med ni spyan la sogs pa gzhan pa ni de la gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:212a-0: de nas rgyan rnams thams cad kyis rdzogs pa ni dmar @212a * //
T02TD1784E:212a-1: po dang dkar po dang nag po dang ser po'i mdog dang ldan pa'i rlung rnams so //
T02TD1784E:212a-2: mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan pa ni g-yas dang g-yon dang gnyis ka dang dal bus dman par gyur pas spro zhing padmo ni yi ge aa dang rgyas pa ni aom dang sngags 'di ni thugs kyi sa bon te /
T02TD1784E:212a-3: de'i rjes la bsgom par bya ste dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:212a-4: aom a'a: h'um de dag 'od zer lnga'i dbye bas ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim gyis rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin bsgom zhing spros la yang rang gi lus la sogs pa la phab pa ni bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:212a-5: de ltar rnal 'byor pas byang chub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:212a-6: de ma thag pa ni bzlas ma thag tu ldang na /
T02TD1784E:212a-7: rnam par snang mdzad ni brtag pa dang mtshungs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:212a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD1784E:212a-9: rgyal po chen po ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:212a-10: sangs rgyas sku ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02TD1784E:212a-11: rdo rje 'dzin ni don yod grub pa ste de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:212a-12: sems dpa' thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ste /
T02TD1784E:212a-13: de bskyed pa ni de'i go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje ltar brtan par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa dang rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:212a-14: de bzhin du phyag rgya la mos pa'i rim pa gzhan bstan par bya ba'i phyir bzhin bzangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:212a-15: snga ma bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du bzhin bzangs la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i gdol ba la sogs pa'i bu mo rnams rnyed cing dben pa'i gnas la sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa ni snyoms par zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid can byas te /
T02TD1784E:212a-16: de las byung ba'i gsang ba ni byang chub kyi sems blangs te /
T02TD1784E:212a-17: bza' par bya ba ni padma'i snod du gnas pa kho na lces blang bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:212a-18: de ltar gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bla ma las rnyed pa gang yin pa de yang dang yang du slob pa'i phyir rim pa de bstan to //
T02TD1784E:212a-20: de ma thag tu rnal 'byor pa de 'jam dpal ni lo bcu drug lon pa'i gzhon nu ste /
T02TD1784E:212b-0: de dang 'dra ba'i gzi @212b brjid ni mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:212b-1: mi snang ba ni so dang skra dang sen mo la sogs pa'i rnying pa 'jig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:212b-2: bdag po ni ngag snyan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:212b-3: dpal dang ldan pa ni stobs dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:212b-5: zhes pa ni gser gyi mdangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:212b-7: dus de nas brtsams de ni rnam mi rtog / ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:212b-8: de bzhin du bshang ba'am yang na bza' ba'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:212b-9: bza' ba dang bshang ba ni tshod ma dang sha ste /
T02TD1784E:212b-10: de la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bsngags nas ni zhes pa ni yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs shing zos na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:212b-11: sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa de la mi mthong ni mi gzigs pa yin no zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:212b-12: de bzhin du bshang ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtha' ma'i dum bu gcig ste /
T02TD1784E:212b-13: de nyid byin gyis brlabs la kham pho ra kha sbyor ni /
T02TD1784E:212b-14: thod pa'i kha sbyor la bzhag cing brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te zos na /
T02TD1784E:212b-15: sangs rgyas nyi ma ni rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i kha sbyor rnams kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:212b-16: de bzhin du khyi dang rta dang mi sha rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas snga ma /
T02TD1784E:212b-17: bzhin du thod pa'i kha sbyor la bsgrubs shing zos na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:212b-18: gzhan yang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas bshang ba la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu ka ra shus dkris par byas la de nyid rdo rje dang padma'i nang du bcug cing de las byung ste zos na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:212b-19: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas sha chen dang /
T02TD1784E:212b-20: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas khyi sha dang /
T02TD1784E:212b-21: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor pas glang po'i sha dang /
T02TD1784E:212b-22: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas ba lang gi sha dang /
T02TD1784E:212b-23: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas ga pur dang tsandan gyi ri lu 'dzin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:212b-24: dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1784E:212b-25: bshang ba las byung srog chags las //
T02TD1784E:212b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:212b-27: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas bshang ba las byung ba'i srog chags kyi ri lu 'dzin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:213a-0: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor @213a * //
T02TD1784E:213a-1: pas ga pur dang tsandan gyi ri lu 'dzin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:213a-2: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor pas gi wang dang aa ka ru'i ri lu 'dzin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:213a-3: dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:213a-4: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:213a-5: rdo rje 'dzin pa gang yang rung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:213a-6: re zhig dang po rnal 'byor mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba la zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:213a-7: de'i rjes la phyag rgya chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang yang rung ba'i sku la dmigs te /
T02TD1784E:213a-8: de ni de dang 'dra ba ni de'i dngos grub gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:213a-9: dpal ldan ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:213a-10: stobs chen ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
T02TD1784E:213a-11: pha rol gnon pa ni mngon par shes pa drug gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:213a-12: rdzu 'phrul de nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:213a-13: dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:213a-14: dpag tshad bye ba ni rgya che ba gang zhig steng du tshangs pa'i sgo ste /
T02TD1784E:213a-15: de'i steng du rdo rje bzhin du mnyam pas 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:213a-16: stong gsum ni 'jig rten gyi khams te der yang der ni 'og dang steng gi dbye bas 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:213a-17: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyir dpal ldan no //
T02TD1784E:213a-18: sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra ba'i 'od gang la yod pa de ni bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:213a-19: rang gi lus po'i 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku rnams spro bar byed pa'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:213a-20: 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:213a-21: de rnams 'dzin pas na 'dod khams te dbang po rnams so //
T02TD1784E:213a-22: de la gnas pa'i gang zhig bu mo ni ye shes skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa drug go //
T02TD1784E:213a-23: lha'i longs spyod ni bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bzhi ste /
T02TD1784E:213a-24: de dang ldan pa'i lha'i longs spyod ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam pa'o //
T02TD1784E:213a-25: 'khrugs pa ni 'khor bar ltung bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa gang la yod pa de ni 'khrugs pa'i brtul zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:213a-26: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o //
T02TD1784E:213b-0: gzugs @213b ni cha brug pa'i gong bu te skyed par byed pas na gzugs khams ni rang bzhin rnams so //
T02TD1784E:213b-1: de la gnas pa'i bu mo ni shes rab dang thabs dang ma rig pa ste /
T02TD1784E:213b-2: de rnams thams cad stobs che ni drag shul gyis 'dod pa spyod pa ni mi snang bar bya'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:213b-3: dam tshig ni ye shes rnams dang tha mal pa'i lus te /
T02TD1784E:213b-4: de rnams mi snang ba ni snang ba nyid du gang gis mdzad pa de lta bu'i rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes bsdus pa'i tshig ste /
T02TD1784E:213b-5: zung 'jug dang sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:213b-6: de nas sangs rgyas rab dgyes dag /
T02TD1784E:213b-7: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:213b-9: sangs rgyas ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:213b-10: gsan pas rab tu dgyes pa dang /
T02TD1784E:213b-11: sems 'khrul pa ni thugs 'khrul ba la ldog pas /
T02TD1784E:213b-12: yid la dbang ba ni bsam pa'i sgo nas ye shes kyi snang ba thob pa dang ;
T02TD1784E:213b-13: spyan gdangs pa ni sgom pa'i sgo nas te /
T02TD1784E:213b-14: gsung ni 'di skad ces pa ni dgyes pa'i ngag bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD1784E:213b-15: de nyid bshad par bya ba ste ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ae ma'o zhes pa ni ngo mtshar ba ste /
T02TD1784E:213b-16: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1784E:213b-17: gsang gnas ni sngags kyi tshig rnams te ;
T02TD1784E:213b-18: de dag gis 'grub pa gang zhig mi 'gyur ba ni mi 'jigs pa'i las kyi tshogs te /
T02TD1784E:213b-20: ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ni 'od gsal ba rtogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:213b-21: chos ni sngags kyi sku ste /
T02TD1784E:213b-22: de yang shin tu dri med ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste /
T02TD1784E:213b-23: de yang shin tu ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:213b-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:213b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig gsan ma thag tu'o //
T02TD1784E:213b-26: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma rnams te /
T02TD1784E:213b-27: de nyid 'dzin pa ni spyi bor 'dzin por 'dzin pas ni rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:213b-28: rigs kyi dbye bas ston par mdzad pas na ston pa'o //
T02TD1784E:213b-29: 'gro ba sbrul pa'i phyir bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:213b-30: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang sogs pa'i phyir mi 'gyur che'o //
T02TD1784E:213b-31: dag pa rdo rje ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
T02TD1784E:213b-32: de nyid las chos chen po ni lha 'byung ba gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:214a-1: 'das des rdo rje gsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma ston par byed pa'i gsung bka' stsal to //
T02TD1784E:214a-2: sems dpa' rdo rje sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:214a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems dpa' rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214a-4: de'i sbyor ba ni de nyid kyi dbang bskur bas rdo rje 'dzin rnams ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs can rnams mnyes par gyur pa ni cod pan bya'o //
T02TD1784E:214a-5: de bzhin du sangs rgyas byang chub ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1784E:214a-6: de nyid kyi rab dbye ba ni bsam gtan gyis rdo rje can ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can rnams la cod pan bya'o //
T02TD1784E:214a-7: rdo rje sa'i snying po la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:214a-8: spyan gyi gzugs la sogs pa ni spyan dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214a-9: de rnams la rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyis gtsug tor mnyes par byed pa ni cod pan byed pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:214a-10: khro bo ni de nyid kyi khro bo gshin rje gshed la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214a-11: de rnams la yang sangs rgyas rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyis rab bsgom pa ni cod pan bya'o //
T02TD1784E:214a-12: rig pa'i rgyal po ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214a-13: de nyid kyi mchog ni m'a ma k'i dang /
T02TD1784E:214a-14: chos rnams ni sgra rdo rje ma dang phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214a-15: de rnams la dkon mchog dpal ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyis cod pan bya'o //
T02TD1784E:214a-16: gal te m'a ma k'i sku mdog ser mo yin na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:214a-17: rin chen 'byung ldan gyis cod pan bya'o //
T02TD1784E:214a-18: gang gi tshe de nyid sku mdog nag mo yin na de'i tshe thugs rdo rjes cod pan du bya ste khyad par ro //
T02TD1784E:214a-19: gang gi phyir m'a ma k'i ni rigs gnyis pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:214a-20: rig pa'i rgyal mo ni gos dkar mo dang sbyor ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1784E:214a-21: rta mgrin dang dri rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214a-22: de rnams kyi dbu la 'od dpag tu med pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:214a-23: thams cad las byed pa'i lha mo sgrol ma dang /
T02TD1784E:214a-24: sngags rnam par sel ba dang /
T02TD1784E:214a-26: ro rdo rje ma la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214a-27: de rnams la gdon mi za ba ni don yod grub pas cod pan bya ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:214a-28: sngags rnams thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214a-29: de rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang /
T02TD1784E:214b-0: mi bskyod pas @214b cod pan du bya'o //
T02TD1784E:214b-1: gnod sbyin ma ni rdo rje ro langs ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:214b-2: sngags rgyud ni khro gnyer ma dang rdo rjes 'dzin ma dang /
T02TD1784E:214b-3: ral pa gcig ma la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214b-4: de rnams la gshin rje gshed kyis cod pan du bya'o //
T02TD1784E:214b-5: sngags rnams thams cad ni phyi nas gsungs pa'i khro gnyer ma la sogs pa'i spyi bor bskul ba ni rgyas gdab pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214b-6: rigs dang rjes su mthun pas shis pa ni 'dod pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:214b-7: dam tshig chen po ni rang rang gi rigs kyis rgyas btab pa la /
T02TD1784E:214b-8: rdo rje ni dbang dang ldan pa ste rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal ba dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1784E:214b-9: bsam gtan 'khor lo 'dis zhes pa ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i cod pan byed pa'i bsam gtan gyi tshogs kyis /
T02TD1784E:214b-10: sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes pa ni drin byed pa dang /
T02TD1784E:214b-11: dkyil 'khor ni de nyid snying por gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:214b-12: rang gi rigs rjes su dran pa'i phyir sgrub pa po rnams la yang phan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:214b-13: de bzhin du dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje 'chang /
T02TD1784E:214b-14: sgrub pa ni thob par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214b-15: las kyi rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:214b-16: da ni dbab pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:214b-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:214b-18: rdo rje ni snod 'dus byas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214b-19: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:214b-20: lus ngag yid rnam par dag par mdzad pa'i phyir ston pa'o //
T02TD1784E:214b-21: chos rnams kun ni rengs pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:214b-22: de rnams kyi dbang phyug ni byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:214b-23: de rnams bstan pas na gtso bo'o //
T02TD1784E:214b-24: sku gsung thugs ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:214b-25: de rnams yang dag par mkhyen pas na rdzogs sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:214b-26: bcom ldan 'das des ye shes ni snod de /
T02TD1784E:214b-27: de'i rdo rje ni dbab pa'i cho ga bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD1784E:214b-28: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:214b-29: ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang //
T02TD1784E:214b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:214b-31: ri bo'i rtse mo dang rab tu dben pa ni dgon pa chen po la sogs pa'i gnas te /
T02TD1784E:214b-32: nyams dga' ba ni me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gnas su /
T02TD1784E:214b-33: bsam gtan rdo rje ni mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin te de bya'o //
T02TD1784E:214b-35: bzlas sngags ni dbab pa'i sngags rnams te /
T02TD1784E:215a-1: kyi sbyor ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba ste /
T02TD1784E:215a-2: de'i phyir ro zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:215a-3: gang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni snod gzhan la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te de dag thams cad //
T02TD1784E:215a-4: sngags ni bzlas pa'i sngags dang /
T02TD1784E:215a-5: bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin gyis bskul ba ni sad pa yin na /
T02TD1784E:215a-6: de'i tshe las rnams sna tshogs ni 'das pa la sogs pa byed par gyur pa ni slob ma'i sgo nas smra bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:215a-7: gsung gi las ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02TD1784E:215a-8: de'i bka' bzhin zhes pa ni 'dir ni the tshom mi bya'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:215a-9: ting nge 'dzin bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:215a-10: rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po //
T02TD1784E:215a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:215a-12: rdo rje chos ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02TD1784E:215a-13: de'i gzugs chen po ni de'i nam pa'i snod do //
T02TD1784E:215a-15: zhes pa ni kha dog dmar po dang ji ltar dbyibs dang /
T02TD1784E:215a-16: tshul dang ldan par bsgoms la ;
T02TD1784E:215a-17: de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni sku la sogs pa'i gnas la rigs gsum gyi sa bon btab pa ni byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:215a-18: de lta bu'i dbab pa'i cho ga byed na 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:215a-19: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:215a-20: dbye ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:215a-21: bskul ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i lha'i nus pas snying stobs kyi rgyal po brgyad do //
T02TD1784E:215a-23: rengs pa rdul dang ba spu ldang //
T02TD1784E:215a-25: mdog 'gyur mchi ma thigs ba ste //
T02TD1784E:215a-26: de ni snying stobs brgyad bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:215a-27: rengs pa ni 'phar ba dang 'dar ba dang 'khor ba'o /
T02TD1784E:215a-28: de la 'phar ba ni steng du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD1784E:215a-29: 'dar ba ni dbang po thams cad 'khrugs pas yan lag 'dar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:215a-30: bskor ba ni phyogs dang mtshams rnams su 'khor lo bzhin du 'gro ba'o //
T02TD1784E:215a-31: mchog chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rjes su zhugs pas gar gyi nyams dgu'i rnam pas gnas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:215a-33: sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung //
T02TD1784E:215a-34: dgod pa drag po 'jigs byed dang //
T02TD1784E:215a-35: snying rje rmad byung zhi ba ste //
T02TD1784E:215a-36: gar gyi nyams ni dgu yin no //
T02TD1784E:215a-37: 'phags pa'i lam ni bla mas dris pa bsgrub bya 'das pa la sogs pa smra ba'o //
T02TD1784E:215b-0: bzhi po de lta bu'i rdo @215b rje grub pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa la mthar thug pa dang /
T02TD1784E:215b-1: las mthong ba'i bla mas bya ba yin no /
T02TD1784E:215b-2: de ltar yin na rtag pa ni nges par 'bab pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:215b-3: snod kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:215b-4: bu mo lo grangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:215b-5: lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i bu mo 'am khye'u mtshan nyid thams cad ni yan lag ma nyams pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i snod rnyed nas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:215b-6: de yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
T02TD1784E:215b-7: ci 'dra ba'i slob ma yang bzung nas dbab pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02TD1784E:215b-8: cho ga thams cad ni bsang gtor la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD1784E:215b-9: de'i rjes la las rnams ni dbab pa'i tshe ga bya ba yin te /
T02TD1784E:215b-10: gzhan du na khams gsum ni dman pa dang bar pa dang rno ba'i skyes pa rnams kyis skyes bus dpyad par gyur pa ni rnal 'byor pa de la de rnams kyis dpyas par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:215b-11: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de zhes pa ni dbab pa'i cho ga la /
T02TD1784E:215b-12: 'di rnams zhes pa ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags ni sbas pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:215b-13: yi ge ni mi g-yo ba'i las byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:215b-14: gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa'o//
T02TD1784E:215b-15: h'um ha a'a dzheem zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1784E:215b-16: de rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du snying ga dang spyi bo dang /
T02TD1784E:215b-17: lkog ma dang rkang mthil rnams la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:215b-18: nus pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:215b-19: nam mkha'i khams ni sems med cing //
T02TD1784E:215b-21: gal te sems med pa'i nam mkha'i khams yod pa yin na de'i tshe de nyid kyang 'bab par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1784E:215b-22: gzugs dang ldan pa ni smos ci dgos /
T02TD1784E:215b-23: yang na gzugs dang ldan pa ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ro ste de yang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:215b-24: ji srid rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'gro ba'i gtso bo ste /
T02TD1784E:215b-25: bdag nyid chen po bstan to //
T02TD1784E:215b-26: yi ge'i rang bzhin bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:215b-27: h'um ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:215b-28: yi ge gsum po de rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:216a-1: pa'o zhes pa ni phul du byung ba'i gsang ba'i lam de bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:216a-2: gang zhig bskul ba la sogs pa gsum sngar bshad pa de rnams yi ge dzhee:yis bya'o //
T02TD1784E:216a-3: bskul ba thams cad ni gsum po de dag gis gsang ba 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o ;
T02TD1784E:216a-4: / khru gang tsam mam khru do 'am //
T02TD1784E:216a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:216a-6: dman pa ni khru gang dang bar pa ni 'khru do dang /
T02TD1784E:216a-8: rab kyi rab ni khru brgyad 'phar bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:216a-10: rdo rje rgyal po ni cho ga bzhin du mkhas pa'i bla mas bskul ni dgug pa'o //
T02TD1784E:216a-11: de rnams ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:216a-13: rdo rje 'chang chen pos bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1784E:216a-16: snga ma bzhin du thams cad 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:216a-17: zhes pa ni yi ge dzheem bzhin du h'um la sogs pa gsum po yang 'bab par byed pa yin no zhes bstan to//
T02TD1784E:216a-18: 'di ni gsang ba thob pa'o zhes pa ni lus bskul ba la sogs pa byed pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:216a-19: 'di gsang ba thob pa'o zhes nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T02TD1784E:216a-20: 'dir ni bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di yin te re zhig dang po rang gi snying gar 'od zer dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi mtha' ma bkod la /
T02TD1784E:216a-21: slob ma yang yi ge h'um las rdul dang bral zhing gsal ba'i snang ba mtha' yas su bsams te /
T02TD1784E:216a-22: de nyid kyi snying gar dang /
T02TD1784E:216a-28: padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du yi ge h'um dang tr'am dang hr'i:dang kham bkod la sgo phye ba'i phyag rgyas rang gi snying ga dang /
T02TD1784E:216a-29: slob ma'i snying ga phye zhing rang gi snying ga las dbyangs tha ma spros te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo de nyid slob ma'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil du bcug la de'i lus kyang de nyid kyis rdzogs par bsams te /
T02TD1784E:216a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis ba rlabs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:216a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' yang bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces slob ma brjod du bcug la /
T02TD1784E:216a-34: de'i 'og tu rang gis kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:216b-0: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje @216b ste ;
T02TD1784E:216b-1: / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod pa //
T02TD1784E:216b-2: rdo rje ye shes bla med pa //
T02TD1784E:216b-3: de ring khyod la 'bab gyur cig / ces brjod pa dang aom badzr'a we sha aa zhes bya ba lan bcu'am /
T02TD1784E:216b-5: bzhi bcu nas brgya'i bar du brjod na nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:216b-6: gal te des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na de'i tshe rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya khro bo'i khu tshur gyis dril bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:216b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' yang aa'i mtha' can brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:216b-8: de ltar byas kyang ma bab na de'i tshe rdo rje dang dril bu blangs la rkang pa g-yon pas slob ma'i rkang pa g-yas ba mnan cing steng du nam mkha' las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dbab pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad khros pa 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis khyab par bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:216b-9: 'og tu yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bskul ba'i yi ge h'um bsams zhing rang rang gi phyogs la bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pas kyang rim gyis h'um tr'am hr'i:aa zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis slob ma bskul bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:216b-10: de'i tshe yang badzra satva a'a zhes bya ba lan bcu brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:216b-11: de ltar byas na yang gal te sdig pa'i dbang gis ma bab na de'i tshe sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral zhing h'um aa zhes bya ba lan mang du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:216b-12: rdo rje bsdams pa brtan byas nas //
T02TD1784E:216b-13: gung mo gnyis po sbyar ba ste //
T02TD1784E:216b-14: mtha' ma bzhi po rtse sbyar na //
T02TD1784E:216b-15: sdig pa dral ba zhes brjod do //
T02TD1784E:216b-16: aom badzra p'a ni bi spho ta ya /
T02TD1784E:216b-18: bandha n'a ni pra mo tsa yam /
T02TD1784E:216b-19: sarbba aa pa ya ga te bhya: sarba na /
T02TD1784E:216b-20: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya tra ta ces kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:216b-21: yang na de bzhin dbab cing brjod de /
T02TD1784E:216b-22: de'i snying gar dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um dang /
T02TD1784E:216b-23: spyi bor chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge ha dang /
T02TD1784E:216b-24: lkog mar rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge aa dang /
T02TD1784E:216b-25: rkang pa'i 'og tu rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge dzheem 'bar ba bkod la /
T02TD1784E:216b-26: a'a be sha ya stam bha ya /
T02TD1784E:216b-27: ra ra ra ra ts'a la ya ts'a la ya h'um ha aa dzheem zhes bya bas bskul zhing /
T02TD1784E:216b-28: spyi bor yi ge aom las rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1784E:217a-2: snying gar yi ge h'um las mi bskyod pa'am /
T02TD1784E:217a-3: de rnams kyi yi ge bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:217a-4: rkang pa dag gi 'og tu yi ge ya gnyis las /
T02TD1784E:217a-5: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can dang /
T02TD1784E:217a-6: mtha' gnyis po la ba dan dang ldan pa bsgoms la //
T02TD1784E:217a-7: de'i steng du yi ge ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa bsam zhing de la gnas pa'i slob ma rdo rje 'bar bas gdungs par gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:217a-8: skul byed ma'i gzugs kyi ngo bor bsgom zhing rdo rje dang dril bu bskyod pas nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis 'phags ma skul byed ma'i phreng ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:217a-10: samya ksam buddha ko t'i n'am /
T02TD1784E:217a-11: aom tsa le tsu le tsu nde sv'a h'a /
T02TD1784E:217a-12: ma h'a bidy'a aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa ne /
T02TD1784E:217a-13: ma h'a ba la pa ra kra me /
T02TD1784E:217a-14: aa si mu sa la pa ra shu p'a sha gra hi ta ha ste /
T02TD1784E:217a-15: ma h'a kro dha kro dh'i shva re /
T02TD1784E:217a-18: sa ha sra bhu dze aa dzi te aa ba r'a dzi ti /
T02TD1784E:217a-22: sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi shthi te /
T02TD1784E:217a-24: bandi ta p'u dzi te pra s'a dhi te /
T02TD1784E:217a-25: badzra gho ne badzre badzra wa te /
T02TD1784E:217a-28: badzro nmi li ta aa kshe /
T02TD1784E:217a-31: gho ra r'u pi ni wi kr'i ta da rsha ne /
T02TD1784E:217a-32: badzra bidya aa lam kri ta sha r'i re /
T02TD1784E:217a-33: aom bha ga ba ti tsu nde drum drum krum krum mrum mrum srum srum r'um r'um /
T02TD1784E:217a-34: a'a be sha ya a'a be sha ya /
T02TD1784E:217a-36: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya /
T02TD1784E:217a-41: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02TD1784E:217a-45: ai dam du sht'am gra ham dzva ram /
T02TD1784E:217a-49: sa ma nta aa hi kam /
T02TD1784E:217a-58: yam ni dza ka rma dzam stha wa ram /
T02TD1784E:217a-60: ye m'am hi santi ke tsi da /
T02TD1784E:217a-61: dushti tam sarb'a na s'a dha ya s'a dha ya /
T02TD1784E:217a-63: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02TD1784E:217a-64: ta pa ya ta pa ya /
T02TD1784E:217a-65: au tstsha da ya au tstsha da ya /
T02TD1784E:217a-66: ha na ha na badzre na ;
T02TD1784E:217a-69: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya kha dge na /
T02TD1784E:217a-73: aom tsa le tsu le tsu nde sarb'am s'a dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1784E:217a-74: zhes bya ba 'di brjod na nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:217a-75: snod la dbab pa cho ga 'di nyid kyis dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rnal 'byor ram /
T02TD1784E:217b-1: babs na mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:217b-2: de nas de'i lce la yi ge aa dmar po bsams te /
T02TD1784E:217b-3: bhr'um te badzre zhes bya ba brjod na dge ba dang mi dge ba thams cad smra bar byed do //
T02TD1784E:217b-4: de'i 'og tu mngon par 'dod pa thams cad dris la babs pa brtan par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba mchod pa dang bstod pa byas na snod la phab pa'i lha gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1784E:217b-5: de nas snod de bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis srung skud byin gyis brlabs la dpung ba g-yas pa la bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD1784E:217b-6: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02TD1784E:217b-7: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1784E:217b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan yang las kyi tshogs bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:217b-9: rdo rje ni phyag mtshan rnon po ste /
T02TD1784E:217b-10: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:217b-11: gdug pa 'dul bas na rgyal po'o //
T02TD1784E:217b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa kun ni zhi ba la sogs ba ste /
T02TD1784E:217b-13: de de rnams kyi bdag po ni byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:217b-14: sku gsum gnas ni gdug pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:217b-15: de dag mngon spyod kyi sgo nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la bzhag pas yongs su dag par mdzad pas na sku gsum gnas ni yongs su dag pa ste /
T02TD1784E:217b-16: des gsung 'di skad ni klog pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i las kyi tshogs kyi gsung bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD1784E:217b-17: rtse gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:217b-18: du ma ni gnyen dang g-yog po dang 'khor gyi nang na /
T02TD1784E:217b-19: rtse gcig gyur pa ni phul du byung bar gnas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:217b-20: brtul zhugs brtan pa ni mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:217b-21: sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gzhan ma ste /
T02TD1784E:217b-22: de yongs su spang bas 'di byed na de'i tshe gdug pa thams cad ni bla ma smod pa la sogs pa rnams gzhig pa ni gsod pa grub po //
T02TD1784E:217b-23: dur khrod sol dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:217b-24: dur khrod kyi sol ba dang phub ma la sogs pa'i mngon spyod kyi rjes rnams kyis dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02TD1784E:217b-25: gcer bu la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:217b-26: lho phyogs su kha ba ltas pas de'i snying gar rkang pa g-yon pas gnon cing khams gsum yang 'jig par byed do //
T02TD1784E:218a-1: gzugs brnyan dur khrod kyi thal ba gcig pus byas te /
T02TD1784E:218a-2: snying gar ming spel te stong phrag brgyad kyi bzlas pas gsod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:218a-3: dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas pa la //
T02TD1784E:218a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:218a-7: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ba lang dang rta dad kyi sha rnams kyis gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02TD1784E:218a-8: dkyil 'khor gru gsum ni gru gsum pa'i me thab la tsher ma'i me la sems drag pos bsregs na dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:218a-9: sha chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:218a-10: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas sha chen gyi gzugs brnyan byas te snga ma bzhin du bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:218a-11: dgra thams cad ni gdug pa thams cad kyi shin tu mi bzad pa ni shin tu rno ba'i 'jigs pa ni gsod pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:218a-12: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas rta sha las gzugs brnyan byas la bsreg par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:218a-14: de bzhin du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas bshang gcig la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lngas gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02TD1784E:218a-15: snga ma bzhin du tsher ma'i me la bsregs na /
T02TD1784E:218a-16: sangs rgyas kyang 'jig ces pa ni phul du byung ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:218a-17: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas chu'i 'gram gyi sa bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi sas bsres la gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02TD1784E:218a-18: de'i yan lag gi tshigs rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:218a-19: sgo rnams la ma da na'i shing la sogs pa'i tsher ma btsugs te /
T02TD1784E:218a-20: khro bo'i sngags brjod la snga ma bzhin du bsregs na dgra de 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:218a-21: ske tshe dang lan tshva dang 'bru mar dang dug dang /
T02TD1784E:218a-22: smyo byed kyi khu bas snga ma bzhin du mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dur khrod kyi thal bas gzugs brnyan byas la bsregs na dgra bo 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:218a-23: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas sol ba'i khu bas gsher ba'i gos gyon la mngon spyod kyi gzugs brnyan sems khro bas rkang pa g-yon pas mnan na de'i tshe bsgrub bya srin po rnams kyis gzung ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:218b-0: de bzhin du snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor pas mi rus kyi phye ma'i gzugs brnyan dug dang @218b khrag gis bsres par byas la /
T02TD1784E:218b-1: snga ma bzhin du gnon na rdo rje sems dpa' yang khyer ba ni srin po rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:218b-2: bdag nyid che ba bstan to //
T02TD1784E:218b-3: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1784E:218b-4: bshad gci sbyor ba ni bdud rtsi lngas byas pa'i gzugs brnyan /
T02TD1784E:218b-5: ske tshe'i phye dang ldan par byas la snga ma bzhin du mnan na /
T02TD1784E:218b-6: tsha ba chen pos dgra gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:218b-7: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:218b-8: de la zhes pa ni mngon spyod la'o //
T02TD1784E:218b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi don yod grub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:218b-10: de nyid kyi dam tshig chen po'i khro bo ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste /
T02TD1784E:218b-11: de nyid kyi snying po ni snying po'i sngags te /
T02TD1784E:218b-12: las thams cad pa yin pa'i phyir dam tshig go //
T02TD1784E:218b-13: na ma:zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:218b-14: sngags 'di nyid brjod la mngon spyod kyi rdzas rnams kyis sbyin sreg gam /
T02TD1784E:218b-15: yang na bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyin sreg gang gis byed pa de ni /
T02TD1784E:218b-16: lus ngag sems ni dgra bo'i lus la sogs pa 'jig par byed do //
T02TD1784E:218b-17: ma yengs pa'i sems ni rtse gcig par gyur pa'i sems kyis 'di byed na /
T02TD1784E:218b-18: gsod pa'i mchog ni nges par gsod pa 'grub po zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:218b-19: da ni mngon spyod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:218b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che //
T02TD1784E:218b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
