T02TD1784E:218b-22: sta re dang tho ba thogs pa dang rdo rje bzhin du sems drag po gang la yod pa de ni sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1784E:218b-23: gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i bsgrub bya bsams la /
T02TD1784E:218b-24: de nyid kyi khro bo che ni de'i rang bzhin gyi gdug pa'i las bsams nas /
T02TD1784E:218b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bar bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:218b-26: sta re dang thob thogs pa'i gdug pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang sa bcu'i dbang phyug dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa yang gsod bar bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:218b-27: gdug pa de sangs rgyas thams cad la gnod par byed pa yin no zhes rnal 'byor pas bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:219a-0: de'i rjes re zhig dang po rtse gnyis kyis btsugs pa'i bshang sgo dang kha las byung @219a * //
T02TD1784E:219a-1: ba'i khrag gi rgyun skyugs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:219a-2: snying ga las kyang de nyid 'dzag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:219a-3: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'dren pa dang /
T02TD1784E:219a-4: srin po dang 'ug pa dang khyi dang bya rog la sogs pas skrag par byas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:219a-5: de nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa ni skyabs med pa ste /
T02TD1784E:219a-6: srin po la sogs pa de rnams kyis dum bur byas te za bar bsams bar gyur na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:219a-7: sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig / ces pa ni phul du byung pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:219a-8: rim pa gzhan gyis mngon spyod bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:219a-9: sbrul nag rab tu khro ba ni //
T02TD1784E:219a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1784E:219a-11: ga pe ga tsu dang dug dang khrag dang /
T02TD1784E:219a-12: lan tsvas sa la sbrul nag po bris te /
T02TD1784E:219a-13: de'i rjes la phyogs bcu la gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la yams dang gnod pa 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i dug dang nye ba'i dug la sogs pa la yi ge h'um gis de rnams kha dog nag po du ba'i phung po dang 'dra ba bkug la /
T02TD1784E:219a-14: sbrul de nyid kyi dpral ba'i gdengs ka'i tshogs kyi nang du 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:219a-15: de nas sbrul de nyid h'um n'am h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskul te //
T02TD1784E:219a-16: aom ta tanta da ra h'um phat ces bya ba'i sngags kyis klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi snying po de nyid du 'jug la /
T02TD1784E:219a-17: de ma thag tu sprul bskyod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:219a-18: de'i 'og tu rta mgrin gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas sprul de la bka' stsal par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:219a-19: song la che ge mo 'di zo shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:219a-20: de nas sbrul de ru phyin nas bsgrub bya de za ba yin te /
T02TD1784E:219a-21: 'di ni zos pas mi snang ba'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1784E:219a-22: tho ba rab tu drag po yis //
T02TD1784E:219a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:219a-24: snga ma bzhin du mngon spyod kyi rdzas rnams kyis dgra po'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02TD1784E:219a-25: gshin rdze gshed la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'i khro bo'i gzugs la dmigs te /
T02TD1784E:219a-26: de nyid kyi sngags ming spel ba sngon du 'gro ba brjod cing rdo rje tho ba dang sta re la sogs pas dgra bo'i snying gar pa rdungs na /
T02TD1784E:219a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mngon spyod la mkhas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:219a-29: srung ba la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:219b-0: dgra bo de'i phyogs byed @219b ba gang zhing srung ba'i sngags dang /
T02TD1784E:219b-1: lha rnams ni tsandi ka la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:219b-2: de rnams kyang sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:219b-3: de'i phyir sbyor ba 'dis gsod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:219b-4: sngar bshad pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyi nang na /
T02TD1784E:219b-5: mchog ni gtso bor gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:219b-6: gzhan gyi phyogs kyang 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:219b-7: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba //
T02TD1784E:219b-8: zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid de /
T02TD1784E:219b-9: gzhan rnal 'byor pas mi thub pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:219b-11: rdo rje'i phung por ji tsam du //
T02TD1784E:219b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:219b-13: sems can thams cad kyi ji tsam du phung po ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyis lus ngag zhig yod pa de nyid //
T02TD1784E:219b-14: rdo rje ni 'od gsal bas gsad pa ni ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa dag gis bdag nyid rtog pa 'od gsal ba de nyid la zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:219b-15: de'i tshe sems can de rnams mnyes par 'gyur pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:219b-16: gzhan du min zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang spangs nas ma yin no zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:219b-18: sangs rgyas ni gzugs kyi phung po dang /
T02TD1784E:219b-19: rdo rje 'dzin ni tshor ba'i phung po dang /
T02TD1784E:219b-20: ston pa ni 'du shes kyi phung po dang /
T02TD1784E:219b-21: rdo rje chos ni 'du byed kyi phung po dang /
T02TD1784E:219b-22: rdo rje can ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
T02TD1784E:219b-23: lnga po de dag bsam gtan sbyor ba ni /
T02TD1784E:219b-24: ting nge 'dzin 'dis 'chi bar gyur pa ni 'od gsal ba nyid du gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:219b-25: rdo rje dugs kyi bka' bzhin du zhes pa ni yid ches pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:219b-26: drag po chen po ni gsod pa'i bsam gtan dang /
T02TD1784E:219b-27: dam tshig ni 'od gsal sgom pa ste /
T02TD1784E:219b-28: de dag gang las byung ba de ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:219b-29: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:219b-30: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:219b-31: rdo rje 'dzin ni rdo rje'i phyag mtshan dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:219b-32: drag po'i las la mdzad pas na rgyal po'o //
T02TD1784E:219b-33: gdug pa thams cad stong pa nyid du mdzad pas na thams cad nam mkha'o //
T02TD1784E:219b-35: thub chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:220a-0: de'i go 'phang thob tu 'jug pas na thub chen @220a * //
T02TD1784E:220a-2: / thams cad dbang bskur ba ni drag po'i las la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:220a-3: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams 'dul bar mdzad pas na rdzogs sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:220a-4: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes ni de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD1784E:220a-5: rdo rje ni drag po'i las bka' stsal pa ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:220a-6: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:220a-7: kye de bzhin gshegs pa rnams /
T02TD1784E:220a-8: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:220a-9: rdo rje theg pa ni sngags kyi tshul te rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:220a-10: bla na med pa ni phul du byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:220a-11: gang du thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos rnams ni phung po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:220a-12: de la rgyal ba rnams kyis ni kho bo cag gis skye bar bstan pa ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang sgrub pa'i dbye ba ste /
T02TD1784E:220a-13: de la zhig ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:220a-14: de la zhes pa ni spros pa de rnams la /
T02TD1784E:220a-15: phran tshegs ni gdug pa'i sems can rnams kyi sgrub pa ni gsod pa la sogs pa de nyid las yin pa ste /
T02TD1784E:220a-17: sbrul ni mi sdug ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:220a-18: rdo rgyus kyi sol ba ni mtshon chas shi ba'i skyes pa'i sol ba'i rdo rgyus kyis lce gnyis pa ste sbrul nag po sa la bris te /
T02TD1784E:220a-19: de'i gdings [*gdengs] ka'i nang na yi ge kham bkod la /
T02TD1784E:220a-20: de la klu khro bo ni nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa'i snying gar gnas pa'i dug dang /
T02TD1784E:220a-21: de bskul ba ni de nyid dgug pa bris pa'i sbrul gyi kha'i dbus su yi ge kham la bzhag cing //
T02TD1784E:220a-22: sbrul de nyid klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dug gis yongs su gang bar bsams la /
T02TD1784E:220a-23: de nas sbrul de bskyod pas che ge mo sod cig ces bskul na bsgrub bya des 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:220a-24: dug sel ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:220a-25: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:220a-26: dug thams cad na dug dang nye ba'i dug rnams te /
T02TD1784E:220a-27: de dag 'byin pa ni dgug pa ste /
T02TD1784E:220a-28: de la snying po sa bon te yi ge hri'o //
T02TD1784E:220a-29: yi ge 'dis khams gsum par gnas pa'i 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i dug bkug la /
T02TD1784E:220a-30: sbrul gyi lus la zhugs par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:220b-0: de'i tshe sbrul de nyid dug gi rgya mtshor gyur cing gang @220b la reg pa de dang ji srid 'gro ba rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:220b-1: de bzhin du sdig pa dang sbal pa la sogs pa'i sems can phran tshigs bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:220b-2: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:220b-3: dug ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD1784E:220b-4: spo ba ni gnas las gnas gzhan du spo ba ste /
T02TD1784E:220b-5: de la snying po ni sa bon te yi ge aom mo //
T02TD1784E:220b-6: lta ba dang dran pa dang reg pa la sogs pa'i dug gang yin pa de ni re zhig dang por sngar bshad pa'i rim pas /
T02TD1784E:220b-7: nam mkha'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni bsgrub bya'i lus la 'jug cing yi ge aom gyis spyi bor bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD1784E:220b-8: de ni 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:220b-9: dug gi dam tshig chen po ni dgug cing 'jug pa ste /
T02TD1784E:220b-10: de la rdo rje ni brtan pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis de skad bka' stsal to zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1784E:220b-11: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:220b-12: dug gso ba ni sel ba ste /
T02TD1784E:220b-13: de la dam tshig ni bsgom pa ste ;
T02TD1784E:220b-14: rdo rje snying po ni mi bskyod pa'i rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:220b-16: yi ge 'di dkar po sgrub bya'i snying gar bsams la /
T02TD1784E:220b-17: de las byung ba'i zla ba dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los /
T02TD1784E:220b-18: gnas bzhi ni pags pa dang sha dang khrag dang glad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:220b-19: de la gnas pa'i dug sbyor ba ni 'od zer gyi sbyor bas dgug ste /
T02TD1784E:220b-21: thams cad bsdus nas lkog ma'i rtsar phyin pa'o //
T02TD1784E:220b-22: de'i rjes la lan gsum mam gnyis kyi bar du de las bskul zhing nad pa'i khas skyug par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:220b-23: nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phul du byung ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:220b-24: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:220b-25: nye ba'i dug ni nad kyis byas pa'i dug rnams te /
T02TD1784E:220b-26: de rnams thams cad drang ba ni sel ba ste /
T02TD1784E:220b-27: de la snying po ni yi ge a'a: ste byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bdud rtsi'i sa bon no //
T02TD1784E:220b-28: 'bras dang phol mig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:220b-29: 'bras la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang //
T02TD1784E:220b-30: gzhan ni mtshan rul dang skran dang /
T02TD1784E:220b-31: skrangs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:220b-32: mdze'i rnam pa bco brgyad de /
T02TD1784E:221a-0: de rnams kyis non pa'i nad pa rnams kyi snying gar gsung gi sa bon bkod la des kyang @221a * //
T02TD1784E:221a-1: snga ma bzhin du pags pa la sogs par gnas pa'i dug bkug cing sgo gnyis las skyugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:221a-2: de'i che de rnams las byung ba'i dug med pas lus kyi nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:221a-3: phyag na rdo rje bka' bzhin zhes pa ni yid ches pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:221a-4: bsgom pa gzhan bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:221a-5: padma chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:221a-6: re zhig dang po rnal 'byor pas lag pa g-yas pa la dag gi dbang phyug gi sa bon las byung ba'i padma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:221a-7: de'i lte bar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yang ngag gi sa bon de nyid bkod la /
T02TD1784E:221a-9: 'od zer lnga rdzogs pa ni dbyangs kyi sde tshan bkod cing de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los chu byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:221a-10: gang la byin pa de ni de ma thag tu dug dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:221a-11: khyad par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:221a-12: sdug pa ni dug sbo ba la /
T02TD1784E:221a-13: dam tshig gang ni sa bon dang bdag nyid bsgrub bya rnams nag por bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:221a-14: bskul ba ni dug sel ba la de rnams dkar por bsgom mo zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:221a-15: bsam gtan gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:221a-16: bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1784E:221a-18: gnas ni sngags pa'i 'gro ba'i don gyi gnas su gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:221a-19: gsang ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa la sba bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:221a-20: gsang chen ni zhal gyi man ngag la gnas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:221a-21: sho be la sogs pa la ni ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:221a-22: ye shes dri med ni rnam par dpyad na de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:221a-23: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:221a-24: phyi ni sems dang ldan pa dang sems dang mi ldan pa la sogs pas byas pa'i skyon rnams so //
T02TD1784E:221a-25: nang gi nad ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan tshogs pa byas te ;
T02TD1784E:221a-26: de rnams gso ba ni sel ba ste /
T02TD1784E:221a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po ste /
T02TD1784E:221a-29: de nyid sbas pa'i rnam pas smra ba'i phyir sngags dang /
T02TD1784E:221a-30: yi ge ni nad sel ba la brten pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:221a-31: dzi na dzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:221b-0: @221b sngags de rnams sku gsung thugs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs gsum skyed par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:221b-1: de nyid kyi phyir gang zhig yi ge'i tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ste /
T02TD1784E:221b-2: dad pas yon tan thob 'gyur ba ni gang zhig dad pa'i mos pa'i dbang gis rnal 'byor pas mngon par 'dod pa de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:221b-4: nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis //
T02TD1784E:221b-5: zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje bzhin du mi thub pa'i nad rnams bskul ba ni sel ba ste de'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:221b-6: de ltar bdag nyid kyis bsgom pa byas la nad kyis zin pa gang zhig yod pa de rnams de'i snying ga las spre'u dang 'dra ba'am /
T02TD1784E:221b-7: khyi la sogs pa 'dra ba ste /
T02TD1784E:221b-8: de nyid kyi lus ngag yid las byung zhing phyi rol du bltas te /
T02TD1784E:221b-9: 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'khor lo dang rdo rje la sogs pa de rnams kyi lus la sogs pa phye mar brlag par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:221b-10: de'i rjes la nad rnams 'jig pas rdzogs sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i phung po rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:221b-11: mig la sogs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:221b-12: de'i rjes la nad pa de nyid kyi lus la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:221b-13: nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang gi sprin rnams 'od zer gyi ngo bor zhugs par bsgoms na de'i tshe nad las thar bar 'gyur ba ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:221b-14: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02TD1784E:221b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:221b-16: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni rlung bcu dang /
T02TD1784E:221b-17: byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:221b-18: blo ldan ni ye shes rnams te /
T02TD1784E:221b-19: de dag thams cad khros pa ni de rnams nye bar sdud par byed pa la rtsol ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsam pa ni 'od gsal ba nyid du bya'o //
T02TD1784E:221b-20: 'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin //
T02TD1784E:221b-22: don dam pa'i ngo bo mi snang bar byed pa de yin no zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:221b-23: bsam gtan sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba 'dis las las skyes pa ni las skyes te /
T02TD1784E:221b-24: yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-0: grags pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa gang yin pa @222a * //
T02TD1784E:222a-2: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa ni brgyad kyis lhag pa'i brgya'i bzlas pa ste rdo rje bzlas pas /
T02TD1784E:222a-3: nyi ma bdun gyis ma rig pa'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin rnams 'gags pas 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:222a-4: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:222a-5: bdag gi sngags rgyal ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-6: de'i sgo nas rdo rje bsam gtan ni /
T02TD1784E:222a-7: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD1784E:222a-8: de las byung ba ni gang zhig spro ba'i rnam pa ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-10: nad rnams thams cad de rnam par rtog pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:222a-11: de yang nad rnams thams cad kyi /
T02TD1784E:222a-12: dam tshig ni 'khor ba'i zhags par gyur pa'i nad rnams kyi dam tshig ste yang dag par bral bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:222a-13: gzhan yang 'ga' dka' ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis spang bar mi bya ba ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-14: sems rnam par dag pa dang rdo rje bzlas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:222a-15: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:222a-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:222a-17: rdo rje ni phyag rgya chen po ste de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:222a-18: 'od gsal ba nyid du mdzes shing snang bas na rgyal po'o //
T02TD1784E:222a-19: ye shes ni lnga ste de rnams nyid ma rig pa 'gugs pa'i phyir skyo ba ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-20: de'i sgo nas 'od po che ni phul du byung ba thob pa'o ;
T02TD1784E:222a-21: /'dod pa ni spyod pa rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-22: de nyid kyis gang zhig rdo rje che ni byang chub rnam pa gsum gang gis thob pa de ni de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-23: bcom ldan 'das des gsung 'di ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gsung bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-24: rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:222a-25: chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:222a-27: chos rnams ni phung po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-28: de rnams rmi lam lta bu yin pa ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-29: de bzhin du ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa ni lha'i rnam pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:222a-30: gnyi ga de dag kyang rang bzhin dag pa ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo dang /
T02TD1784E:222a-31: de nyid ni ngo bo de nyid kyis gnas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-32: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa dang bral ba de rnams kyi nang na 'khrul pa ni rmi lam ste /
T02TD1784E:222a-33: de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob bar byed pa'i phyir ram /
T02TD1784E:222a-34: 'bras bu ngan pa rtsol ba'i phyir rdo rje gsung pa ste bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:222b-0: de bas na 'di dag thams cad @222b kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba ste /
T02TD1784E:222b-1: sgyu ma'i rnam par 'phrul pa yin no zhes shes par gyis shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:222b-2: de nyid bshad par bya ste bsam gtan bzlas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:222b-3: sgrub pa po ni rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:222b-4: bsam gtan bzlas pa'i brtson pa ni /
T02TD1784E:222b-5: bsam gtan dang bzlas pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa de rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:222b-7: dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su zhes pa ni rlung la sogs pa 'khrugs pa /
T02TD1784E:222b-8: de med pa mthong bas ni rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:222b-9: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de la 'di zhes pa ni rmi lam rnam pa gnyis pa la'o //
T02TD1784E:222b-10: rmi lam chen po ni bzang ba dang ngan pa'i rmi lam rnams kyi dam tshig ni de rnams mthong ba'o //
T02TD1784E:222b-11: byang chub ye shes mchog thob pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:222b-12: 'od zer dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gal te mthong ba'am /
T02TD1784E:222b-13: rang gi bdag nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas mthong na rnal 'byor pa de sems can chen po khams gsum pa ni lha chen po dang khyab 'jug la sogs pas mchod par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:222b-14: rmi lam gyi rnam par smin pa'o //
T02TD1784E:222b-15: sprul pa'i sku bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:222b-16: ye shes chen po'i 'od 'dra ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:222b-17: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:222b-18: sa'i snying po la sogs pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pas mchod pa byas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:222b-19: ye shes chen po ni nyi ma ste /
T02TD1784E:222b-20: de'i 'od dang 'dra ba ni de'i mdangs dang mnyam pa de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD1784E:222b-21: gzugs chen ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1784E:222b-22: rdo rje chos ni snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02TD1784E:222b-23: grags pa chen po ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02TD1784E:222b-24: gsang ba rdo rje ni don yod grub pa dang /
T02TD1784E:222b-25: grags chen ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1784E:223a-0: rang gi gzugs ni rang gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshul du bskor zhing phyag @223a * //
T02TD1784E:223a-1: btsal bar byas par rmi lam mthong na de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa de la sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub yun ring ma yin pas 'byung ba ste 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:223a-2: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:223a-3: rgyan dang bcas pa'i lha'i bu mo'am khye'u rmi lam du gal te mthong na /
T02TD1784E:223a-4: de'i tshe dngos grub ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:223a-5: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas pa'o mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams gang la /
T02TD1784E:223a-6: chos mchog ni shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la sogs pa'i po ti stsol ba mthong ba dang /
T02TD1784E:223a-7: de rnams kyang de la bzhugs par mthong ba dang /
T02TD1784E:223a-8: rang gi bdag nyid kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02TD1784E:223a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskor ba rmi lam du mthong na de ni /
T02TD1784E:223a-10: dam tshig sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:223a-11: bsam gtan rdo rje ni mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo'i de kho na nyid la zhugs par 'gyur te 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:223a-12: de bzhin du kun dga' rab dang /
T02TD1784E:223a-13: skyed mos tshal ni rtsva mchog dang /
T02TD1784E:223a-16: 'bras bu la sogs pas rgyas pa'i ngal so ba'i gnas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis mi gang la rmi lam na dbang bskur ba stsol ba de ni /
T02TD1784E:223a-17: bsam gtan dam tshig ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dus su sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:223a-18: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mi gang la rmi lam na dbang bskur ba stsal ba de ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur te 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:223a-19: rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD1784E:223a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:223a-21: rdo rje las byung ba ni dge ba'i dbang gis byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:223a-22: sna tshogs pa ni rnam pa du ma'i rmi lam dri med ni dge ba'i rmi lam gal te mthong na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:223a-23: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po las byung ba'i bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:223a-25: rmi lam ngan pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:223b-0: gdol ba zhes @223b bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:223b-1: gdol pa ni mtshon cha 'dzin pa rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:223b-2: khyil sogs pa ni khyil sogs pa'i srog chags ngan pa rnams /
T02TD1784E:223b-3: gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pas mthong na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:223b-4: blo ldan ni shes rab can des dam tshig nyams pa sel zhing /
T02TD1784E:223b-5: tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:223b-6: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni rnal 'byor de'i sems kyi gnas ni zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra ba'i lus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:223b-7: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:223b-8: de la ni rmi lam gyi skabs su'o //
T02TD1784E:223b-9: rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa ni yod pa dang med pa dag las grol ba nyid de /
T02TD1784E:223b-10: de'i dam tshig ni sgom pa ste /
T02TD1784E:223b-11: de nyid rtse gcig par gyur pas thob pa'i phyir snying po'o //
T02TD1784E:223b-12: rang sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:223b-13: rang sems ni rnam par shes pa drug gi ngo bo'i sems te /
T02TD1784E:223b-14: de nyid sems dmigs pa ni yang dag par rnam par dpyad bar bya ste ;
T02TD1784E:223b-15: gcig dang du ma bral pa'o //
T02TD1784E:223b-16: des byas pas chos rnams thams cad ni sems can dang snod kyi rang bzhin gyi chos rnams sems dmigs pa de nyid kyi ngo bo la /
T02TD1784E:223b-17: rab tu gnas pa ni de nyid du thim par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1784E:223b-18: de bas na nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin du de rnams gzung bar mi nus pa dang /
T02TD1784E:223b-20: de bas na chos ni phung po la sogs pa med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:223b-21: chos nyid med pa ni stong pa nyid las tha dad pa ma yin no zhes tshig gi lhag ma ste /
T02TD1784E:223b-22: ji srid de nyid rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:223b-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:223b-24: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par thos pa dang /
T02TD1784E:223b-25: rmang du gyur pa ni rmi lam dang de'i 'bras bu thos pas /
T02TD1784E:223b-26: the tshom gcod pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad zhus pa ste /
T02TD1784E:223b-27: kye bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig ngo mtshar ba lags /
T02TD1784E:223b-29: chos rnams ngo bo med pa la /
T02TD1784E:223b-30: zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo phung po la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:223b-31: chos ni rmi lam rnams dang de nyid ni de rnams kyi 'bras bu'ang bshad pa de ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:224a-0: nam mkha' las nam mkha' dang stong pa @224a * //
T02TD1784E:224a-1: las stong pa 'byung ba'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:224a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje 'chang gis de rnams la 'di skad gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:224a-3: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:224a-4: kye de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyon cig / nam mkha' ni gzugs la sogs pa chos gang dang yang mi ldan te /
T02TD1784E:224a-5: thogs pa med pa dang bstan du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:224a-6: mi ldan pa yang ma yin te khyab byed kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:224a-7: de bzhin du nam mkha' de la nga rgyal 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:224a-8: nga ni thams cad du 'gro ba ni khyab byed dang /
T02TD1784E:224a-9: thams cad kyi rjes su lta ba ni bstan du med pa'o //
T02TD1784E:224a-10: de bzhin du rmi lam dang de'i 'bras bu dag la nam mkha'i dpes mnyam pa nyid du shes par gyis shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:224a-11: dpe las byung ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:224a-12: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:224a-13: dper na nam mkha' ni thogs pa med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:224a-14: bltar mi snang ba ni gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du gnod par mi 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1784E:224a-15: 'dir ni 'di yin no zhes shes pa bzhin du bstan du med pa ste /
T02TD1784E:224a-16: de bzhin du chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa shes par gyis shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:224a-17: lus la sogs pa tha dad pas dpe bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:224a-18: chos thams cad ni khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis lus ngag yid rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:224a-19: kun rdzob kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir gnas te /
T02TD1784E:224a-20: de rnams par dpyad na sems can gyi rigs rnam bzhi khyab par byed pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang ;
T02TD1784E:224a-21: 'on kyang bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin gyis mnyam pas rang bzhin gcig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:224a-22: de rnams gnyis su med pa yin nam ma yin zhe na /
T02TD1784E:224a-23: lus kyi rang bzhin sems de dang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:224a-24: sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni lus te /
T02TD1784E:224a-25: de med pas na de mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro ;
T02TD1784E:224a-26: / de bzhin du ngag dang sems dang lus dag dbyer med pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:224a-27: de bas na lus la sogs pa dang nam mkha'i khams gnyis su med pa ste /
T02TD1784E:224a-28: 'dis bum pa dang snam bu bzhin du yang dag par sbyor ba'i gnyis su med pa sel ba ste /
T02TD1784E:224b-0: gnyis su med pa ni shing dang @224b sha ba bzhin du'o //
T02TD1784E:224b-1: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:224b-2: nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa ste re zhig shes pa yin la /
T02TD1784E:224b-3: nam mkha'i khams de yang 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:224b-4: so sor nges pa'i gnas med pas khyab byed kyi phyir ro /
T02TD1784E:224b-5: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa /
T02TD1784E:224b-6: ngo bo nyid med pa ni skyed pa yang ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:224b-8: de bas na chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa /
T02TD1784E:224b-9: ngo bo nyid med pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:224b-10: rnam par byang ba'i dpe bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:224b-11: byang chub kyi sems ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:224b-12: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni ye shes kyi sku skyed par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:224b-13: rim pa gnyis kyis skyes pa dang spro bar byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:224b-14: byang chub kyi sems de yang zhes pa ni de kho na nyid de lus la sogs pa la mi gnas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:224b-15: 'dus byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:224b-16: gang zhig lus la sogs pa la mi gnas pa de ni rtag pa yin pa'i phyir skye ba dang 'jig pa ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:224b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD1784E:224b-18: ye shes kyi sku 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i gnas ni mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1784E:224b-19: de bzhin du rmi lam la ni 'di ltar 'byung ba ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:224b-20: bdag gis skyes bu la sna tshogs pa 'di ltar bstan to //
T02TD1784E:224b-21: bdag gis rmi lam mthong bar bya'o zhes skyes bu la yang sems pa mi 'byung ste /
T02TD1784E:224b-22: 'dod dan mi mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:224b-23: mi 'dod na yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:224b-24: de bzhin du khams gsum pa'i bya ba ni dge ba'am mi dge ba ste /
T02TD1784E:224b-25: rmi lam bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:224b-26: sgyu ma mkhan gyi sprul pa'i skyes pa bskor ba mthong ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad yin no zhes bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:224b-27: de bzhin du phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i phyags par gyur pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams so so'i skyes bor gyur pa'i sems can thams cad de /
T02TD1784E:224b-28: de rnams rmi lam la bdag med pa ni 'khrul pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02TD1784E:225a-2: 'o na gal te de ltar yin na gang sbyin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:225a-5: sgom pa gang yin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:225a-7: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:225a-8: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:225a-9: yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:225a-10: 'dod pa po rnams kyis gang zhig 'dod par gyur pa gser la sogs pa /
T02TD1784E:225a-11: de dag thams cad 'dod pa tsam gyis ster ba ste /
T02TD1784E:225a-12: ngag gis ni ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:225a-13: rin po che des sbyin pa'i nor la sogs pa de sems la mi gnas pa ni 'dod pa'i skyes pa'i yid la gnas pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:225a-14: sngar 'dod na yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:225a-15: yid bzhin nor bu la gnas pa ma yin zhes pa ni /
T02TD1784E:225a-16: don du ma gnyer na mi ster ba'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:225a-17: ba lang la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:225a-18: 'o na kyang de ltar ma yin na yang rkyen gyi dbang gis de lta bu'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:225a-19: de bzhin du shes pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dpe tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gro ba thams cad la chos bstan pa'i sgo nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu la thob tu 'jig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:225a-20: de rnams la yang rnam par rtog pa gang yang mi mnga' ste /
T02TD1784E:225a-21: rnams par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:225a-22: de rnams kyis kyang thob tu 'dzud pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:225a-24: 'o na kyang glo bur ba'i dri ma sel ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:225a-25: bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:225a-26: de bas na thams cad sangs rgyas pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:225a-27: rang bzhin la brtan nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang so sor skyes bo dag don dam par byer med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:225a-28: chos thams cad ni sbyin ba la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:225a-29: dper na ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir gang gis sbyin pa dang gang la sbyin pa'o //
T02TD1784E:225a-30: 'on kyang 'dus byas ba tsam la brten nas rgya skyegs kyi khu bas gsher ba'i ras bal gyis bon las de dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba kho na yin no //
T02TD1784E:225b-0: de bas na chos thams cad stong pa yin na yang 'das ma thag @225b tu bshad pa'i rigs pas las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:225b-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams te /
T02TD1784E:225b-2: de rnams kyang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi dbye bas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du thob par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:225b-3: 'on kyang don dam par de rnams dngos po med do //
T02TD1784E:225b-4: thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas dag rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du sems can thams cad la sogs bstan pa la sogs pa mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:225b-6: skyes bu yid bzhin nor bu bzhin //
T02TD1784E:225b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:225b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:225b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs te /
T02TD1784E:225b-10: chos nyid rtogs pas dgyes shing spyan gdangs nas rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad zhus te /
T02TD1784E:225b-11: kye bcom ldan 'das 'di ni ngo mtshar ba yin te /
T02TD1784E:225b-12: gang zhig nam mkha'i khams dang 'dra ba chos thams cad ni sbyin pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:225b-13: phung po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:225b-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa gang yin pa de rnams /
T02TD1784E:225b-15: rjes su 'brang ba ni de dang 'dra ba dang de'i bdag nyid dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa dang ldan par gyur pa zhes bya ba 'di ni kho bo cag gis rtogs pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:225b-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:225b-18: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni byams pa la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad zhus so //
T02TD1784E:225b-19: sngags thams cad ni zhi ba dang drag po gtso bor gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:225b-20: de rnams kyis byas pa'i gang zhig dngos grub ni zhi ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:225b-21: 'dus pa ni lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom ba ste /
T02TD1784E:225b-22: de dag gang la gnas pa lags zhes 'dri ba'o //
T02TD1784E:225b-24: re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kun gyi rang bzhin med pa nyid gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:226a-0: de bas na spros pa du ma'i dra ba dang ldan pa'i dngos grub rnams cung zad kyang ma @226a * //
T02TD1784E:226a-1: yin te the tshem ldang ba'o //
T02TD1784E:226a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje 'dzin gyis de rnams la 'di skad bka' stsal te /
T02TD1784E:226a-3: de la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa ni the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:226a-4: sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub 'di rnams sku gsung thugs ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi sku la gnas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:226a-5: de la brten nas de rnams 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:226a-6: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:226a-7: sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba dang //
T02TD1784E:226a-8: dkyil 'khor la sogs rnam brtag pa //
T02TD1784E:226a-9: gtor ma sbyin sreg bya ba kun //
T02TD1784E:226a-10: rtag tu sgyu ma lta bur bya //
T02TD1784E:226a-11: zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
T02TD1784E:226a-12: dbang dang mngon spyod de bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:226a-13: gang zhig dgug pa la sogs kun //
T02TD1784E:226a-14: de dag 'ja' tshon lta bur bya //
T02TD1784E:226a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:226a-16: de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:226a-17: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:226a-18: dngos grub thams cad ni zhi ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:226a-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:226a-20: de rnams bdag gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i rnam par gnas pa ste ;
T02TD1784E:226a-21: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas so zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02TD1784E:226a-22: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi lha'i rnam pa'i sku la sogs pa de rnams kyang 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa la mi gnas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:226a-23: bye brag med pas thams cad de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:226a-24: lus la sogs pa de rnams kyang phan tshun du gzhi dang gzhi can gyi 'brel pas mi gnas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:226a-25: sgyu ma lta bu nyid gcig yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:226a-26: mar la mar bzhin du dbye ba med pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:226a-27: nam mkha' bzhin du rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes pa gtan tshigs so //
T02TD1784E:226a-28: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis zhus pa ste /
T02TD1784E:226a-29: kye bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar yin na /
T02TD1784E:226a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis te /
T02TD1784E:226a-31: de rnams gang du gnas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:226b-0: gang gi drin gyis sgyu ma'i rgyu yongs su gzung ba ste dgongs @226b pa'o ;
T02TD1784E:226b-1: / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1784E:226b-2: rang gi lus ngag sems ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes tsam de la gnas pa /
T02TD1784E:226b-3: de nyid la brten nas 'byung ba ni phyi rol du snang ba yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:226b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol pa /
T02TD1784E:226b-5: de lta bu'i ye shes tsam gyi sems de sgyu ma'i sku'i rnam pa ste gang du gnas zhes 'dri ba'o //
T02TD1784E:226b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1784E:226b-7: nam mkha' la gnas pa ni 'od gsal ba la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:226b-8: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:226b-9: bdag la byin rlabs ting 'dzin dang //
T02TD1784E:226b-11: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis //
T02TD1784E:226b-12: bden pa gnyis po de bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:226b-13: bdag la byin rlabs go rims kyis //
T02TD1784E:226b-15: de phyir rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02TD1784E:226b-16: sngon du bdag la byin rlabs bstan //
T02TD1784E:226b-19: nam mkha' ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:226b-20: de yang gang du gnas zhes dri ba'o //
T02TD1784E:226b-21: gang na yang mi gnas zhes pa ni lan te /
T02TD1784E:226b-22: thams cad du gnas pa'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:226b-23: byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam 'grel las kyang /
T02TD1784E:226b-24: ji ltar bu ram mngar ba dang //
T02TD1784E:226b-25: me yi rang bzhin tsha ba ste //
T02TD1784E:226b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:226b-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:226b-28: byams pa la sogs pa de rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni the tshom chod pa dang /
T02TD1784E:226b-29: rmad du gyur pa ni chos kyi don rtogs pas so //
T02TD1784E:226b-30: de nyid kyi phyir rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas pa ni 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste /
T02TD1784E:226b-31: cang mi smra ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su zad pas zhi ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:226b-32: sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:226b-33: sems thams cad ni rnam par shes pa gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:226b-34: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:226b-35: de nyid kyi snying po ni blang bar bya ba ste /
T02TD1784E:226b-36: de las rdo rje ni sgyu ma'i sku 'byung ba le'u gang la yod pa de rjod par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs kyang de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:226b-37: rgyud 'grel las le'u bco lnga pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o//
T02TD1784E:227a-0: @227a * // le'u bco lnga po'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni bzhi brgya drug cu'o /
T02TD1784E:227a-2: // / le'u bzhi pa las gsungs pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:227a-3: sku dang gsung gi dkyil 'khor gnyis gtso bor gyur pa le'u bcu drug pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:227a-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:227a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la'ang 'dus te /
T02TD1784E:227a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po la /
T02TD1784E:227a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i tshig ni /
T02TD1784E:227a-8: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02TD1784E:227a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo rin chen gyi mchod pa ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams te ;
T02TD1784E:227a-10: de dag gi tshogs ni re re'i 'khor du ma rnams kyis mchod pa byas te /
T02TD1784E:227a-11: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02TD1784E:227a-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:227a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:227a-14: de rnams kyis gang zhig rdo rje thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams te /
T02TD1784E:227a-15: de dag gi seng ge ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po rnams te /
T02TD1784E:227a-16: de dag mchod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig ni phyi dang gsang ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:227a-17: de dag nyid dag pa thob par byed pa'i phyir mdzes pas na rgyal po ste /
T02TD1784E:227a-18: tshogs ni slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:227a-19: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la /
T02TD1784E:227a-20: snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i sku ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1784E:227a-21: de'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang chen po sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1784E:227a-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:227a-23: de nas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD1784E:227a-25: sku'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad pa ni phul du byung bas phye zhing bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:227b-0: mchog ni me long lta bu'i @227b ye shes thob par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:227b-1: de bzhin du thugs rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:227b-2: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang gru bzhi la sogs pa'i yon tan dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD1784E:227b-3: de nyid kyi phyir thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:227b-4: de dag gi dkyil 'khor dag ste gang dang gang de ru bdag po gnyis su gyur pa de dag de'i dkyil 'khor yin no zhes 'og nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:227b-5: yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:227b-6: khru ni bcu drug ces bya ba la sogs pa la phyogs bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:227b-7: rnam par snang mdzad ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin yin la /
T02TD1784E:227b-8: gzugs kyang sa'i rang bzhin yin pa ste /
T02TD1784E:227b-9: sa yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pas phyogs re re khams bzhi bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro zhes rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:227b-10: gru bzhi zhes pa ni phyi dang nang du'o //
T02TD1784E:227b-11: rab tu mdzes pa ni dri ma med pa dang gsal ba'i tshon gyi ri mo dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:227b-12: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can rnams te /
T02TD1784E:227b-13: de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni bzhir gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:227b-14: sku rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1784E:227b-15: de nyid kyi dbus kyi gtso bo nyid du rab tu gnas pa ni dbus su bzhugs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:227b-16: de'i nang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:227b-17: 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su 'khor lo ni 'khor lo'i phreng ba bri ba ni dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:227b-19: cho ga'i rdo rje zhes pa la /
T02TD1784E:227b-20: cho ga ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ste /
T02TD1784E:227b-21: de nyid rdo rje bzhin du brtan pa gang la yod pa de ni sgrub pa'i blos bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:227b-22: 'dir ni cho ga'i sgra'i don yin te /
T02TD1784E:227b-23: re zhig dang po rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02TD1784E:227b-24: phyi yi rnam rtog ngan 'dra ba //
T02TD1784E:227b-25: rnam par dben pa'i yid las spangs //
T02TD1784E:227b-26: rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur gyis //
T02TD1784E:227b-27: gnang ba thob dang blo ldan pas ;
T02TD1784E:227b-28: / zla ba nyi ma chu sman dang //
T02TD1784E:227b-29: de bzhin dri yang sngags byas pa //
T02TD1784E:227b-31: dam tshig gsang ba bsnyen par bya //
T02TD1784E:227b-32: lan ni gnyis gsum slob dpon la //
T02TD1784E:227b-33: gsol btab gsang ba'i bdud rtsi snod //
T02TD1784E:227b-34: thar pa 'dod dang dad pa can //
T02TD1784E:228a-0: @228a * // slob ma dam pa bltas nas ni //
T02TD1784E:228a-1: dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus tshul gyis //
T02TD1784E:228a-2: 'di rnams bdag gis byang chub la //
T02TD1784E:228a-3: gzhag par bya zhes rjes gzung ba //
T02TD1784E:228a-4: de ltar rnal 'byor pa yis bsam //
T02TD1784E:228a-5: de la re zhig dang po slob dpon ni theg pa chen po'i tshul la mkhas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:228a-6: 'gro ba ma lus pa gdon pa la thugs rje dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:228a-7: dad pa dang thos pa la sogs pa'i stobs kyis 'byung ba'i 'od gsal ba rtogs pas ma lus pa'i yul nye bar spyod pa dri ma med par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1784E:228a-8: kun du 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings so sor rtog pa'i bsam pas spyod pa rnam par dag pa la gnas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:228a-9: ye shes kyi tshogs 'phel pas dri ma dang bcas pa'i bag chags dang gti mug gi rab rib yun ring du gdon nus pa'o //
T02TD1784E:228a-10: de lta bu'i slob dpon la gang gi tshe slob mas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab na /
T02TD1784E:228a-11: de'i tshe des kyang de la dri ba ste /
T02TD1784E:228a-12: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad khyod kyis rdzogs sam ma rdzogs /
T02TD1784E:228a-13: gal te cung zad rdzogs pa dang cung zad ma rdzogs so zhes zer na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:228a-14: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i steng du khro bo'i gzugs dang 'og tu rtse gcig pa'i rnam pa'i khro bos de'i sems kyi bgegs rnams phur bus btab la /
T02TD1784E:228a-15: de'i 'od zer gyi 'khor las kyang gdug pa de rnams bsregs nas slob ma'i sems bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir dbyangs tha ma las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
T02TD1784E:228a-16: de'i steng du las kyi rdo rje yang bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:228a-17: bden pa ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02TD1784E:228a-18: bar brtags gang gis nus pa'o //
T02TD1784E:228a-19: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1784E:228a-21: de bas na rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi mthar phra mo rdo rje bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1784E:228a-22: rdo rje thig le bsgom pas sems brtan par byas la dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi sngags re re 'bum bzlas te /
T02TD1784E:228a-23: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pas nges par byas la /
T02TD1784E:228b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i @228b bka' sngon du 'gro ba rim pa 'dis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
T02TD1784E:228b-1: re zhig dang po aom bhu kham zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis nam mkhar gyur pa'i sa gzhi h'um lam h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis zla ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsams la /
T02TD1784E:228b-2: aom me de n'i badzri bha ba badzra bandha h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:228b-3: sngar bshad pa'i bsam gtan gyis phur bus 'debs shing yi ge hri:las byung ba'i nam mkha'i khams khyab par byed pa'i chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'i nang du a'a li dang k'a li las skyes pa'i sngar bshad pa'i gnas pa rdzogs pa'i sa gzhi bsgoms la ;
T02TD1784E:228b-4: de nyid lag pa g-yas pas reg cing yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:228b-5: sa gzhi ji lta bu zhe na gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi dang rdo rje'i ka bas rnam par brgyan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:228b-6: phyogs bzhi la sgo dang rta babs dang /
T02TD1784E:228b-7: rgyal mtshan dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa dmigs te /
T02TD1784E:228b-8: lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams la gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan rnams yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bsams la /
T02TD1784E:228b-9: de'i dbus kyi gtso bo'i nga rgyal gyis phyi rol gyi bud med rigs kyi dbye bas lha mo spyan la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de rigs kyi sa bon lngas byin gyis brlabs shing de'i padmar yang yi ge aa la sogs pa dgod cing snga ma bzhin du dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams 'byung bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:228b-10: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa re re lha mo bzhi dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:228b-11: khro bo rnams kyang rang rang gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:228b-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dang bcas pa spro ba dang bsdu ba dang gnas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:228b-14: rjes su chags pas las la gnas par byas la /
T02TD1784E:228b-15: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba brjod cing bdag nyid dang rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i lha thams cad kyi ngo bo rang bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:228b-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal byas pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i slob ma rnams kyis rdo rje dang dril bu lag na thogs shing bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:229a-0: @229a * // de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD1784E:229a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1784E:229a-2: chos mchog kun gyi bdag med pa //
T02TD1784E:229a-3: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1784E:229a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gsol ba gdab par bya'o//
T02TD1784E:229a-5: de'i 'og tu slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams la /
T02TD1784E:229a-6: h'um badzro tishtha zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bteg cing rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal gyis yi ge ta dang ma dag las byung ba'i mig gnyis ni zla ba dang nyi mar bsams te /
T02TD1784E:229a-7: phyogs thams cad la yang de nyid las rdo rje ra ba la sogs pa bsams te /
T02TD1784E:229a-8: rkang pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje bkod la /
T02TD1784E:229a-9: nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i gar gyis dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi la yi ge gsum brjod cing rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal gyis bcag par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:229a-10: rdor sems yang dag sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:229a-11: mchu gnyis yang dag gzung byas te //
T02TD1784E:229a-12: dpal ldan g-yon phyogs nga rgyal 'dzin //
T02TD1784E:229a-13: phyogs kyi 'khor lo bcas par bya //
T02TD1784E:229a-14: sa 'og sa bla sa steng rnams //
T02TD1784E:229a-15: 'og dang steng ni bcings byas te //
T02TD1784E:229a-16: gdug pa rnams kyis mi thub pas //
T02TD1784E:229a-17: yi ge h'um ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1784E:229a-18: de nas rdo rje rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD1784E:229a-19: aom badzra mandal h'um dza:zhes bya bas bkug cing aom ma h'a badzra tsa kra aa dhi tishtsha siddhi h'um zhes bya bas dbyer med par byas la /
T02TD1784E:229a-20: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya h'um phat ces bya bas phur bus btab las gzhi de bdud rtsi lnga'i chus byugs shing lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams la tsandan dang bdud rtsi lnga'i chus thig le rnams byas shing me tog gtor te /
T02TD1784E:229a-21: lha'i dkyil 'khor dang rang gi gnas su zhugs par byas la /
T02TD1784E:229a-22: gsang ba dang de las gzhan pa'i mchod pas mchod cing gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs pa'i ngo bo mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ha sa de ba dang /
T02TD1784E:229a-23: ba hu pu kri ta dang pri ha ti dang /
T02TD1784E:229a-24: dandotpa la dang aa pa r'a dzi ta zhes bya ba sman chen po dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:229a-29: bye ru ste rin po che dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:229b-4: cung zad bdud rtsi lnga'i chu dang bcas pa rigs kyi bdag po'i sngags kyis bzlas la /
T02TD1784E:229b-5: 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus na bzhag nas spos gtul zhing mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:229b-6: las thams cad pa'i bum pa yang rang gi sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la shar phyogs kyi sgo'i phyi rol du bzhag la /
T02TD1784E:229b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la spos gtul bas zhu bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:229b-8: khyed rnams mchod par bya phyir dang //
T02TD1784E:229b-9: slob ma rnams kyang rjes gzung phyir //
T02TD1784E:229b-10: snying rje'i bdag nyid bdag de yis //
T02TD1784E:229b-12: de phyir dang ldan bdag la ni //
T02TD1784E:229b-13: bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1784E:229b-14: 'jig rten mgon po thugs rje can //
T02TD1784E:229b-15: khyed rnams bdag la dngos su gsol //
T02TD1784E:229b-16: dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD1784E:229b-17: sngags kyi lha mo gzhan gang rnams //
T02TD1784E:229b-18: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02TD1784E:229b-19: mthu chen gang zhig 'byung po rnams //
T02TD1784E:229b-20: gang zhig lha yi spyan ldan pa //
T02TD1784E:229b-21: bstan pa la dga' de rnams kun //
T02TD1784E:229b-22: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi pa yis //
T02TD1784E:229b-24: ci nus pa yi nyer spyod pas //
T02TD1784E:229b-25: nang par bri bar bya ba'o//
T02TD1784E:229b-26: de phyir slob ma nang bcas pa //
T02TD1784E:229b-27: bdag ni snying rjes bzung nas ni //
T02TD1784E:229b-28: thams cad bcas pa dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1784E:229b-29: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1784E:229b-30: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:229b-31: de'i 'og tu slob ma rnams bkug cing mo'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge ra'i mes de rnams re re thal bar byas la /
T02TD1784E:229b-32: yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin rang gi kha nas zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:229b-33: bde ba chen po'i ngo bo de nyid rdo rje nas spro bar byas la /
T02TD1784E:229b-34: de nyid sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:229b-35: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:229b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i sgo'i ngos su bzhag nas 'di yis lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:229b-37: sdig pa bdag gis gang byas pa //
T02TD1784E:229b-38: byed du bcug dang rjes yi rang //
T02TD1784E:229b-39: slar yang de nyid mi bya'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:229b-40: de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02TD1784E:229b-41: sangs rgyas mgon po'i bsod nams dang//
T02TD1784E:230a-0: @230a * // rang rgyal slob ma las byung dang //
T02TD1784E:230a-1: 'gro ba'i bsam pa las skyes gang //
T02TD1784E:230a-2: thams cad bdag ni rjes yi rang //
T02TD1784E:230a-3: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02TD1784E:230a-4: bla med chos ni rin po che //
T02TD1784E:230a-5: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD1784E:230a-6: rin chen mchog gsum bla med pa //
T02TD1784E:230a-7: sdom pa sangs rgyas sbyor skyed pa //
T02TD1784E:230a-8: de ring bdag gis mchog tu gzung //
T02TD1784E:230a-9: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD1784E:230a-10: bdag gis yang dag gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1784E:230a-11: slob dpon yang ni gzung bya ste //
T02TD1784E:230a-12: rdo rje rin chen bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1784E:230a-13: nyin dang mtshan du lan gsum du //
T02TD1784E:230a-14: sbyin pa bzhi dag rab tu sbyin //
T02TD1784E:230a-15: rin chen chen po'i rigs mchog la //
T02TD1784E:230a-16: de ni dam tshig yid du 'ong //
T02TD1784E:230a-17: phyi nang gsang ba theg gsum gyi //
T02TD1784E:230a-18: dam pa'i chos ni blang bar bgyi //
T02TD1784E:230a-19: byang chub chen po'i las byung ba'i //
T02TD1784E:230a-20: padma chen po'i rigs dag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:230a-21: sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD1784E:230a-22: yang dag tu ni blang bar bgyi //
T02TD1784E:230a-23: mchod pa'i las ni ci nus pas //
T02TD1784E:230a-24: las kyi rigs chen bsdu ba'o //
T02TD1784E:230a-25: tshul khrims gsum po'i rnam dag dang //
T02TD1784E:230a-26: ting 'dzin de bzhin sdom pa rnams //
T02TD1784E:230a-27: byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la //
T02TD1784E:230a-29: sangs rgyas de yi sras rnams kyis //
T02TD1784E:230a-30: shes rab chen pos ji bzhin bskyed //
T02TD1784E:230a-31: byang chub sems ni che mchog go //
T02TD1784E:230a-32: de bzhin bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD1784E:230a-33: sangs rgyas dang ni de sras rnams //
T02TD1784E:230a-34: mgon po bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1784E:230a-35: deng nas brtsams te ji srid du //
T02TD1784E:230a-36: bla med byang chub thob kyi bar //
T02TD1784E:230a-37: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD1784E:230a-38: sdom pa chos dag bsdu ba dang //
T02TD1784E:230a-39: sems can don byed tshul khrims dang //
T02TD1784E:230a-40: bdag gis brtan por blang bar bya //
T02TD1784E:230a-41: dge ba 'di yis bdag gis ni //
T02TD1784E:230a-42: sangs rgyas nyid du thob pa ste //
T02TD1784E:230a-43: gting med srid pa'i rgya mtsho las//
T02TD1784E:230a-44: 'gro ba thams cad bdag gis bsgral //
T02TD1784E:230a-45: zhes bya ba lan gsum du bcug la /
T02TD1784E:230a-46: de nyid kyi snying ga dang spyi bo dang lkog ma rnams la rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma bsams la /
T02TD1784E:230a-47: yi ge gsum brjod la reg cing de'i lag pa la dri dang me tog sbyin te /
T02TD1784E:230b-0: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis @230b brlabs la sogs kyis gtul bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:230b-1: mar mes kyang snang bar byas shing de nyid lha bshos byin te /
T02TD1784E:230b-2: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bzlas pa'i so shing dang /
T02TD1784E:230b-3: 'thing thung byin la ku sha yang sbyin te /
T02TD1784E:230b-4: dbug pa g-yas pa la mdud pa gsum byas pa'i srung skud bcings shing aom gi shuddha dharmma:sarba p'a pam ni tsa aa sya sho dha ya /
T02TD1784E:230b-5: sarba bi ka w'a na aa pa na ya h'um zhes byas pas dri chu 'thung du bcug la /
T02TD1784E:230b-6: ci nus pas zab pa dang rgya che pa'i chos bstan cing /
T02TD1784E:230b-7: kye bzhin bzangs rnams song shig / nang par dkyil 'khor chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i drin gyis mthong bar gyis shig ces slob ma rnams la smras te /
T02TD1784E:230b-8: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod la nam mkha'i dbyings la bteg cing mnyam par bzhag pas dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi la nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:230b-9: de nas zhag gnyis pa la lha'i rnal 'byor gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:230b-10: bya ba'i sa bon rnams las bskyed pa'i thig skud ni dkar po dang /
T02TD1784E:230b-14: aindra n'i la dang 'dra ba ste /
T02TD1784E:230b-15: dkyil 'khor las nyis 'gyur du byas la /
T02TD1784E:230b-16: sa bon de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:230b-17: dam tshig las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga de rnams la thim zhing yi ge gsum brjod cing bsgril ba dag sbyangs te byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:230b-18: de'i 'og tu yi ge dza las byung ba'i zla ba dag nyi ma mig gnyis su bkod cing /
T02TD1784E:230b-19: h'um pra yatstsha pee ro tsa na tsakra s'u tr'a n'a ya zhes bya bas rang gi mdog dang 'dra ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying gar zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'i lcags kyu rnams kyi 'od zer gyi thing skud bkug la thing skud dkar po la thim par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:230b-20: de bzhin du snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i snying ga'i zla ba rnams las rang rang gi mdog dang 'dra ba'i thig skud rnams ji bzhin du thig skud bzhi la thim zhing sku gsum gyi sgom pas rang gi sku rdo rjer bsgom zhing /
T02TD1784E:230b-21: thig skud 'dzin pa gal te shes rab ma yin na de'i tshe lha mo spyan du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:230b-22: gal te slob ma yin na de'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'am /
T02TD1784E:230b-23: rdo rje sems dpar bsgom par bya'o//
T02TD1784E:231a-0: @231a * // de bzhin du gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la rang gi bdag nyid gsung rdo rje dang thugs rdo rjer bsams la /
T02TD1784E:231a-1: thig skud 'dzin pa gal te shes rab ma yin na de'i tshe gos dkar mo dang m'a ma k'i bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231a-2: gal te slob ma yin na de'i tshe rnam par snang mdzad dam bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'am rdo rje sems dpar bsams la /
T02TD1784E:231a-3: aom dzdza dzdza dzdza zhes bya bas bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231a-4: nye ba'i sgrub pas kyang aom dzdza dzdza dzdza zhes bya bas gzung zhing g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis gzung bas lte ba'i phyogs su thig skud 'dzin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231a-5: de'i 'og tu mtho ris dang gnod sbyin gyi bdag po'i phyogs kha bltas pas rdo rje can gyis nam mkha' la thig skud gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231a-6: de'i 'og tu de bzhin du rang rang gi phyogs la dmigs te /
T02TD1784E:231a-7: tshangs pa'i thig skud gnyis sa la btab cing gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD1784E:231a-10: klu'i phyogs la kha bltas nas phyi rol du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231a-11: de'i 'og tu me dang bden bral gyi mtshams su kha bltas pas thig gdab par byas te /
T02TD1784E:231a-12: shar nub byang dang lho phyogs su //
T02TD1784E:231a-13: thig skud bzhi dang dum bu brgyad //
T02TD1784E:231a-14: ces bya ba'i rim pas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231a-16: khyed la sems can don dus yin //
T02TD1784E:231a-17: zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231a-18: de la bla ma dang slob ma dag g-yas phyogs nas bskor bas 'gro ba shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231a-19: gru bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1784E:231a-20: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1784E:231a-21: dar dbyangs me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD1784E:231a-22: gra yi cha ni thams cad dang //
T02TD1784E:231a-23: sgro dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
T02TD1784E:231a-24: rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa //
T02TD1784E:231a-25: kun du yang ni zlum po'o //
T02TD1784E:231a-26: rdo rje ka ba mchog gis spras //
T02TD1784E:231a-27: rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1784E:231a-28: hi yig khro bo'i lta ba yis //
T02TD1784E:231a-29: de nas sgo ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD1784E:231a-30: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad kyi cha //
T02TD1784E:231a-31: de yi phyed ni kha khyer ro //
T02TD1784E:231a-32: sgo khyud sgo yi tshad ldan pa //
T02TD1784E:231a-34: 'gram dang logs ni sgo phyed de //
T02TD1784E:231a-35: rdul tsho nas ni de yi phyed //
T02TD1784E:231a-36: 'khor lo khru ni bcu drug pa'i //
T02TD1784E:231b-0: @231b lha yi snam bu khru gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1784E:231b-2: lhag ma rnams ni rtag par 'dod //
T02TD1784E:231b-3: de ltar thig btab nas yi ge dza'i 'bar ba'i lta bas kha dog dkar po la sogs pa'i rdul tshon rnams byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:231b-4: de rnams la re re ra lha mo bzhis bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thim zhing yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:231b-5: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba brjod cing rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi dril bu'i sgras mtshan ma ngan pa la sogs pa sel zhing chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam dag la dmigs te /
T02TD1784E:231b-6: dang po g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te mnyam pa dang mtshungs pa dang ma chad pas dkar po dang /
T02TD1784E:231b-10: nag po'i rim pas rdul tshon rnams dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231b-11: re re'i rdul tshon gyi ri mo ni sgo'i cha nyi shu'i rags pa bya ste /
T02TD1784E:231b-13: 'dri ba'i dkyil 'khor de la shar phyogs kyi sa ni nag po dang /
T02TD1784E:231b-14: gshin rje'i sa ni ser po dang /
T02TD1784E:231b-15: chu lha'i sa ni dmar po dang //
T02TD1784E:231b-16: rnam thos sras kyi sa ni ljang gu dang /
T02TD1784E:231b-17: dbus kyi sa ni dkar po'o //
T02TD1784E:231b-18: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus su gal te bgegs byung na de'i tshe sngar bshad pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags h'um dang phat kyi mtha' can gyis de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan zhing de rnams skrag par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231b-19: yang na don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231b-20: de nas lha bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su padma dang nyi zla'i gdan rnams ji bzhin du bkod la 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231b-21: yang na sngar bshad pa'i lha rnams zhal dang phyag dang mtshon cha dang sku mdog gis mtshan pa dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rim pa gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor zhugs pa dang byung ba la sogs pa'i dus thams cad du yi ge gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:231b-23: gal te lha'i gzugs bri ba yin na de'i tshe dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1784E:231b-24: shar du mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD1784E:232a-2: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02TD1784E:232a-3: byang du don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:232a-4: dbang ldan gyi mtshams la sogs pa'i grva bzhi po la lha mo spyan dang /
T02TD1784E:232a-8: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor la ste shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su gshin rje gshed la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:232a-9: grva rnams la mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:232a-10: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02TD1784E:232a-11: shar phyogs kyi snam bu nas lho byang gi bar du byams pa dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gnyi sa dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:232a-12: shar dang nub kyi sgo dag la gshin rje mthar byed dang padma mthar byed kyi cung zad rgyab tu gnod mdzes rgyal po dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:232a-13: reg bya rdo rje ma ni dbus kyi gtso bo dang snyoms par zhugs par dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:232a-14: de rnams kyang sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor phyung pa'i snying po rnams kyis bkod la /
T02TD1784E:232a-15: nam mkha' la zhugs pa rnams dang dbyer med par byas te /
T02TD1784E:232a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bzlas pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa de'i mdun du bzhag cing /
T02TD1784E:232a-17: lhag ma lha'i bum pa gzhan rnams kyang rang rang gi sngags rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs la dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams la sogs par bzhag cing khro bo gnod mdzes kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1784E:232a-18: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02TD1784E:232a-20: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD1784E:232a-21: a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na bidy'a r'a dza h'um phat ces bya ba brjod cing /
T02TD1784E:232a-22: me tog gi phreng ba blangs te dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing bskor ba gsum byas la /
T02TD1784E:232a-23: bcom ldan 'das la phul te dbus su gnas par bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:232a-24: mnyam par gzhag pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis yid kyis sgo dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:232a-25: de'i dbus su yi ge gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:232a-26: de'i 'og tu bcu drug lo lon pa dang /
T02TD1784E:232b-0: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khrus mkhan gyi bu mo dam tshig gi rigs kyi bdag po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs @232b te ;
T02TD1784E:232b-1: dga' ba'i mthar zhu ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi nang du gnas pa'i dam tshig gi 'khor lo phra mo blos dmigs te /
T02TD1784E:232b-2: sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor phyung pa'i snying po rnams brjod cing spro ba dang /
T02TD1784E:232b-6: rjes su chags pas thabs dang shes rab kyi bsgom pa'i lha'i 'khor lo bsams te /
T02TD1784E:232b-7: yi ge h'um bzhi pa'i sngags dza:'i mtha' can gyis zhags pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa'i gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po bskul te /
T02TD1784E:232b-8: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dgug cing ji bzhin du rang rang gi gzugs brnyan rnams la phat kyi mtha' can de'i sngags kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:232b-9: de'i 'og tu snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar spyad pa mtha' yas pa bza' bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:232b-13: ma myos pa'i chang dang ldan pa'i yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod pas mchod la /
T02TD1784E:232b-16: dga' ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i rol mo la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i phyi nang gi mchod pa'i tshogs dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:232b-17: 'di ni mchod pa dam pa ste//
T02TD1784E:232b-18: gang zhig yid ni dga' bar byed //
T02TD1784E:232b-19: de phyir kun bdag rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1784E:232b-20: rang rang gzhan rnams mchod par bya //
T02TD1784E:232b-22: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02TD1784E:232b-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga po'i bstod pa gzhan gyis bstod cing bzlas pa'am /
T02TD1784E:232b-25: zla ba dang nyi ma dang chu dang /
T02TD1784E:232b-26: sman dang dri rnams dung chen po'i nang du man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs te /
T02TD1784E:232b-27: 'khor lo'i nang du zhugs la de nyid mngon par 'dus byas te /
T02TD1784E:232b-28: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas lha dang lha min la sogs pa la gtor ma sbyin zhing cho ga 'dis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1784E:232b-29: sor bzhi pa'i kha khyer dang ldan zhing khru ni gcig pa ste /
T02TD1784E:232b-30: 'og tu khru phyed chad ldan pa //
T02TD1784E:232b-31: me thab yongs su zlum po yin //
T02TD1784E:232b-32: nang gi cha ni rgya che ba //
T02TD1784E:232b-33: sor re dbangs su 'phel bar bya //
T02TD1784E:232b-34: rin chen rdo rje mtsho skyes dang //
T02TD1784E:232b-35: ral gri yis na kun du bskor //
T02TD1784E:233a-0: @233a * // dbus su 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1784E:233a-1: rdo rje la sogs phyogs rnams la'o //
T02TD1784E:233a-2: las kun byed pas bzlas pa ni //
T02TD1784E:233a-3: mkhas pas byas te yo byad rnams //
T02TD1784E:233a-4: g-yon du bzhag ste sreg rdzas rnams //
T02TD1784E:233a-5: yang dag bzlas te g-yas su bzhag / mngar ba shing drung bdud shing sogs //
T02TD1784E:233a-6: yi ge gsum gyis gsal ba'i me //
T02TD1784E:233a-7: rlung g-yab kyis ni sbar byas nas //
T02TD1784E:233a-8: g-yas skor bas ni ku sha dgra ma //
T02TD1784E:233a-9: de nas snying byung gru gsum ni //
T02TD1784E:233a-10: padma la gnas ram las byung //
T02TD1784E:233a-11: zhal bzhi pa ni sku mdog ser //
T02TD1784E:233a-12: ral pa'i cod pan mchod sbyin dag //
T02TD1784E:233a-14: phreng 'dzin zhal dkar me lha bsgom //
T02TD1784E:233a-15: ye shes me lha dgug par bya //
T02TD1784E:233a-16: bsang gtor la sogs byas nas ni //
T02TD1784E:233a-17: de nas mda' rnams gzugs par bya //
T02TD1784E:233a-18: rang lha'i sa bon bsams nas ni //
T02TD1784E:233a-19: shin tu 'bar ba'i dgang blugs rnams//
T02TD1784E:233a-20: de khar re pha bkod nas ni //
T02TD1784E:233a-21: de nas yam shing bsreg par bya //
T02TD1784E:233a-22: sngags kyis mngon par bzlas pa'i mthar //
T02TD1784E:233a-23: 'bar ba'i me la bsreg par bya //
T02TD1784E:233a-24: de nas til dang 'bru la sogs //
T02TD1784E:233a-25: cho ga 'dir ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1784E:233a-26: de bzhin ye shes me lha yi //
T02TD1784E:233a-27: snying ga'i zla bar rang bdag yin //
T02TD1784E:233a-28: bsams te de skyed de 'dra ba //
T02TD1784E:233a-29: snyoms par zhugs pas rnam par gnas //
T02TD1784E:233a-30: zla ba nyi ma la sogs dang //
T02TD1784E:233a-31: rdzas gzhan gyis ni me lha mchod //
T02TD1784E:233a-32: rim bzhin 'bar ba'i lce ldan pa //
T02TD1784E:233a-33: mthar ni dgang blugs bsreg par bya //
T02TD1784E:233a-34: zhi ba'i don du rdzas rnams ni //
T02TD1784E:233a-35: rang lha sbyor bas bsreg par byas //
T02TD1784E:233a-36: yig gsum bdud rtsi sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1784E:233a-37: sngags pas bsams te bsreg par bya //
T02TD1784E:233a-38: rdzas ni yam shing mar dang ni //
T02TD1784E:233a-39: til dang 'bras dang nas rnams ni //
T02TD1784E:233a-40: gro dang ma sha 'bras so ba //
T02TD1784E:233a-41: spos dang star ga bil ba dang //
T02TD1784E:233a-42: gla gor zho sha zho dang ni //
T02TD1784E:233a-43: 'o ma d'ur ba ku sha dang //
T02TD1784E:233a-44: 'bras bu gsum dang sles tres dang //
T02TD1784E:233a-45: kha ra rgyal mo khar lo ma //
T02TD1784E:233a-47: pri yang ku dang gur gum dang //
T02TD1784E:233a-48: spos gnyis dang ni sman rnams dang //
T02TD1784E:233a-49: dz'a ti pha la nor bu dang //
T02TD1784E:233b-0: dar dang so rtsi @233b me tog phreng //
T02TD1784E:233b-1: de bzhin mchod pa rnams la lnga //
T02TD1784E:233b-2: rnal 'byor rgyud la de tsam ni //
T02TD1784E:233b-3: go rims kyis ni rdzas rnams so //
T02TD1784E:233b-4: rdzas rnams te yi rnam dag pa //
T02TD1784E:233b-5: dkyil 'khor rim pas bshad par bya //
T02TD1784E:233b-6: ji ltar bla mas slob ma la //
T02TD1784E:233b-7: rjes su gzung bas yang dag bya //
T02TD1784E:233b-8: yam shing nas ni gro yi bar //
T02TD1784E:233b-9: sreg par byed pa de ma thag / mi ga la sogs pa dbang po drug / tha mal ba de sbyor bar gyur //
T02TD1784E:233b-10: gang zad pas ni sa snying sogs //
T02TD1784E:233b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rang nyid //
T02TD1784E:233b-12: sngags kyi sku yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:233b-13: slob ma'i lus la 'jug par bya//
T02TD1784E:233b-14: ma sha nas brtsams bu ga'i bar //
T02TD1784E:233b-15: bsreg pa de ma thag tu ni //
T02TD1784E:233b-16: gzugs la sogs pas don grub po //
T02TD1784E:233b-17: rmongs par byed pa dag par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:233b-18: gang zag gzugs gtor la sogs pa //
T02TD1784E:233b-19: lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1784E:233b-20: 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1784E:233b-21: slob ma des na 'jug par bya //
T02TD1784E:233b-22: zho nas sle tres kyi ni bar //
T02TD1784E:233b-23: bsam gtan rtsol pas bsreg par bya //
T02TD1784E:233b-24: rnam shes drug pos 'khor ba yi //
T02TD1784E:233b-26: gang zad pas ni ye shes lnga //
T02TD1784E:233b-27: ngo bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams //
T02TD1784E:233b-28: rdo rje 'chang chen dang bcas pas //
T02TD1784E:233b-29: slob ma de ni rang bzhin byed //
T02TD1784E:233b-30: kha ra nas brtsams sman gyi bar //
T02TD1784E:233b-31: rtse gcig pa ni bla mas bsreg /'dod chags la sogs so ma nyi pa //
T02TD1784E:233b-32: lta ba lnga ni dag par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:233b-33: gang zad pas ni ye shes bcu //
T02TD1784E:233b-34: yang na sa ni bcu po ste //
T02TD1784E:233b-35: skad cig tsam gyis slob ma yis //
T02TD1784E:233b-36: yang dag par ni mngon du gyur //
T02TD1784E:233b-37: dz'a ti pha la nas dri'i bar //
T02TD1784E:233b-38: rdzas brgyad po ni bsreg par bya //
T02TD1784E:233b-40: blo ldan slob ma la ni bya //
T02TD1784E:233b-41: gang zad pas ni mngon du ni //
T02TD1784E:233b-42: pha rol phyin pa brgyad pa ste //
T02TD1784E:233b-43: slob dpon dam pa'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1784E:233b-44: sgrub pa pos ni tshe 'dir thob //
T02TD1784E:233b-45: lha bshos gcig pu bsreg byas na //
T02TD1784E:233b-46: nga rgyal rnam par dag par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:233b-47: gang zhig zad ba'i slob ma yis //
T02TD1784E:233b-48: pha rol phyin mchog dbu pa thob //
T02TD1784E:233b-49: dgang blugs kyi ni sbyor ba dang //
T02TD1784E:233b-50: bum pa'i chu yis bsang gtor gyis //
T02TD1784E:233b-51: pha rol phyin pa bcu thob pa//
T02TD1784E:234a-0: @234a * // blo dang ldan pas slob ma byas //
T02TD1784E:234a-1: sbyin sreg las kyi rnam dag pa //
T02TD1784E:234a-2: de ni bdag gis yang dag bshad //
T02TD1784E:234a-3: rdzas rnams phyi rol kun rdzob kyis //
T02TD1784E:234a-4: don dam pa ni rab ston pa'o //
T02TD1784E:234a-5: de nas las kun gtor ma ni //
T02TD1784E:234a-6: mchog tu grub pa rab ster ba //
T02TD1784E:234a-7: khams gsum pa ni tshim pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:234a-8: blo dag pas ni sngags brjod bya //
T02TD1784E:234a-9: lhag ma sreg rdzas bsregs nas ni //
T02TD1784E:234a-10: rdor can rang gi rnal 'byor ldan //
T02TD1784E:234a-11: dkyil 'khor pa ni rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1784E:234a-12: cho ga 'di ni tshim par bya //
T02TD1784E:234a-13: slob ma gzhug pa'i chog bzhin //
T02TD1784E:234a-14: rang nyid kyang ni 'jug bya ste //
T02TD1784E:234a-15: dbang bskur mthar thug rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD1784E:234a-16: rigs bdag pos ni gnang ba thob //
T02TD1784E:234a-17: gzhan yang slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:234a-18: de ltar bden pas gsol gdab bya //
T02TD1784E:234a-19: chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa //
T02TD1784E:234a-20: dang zhing dag pa dri ma med //
T02TD1784E:234a-21: gzung ba med cing brjod du mad //
T02TD1784E:234a-22: rgyu dang las las yang dag byung //
T02TD1784E:234a-23: de bzhin de nyid las byung ba //
T02TD1784E:234a-24: de rnams bden pas dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1784E:234a-25: dri med pa yi slob ma kun //
T02TD1784E:234a-26: gzugs brnyan ltar snang mthong bar shog / nam mkha' bskyed pa'i mtshan ma can //
T02TD1784E:234a-27: thog mtha' med pa'i gtso bo ste //
T02TD1784E:234a-28: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD1784E:234a-29: rdor sems de dang bdag grub shog / thams cad mchog ni dngos grub che //
T02TD1784E:234a-30: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1784E:234a-31: rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal po ni //
T02TD1784E:234a-32: mi 'gyur dam pa bdag grub shog / khyod ni 'jig pa skyon med pa //
T02TD1784E:234a-33: chags pa kun gyis rjes chags te //
T02TD1784E:234a-34: bcom ldan chags chen dga' ba che //
T02TD1784E:234a-35: yang dag tu ni bdag grub shog / shin tu dag pa chos mchog ni //
T02TD1784E:234a-36: thog ma nas dag de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1784E:234a-37: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1784E:234a-38: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub shog / thams cad mchog ni dngos grub che //
T02TD1784E:234a-39: phyag rgya mchog gis dbang bskur che //
T02TD1784E:234a-40: rdo rje sgeg gdab rdo rje che //
T02TD1784E:234a-41: 'gying ba rdo rje bdag grub shog / sems can kun la yid khyab pa //
T02TD1784E:234a-42: sems can kun gyi yab gyur cing //
T02TD1784E:234b-0: dam tshig mchog ldan 'dod pa mchog / bden pa @234b gang gis dam tshig che //
T02TD1784E:234b-1: thabs dang shes rab bdag dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1784E:234b-2: bdag po 'dis ni mgon po bdag /'dod pa khyod kyis rdzogs par mdzod //
T02TD1784E:234b-3: de ltar dam tshig gi glu yis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:234b-4: de nas slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:234b-5: ji ltar bshad pa'i tsho gas slob ma mngon par 'dus byas la /
T02TD1784E:234b-6: sdom pa blangs pa de'i snying gar snyoms par zhugs pas bde ba chen po bsams te /
T02TD1784E:234b-7: de'i sbyor ba'i bskyod pa las byung ba 'od zer gyi phreng ba can lus kun snang bar byed pa'i yi ge aa bsams te /
T02TD1784E:234b-8: gos dmar po thogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:234b-9: ras dmar pos mig g-yogs pa /
T02TD1784E:234b-10: aa kham b'i ra h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis thal mos me tog phreng ba blangs pa mgo ru bzhag cing gsol ba gdab pa la 'jug go //
T02TD1784E:234b-11: bde ba la dga' ba khyod gang yin zhes dris pa dang /
T02TD1784E:234b-12: kye ba de nga chen po nga ni skal pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes zhu ba brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:234b-13: de nas yi ge lnga pas zhugs shing 'di ltar smra par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:234b-14: khyod ni de ring de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad la zhugs pas de bas na bdag gis khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:234b-15: ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thob na /
T02TD1784E:234b-16: dngos grub gzhan dag smos ci dgos /
T02TD1784E:234b-17: dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du khyod kyis kyang smra bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1784E:234b-18: dka' ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas dmyal bar lhung nga re /
T02TD1784E:234b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD1784E:234b-20: snying la yang dag gnas pa ste //
T02TD1784E:234b-21: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD1784E:234b-22: de ma thag tu gas nas 'byung //
T02TD1784E:234b-24: ga pur dang ni tsandan bcas //
T02TD1784E:234b-25: rdo rje yang ni mngon bzlas te //
T02TD1784E:234b-26: dung phor las ni bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD1784E:234b-27: de nas de ni 'thung du gzhug / gsum dang yi ge lnga sngags kyis //
T02TD1784E:234b-28: blo brtan slong mi byas nas ni //
T02TD1784E:234b-29: 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin te //
T02TD1784E:234b-30: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD1784E:234b-31: dam tshig bsrung pas dngos grub ster //
T02TD1784E:234b-32: bdud rtsi lnga chu btung bar gyis //
T02TD1784E:234b-34: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi lag na rdo rje bdag yin pas /
T02TD1784E:235a-0: bdag gis 'di gyis shig ces ji @235a ltar smra pa de khyod kyis bya'o //
T02TD1784E:235a-1: khyod kyis kyang bdag la smod par mi bya ste /
T02TD1784E:235a-2: gzhan du na dka' ba ma spangs par dus byas la dmyal par lhung par gyur ta te /
T02TD1784E:235a-3: de nas slob ma la bsnyen par byas te /
T02TD1784E:235a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs shig pa dang /
T02TD1784E:235a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par mdzod cig / ces smra ba 'jug go //
T02TD1784E:235a-6: di nas le'u bco lnga las gsungs pa'i cho gas dbab la /
T02TD1784E:235a-7: dbab pa de yang tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD1784E:235a-8: sha shva to me bha ba /
T02TD1784E:235a-9: hri da yam me aa dhi tishsha sarba sidhhim me pra ya tstsha /
T02TD1784E:235a-11: zhes brjod pas brtan par byas te /
T02TD1784E:235a-12: yi ge lnga pas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor la gtor du 'jud cing de nyid kyis kyang blangs te de nyid kyis spyi bor bcings la /
T02TD1784E:235a-13: snying ga'i zla bar bdag po dang /
T02TD1784E:235a-15: dpral bar ram bsams te yi ge lnga pas mig phye zhing man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor ston cing /
T02TD1784E:235a-16: kye rdo rje ltos shig ces smra bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:235a-17: mi mnyam med pas gru bzhi pa //
T02TD1784E:235a-18: dran pa'i dang po sgo bzhi yin //
T02TD1784E:235a-19: bsam gtan bzhi po rta babs ldan //
T02TD1784E:235a-20: kha khyer ting nge 'dzin du bshad //
T02TD1784E:235a-21: kha khyer la gnas rdo rje mchog / gzugs ni lha mo dang ldan pa//
T02TD1784E:235a-22: rgyan ni sna tshogs thams cad ldan //
T02TD1784E:235a-23: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa //
T02TD1784E:235a-24: kun gyi rtse mo ba dan dang //
T02TD1784E:235a-25: dril bu sgra sgrogs gdul bya ston //
T02TD1784E:235a-26: ye shes me long me tog dang //
T02TD1784E:235a-27: byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02TD1784E:235a-28: dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog / zla ba nyi mas kun du bskor //
T02TD1784E:235a-29: kun gyi dngos grub mi 'gyur pa de //
T02TD1784E:235a-30: bde ba chen po zhes bstan to //
T02TD1784E:235a-31: de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1784E:235a-32: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dang mtshungs pa //
T02TD1784E:235a-33: de ni rnams par thar pa brgyad //
T02TD1784E:235a-34: dngos grub thams cad bde ster ba //
T02TD1784E:235a-35: rdo rje tshig gis yongs su bskor ba //
T02TD1784E:235a-36: thams cad du ni yongs su rdzogs //
