T02TD1784E:235a-37: de la zhugs pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1784E:235a-38: zil gyis mi gnon phyir mi ldog / bde ba chen po rab grub phyir //
T02TD1784E:235a-40: de nas rdo rje slob dpon la //
T02TD1784E:235a-41: yon ni shin tu mchog pu la nas //
T02TD1784E:235b-0: dbang bskur @235b don du gsol gdab bya //
T02TD1784E:235b-1: 'gro ba skyob phyir rdor can gyis //
T02TD1784E:235b-2: sangs rgyas rnams la dbang bskur ni //
T02TD1784E:235b-3: yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar gsol //
T02TD1784E:235b-4: de bzhin deng bdag la stsol mdzod //
T02TD1784E:235b-5: zhugs pa'i sgo yi mngon phyogs su //
T02TD1784E:235b-7: rang bdag sbyor ldan slob ma ni //
T02TD1784E:235b-8: sna tshogs gdan khri la bzhag nas //
T02TD1784E:235b-9: lus la dkyil 'khor bkod nas ni //
T02TD1784E:235b-10: cho ga 'dis ni dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1784E:235b-11: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang //
T02TD1784E:235b-12: bum pa rol mo gos bzangs dang //
T02TD1784E:235b-13: lha yi rgyan ni thogs pa ste //
T02TD1784E:235b-14: snga ma'i thugs rje'i shugs kyis ni //
T02TD1784E:235b-15: chags pa dgug cing kun byung ba /
T02TD1784E:235b-16: dbang gi dus su slob dpon gyis //
T02TD1784E:235b-17: mkha' dbyings sems can thams cad kyis //
T02TD1784E:235b-18: yongs su gang bar bsgom par bya //
T02TD1784E:235b-19: bum pa'i chu la thim byas nas //
T02TD1784E:235b-20: bdag po bdud rtsi ldar bzhugs pa //
T02TD1784E:235b-21: mgrin par gos bzangs bcings pa na //
T02TD1784E:235b-22: spyan la sogs pas de gzung zhing //
T02TD1784E:235b-23: bum pas ba spu'i bu gnas //
T02TD1784E:235b-24: sangs rgyas thams cad zhugs par bya //
T02TD1784E:235b-25: tshigs bcad sngags 'di brjod bzhin pas //
T02TD1784E:235b-26: slob pa'i lus la dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1784E:235b-27: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje chos //
T02TD1784E:235b-28: khams gsum bas ni phyag byas pa //
T02TD1784E:235b-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum ;
T02TD1784E:235b-30: / gnas las byung ba bdag gis sbyin //
T02TD1784E:235b-32: dad pa'i blos ni ji bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:235b-33: cod pan gyis kyang dbang bskur bya //
T02TD1784E:235b-34: sbyor ba yis ni brtan byas te //
T02TD1784E:235b-35: rim pas ji ltar phyag mtshan bzhin //
T02TD1784E:235b-37: sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang gis ni //
T02TD1784E:235b-38: de ring khyod ni dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1784E:235b-39: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1784E:235b-40: dngos grub phyir ni rdo rje long //
T02TD1784E:235b-41: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stv'am /
T02TD1784E:235b-42: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1784E:235b-43: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD1784E:235b-44: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1784E:235b-45: rdo rje 'gying ba bdag po'i bdag /
T02TD1784E:235b-47: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1784E:235b-48: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02TD1784E:235b-49: rgyal pas byang chub mchog 'dod pa //
T02TD1784E:235b-50: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD1784E:235b-52: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa //
T02TD1784E:235b-53: ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02TD1784E:236a-1: bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02TD1784E:236a-2: srid pa dam par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:236a-4: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02TD1784E:236a-5: sdug bsngal chen po tshogs yin te //
T02TD1784E:236a-6: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02TD1784E:236a-7: dam tshig 'di nang de skyid pa'o //
T02TD1784E:236a-8: 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod ni //
T02TD1784E:236a-9: ci bde bas ni bsten par bya //
T02TD1784E:236a-10: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:236a-11: rang dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02TD1784E:236a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mchog / ji srid 'khor ba la gnas pa //
T02TD1784E:236a-13: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02TD1784E:236a-14: byed du nus te 'tshang me rgya //
T02TD1784E:236a-15: shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang //
T02TD1784E:236a-16: bsod nams byin rlabs las byung ba //
T02TD1784E:236a-17: dngos grub kun ni dbang phyug 'grub //
T02TD1784E:236a-18: sems can don ni brtan par byed //
T02TD1784E:236a-19: sngags kyi sku ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:236a-20: sku kun rab tu brtan pa ni //
T02TD1784E:236a-21: des na phyag rgya rab tu grags //
T02TD1784E:236a-22: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig go //
T02TD1784E:236a-23: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje blang ;
T02TD1784E:236a-24: / chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD1784E:236a-25: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya che //
T02TD1784E:236a-26: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02TD1784E:236a-27: zhes bya ba gang gsungs pa de so sor bstan to //
T02TD1784E:236a-28: aom badzra aa dh'i pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a m'a bhi she ka ta /
T02TD1784E:236a-29: kye dpal rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba dpal gyi sgra brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:236a-31: sku gsum sa la sogs pa dang //
T02TD1784E:236a-32: stobs dang pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02TD1784E:236a-33: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1784E:236a-34: lag na rdo rje phyag na gnas //
T02TD1784E:236a-35: lag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1784E:236a-36: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD1784E:236a-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra y'a mi hi hi hi hi h'um zhes bya bas ni rdo rje brtul zhugs so //
T02TD1784E:236a-39: sdig med slob ma dam pa ni //
T02TD1784E:236a-40: me tog sogs kyis mchod par bya //
T02TD1784E:236a-42: de nas de la dbang bskur byin //
T02TD1784E:236a-43: m'a ma k'i sogs dang sbyar nas //
T02TD1784E:236a-44: bdag ni skal ldan zhes brjod nas //
T02TD1784E:236a-45: rdo rje padma dag bsdus te //
T02TD1784E:236a-46: de bde la ni snyoms zhugs na //
T02TD1784E:236a-47: rdo rje padma las dgug cing //
T02TD1784E:236a-48: slob ma'i mkhar ni mkhas pas bcug / kye ma bde ba zhes brjod pas //
T02TD1784E:236a-49: sems byung ba ni myang bar bya //
T02TD1784E:236a-50: mi mkhas pa yi slob ma la //
T02TD1784E:236a-51: de nyid 'di ni bstan par bya //
T02TD1784E:236b-0: dbang bskur ba tsam @236b 'di nyid kyis //
T02TD1784E:236b-3: bde bas slob dpon nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:236b-5: shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i dang por dam tshig rnams sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:236b-6: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang //
T02TD1784E:236b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang /
T02TD1784E:236b-8: kha na ma tho ba sbam po bcu ste /
T02TD1784E:236b-9: de rnams slob ma nyan du gzhug ba dang /
T02TD1784E:236b-11: gdol pa dang khrus mkhan dang gar mkhan ma rnams las gang yang rung pa'i phyag rgya ma rigs lngas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1784E:236b-12: rdo rje slob dpon gyis mtshan phyed la slob ma de la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:236b-13: de'i tshe phyag rgya mas slob ma la 'di skad smra ba ste /
T02TD1784E:236b-14: bshang gci dang ni khrag dang ni //
T02TD1784E:236b-15: shu kra de bzhin sha nyid dang //
T02TD1784E:236b-16: bha ga'i padmar tsum ba na //
T02TD1784E:236b-17: bud med rnams la dad pa'i mchog / khyod kyis rdor can ci nus sam //
T02TD1784E:236b-18: bde chen bu ni smra bar gyis /
T02TD1784E:236b-19: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02TD1784E:236b-20: bzhad cing 'di ltar bka' stsal te //
T02TD1784E:236b-21: shu kra khrag la sogs za ba //
T02TD1784E:236b-22: lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus //
T02TD1784E:236b-23: bha ga'i tsum ba na dang ni //
T02TD1784E:236b-24: rtag tu bud med la dad bya //
T02TD1784E:236b-26: na bza' phud cing nyid kyi padma yang dag par bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:236b-28: bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa //
T02TD1784E:236b-29: cho ga gang gis sten byed na //
T02TD1784E:236b-30: de yi mdun du bdag gnas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:236b-31: sems can khams ni rab grol ba //
T02TD1784E:236b-32: chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa 'di //
T02TD1784E:236b-33: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD1784E:236b-34: 'di la bde chen rgyal po gnas //
T02TD1784E:236b-35: de na de'i nang du gnas pa'i //
T02TD1784E:236b-36: rtsa yi 'khor lo bstan pa yin //
T02TD1784E:236b-37: bha ga'i dbus su nam mkha' gang //
T02TD1784E:236b-38: nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1784E:236b-39: ze ba ge sar dang ldan pa //
T02TD1784E:236b-40: 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1784E:236b-41: shu kra'i rang bzhin bdud rtsi ni //
T02TD1784E:236b-42: de la gnas pa rtag tu 'dzag /
T02TD1784E:236b-43: de nas slob ma bka' stsal te //
T02TD1784E:236b-44: bhanydza mo ksha ho zhes bya'o //
T02TD1784E:236b-46: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1784E:236b-47: bha ga'i dbus su rtsa gang gnas //
T02TD1784E:236b-48: sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa gzhan rnams //
T02TD1784E:236b-49: de yi nang na de gtso bo //
T02TD1784E:236b-50: goms dang bla ma'i zhal nas ni //
T02TD1784E:237a-2: cung zad sor mos bskul ba dang //
T02TD1784E:237a-3: slar yang lce yi rtse mos bskul //
T02TD1784E:237a-4: dkar mchog rab tu rgyu ba ni //
T02TD1784E:237a-5: de nas rtsa de kha phyed gyur //
T02TD1784E:237a-6: pha rol phyin pa bcu stobs nas //
T02TD1784E:237a-7: de bzhin stobs dang dbang nyid bcu //
T02TD1784E:237a-8: sa ni bcu la 'das nas ni //
T02TD1784E:237a-9: de nas rdo rje rengs par gyur //
T02TD1784E:237a-10: de nyid kyi phyir le'u bco brgyad pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:237a-11: bsgrub bya sgrub byed sbyor ba ni //
T02TD1784E:237a-12: gang phyir bsnyen pa bshad pa dang //
T02TD1784E:237a-13: rdo rje padma sbyor bas ni //
T02TD1784E:237a-14: nye bar bsgrub par 'dod pa yin //
T02TD1784E:237a-15: h'um dang phat gnyis ldan pa ni //
T02TD1784E:237a-16: bskyod pa sgrub par rab bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:237a-17: rang ngo rang bde bzhi pa ni //
T02TD1784E:237a-18: sgrub pa chen por bshad pa yin //
T02TD1784E:237a-19: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang chen gyi go 'phang //
T02TD1784E:237a-20: sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs 'byung ba //
T02TD1784E:237a-21: de ni chos rnams chos nyid do //
T02TD1784E:237a-24: de nas lha mo des rengs pa rdo rje'i steng du bzhugs la bsgrub pa bya'o //
T02TD1784E:237a-25: slob mas kyang aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta a'a nu ra ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:237a-26: de nas slob dpon gyis kyang rdo rje dpang phyug ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i slob ma gzigs te rang gi thugs ka nas mo ha ra ti la sogs pa lha mo bzhi po slob ma'i snying gar zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:237a-27: mkha' dbyings rdo rje spyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:237a-28: yang dag rig pas rmad byung che //
T02TD1784E:237a-29: mchog tu dga' ba skyed byed pa'i //
T02TD1784E:237a-30: gang zhig bde ba de skye 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:237a-31: bral dang dga' ba'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1784E:237a-32: mtshon cha bltas nas brtan par gyis //
T02TD1784E:237a-34: rdo rje nor bu'i lte ba dag / btsir bas rdo rje skyil krung gis //
T02TD1784E:237a-35: nor bu'i nang 'gro'i sems blta bya //
T02TD1784E:237a-36: gang zhig ye shes skye 'gyur te //
T02TD1784E:237a-37: ye shes de ngo smra mi nus //
T02TD1784E:237a-38: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
T02TD1784E:237a-39: bar pa yang ni mi dmigs so //
T02TD1784E:237a-40: gang tsho ye shes lta ba yis //
T02TD1784E:237a-41: rnal 'byor pa yis skad cig gam //
T02TD1784E:237a-42: yang na thun gcig gam bdun nam //
T02TD1784E:237a-43: zla phyed zla gcig lo gcig gam //
T02TD1784E:237a-44: bskal pa bskal pa stong gi phrag / ye shes sbyor bas gnas 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:237b-0: de nas ci nus pas slob ma phyung zhing rig ma'i padmar gnas @237b pa'i byang chub kyi sems /
T02TD1784E:237b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid kyi blos lce bskul bas btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:237b-2: de'i dus su yang lha mo de la bhanydza mo ksha ho zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bka' stsal pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:237b-3: shes rab dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
T02TD1784E:237b-4: de nas don dam pa'i yum dang chos kyi sku skyed par byed pa'i rig ma'i brtul zhugs kyi ngo bo tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bskul zhing /
T02TD1784E:237b-5: slob ma'i lag tu de gtad nas //
T02TD1784E:237b-6: bla ma rdo rje can gyis smra //
T02TD1784E:237b-7: thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya //
T02TD1784E:237b-8: de phyir rig ma'i phyogs zung shig / chos kun gnyis su med pa ste ;
T02TD1784E:237b-9: / tshul ni gnyis kyis brtan pa yin //
T02TD1784E:237b-11: khyod kyis bral bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1784E:237b-12: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1784E:237b-13: rig ma'i brtul zhugs bla med pa //
T02TD1784E:237b-14: rmongs pa gang ges 'da' byed pa //
T02TD1784E:237b-15: mchog gi dngos grub des mi 'thob //
T02TD1784E:237b-16: ces bya ba sa phyag rgya ma des slob ma de la gtan du sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:237b-18: snying dang spyi por sangs rgyas dgod //
T02TD1784E:237b-19: h'um yig mchog gi tshul brjod rnams //
T02TD1784E:237b-20: sangs rgyas kun gyis de bsten pa'i //
T02TD1784E:237b-21: dam tshig de ni nyan 'jug bya //
T02TD1784E:237b-22: thabs dang shes rab bsam pa yis //
T02TD1784E:237b-23: cung zad mi byar med pa ste //
T02TD1784E:237b-24: rtag tu rtog pa med 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1784E:237b-25: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyod cig / ji bzhin rang bzhin nyid kyis ni //
T02TD1784E:237b-27: 'dod chags la sogs rnam dag pas //
T02TD1784E:237b-28: de bzhin sems can gyi don bya //
T02TD1784E:237b-29: chags pa mnyam pa med pa ste //
T02TD1784E:237b-30: rgyal ba rnams la de dbul bya //
T02TD1784E:237b-31: sems can don phyir gzhan bud med //
T02TD1784E:237b-32: bsten na bsod nams thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:237b-33: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:237b-34: sangs rgyas sku yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:237b-35: gzhan gyi nor rnams 'phrog byed na //
T02TD1784E:237b-36: sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:237b-37: gang zhig dam tshig la sdang dang //
T02TD1784E:237b-38: gang zhig skye bo dam tshig nyams //
T02TD1784E:237b-39: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyu yis ni //
T02TD1784E:237b-40: rtsol bas de rnams gsad par bya //
T02TD1784E:237b-41: gdon mi ja yi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1784E:237b-42: brdzun dag rdo rje tshig rnams ni //
T02TD1784E:237b-43: rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1784E:238a-1: pas dam tshig mchog bsten bya //
T02TD1784E:238a-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gyur cing gzengs bstod kyis g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis chos gos kyi dbus nas gzung ba dang /
T02TD1784E:238a-3: g-yas pas kyang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya byas la lung bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:238a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs ;
T02TD1784E:238a-5: / bdag gis khyod la lung bstan bya //
T02TD1784E:238a-6: srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton zhing //
T02TD1784E:238a-7: yang dag srid pa sgrub phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:238a-8: kye yi rdo rje che ge mo //
T02TD1784E:238a-9: zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par gang la gzengs bstod pa 'di yis lung bstan par byas pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad chub la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slob dpon nyid du lung bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:238a-11: de nas dbugs dbyung bar byas la /
T02TD1784E:238a-12: sngags dang bsam gtan byin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238a-13: de la sngags ni yi ge gsum gyis spel ba'i dzin dzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:238a-14: sv'a h'a'i mtha' can gyi bzlas pa'i sngags rnams so //
T02TD1784E:238a-15: de'i mos pa'i dbye bas snga ma bzhin lha'i dkyil 'khor bsam gtan no //
T02TD1784E:238a-16: de nas slob ma mchod pa rnam pa lngas dkyil 'khor mchod du bcug la rang gis kyang mchod cing gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pas rgyal po bzhi'i gtor ma dang /
T02TD1784E:238a-17: 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma dang /
T02TD1784E:238a-19: de nas zhi ba'i don du snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg kyang bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238a-20: de nas slob ma gdugs dang bcas pa mthe po g-yas pa la gzung zhing dkyil 'khor la bskor ba gsum byed du bcug cing gdugs dang bcas pa de nyid dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo la dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD1784E:238a-21: slob ma 'di ni dad pa yis //
T02TD1784E:238a-22: dam tshig dkyil 'khor la phul te //
T02TD1784E:238a-23: mgon po de ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD1784E:238a-24: rjes su brtse bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1784E:238a-26: de nas yi ge mu'i mtha' can gyi yi ge brgya pas gshegs su gsol zhing dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon bsdus te gtsang po la gtor ro //
T02TD1784E:238a-27: phur bu rnams kyang bton te'o mas bkrus shing spos kyis gdugs la /
T02TD1784E:238a-28: me tog spyin zhing gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238a-29: dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi yang ba chus byugs la /
T02TD1784E:238a-30: me tog gis dgram par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238b-0: 'phags pa brgyad stong pa kla gcing [*klag cing?] bsod nams @238b bsngo ba dang /
T02TD1784E:238b-3: bskor ba byas nas bzod par gsol zhing langs te rang gi gnas su phyin nas mnyam par gzhag par bya zhing yid la byed pa de nyid kyis spyod lam bzhi pos ci 'dod pas gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238b-4: des ni cho ga'i sgras ni bstan pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:238b-5: dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:238b-6: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:238b-7: dkyil 'khor de la phyag rgya ni 'khor lo la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:238b-8: rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /
T02TD1784E:238b-10: de rnams bsam pa ji bzhin bya ba ni bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238b-11: sngags ni sgrub pa po rnams kyis gsang ba mchog de ni bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T02TD1784E:238b-12: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas //
T02TD1784E:238b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su de'i sa bon nam /
T02TD1784E:238b-15: phyag mtshan nam sku bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238b-16: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang //
T02TD1784E:238b-17: zhes pa ni shar la sogs pa phyogs bzhi la de rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238b-18: sku gsung thugs rdo rje mchog ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:238b-19: de rnams grva rnams su bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238b-20: khro bo rnams ni sgo rnams dang de'i grva rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:238b-22: rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:238b-23: sngags zhes pa ni rnal 'byor bas de nas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238b-25: gsang ba dang rdo rje ni gsang ba rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:238b-27: de dag gis rab bsgoms pa ni khrus mkhan ma dang snyoms par zhugs par bya'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:238b-28: sngags rnams thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi dam tshig ni mchod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:238b-29: 'da' dka' ba ni spang bar mi bya'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:238b-30: bshang dang gci bzhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:238b-31: dkyil 'khor de nyid du ba shang gci la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi rnams rnal 'byor ba nyid kyis spyod pa dang /
T02TD1784E:238b-32: slob ma rnams la yang sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:238b-33: sngags rnams thams cad ni snga ma bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can gyi dam tshig 'di yin te bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:238b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1784E:238b-35: de'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T02TD1784E:239a-2: gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig ni padma'i rigs can rnams te /
T02TD1784E:239a-3: de dag gi sprin ni tshogs te /
T02TD1784E:239a-4: de nyid bkod pa ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag pa ste /
T02TD1784E:239a-5: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:239a-6: gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:239a-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:239a-8: khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya //
T02TD1784E:239a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:239a-10: khru nyi shu'i tshad ni phyogs re re khru lnga lnga yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:239a-11: 'dir yang sgra rlung lnga'i bdag nyid yin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:239a-12: de nyid gsang ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams la zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhes rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:239a-13: de bzhin du snga ma bzhin du gru bzhi pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa de nyid rdo rje sgom pa ni brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa po rnams kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:239a-14: nyid kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD1784E:239a-15: de'i gnas ni de dang dbyer med par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:239a-16: sku'i rdo rje ni snyid ga'i padma ste /
T02TD1784E:239a-17: de'i yon tan ni phreng ba yin la /
T02TD1784E:239a-18: de skyed pa ni de 'dzin pa ste padma'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:239a-19: rgyal po chen po rdo rje chos //
T02TD1784E:239a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:239a-21: dkyil 'khor de nyid du rdo rje chos ni snang ba mtha' yas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:239a-22: rgyal po chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:239a-23: rig pa ni lha mo rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:239a-24: dbang po ni khor bo dang /
T02TD1784E:239a-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T02TD1784E:239a-26: de dag dbab par bya ba ni bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:239a-27: de'i dbus su 'khor lo chen po ni 'khor lo'i tshul gyis zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:239a-28: kun du zlum po ni sna tshogs padma rnams kyang bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:239a-29: phyag rgya thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag mtshan phyag rgya la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:239a-31: cho ga bzhin du zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las 'byung ba'i rim pas so //
T02TD1784E:239a-32: tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che //
T02TD1784E:239a-33: zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi dbus su snang ba mtha' yas kyi phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgya las gang yang rung ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:239a-34: snang ba mtha' yas de nyid kyi gang zhig rdo rje'i gnas ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:239b-0: de rnams thams @239b cad snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:239b-1: yongs su gsal ba dang cho ga bzhin du rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD1784E:239b-2: de'i dbus su gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ba ni shin tu bslabs pa dang 'dus byas pa'i gar mkhan gyi bu mo dang snyoms par zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:239b-3: de ltar byas na rdo rje can ni gsung rdo rje'i rigs can rnams mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:239b-4: de bzhin du bshang ba la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lngas mchod par byas na /
T02TD1784E:239b-5: dngos grub ni gsung rdo rje 'dzin gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:239b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad ni gsung rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:239b-7: de dag gi dam tshig mchod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:239b-8: 'da' dka' ba ni spang bar mi bya'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:239b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni gsung gi snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02TD1784E:239b-10: de'i dkyil 'khor yin no zhes nye bar bsdu ba ste /
T02TD1784E:239b-11: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:239b-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:239b-13: kun nas spri na ni rin chen dpal la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:239b-14: de rnams kyi tshogs ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:239b-15: de rnams bkod pa ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:239b-16: de nyid rdo rje 'dzin gang la yod pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:239b-17: rab tu gsang ba ni bya ba'i tshul la gnas pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:239b-18: gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bor gyur pa sa de'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:239b-19: dkyil 'khor ni rin chen dpal la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dag ste /
T02TD1784E:239b-20: de nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:239b-21: rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa ;
T02TD1784E:239b-22: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:239b-23: re zhig thugs dang gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor gsum bstan pa yin la /
T02TD1784E:239b-24: de'i nang na rdo rje 'dzin mchog ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang don yod grub pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa la sogs pa byed na /
T02TD1784E:239b-25: de'i tshe de nyid kyi gzugs sam phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgyal sogs pa bri ba'o //
T02TD1784E:239b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor de shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:239b-28: sku gsung thugs ni rigs gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:239b-29: de rnams kyi gsang ba bsdu ba ste /
T02TD1784E:239b-30: de las byung ba ni rin chen la sogs pa'i rigs rdzogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:240a-2: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rigs gsum gyi sku gsung thugs rnams yin la /
T02TD1784E:240a-3: gsang ba ni bsdu pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:240a-4: nyid kyi sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi gang zhig gnas ni dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD1784E:240a-5: de nyid kyi ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag ste /
T02TD1784E:240a-6: de'i gsang ba ni de'i bdag po nyid da /
T02TD1784E:240a-7: de'i dngos grub ster ba'o zhes pa bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:240a-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:240a-9: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD1784E:240a-10: de rnams 'byung ba ni gang las skyes pa de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:240a-11: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni sngar bshad pa'i sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams te /
T02TD1784E:240a-12: de dag gi gsang ba ni sa bon rnams nyid kyi sku las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:240a-13: rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD1784E:240a-14: de'i sngags ni gsang bar smra ba dang /
T02TD1784E:240a-15: snying po ni de dag nyid bskyed pa'i sa bon dang /
T02TD1784E:240a-16: mdor na thig skud byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:240a-17: yi ge'i tshig ni dkyil 'khor bskyed pa bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:240a-18: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba ni yi ge rnams kyis rdo rje thig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig skud dang /
T02TD1784E:240a-19: tshon rtsi ni tshon rnams pa lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:240a-20: de dag byin gyis brlabs pa la gang ba par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:240a-21: sngags kyi sems dpa' ni sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor pas gal te de ltar byed na /
T02TD1784E:240a-22: de'i tshe byang chub rnyed par mi dka' ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnyed par sla ba'i zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:240a-23: de'i phyir dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD1784E:240a-24: de nyid kyi tshul ni thig gdab pa la sogs pa'i las gang gis shes pa des bdag nyid sngags kyi lha ni rang gi yi dam gyi lha bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1784E:240a-25: sgrub pa po la yang rnam snang la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:240a-26: dkyil 'khor rnam par brtag pa ni bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:240a-27: de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:240a-28: rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad dang //
T02TD1784E:240a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:240a-30: rang gi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:240b-0: khrus mkhan mo yang lha mo spyan gyi rang bzhin du bsgom par bya ba gang yin pa de ni sku'i @240b dkyil 'khor bskyed pa yin la /
T02TD1784E:240b-1: gnas ni gnas par gyur pa'i bsam gtan no //
T02TD1784E:240b-2: gang gi phyir sku rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo spyan gyi bdag nyid de /
T02TD1784E:240b-3: de'i yon tan ni de nyid kyi sa bon byin gyis brlabs ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:240b-4: de rnams thob par byed pas na de bzhin du shes par bya'o /
T02TD1784E:240b-5: gsung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod na /
T02TD1784E:240b-6: de'i rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje chos ni snang ba mtha' yas bsams la /
T02TD1784E:240b-7: rang gi chos ma ni gar mkhan gyi bu mo gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:240b-8: thig skud 'dzin pa de nyid kyis bya'o //
T02TD1784E:240b-9: sngags rnams thams cad ni padma'i rigs can te /
T02TD1784E:240b-10: de dag gi gsang ba ni gsang ba'i sgom pa ste /
T02TD1784E:240b-11: de nyid rab tu rtag pa ni mi 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'o /
T02TD1784E:240b-12: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod na /
T02TD1784E:240b-13: de'i tshe rdo rje sems dpa' ni rigs bdag nyid mi bskyod par bsam la /
T02TD1784E:240b-14: gdol pa'i bu mo m'a ma k'i'i rang bzhin du bsams te de nyid kyis thig skud 'dzin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:240b-15: sngags rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:240b-16: de ltar byas nas yid la dbang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:240b-17: de dag nyid gshegs nas dkyil 'khor bri ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:240b-19: rab tu dgyes par gyur pa ni sgrub pa po la dgyes par gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:240b-20: phul du byung ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:240b-21: sngags kyi sems dpas bya ba ni //
T02TD1784E:240b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i rjes la rang gi snying ga las gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po spros te /
T02TD1784E:240b-23: khro bo'i rgyal po de nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad ni nam mkha' la bzhugs pa rnams dgug cing dkyil 'khor la zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:240b-24: de rnams kyis bzhugs la tsandan la sogs pas thig le'i ngo bor byas la de rnams mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:240b-25: de la dus gsum ni dus mtshams gsum la thig gdab pa dang dam tshig mchod pa ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD1784E:240b-27: rdo rje gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:240b-28: de dag gi dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor la'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:240b-30: rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor ba ni sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi sgrub pa pos so //
T02TD1784E:240b-31: de ltar byas na sngags thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:241a-0: de dag dkyil 'khor de la rab tu zhugs pa ni byin gyis brlabs par @241a * //
T02TD1784E:241a-2: sngags rnams thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:241a-3: mchod pa'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo tshim par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:241a-4: gtor ma ni lha bshos dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:241a-6: bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bshang gci la sogs pa ni bdud rtsi lngas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:241a-7: de la shu kra ni tho rangs kyi skar ma bzhin du kha dog dkar po'i lha bshos dang /
T02TD1784E:241a-8: me tog la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:241a-9: sngags rnams kun ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams la kha dog nag po la sogs pa'i lha bshos la sogs pa dbul ba yin no zhes 'dir bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:241a-10: tshim par gyur pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams tshim pa kun du bshad pa ni bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:241a-11: ma li ka dang mal ti //
T02TD1784E:241a-12: kunda sangs rgyas la dbul bya //
T02TD1784E:241a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:241a-14: 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te //
T02TD1784E:241a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:241a-16: gtor ma'i cho ga'i dam tshig 'di ni mchod pa'i bya ba ste /
T02TD1784E:241a-17: mchog ni phul du byung ba dang /
T02TD1784E:241a-18: sangs rgyas byang chub ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /
T02TD1784E:241a-19: de yang rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:241a-20: thig gdab ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:241a-21: gal te shin tu bslab pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i gdol pa mo dang khrus mkhan dang gar mkhan gyi bu mo rnams mi rnyed na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:241a-22: bdag nyid ni rnal 'byor pa nyid kyis rang gi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1784E:241a-23: slob ma yang rdo rje sems dpa' 'am /
T02TD1784E:241a-24: bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsams la thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:241a-25: de bzhin du bdag nyid ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bsgom pa dang //
T02TD1784E:241a-26: slob ma yang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bor bsgom par bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:241a-27: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams la /
T02TD1784E:241a-28: las ni don yod grub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:241a-29: de'i go 'phang ni de'i rigs can gyi bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste slob ma der bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:241a-30: rang gi bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'i rigs dang mthun pa'i skus /
T02TD1784E:241b-0: des bstan pa ni @241b byin gyis brlab par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:241b-1: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:241b-2: rgyal chen ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:241b-3: de rnams rdo rje thig skud la dgod par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:241b-4: lha mo bzhis bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re thig skud re re la dgod par bya'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:241b-5: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1784E:241b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:241b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad ni bya ba'i rgyud la zhugs pa rnams la 'di gsang ba ni sbas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:241b-8: bgegs med par dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir rab tu rmad du byung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:241b-9: thig skud gcig bu rnams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye bas bsgoms pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:241b-10: 'on kyang tshon rtsi yang de bzhin du bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:241b-11: mdog gi dbye bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:241b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsang ba ni tshon rtsi la de rnams dgod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:241b-13: de nyid byang chub bsgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor la byin gyis brlabs par bya'o zhes dgongs pa ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:241b-14: yang na dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus la ni 'jug pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:241b-15: de nyid kyi go 'phang ni gnas su gyur pa'i yi ge gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:241b-16: de nyid sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas /
T02TD1784E:241b-17: des bstan pa ni de'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:241b-18: sangs rgyas lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rgyal mtshan ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:241b-19: de rdo rje'i thig skud ni dkyil 'khor bzhin la /
T02TD1784E:241b-20: dgod pa ni brtag par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:241b-21: sangs rgyas thams cad ni rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:241b-22: de dag gi gsang ba ni sbas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:241b-23: rab tu rmad du byung ba ni nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i grangs kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:241b-25: rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga ni dkyil 'khor re re la nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye bas dgu brgyar brtags pas so //
T02TD1784E:241b-26: sngags thams cad de yi ge gsum gyi gsang ba ni de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1784E:241b-27: byang chub ni byang chub bsgrub par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:241b-28: nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dbye bas bzlas na rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:241b-29: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:241b-30: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:241b-31: nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ni //
T02TD1784E:241b-32: gos dkar la sogs slar bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:242a-1: rnams thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:242a-2: sngags rnams thams cad ni dkyil 'khor rnams te /
T02TD1784E:242a-3: de dag bri ba'i dus su rdo rje h'um mdzad ni gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po ste /
T02TD1784E:242a-4: de nyid bskul nas sku gsung thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:242a-5: de dag gnas lnga ni thig skud dang tshon rtsi rnams la bsgom pa ni thim par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:242a-6: de ltar byas nas rdo rje mi phyed gsum ni sangs rgyas de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:242a-7: gang las she na rdo rje sems dpa' ni des mtshon pa'i dkyil 'khor dang blo ldan pa la ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02TD1784E:242a-8: sangs rgyas ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:242a-9: 'jigs shing skrag pa ni thugs rje 'khrugs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:242a-11: rdo rje bum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:242a-12: thig gdab pa dang dkyil 'khor bris ma thag tu dkyil 'khor pa'i grangs kyis bum pa rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:242a-13: yang na bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bum pa bcu gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:242a-14: phyogs de la rdo rje can ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:242a-17: de rnams zhags pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa'i gnod mdzes kyi rgyal pos 'gugs shing lha'i sku'i ngo bos bum pa'i nang du dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:242a-18: de'i rjes la sngags ni sku la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:242a-19: rgyud ni so shing dang dbab pa dang bsrung ba la sogs pas /
T02TD1784E:242a-20: bdag po ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'i slob ma bya'o //
T02TD1784E:242a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' ni dkyil 'khor pa la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'i lha'i sku ste /
T02TD1784E:242a-22: de'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bya ba'o //
T02TD1784E:242a-24: brtan pa'i blo ni rdo rje slob dpon gyis so //
T02TD1784E:242a-25: sbyin sreg ni rmi lam mthong ba'i 'og tu zhag gnyis pa la snga ma bzhin du zhi ba'i don du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1784E:242a-26: bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos po thams cad 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas bdud rtsi lnga yang bsreg par bya'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:242a-27: de'i rjes la rdzas thams cad nye bar bsdus te /
T02TD1784E:242a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen po mo'i snying gar bsams la /
T02TD1784E:242b-0: dgang blugs phul na de'i tshe zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par @242b 'gyur ro ;
T02TD1784E:242b-1: /'di skad kyang gsungs so zhes pa ni sdud pa po'i tshig ste /
T02TD1784E:242b-2: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02TD1784E:242b-3: dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:242b-4: dbang po la sogs sbyor ba ni de las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems te /
T02TD1784E:242b-5: de nyid rtsa ba'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas shing bsreg par bya'o ;
T02TD1784E:242b-6: / sangs rgyas thams cad ni sngags pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni shin tu 'da' dka' ba ste sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:242b-7: yang na dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni de srog dang rtsol ba sbyor ba ste /
T02TD1784E:242b-8: de nyid kyis brgya rtsa brgyad ni brgyad brgyad dang bcas pa'i brgyad de dgu brgya'o //
T02TD1784E:242b-9: de nyid dkyil 'khor re re la sbyin sreg bya ba ni bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:242b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dam tshig ni bsgom pa'i rim pa ste /
T02TD1784E:242b-11: 'da' dka' ba ni rtag tu bya'o zhes ston te /
T02TD1784E:242b-12: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:242b-13: rnam par snang mdzad sbyor pa yis //
T02TD1784E:242b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:242b-15: sku'i dkyil 'khor la rang gi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:242b-16: slob ma yang rdo rje gsum las byung ba ni sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /
T02TD1784E:242b-17: yi ge a'a:las byung ba'i snang ba mtha' yas bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:242b-18: lus ngag sems ni de nyid sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs shing /
T02TD1784E:242b-19: rdo rje ni le'u bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i rdo rje dbab pa las /
T02TD1784E:242b-20: gzung bar bya ba ni slob ma de la de nyid bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:242b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' ni yi ge h'um dang /
T02TD1784E:242b-23: rnam par snang mdzad ni yi ge ha dang /
T02TD1784E:242b-24: grags chen ni yi ge a'a: ste /
T02TD1784E:242b-25: de rnams sku gsung thugs ni snying ga dang spyi bo dang lkog mar dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:242b-26: dam tshig ni dbab par byed pa'i yi ge dzheem /
T02TD1784E:242b-27: de gnyis ni rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og tu dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:242b-28: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:242b-29: de la zhes pa ni dbab pa de la /
T02TD1784E:242b-30: dkyil 'khor chen po ni sku la sogs pa 'jug pa la /
T02TD1784E:242b-31: dam tshig gi rim pa 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:242b-32: ras dmar pos slob ma'i mig bkab pa la /
T02TD1784E:242b-33: aa kham b'i ra h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis de nyid zhugs shing khyod gang yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas dris la /
T02TD1784E:242b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' mngon du nyid //
T02TD1784E:242b-35: ces bya ba la sogs pas mig phye la /
T02TD1784E:243a-1: thugs kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:243a-2: de'i rjes la gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:243a-3: rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsgom pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:243a-4: sangs rgyas kun gyi nam mkha'i khams //
T02TD1784E:243a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:243a-6: re zhig dang po nam mkha'i khams sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar bsams la /
T02TD1784E:243a-7: rol mo la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis de rnams mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:243a-8: de'i rjes la bgegs bskrad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:243a-9: aom sarbba p'a pam da ha na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis yungs kar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:243a-10: aom re re ti ti phat ces bya ba'i sngags kyis slob ma la brdegs te rdul spro ba'i cho ga bya'o //
T02TD1784E:243a-11: de'i tshe bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas nyid kyis slob ma la dbang bskur ba ste /
T02TD1784E:243a-12: byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdag nyid che ba bstan to //
T02TD1784E:243a-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:243a-14: de'i rjes la rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bum pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi ngo bor bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:243a-15: dam tshig ni nye bar sgrub pa po brgyad po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin can rnams kyis bum pa de rnams gzung bar bsams la ;
T02TD1784E:243a-16: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo slob ma la sku la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bas sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams mig la sogs pa la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:243a-17: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:243a-18: de zhes bya ba ni bkod ma thag tu'o //
T02TD1784E:243a-19: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsang ba ni sba bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:243a-20: slob dpon thams cad ni sku rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i slob dpon rnams kyi tshig tu smra ba ni tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:243a-21: sangs rgyas rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:243a-22: dbang bskur khyod la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:243a-24: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:243a-25: yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:243a-26: khams gsum dag ni khams gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa ni mngon du 'dud pa'o //
T02TD1784E:243a-27: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje gsang ba gsum ni sku la sogs pa las 'byung ba ni bskyed pa'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:243b-0: de la zhes @243b bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:243b-1: de la zhes pa ni bla mas gsungs ma thag tu'o //
T02TD1784E:243b-2: slob ma thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa'i bsgrub bya rnams kyis rdo rje chen po ni bla ma la /
T02TD1784E:243b-3: gsol ba ni dbang bskur ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab pa ste /
T02TD1784E:243b-4: de nyid kyi phyir cho ga ni tshig ste /
T02TD1784E:243b-5: de nyid sgras pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
T02TD1784E:243b-6: byang chub rdo rjes zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:243b-7: byang chub rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos /
T02TD1784E:243b-8: sangs rgyas ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:243b-9: mchod chen ni dbang bskur ba ji ltar stsal pa de bzhin du /
T02TD1784E:243b-10: nam mkha' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin gyi slob ma la ;
T02TD1784E:243b-11: bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:243b-12: zhes pa ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir de nyid bdag la stsol cig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:243b-13: de'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa la slob ma des gsol ba btab pas /
T02TD1784E:243b-14: rab tu dgyes pa ni bla ma des rab tu dgyes shing slob ma de la dbang bskur ba stsol pa'o ;
T02TD1784E:243b-15: / dbang bskur ma thag tu tshangs pa'i bu ga las zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshogs zhu zhing /
T02TD1784E:243b-16: lha'i gzugs ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1784E:243b-17: de'i snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:243b-18: de'i rjes la gzhi dang gzhi can gyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyis gru bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:243b-20: rdo rje'i slob ma blo ldan la //
T02TD1784E:243b-21: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i slob ma la'o //
T02TD1784E:243b-22: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste de'i rang bzhin gyi dam tshig rnams ni sngar bshad pa'i /
T02TD1784E:243b-23: khyed kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
T02TD1784E:243b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dam tshig bzhi po bsgrang par bya ba ni nyan du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:243b-25: rdo rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis //
T02TD1784E:243b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:243b-27: rdo rje'i lam ni rdo rje tshul las gsungs pa'i dam tshig gi tshogs kyis /
T02TD1784E:243b-28: sems can thams cad ni slob ma rnams bskul ba ni nyan du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:243b-29: de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni de dag gi ngo bo dang /
T02TD1784E:243b-30: mchog tu brtag pa ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:243b-31: sngags kyis bskul ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:243b-32: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'og tu slob ma de la sngags kyang sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:244a-1: sngags kyis bskul ba smra ba yis //
T02TD1784E:244a-2: zhes pa la sngags ni snying po dang /
T02TD1784E:244a-3: bskul ba ni nye ba'i snying po dang /
T02TD1784E:244a-4: smras pa ni phreng ba'i sngags te /
T02TD1784E:244a-5: de rnams kyang sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:244a-6: sngags kyi rgyal pos ting 'dzin dang /
T02TD1784E:244a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:244a-8: sngags dang mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni lha'i sku sgom pa sbyin la /
T02TD1784E:244a-9: gsang ba'i dbang sbyin pa'i phyir brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:244a-10: khu ba bshang gci la sogs ni bdud rtsi rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la slob ma za ru gzhu ga par bya'o /
T02TD1784E:244a-11: de ltar byas na dngos grub rnyed mi dka' ni de'i dus su brtsams te de ni rtogs pa med pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du'o //
T02TD1784E:244a-12: rnam pa 'di bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:244a-13: de'i rjes la gsang ba'i dbang thob pas shes rab dang shes rab ye shes ster bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:244a-14: gsang chen ni shin tu bslabs pa dang 'dus byas pa'i phyag rgya ma de nyid do //
T02TD1784E:244a-15: de'i rjes la de dang snyoms par zhugs pa las byung pa'i bde ba chen po nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:244a-16: rdo rje can kun ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags bar pa rnams kyi gsang ba ni ro gcig par gyur pa'i de kho na nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:244a-17: de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ba'i don du'o //
T02TD1784E:244a-18: bud med kyi gzugs ni rig ma ste /
T02TD1784E:244a-19: bla ma'i g-yon phyogs su bzhag cing /
T02TD1784E:244a-20: slob ma g-yas phyogs su bzhag la /
T02TD1784E:244a-21: de dag gi dbus su gnas pas /
T02TD1784E:244a-22: sngags kyi 'khor lo ni sngags kyi sku dang ldan pa des gnyis ka'i lag pa gzung zhing sems can gyi don gyi spyod pa bya ba'i phyir gnang ba khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du lha mo 'di dag lhan cig gnas par gyis shig ces bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:244a-23: de nas dam tshig chen po rtag tu spyod pa'i phyir sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:244a-24: glang po'i lcags kyu la sogs pa lnga dkyil 'khor la phul zhing bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:244a-25: de ltar na snga ma bzhin du dngos grub thob bo //
T02TD1784E:244a-26: de nas slob ma la yid ches pa bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:244a-27: aom la sogs pa yi ge gsum gyis bshang gci la sogs pa dkyil 'khor la bzhag cing sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis 'bar ba bstan la /
T02TD1784E:244a-28: de'i tshe slob ma yid ches par gyur pas de bzhin du spyad do //
T02TD1784E:244b-0: sngags @244b kyi rigs chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo rnams te /
T02TD1784E:244b-1: de rnams kyi skyes bu ni bdag po ste /
T02TD1784E:244b-2: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:244b-3: de bzhin du kye bu de ring nas brtsams te sngar bshad pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /
T02TD1784E:244b-4: de rnams kyi rgyur gyur pa'i dam tshig chen po ni bdud rtsi bza' ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:244b-5: de rnams thams cad nan tan gyis khyod kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:244b-6: de ltar byas na nyid ces pa ni mngon sum du tshe 'di nyid la /
T02TD1784E:244b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:244b-8: gcig pu de rnams sgrub pa ma yin gyi /
T02TD1784E:244b-9: 'on kyang 'jig rten gyi dngos grub rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:244b-10: dper na mi snang ba ni snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1784E:244b-11: stobs ni glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang /
T02TD1784E:244b-12: brtson 'grus ni sa 'gul ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:244b-13: rdo rje dgug pa ni lha'i bu mo la sogs pa dgug pa ste /
T02TD1784E:244b-14: de'i lha'i bu la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams /
T02TD1784E:244b-15: dkyil 'khor ni sems can gyi khams la khyod kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:244b-16: rdo rje sku yi bka' bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:244b-17: zhes pa ni bden pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:244b-18: bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:244b-19: de bzhin du ri lu'i dngos grub kyang khyed kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:244b-20: tshes brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi la sogs pa'i bshang ba la bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu kham phor kha sbyor gyi nang du bsgrubs la /
T02TD1784E:244b-21: rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam de nyid yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:244b-22: yi ge dgu pa bzlas shing nyin re'am zla ba re re'am lo re re zos na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:244b-23: sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig tu 'khod par 'gyur ba ni mkha' spyod la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:244b-24: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:244b-25: ting nge 'dzin gzhan gyis kyang dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:244b-26: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:244b-27: de la zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi las rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:244b-28: dbang bskur gyi bya ba rdzogs pas /
T02TD1784E:244b-29: gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gang zhig mngag gzhug pa ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:245a-0: de rnams kyi sgrub pa chen po bsgom @245a * //
T02TD1784E:245a-1: pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bskul ba ste /
T02TD1784E:245a-2: de'i tshig ni sa bon gyi yi ge rnams te /
T02TD1784E:245a-3: de la sgrub pa'i mchog ni mngag gzhug pa'i gzugs so //
T02TD1784E:245a-4: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:245a-5: hr'i:ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:245a-6: nam mkha'i dbyings la 'bar bas 'khrug pa'i yi ge hr'i:bsams la //
T02TD1784E:245a-7: de'i rjes la nam mkha'i dbyings de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs su gang ba bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:245a-8: sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo sangs rgyas de rnams yi ge hr'i:de la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:245a-9: de'i se de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bor gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:245a-10: de la zhes pa ni sngags thams cad kyi bdag nyid sa bon de la sku gsung thugs kyi sngags byin gyis brlabs pa la /
T02TD1784E:245a-11: gnas ni g-yo bar mi 'gyur ba de rnams 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:245a-13: de rnams zhugs shing sa bon de yongs su gyur pas /
T02TD1784E:245a-14: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la sogs pa'i mngag gzhug rnams rigs dang mthun par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:245a-15: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:245a-16: de la zhes pa ni mngag gzhug pa de rnams bskyed pas /
T02TD1784E:245a-17: gsang ba'i rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:245a-18: de rnams kyi gnas su aom a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1784E:245a-19: zhes bya ba'i sa bon rnams te /
T02TD1784E:245a-20: de dag yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la bzhugs pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyi rang gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:245a-21: de'i rjes la sdug bsngal chen po ni snying rje dang ldan pa'i rang gi sems kyis mngag gzhug pa de rnams bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:245a-22: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:245a-23: de la zhes pa ni lha'i sku de rnams rdzogs pas /
T02TD1784E:245a-24: rdo rje sems ni mngag gzhug pa de rnams bskul ba ni dgug pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:245a-25: snying po'i sa bon te yi ge a'a'o //
T02TD1784E:245a-26: gsung gi dbang phyug gi sa bon des bka' 'jug pa rnams bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:245a-27: de'i tshe de rnams rtse gsum la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha 'dzin cing 'gro bas lha'i bu mo la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:245a-28: rdzu 'phrul brgyad sgrub pa po la sgrub par byed do //
T02TD1784E:245a-29: gzhan yang ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang 'grub par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:245a-30: phul du byung ba'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:245a-31: de skad ces kyang gsungs so zhes nye bar bsdu bas te /
T02TD1784E:245b-0: @245b da ni yul dang dus kyi bye brag bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:245b-1: nyams dga' ba yi ri dag dang //
T02TD1784E:245b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:245b-3: ri bo la sogs pa'i gnas de rnams rnam par dben pa'i phyir dngos grub kyi gnas yin te /
T02TD1784E:245b-4: de rnams dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:245b-5: mngag gzhug pa'i dngos grub 'di ni zla ba phyed kyi bar ram /
T02TD1784E:245b-6: zla ba phyed po rdzogs pas 'grub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:245b-7: sangs rgyas kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:245b-9: mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa pos re zhig 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub mngon du 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:245b-10: gang gi tshe le'u bcu pa las gsungs pa'i rig pas drag shul gyi rnal 'byor gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po nus pas dgug cing rang gi bdag nyid la zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:245b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdul phra rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku thob par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:245b-12: de nyid kyi phan yon bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:245b-13: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:245b-14: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs ni lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i bu mo rnams rnal 'byor pa de'i bka' bzhin byed cing yongs su bskor nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:245b-15: de bzhin du 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par dga' ba la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'gro zhing de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las /
T02TD1784E:245b-16: zab mo'i chos ni sngags kyi tshul gyis chos thos nas sangs rgyas kyis thob par 'gyur ro ;
T02TD1784E:245b-17: / dam tshig chen po ni mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:245b-18: de nyid rdo rje ni bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:245b-19: de nyid bshad pa ni ngo mtshar bar byed pa'i las gang las byung ba de ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal te zhes pa dang sbyar te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:245b-20: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:245b-21: de la zhes mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa la /
T02TD1784E:245b-22: mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje ni rigs kyi dbye ba la gnas pa de rnams kyi rang rang gi bdag po de rnams las 'byung ba'i gsang ba ni bka' stsal pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02TD1784E:245b-23: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:246a-1: la sogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rjes su 'gro bas rang gi bdag nyid bsams te /
T02TD1784E:246a-2: de rnams kyi rigs dang mthun pa'i mngag gzhug pa rnams bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:246a-3: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:246a-4: de la zhis pa ni sku de rnams rdzogs pas /
T02TD1784E:246a-5: rdo rje ni mi skyod pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246a-6: ye shes ni snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02TD1784E:246a-7: 'khor lo ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1784E:246a-8: sngags ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02TD1784E:246a-9: dam tshig ni do nyod grub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:246a-10: bdag po nyid du gyur pa de rnams kyi gnas ni bka' stsal pa'i rang bzhin gyis gsung ngo //
T02TD1784E:246a-11: dam tshig mngag gzhug pa skyed par byed pa'i sa bon te ye ge a'o //
T02TD1784E:246a-12: de nyid bskul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dang dbyer med par byas la /
T02TD1784E:246a-13: mngag gzhug pa'i rnam pa mthong pa'o //
T02TD1784E:246a-14: mngag gzhug pa'i rnam pa mthong pas dam tshig ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi ngo bo dgug pa brtsams par bya ba'i phyir gtong pa ni de rnams la bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:246a-15: sgrub pa po'i las gnyis so //
T02TD1784E:246a-16: de'i rjes la mngag gzhug pa de rnams kyis sgrub pa po'i bka' nyan byed cing /
T02TD1784E:246a-17: bsgrub bya de rnams la dam tshig 'bod pa'i 'dum pas dngos grub gnyer pa ste /
T02TD1784E:246a-18: bdag cag la 'dod pa gsol cig ces tshig gis so //
T02TD1784E:246a-19: gal te de rnams kyis mngag gzug pa'i tshig mi nyan na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:246a-20: drag shul gyis tshig ni bsgrub pa de rnams //
T02TD1784E:246a-21: bcings pa ni dgug pa sngon du 'gro bar bcings shing bdag po'i mdun du phyin par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:246a-22: mngag gzhug pa'i las gnyis so //
T02TD1784E:246a-23: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:246a-24: de ltar byas nas mkha' dbyings ni mkha' dbyings ni nam mkha'i dbyings te /
T02TD1784E:246a-25: rgya chen ni sa la sogs pa'i bye brag dang bral pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246a-26: dag pa ni gzugs med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246a-27: chos rnams thams cad ni thogs pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i chos dang spangs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:246a-28: de yang mngag gzhug pa de rnams kyis gong bu'i tshul du byed pa ni ri bo bzhin du byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:246a-29: dngos grub gzhan rnams smos cing dgos zhes ngo mtshar pa gsungs pas bdag nyid che pa bstan to //
T02TD1784E:246b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams @246b dang bu ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /
T02TD1784E:246b-1: de rnams ngo bo gcig pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes sdud pa po'i tshig ste skyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:246b-2: da ni dbang du byed pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:246b-3: sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' rung //
T02TD1784E:246b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:246b-5: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246b-6: rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246b-7: sems dpa' ni snang ba mtha' yas la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gal te bsgrub bya dbang du gyur par 'dod na de'i tshe //
T02TD1784E:246b-8: rdo rje gsum ni sangs rgyas gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:246b-9: de dag gi mchog 'dzin ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs te /
T02TD1784E:246b-10: dbang du byed pa la nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir phye pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246b-11: bstan par mi bya ba'i phyir gsang pa chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:246b-12: rdo rje 'chang pa ni de nyid rdo rje lus med pa zhes bya ba'i rnam grags gzhan yod pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:246b-13: de la nam mkha'i rdo rje ni rang gi rig ma'i padma'i lte pa ste /
T02TD1784E:246b-14: de'i dbus su yi ge mam las byung pa'i rang gi bdag nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rje bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:246b-15: sku mdog dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02TD1784E:246b-16: zhal g-yas pa dang gyon pa ni nag po dang dkar po ste /
T02TD1784E:246b-17: phyag lnga la smyo byed dang /
T02TD1784E:246b-21: skem byed de mda' lnga 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246b-22: mda' de rnams kyang gro ni yi ge aom gyis brgyan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246b-23: bar smyug ma ni yi ge a'a: yis bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246b-24: mde'u ni yi ge h'um gyis skyed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:246b-25: kha dog dmar po dang yi ge gsum gyis gsum la byin gyis brlabs pa de rnams 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246b-26: phyag gyon pa'i gco pos de bzhin du bskyed pa'i gzhu 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:246b-27: spyi bor mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:246b-28: de lta bu'i rang gi bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD1784E:246b-29: gzhu'i mtha' gnyir bar gyi cha rnams mda' lnga po de rnams 'dren cing /
T02TD1784E:246b-30: rgyal po la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya'i spyi bo dang /
T02TD1784E:246b-33: gsang pa'i gnas rnams la aom a'a:h'um sv'ah'a //
T02TD1784E:247a-0: zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyi rnam pa'i mda' lnga po phog pa dang sa bon de rnams kyang klog cing mda' de rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i phung po lnga dbang du gyur par bsam par bya'o// mda' lnga po de nyid yang dang @247a * //
T02TD1784E:247a-1: yang du bsgrub bya la phog pa ji srid bsgom par bya ba de srid bsgrub bya de bdag nyid dang nor gyi dbang du gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:247a-3: brgyal ba ni dbang du gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:247a-4: skrag pa ni skyabs gzhan med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:247a-5: byis pa'i blo ni mkhas pa yin na yang byis pa nyid du gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:247a-7: grags chen ni rgyal po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:247a-8: de lta bu'i bsgrub bya bsgom pa ni bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:247a-9: bsam gtan 'di gsang ba'i bskul ba dag ni bdag gis che ge mo 'di zhes bya ba dbang du byed pa'o zhes bya ba sngon du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la zhus te /
T02TD1784E:247a-10: zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:247a-11: sngags rnams kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:247a-12: rdo rje don gyi blo ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:247a-13: des sngags rnams kun gyi rgyal po la sogs pa dbang du bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsungs te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:247a-14: ting nge 'dzin gzhan bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:247a-15: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:247a-16: nam mkha' rdo rje ni phyi rol gyi nam mkha' la yi ge h'um la sogs pa lnga po las /
T02TD1784E:247a-17: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor lo 'khor dang bcas pas bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:247a-18: gdug pa rnams kyang de bzhin du yongs su gyur pas sangs rgyas nyid du bsams te /
T02TD1784E:247a-19: de rnams kyi mig gi dbang po la yi ge aom bkod la /
T02TD1784E:247a-20: khyed rnams kyis nam mkha' ltos shig ces bya bas de rnams la rnal 'byor bas nam mkha'i dbyings bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:247a-21: de'i 'og tu de rnams kyang sngags rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:247a-22: de dag gi sku gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi sku mthong bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:247a-23: bsgrub byed de rnams 'dul bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:247a-24: dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dang las kyi rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
T02TD1784E:247a-25: bkres skom la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:247a-26: bkres pa dang skom pa sgom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i dus su gsal te bsam gtan 'di bsgoms na de'i tshe /
T02TD1784E:247a-27: sdug bsngal thams cad ni de rnams nyid 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:247a-28: rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:247b-0: zhes pa @247b ni bden pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1784E:247b-1: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:247b-2: re zhig dang po cig car du don rnams thams cad ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa gang la yod pa de lta bu'i sku rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:247b-3: rkan gyi bu ga la bdud rtsi'i sa bon yi ge wa bkod cing lce'i rtse mor yang yi ge aom bkod la lce de nyid bzlog pas za bar byed pa thams cad kyi gnas dang /
T02TD1784E:247b-4: bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi yi ge wa 'dzin la /
T02TD1784E:247b-5: de'i tshe yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du rtsol ba med pas rgyas pa ni tshim par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:247b-6: sdug bsngal thams cad ni bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams sel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:247b-7: de'i tshe zhi ba ni yongs su 'tsho ba'i lus su 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:247b-8: ye shes rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku ste /
T02TD1784E:247b-9: de'i tshe nas de bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:247b-10: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rtsol ba med pas rgyas par mdzad pas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste ;
T02TD1784E:247b-11: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD1784E:247b-12: las kyi rgyal ba mchog dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1784E:247b-13: yang na rnam par snang mdzad ni khyad par du mdzes pa'i rang bzhin gyi byang chub kyi sems te /
T02TD1784E:247b-14: de nyid kyi gzugs chen po ni gzhir gyur pa'i rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:247b-16: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun rnams te /
T02TD1784E:247b-17: de dag 'gro ba dang 'od pa'i sbyor bas srog dang rtsol ba dag gis 'gags shing rdo rje de nyid kyi nang gi cha ru chu'i khams kyi sa bon yi ge wam dgod la /
T02TD1784E:247b-18: phyi rol gyi lce la char rengs pa'i phyir yi ge aom bkod cing de'i rjes la kun ni rlung bcu ste /
T02TD1784E:247b-19: de rnams za bar byed pa dang /
T02TD1784E:247b-20: bza' bar bya ba kun ni srog dang rtsol ba ste /
T02TD1784E:247b-21: de dag gi gnas ni g-yon dang g-yas pa'i rdo rje rtse gnyis te /
T02TD1784E:247b-22: de dag gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i phreng ba brgyan par 'gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:247b-23: de nas 'gro ba dang 'od pas yongs su bskor te /
T02TD1784E:247b-24: de srid du 'dzin par bya ba ji srid du brtan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:247b-25: de ltar byas na sdug bsngal thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:247b-26: de rnams sel ba ni 'jig par byed pas na sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba ste bsam gtan no //
T02TD1784E:247b-27: de bas na 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir zhi ba'o //
T02TD1784E:248a-0: @248a * // ye shes ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi rdo rje ni gsang ba'i rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:248a-1: gnas de la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:248a-3: a'a li dang k'a li'i bdag nyid kyi yi gel da bcu'i rang bzhin gyi yi ge'i phyi mo'i phreng ba las byang chub kyi thig le phreng ba rlung gnyis pos yongs su bskor ba dang /
T02TD1784E:248a-4: rdo rje'i rtse mor gnas pa'i ye ge aom gyis ri rab kyi rnam par brgyan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:248a-5: de mi lhung ba'i ting nge 'dzin brtan par byed pas ma ning gi bzlas pa'i rang bzhin gyis rdo rje bzlas pa byed pa yin no zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:248a-6: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
T02TD1784E:248a-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i lingga la phreng ba 'phyang ba mthong ba ste /
T02TD1784E:248a-8: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa dang las dang rnal 'byor rnams so //
T02TD1784E:248a-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:248a-10: dpa' bo chen po ni thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:248a-12: rdo rje ni nor rgyun ma ste /
T02TD1784E:248a-13: de bsgom par bya ba'i phyir tshig gi mchog ni sa bon te /
T02TD1784E:248a-14: de nyid rdo rje gsum ni gsung gi sgo nas phyung ngo //
T02TD1784E:248a-15: ri dha zhes pa ni nor dang 'bru ster ba'i phyir yi ge dha'o //
T02TD1784E:248a-16: yi ge ai ni dpal mo'i sa bon no //
T02TD1784E:248a-17: tsheg drag ni rgyas pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1784E:248a-18: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:248a-19: nam mkha'i rdo rje ni rang gi rig ma'i padmar yi ge dhi yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:248a-20: de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis zhes pa ni sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /
T02TD1784E:248a-21: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:248a-22: ral ba'i cod pan gyis dbul brgyan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:248a-25: zhal gsum phyag drug pa dang /
T02TD1784E:248a-26: zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa ni nag po dang dmar po ste /
T02TD1784E:248a-27: rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin chen gyi mchog sbyin phyag g-yas pa rnams la bsnams pa dang /
T02TD1784E:248a-28: phyag g-yon pa dang rnams la padma dang ral gri dang 'bras kyi yal ga bsnams pa ste /
T02TD1784E:248a-29: padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i lha mo nor rgyun ma bsams te /
T02TD1784E:248a-30: de'i rjes la thams cad brtsam par bya ba ni de nyid kyis dbul po rnams la rin chen gyi char phab par byas te /
T02TD1784E:248b-0: rang gi bdag @248b nyid de dang dbyer med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:248b-1: rdo rje dpa' bo ni lha mo nor rgyun te /
T02TD1784E:248b-2: de nyid kyi dpa' rlabs kyi phreng ba ni 'od zer gyi sbyor bas rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:248b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:248b-4: kun nas dbyangs ni grags pa mnyams pa'i lha mo skul byed ma'i sku ste /
T02TD1784E:248b-5: de nyid zhi ba la sogs pa bsgrub pa la nus pa ldan pa'i phyir rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:248b-6: rdo rje chen po mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:248b-7: de nyid bsgom pa ni cod pa na la zhugs pa gnas gang yang yod pa de ni lha mo skul byed ma'i sku ste /
T02TD1784E:248b-8: de nyid dbyer med pas de'i sa bon yang de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:248b-9: de nyid sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:248b-10: tsum zhes ba ni gdug pa thams cad phye mar brlag par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:248b-11: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:248b-12: rang gi rig ma'i chos 'byung gi nam mkhar ;
T02TD1784E:248b-13: yi ge ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge tsum yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su zhugs pa las byung ba'i sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid sku mdog dkar po dbul rdo rje sems dpas brgyan pa /
T02TD1784E:248b-15: zhal g-yas dang g-yon ni nag po ste /
T02TD1784E:248b-16: phyag g-yas pa rnams la rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin chen bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:248b-17: phyag g-yon pa rnams na padma dang ral gri dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:248b-18: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i lha mo skul byed ma bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:248b-19: de'i 'og tu phyi rol du spros te las thams cad mdzad nas slar yang byon te /
T02TD1784E:248b-20: bdag nyid de dang dbyer med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:248b-21: rdo rje dam tshig ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:248b-22: de las byung ba'i yi shes kyi 'od zer ni lha mo skul byed ma'i sku ste ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa ni de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:248b-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:248b-24: bsam pa thams cad ni 'bru dang nor la sogs pa'i 'dod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:248b-25: de rnams nyid mi zad pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:248b-26: de rnams kyi longs spyod ni nye bar spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin ni gang ba bzang po la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin chen po brgyad de /
T02TD1784E:249a-2: de nyid 'dul bas bdag po nyid du dbang du byed pas na /
T02TD1784E:249a-3: ting nge 'dzin 'khor lo'i tshul ni lha dzam bha la ste /
T02TD1784E:249a-4: de dang dbyer med pas de'i sa bon yang de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:249a-5: nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:249a-6: dzam zhes pa ni dzam ni 'byung ba la'o //
T02TD1784E:249a-7: na ni rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyings su 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:249a-8: de bas na 'bru dang nor rin po che la sogs pa 'byung bar byed pas na dzam zhes bya'o //
T02TD1784E:249a-9: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:249a-10: snga ma bzhin du rang gi rig ma'i padmar padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge dzam yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su zhugs pa las skyes pa /
T02TD1784E:249a-11: ral ba'i cod pan can zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02TD1784E:249a-12: sku mdog ser po zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa ni nag po dang dmar po ste /
T02TD1784E:249a-13: phyag g-yas pa rnams la mnga' dang kyo ba dang bi dza bu ra ka bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:249a-14: phyag g-yon pa rnams la gzhu dang zhags pa dang /
T02TD1784E:249a-16: sngar bshad pa'i lha mo nor rgyun mas 'khyud pa dang /
T02TD1784E:249a-17: aom la sogs pa'i sa bon lnga yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas spyi bo la sogs par byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:249a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i cod can dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin chen po ni 'phags pa dzam bha la bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:249a-19: de'i 'og tu spros nas sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzad la /
T02TD1784E:249a-21: bdag nyid de dang dbyer med par bsams la /
T02TD1784E:249a-22: de dang 'dra ba'i ye shes kyi dzam bha la snying ga las spros te /
T02TD1784E:249a-23: de'i spyi bor bzhugs ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang m'a ma k'i snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis /
T02TD1784E:249a-24: aom dzam bha la dza len dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1784E:249a-25: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis de'i spyi bo la dbang bskur gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:249a-26: de ltar byas na gnod sbyin gyi dbang ni 'phags pa dzam bha la mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:249a-27: 'od chen po ni rnal 'byor pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:249a-28: rdo rje dam tshig ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1784E:249a-29: sngags de nyid kyi phyag rgya ni m'a ma k'i ste /
T02TD1784E:249a-30: de dag dpal ni spyi bor mtshan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:249b-0: de nyid dpal ni mdzes pa nyid gang la @249b yod pa de ni dzam bha la ste /
T02TD1784E:249b-1: de'i ting nge 'dzin yang de bzhin du bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:249b-2: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02TD1784E:249b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:249b-4: rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa'i 'dod pa'i lha dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i gnod mdzes me rnams te /
T02TD1784E:249b-5: de dag nye bar spyod pa ni bsten pa dang /
T02TD1784E:249b-6: dpal ni 'bru dang gser la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la snyoms par bzhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:249b-7: gnod sbyin mo ni zla ba'i 'od ma la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:249b-8: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni snyoms par zhugs pa'am skyed par byed pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:249b-9: rdo rje tshig ni sa bon te de nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:249b-10: ksham zhes pa ni gnod sbyin mo'i sgra'i tha ma'i yi ge te /
T02TD1784E:249b-11: tshogs pa la 'jug pa'i sbra rnams cha shas la yang 'jug pa ste /
T02TD1784E:249b-12: dper na yul tshig pa dang /
T02TD1784E:249b-13: snam bu tshig pa bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:249b-14: tshig rnams la tshig gi phyogs gcig kyang yod pa de /
T02TD1784E:249b-15: dper na 'jigs sde ni 'jigs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:249b-16: bden par khros ma ni khros ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:249b-17: mkha' dbyings dbus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus su yi ge bhr'um las skyes pa'i gzhal yas khang pa grub bzhi pa /
T02TD1784E:249b-18: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas rnam par sbras pa /
T02TD1784E:249b-19: 'od zer thams cad kyis phyogs bcu rnam par brgyan pa /
T02TD1784E:249b-20: dri dang me tog la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan sna tshogs pas byin gyis brlabs nas de'i dbus su rin po che'i khri'i steng du padma dang zla ba'i gdan la yongs su bsdus pa'i shing gi yal ga lag pa g-yon pas 'dzin cing lag pa g-yas pas ni rol ba'i padma gcod par byed pa /
T02TD1784E:249b-21: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD1784E:249b-22: smad yangs pa gser gyi mdog lta bu'i smad g-yogs kyis mdzes pa /
T02TD1784E:249b-23: rgyas pa dang mtho ba gser lta bu'i nu ma gnyis dang ldan pa /
T02TD1784E:249b-24: bung ba dang mig sman dang 'dra ba'i skra'i tshogs kyi nang na yongs su bsdus pa'i me tog btags pa /
T02TD1784E:249b-25: dri la chags pas 'ong pa'i bung ba'i skad kyis yid 'phrog pa /
T02TD1784E:249b-26: rkang gdub dang ska rags kyi sgra snyan pas dang ba'i rgyal po las rgyal bar 'dod pa'i lha'i mdo'i tshogs kyis snying mnan pa /
T02TD1784E:249b-27: zur dang bcas pa'i g-yon pas lta ba /
T02TD1784E:250a-0: yi ge ksham las skyes pa'i gnod @250a * //
T02TD1784E:250a-2: de dang 'dra ba'i gnod sbyin mo'i rigs sna tshogs pas nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsams la /
T02TD1784E:250a-3: de'i bdag nyid gcig pu bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:250a-4: las gsum rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:250a-5: de rnams kyi bye brag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis de nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:250a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon rnams de'i lus la sogs pa la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:250a-7: de'i 'og tu rang gi bdag nyid gsang ba'i bdag po ni phyag na rdo rje bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:250a-8: gnod sbyin mo de'i spyi bor rengs pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:250a-9: khro bo ni gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po 'am bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:250a-10: de nas snying ga ni rang gi snying gar sngags kyi tshogs ni yi ge h'um bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:250a-11: sbyor ba ni gnod sbyin mo de dang lhan cig tu snyoms par zhugs par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:250a-12: de ltar byas na gnod sbyin mo rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:250a-13: gnod sbyin mo bsgrub pa'i spros pa ni 'byung po 'dul pa'i rgyud dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:250a-14: gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang mnyam pa ni gnod sbyin mo gcig la thim pa ste /
T02TD1784E:250a-15: de nyid bsgom pa ni bsam gtan te /
T02TD1784E:250a-16: de yang nges par 'grub pa'i phyir rdo je ste /
T02TD1784E:250a-17: ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:250a-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:250a-19: rdo rje sngags thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:250a-20: de rnams kyi dngos gzhug pas /
T02TD1784E:250a-21: thams cad 'grub pa ni gnod sbyin mo la sogs 'grub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:250a-22: de'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni 'dod pa rnam pa lnga nye bar spyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:250a-23: de nyid brtan pa'i phyir rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1784E:250a-24: dngos grub phra mo ni 'dod pa rnam pa lnga nye bar spyod pa'i dngos grub nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:250a-25: sku dang gsung thugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:250a-26: sku gsung thugs ni rnam par snang mdzad dang snang mtha' yas dang mi bskyod pa gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:250a-27: de dag gi gzugs kyi dag pa ni gnod sbyin mo rnams yang dag par sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs te bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:250a-28: de bzhin du sangs rgyas gzugs ni don yod grub pa'i gzugs blangs te /
T02TD1784E:250a-29: 'od bzang po ni 'od dang ldan pa de rnams nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:250b-0: de bzhin @250b du 'dzam bu chu'i gser 'od 'dra ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis kyang gnod sbyin mo de rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:250b-1: de rnams ji lta bu zhes na /
T02TD1784E:250b-2: dngos grub phra mo ni mkha' spyod dang sa spyod la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams la gnas pa de dag gal te bsgrubs na /
T02TD1784E:250b-3: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pa mi snang ba la bdag po nyid du 'gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:250b-4: de nyid kyi mthus 'jam pa'i phyir zla ba ste /
T02TD1784E:250b-6: gnod sbyin mos sbyar ba'i longs spyod nye bar spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:250b-7: gnod sbyin mo'i rgyal po rnams grub pas rig pa 'dzin pa ni 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dbang po ste bdag po nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:250b-8: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:250b-9: de la zhes pa ni gnod sbyin mo rnams te /
T02TD1784E:250b-10: 'khor lo thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1784E:250b-11: dngos grub ni mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD1784E:250b-12: gzugs ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02TD1784E:250b-13: gsang ba ni snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02TD1784E:250b-14: sngags kyi dngos grub ni don yod grub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:250b-15: de rnams kyi gzugs kyis gnod sbyin mo de rnams thams cad /
T02TD1784E:250b-16: mdzes pa'i gzugs ni shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:250b-17: sngags kyi dngos grub kyis 'grub pa de rnams /
T02TD1784E:250b-18: thams cad ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas sgrub pa po dga' bar byed pa'o//
T02TD1784E:250b-19: 'o na kyang de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gzugs kyis 'grub par 'gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:250b-20: yang na gtsug hor 'khor los sgyur pa'i gzugs kyi mngag gzhug pas /
T02TD1784E:250b-21: thams cad 'grub pa ni gnod sbyin mo de rnams te /
T02TD1784E:250b-22: yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:250b-23: bdag po ni sgrub pa po de yang de rnams kyi bdag por gyur te /
T02TD1784E:250b-24: gtsug tor ma ni mkha' spyod yin pas thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir ro zhes dgos pa'o //
T02TD1784E:250b-25: sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:250b-26: ji srid 'grub pas 'grub pa'i gnod sbyin mo de rnams dang lhan cig tu rol pa dang /
T02TD1784E:250b-27: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rgya che bas spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pas rnal 'byor pa spyod na /
T02TD1784E:250b-28: de'i tshe sangs rgyas byang chub ni chos 'byung gi mngon par byang chub byed pa ni mngon du byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:250b-29: bsam pa thams cad ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la nye bar spyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:250b-30: de nyid gnod sbyin mo sgrub pa'i sgo nas /
T02TD1784E:251a-0: @251a * // yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes pa dang sbyar te /
T02TD1784E:251a-1: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:251a-2: spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa bshad zin to //
T02TD1784E:251a-3: da ni brtul zhugs kyi sgo nas spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:251a-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:251a-5: de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs ni rnal 'byor pa gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:251a-6: de rnams kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs nyid spyod pa ste //
T02TD1784E:251a-7: spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:251a-8: yang dag par len pa ni de nyid blang ba ste /
T02TD1784E:251a-9: de nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:251a-10: sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:251a-11: sku la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gsum ste /
