T02TD1784E:251a-12: de rnams sgom pa ni de dag gi rnam pa /
T02TD1784E:251a-13: ngang tshul ni shing la sogs pa las sbyar ba dang brdungs pa dang bris pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:251a-14: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:251a-15: de zhes pa ni gzugs bya ba la /
T02TD1784E:251a-16: sku la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:251a-17: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas rang gi bdag nyid ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:251a-18: thal ba la sogs pas kha dog dkar po sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas pas bya'o //
T02TD1784E:251a-19: rig ma yang lo grangs bcu drug lon pa'i khrus mkhan gyi bu mo ste /
T02TD1784E:251a-20: bzhin sdug pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:251a-21: sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa la mkhas pa rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya'o //
T02TD1784E:251a-22: de yang spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod ni lha mo spyan gyi zhal dang phyag dang sku mdog la sogs pa ngang /
T02TD1784E:251a-23: mtshan ma ni de'i phyag mtshan 'khor la sogs pa bsgom par bya ba ni ngo bo nyid du bya'o //
T02TD1784E:251a-24: de yang sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga la mkhas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:251a-25: sngags dang rgyud legs par bslabs pa la rang bzhin gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:251a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i sku rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lha mo'o //
T02TD1784E:251a-27: sangs rgyas byang chub ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub ste /
T02TD1784E:251a-28: de'i gnas ni de nyid thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:251a-29: de dang lhan cig tu gsang ba'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD1784E:251a-30: nam zhes dus bzhi ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo'o //
T02TD1784E:251b-1: brtul zhugs chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi brtul zhugs 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
T02TD1784E:251b-2: sdong bu dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams shing las blangs te bza' ba'o //
T02TD1784E:251b-3: yang na dgongs pas bshad pa'i /
T02TD1784E:251b-4: sdong bu la sogs pa ni bdud rtsi lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:251b-6: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas te rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:251b-7: ye shes che ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
T02TD1784E:251b-8: de nyid zab phyir rgya mtsho ste de yod pas bdag po ni gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:251b-9: de bzhin du zla ba drug gi bar du rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod na mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:251b-11: rtag tu gzhan gyi nor rku zhing //
T02TD1784E:251b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:251b-13: rnal 'byor pa de'i sgrub pa yang le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa'i rig pas gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa la sogs pa dam tshig rnams shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:251b-14: 'dod chags rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs ba la /
T02TD1784E:251b-15: 'dod chags rdo rje ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02TD1784E:251b-16: de nyid kyi lcags kyu mo dang 'dra bas lcags kyu mo dang gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin gyi gar mkhan ma'i bu mo snga ma bzhin du gsung rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas rgyan la sogs pa dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:251b-17: de bzhin du m'a ma k'i'i rang bzhin gyi gdol ba'i bu mo yang /
T02TD1784E:251b-18: yon tan ska rags ni sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa rtogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa thugs rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas bya'o //
T02TD1784E:251b-19: spyod pa yang snga ma bzhin du spyad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:251b-20: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:251b-21: de ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:251b-22: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:251b-23: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:251b-24: yang na shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams /
T02TD1784E:251b-25: yi ge gsum bsgoms pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1784E:251b-26: rang gi phyag rgya ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:251b-27: de rnams bsam pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma'i rnam pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:251b-28: de ltar byas nas de rnams sangs rgyas kun mkhyen ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:252a-0: blo brtan pa ni brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas @252a * //
T02TD1784E:252a-1: nags tshal la bsod snyoms blang bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:252a-2: de rnams la nags tshal gyi lha mo rnams /
T02TD1784E:252a-3: kha zas ni bza' ba ster bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:252a-4: lha mo ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:252a-5: skrag pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bkas 'jigs par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:252a-6: gal te 'das pa ni bsod snyoms rnal 'byor pa rnams la mi ster na /
T02TD1784E:252a-7: de'i tshe 'jigs par 'gyur pa ni de rnams kyi rang gi dngos grub nyams par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:252a-9: rdo rje yi ge ni rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa'i gsung 'di yin no zhes ston te /
T02TD1784E:252a-10: rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:252a-11: de ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:252a-12: spros pa dang bcas pa dang spros pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gi khyad par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:252a-13: lha mo klu mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:252a-14: lha mo la sogs pa rnams sngar bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin du dgug ste /
T02TD1784E:252a-17: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsten //
T02TD1784E:252a-18: zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD1784E:252a-19: 'di yang sngags rnams thams cad ni spros pa dang bcas pa dang spros pa med pa'i spyod pa dag gis gsang ba'i tshul ni sbas par bya ba'i snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:252a-20: theg pa chen po la gsungs pa'i phyir tshul chen no //
T02TD1784E:252a-21: rdo rje gsum gyi 'khor lo ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs la /
T02TD1784E:252a-22: sangs rgyas byang chub ni chos 'byung dang /
T02TD1784E:252a-24: bla na med pa'i mngon par byang chub pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:252a-25: de rnams 'jug pa ni thob par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:252a-26: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs so zhes pa tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02TD1784E:252a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:252a-28: de dag gi gang zhig rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni rnam pa gsum gyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:252a-29: de'i dam tshig ni spyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:252a-30: de kho na nyid ni byang chub rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:252a-31: de nyid rdo rje ni mi g-yo ba gang las 'byung ba de ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes pa dang sbyar te sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:252a-32: thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:252a-33: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum mo //
T02TD1784E:252b-0: de bzhin du rdo rje dkyil 'khor de @252b rnams la zhugs pa'i slob ma ste /
T02TD1784E:252b-1: de'i mngon par byang chub ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs mthar yod pa'i dbang bskur bas /
T02TD1784E:252b-2: byang chub thob pa le'u gang la yod pa de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gis tshogs kyang de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:252b-3: rgyud 'grel las le'u bcu drug pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:252b-4: le'u bcu drug pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni drug brgya bcu'o /
T02TD1784E:252b-6: // / rig pa'i brtul zhugs thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dam tshig dang sdom pa med pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang mi thob ste /
T02TD1784E:252b-7: de'i don du le'u bcu bdun pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:252b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:252b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:252b-10: de rnams yang 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad gsol ba btab pa ni bstod pa mdzad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:252b-11: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02TD1784E:252b-12: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni bdud rtsi lnga 'am lcags kyu rnams te /
T02TD1784E:252b-13: de dag 'dus pa ni gcig tu gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:252b-14: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bor gyur cing /
T02TD1784E:252b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje ni yi ge gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:252b-16: de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ni sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rim pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin du gyur nas /
T02TD1784E:252b-17: gsol ba gdab pa ni spyod par bya ste 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:252b-18: gsol ba gdab pa de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:252b-19: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02TD1784E:252b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:252b-21: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par dag pas mi g-yo ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir mi bskyod rdo rje'o //
T02TD1784E:252b-22: ye shes kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ye shes che'o //
T02TD1784E:252b-23: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:252b-24: de dag 'dzin pas ni rdo rje dbyings so //
T02TD1784E:252b-25: rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par dag pas nam mkha' che'o //
T02TD1784E:252b-26: dkyil 'khor gsum di sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams te /
T02TD1784E:252b-27: de dag gi rdo rje gsum ni bdag po rnams te /
T02TD1784E:252b-29: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das dbyangs ni gsungs shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:252b-30: phyag btsal ba ni khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1784E:253a-0: khyad par du me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi snang bas na rnams par @253a * //
T02TD1784E:253a-2: che ba ni nad kyis gzung ba rnams la zhi bar mdzad pas na dag pa che'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-3: rdo rje'i nang du zhi ba ni zhi ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:253a-4: che ba ni sa'i khams rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir dag pa che'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-5: rang bzhen 'od gsal ba ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos ston pa ni gsungs shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-6: nam mkha'i mdzod kyis bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bas na rin chen rgyal po'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-7: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rab tu zab pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-8: rdo rje nam mkha'i khams rnam par dag pas nam mkha' bzhin du dri med ni dag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-9: rgyas pa ni mdzad pa'i phyir rang bzhin dag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-10: nga rgyal gyi 'dam gyis mi gos pa'i phyir gos pa med pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-11: gsang ba ni gsungs shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-12: rdo rje bdud rtsi ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:253a-13: che ba ni me'i khams te de'i rnam par dag pas mdzes pas na rgyal po che'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-14: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-15: nam mkha' rdo rje ni rtsa zla ba ma ste /
T02TD1784E:253a-16: de 'dzin ma ni tshim par byed pas na nam mkha'i rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:253a-17: 'dod chags ni 'dod chags spang pas 'khor ba pa rnams 'khor ba las pha rol tu phyin par mdzad pas na 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes so //
T02TD1784E:253a-18: rdo rje'i dam tshig gsungs shig pa ni bshad du gsol cig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-19: don thams cad bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i phyir don yod rdo rje'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-20: phrag dog rnam par dag pa'i phyir dag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-21: bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pas na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-22: dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dam tshig rnam par sbyang bas slar yang rang gi dam tshig la bzhag pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:253a-23: dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las byung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-24: kun gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1784E:253a-25: phyag 'tshal ba ni khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1784E:253a-26: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:253a-27: bstod pa'i tshig lnga po 'di rnams kyis gang yang rung ba'i sgrub pa pos rdo rje longs spyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bstod na /
T02TD1784E:253b-0: sgrub pa po yang sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur ba ni rdo rje @253b 'chang chen po 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:253b-1: bstod pa'i tshig ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:253b-2: zhi ba ni bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob par byed pa dang /
T02TD1784E:253b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253b-5: bstod pa tsam gyis rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar gyur pa ste ;
T02TD1784E:253b-6: don dpyad pa dang sgom pa'i sgo nas smos ci dgos zhes bstod pa'i phan yon bstan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:253b-7: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:253b-8: yang mi spyod rdo rje ni yi ge h'um dang /
T02TD1784E:253b-9: ye shes che ni yi ge a'a:dang /
T02TD1784E:253b-10: rdo rje dbyings ni yi ge aom dang de rnams kyi 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas /
T02TD1784E:253b-11: che ba ni 'od gsal ba rtogs pas mngon du byed pas na mkhas pa che'o //
T02TD1784E:253b-12: dkyil 'khor gsum ni srog dang rtsol ba dang me dang mnyam pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:253b-13: de dag gi rdo rje gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa gsum dmigs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:253b-14: des mchog ni byang chub thob pa ste /
T02TD1784E:253b-15: de lta bu'i rdo rje ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:253b-17: rnam par snang mdzad ni snang ba'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1784E:253b-18: dag pa che ni snang ba mched pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1784E:253b-19: rdo rje zhi ba ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD1784E:253b-20: che ba de rnams dga' ba ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253b-21: de bzhin du rang bzhin ni 'dod chags la sogs pa brgya drug bcu'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1784E:253b-23: ston pa ni gsungs shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253b-25: rdo rje ni rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:253b-26: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253b-27: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir rin chen dang /
T02TD1784E:253b-28: mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis mdzes pa'i phyir rgyal po dang /
T02TD1784E:253b-29: shin tu zab pa'i 'od gsal ba la zhes pa'i phyir rab tu zab pa'o //
T02TD1784E:253b-30: rdo rje nam mkha' ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD1784E:253b-31: de dang ldan pa'i phyir rdo rje nam mkha' dang /
T02TD1784E:253b-32: nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon dang 'dra bas rdo rje nam mkha'o //
T02TD1784E:253b-33: nam mkha' bzhin du rus pa dang sha la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa ste /
T02TD1784E:253b-34: ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:253b-35: de'i phyir sgyu ma'i rus pa dang sha la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir dri ma med pa rang bzhin dag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:253b-36: de'i bag chags kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na gos pa med pa'o //
T02TD1784E:254a-1: ba bshad du gsol cig pa ste /
T02TD1784E:254a-2: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:254a-4: bdud rtsi ni 'dod chags par pa dang /
T02TD1784E:254a-5: rgyal po che ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste /
T02TD1784E:254a-6: de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams dang bral ba'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1784E:254a-7: de nyid nam mkha' dang 'dra bas nam mkha' dang /
T02TD1784E:254a-8: rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa 'dzin pas na nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:254a-9: 'dod chags ni dus mtshams dang mtshan mo dang nyin mo rnams te /
T02TD1784E:254a-10: de rnams phyi dang nang gi mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas mtshan ma nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:254a-11: pha rol phyin pa ni bzhi pa'i skad cig ma mngon du mdzad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:254a-12: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes pa'o //
T02TD1784E:254a-13: de lta bu'i rdo rje ni mngon par byang chub pa gsungs pa ni bka' stsol cig pa ste /
T02TD1784E:254a-14: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:254a-15: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la zhugs pa'i phyir don yod rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:254a-16: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag gcig tu mdzad pa'i phyir dag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:254a-17: bsam pa thams cad ni 'jig rten gyi chos rnams te /
T02TD1784E:254a-18: de dag bye brag med pas rdzogs mdzad pa ni mkhyen pas na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:254a-19: de bzhin du dag pa ngo bo nyid ni gtsang ba la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams te /
T02TD1784E:254a-20: de dag byung ba ni bye brag med par mkhyen pas na dag pa ngo bo nyid las 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:254a-21: de nyid kyi phyir drug pa yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1784E:254a-22: de la phyag 'tshal ba ni de'i bdag nyid du rjes su zhugs par bya ba ste /
T02TD1784E:254a-24: de lta bu'i bstod pa'i tshig rnams kyis gang gis bstod pa de yang rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:254a-25: rab tu byed pa las kyang khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud ces pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:254a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab ma thag tu rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:254a-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas ni de'i 'og tu'o//
T02TD1784E:254a-28: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i dam tshig ste /
T02TD1784E:254a-29: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:254a-30: lam de nyid kyis gdul bya rnams 'dul bar mdzad pas na ston pa'o //
T02TD1784E:254a-31: sangs rgyas kun ni sna tshogs pa'i mos pa dang ldan pa'i bsgrub bya rnams te /
T02TD1784E:254b-0: de dag rjes su mthun pa'i lam rnams kyis rjes su brtse ba ni rjes su @254b gzung bar mdzad nas sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtse ba'o //
T02TD1784E:254b-1: rdo rje gsang ba ni bsrung bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:254b-2: bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig rnams te /
T02TD1784E:254b-3: de dag gi gsung ni de ston par byed pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:254b-5: dag pa ni rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:254b-6: de lta bu'i rdo rje gsung ni brtan pa'i gsung rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:254b-7: sdud pa po'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:254b-8: ae ma ho zhes bya ba la sogs pas dam tshig gsung gi gong du chos nyid bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:254b-9: kye de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas thams cad ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched de chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin de rnams kyi mi 'gyur che ni mi g-yo ba'i chos nyid do //
T02TD1784E:254b-10: gang gi phyir 'jig rten dang 'gal pa'i dam tshig gi sgo nas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ste /
T02TD1784E:254b-11: de nyid yongs su dag pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1784E:254b-12: nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin du dri ma med pa ni ye shes kyi sku thob par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1784E:254b-13: de ni ngo mtshar ba ste /
T02TD1784E:254b-14: sgrub pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD1784E:254b-15: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:254b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:254b-17: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:254b-18: de dag gi dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:254b-19: bza' bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid can te /
T02TD1784E:254b-20: de nyid sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:254b-22: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:254b-24: le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:254b-25: rigs thams cad kyi thun mong yin no //
T02TD1784E:254b-26: khyad par ni sha chen gyis nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02TD1784E:254b-27: don yod grub pa'i dam tshig nang du 'gro bas bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'o //
T02TD1784E:254b-29: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa nams kyis so //
T02TD1784E:254b-31: ye shes rgya mtsho ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la mos pa dang ldan pa de rnams kyis /
T02TD1784E:254b-32: 'di mchog ni dam tshig gi nan tan bya'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:254b-33: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:254b-34: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos /
T02TD1784E:255a-0: gsung gi dam tshig ni gsung @255a * //
T02TD1784E:255a-1: gi rigs kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:255a-2: dam tshig bzhi po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:255a-3: dam tshig bzhi po ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:255a-4: khyad par ni bshang gci ste /
T02TD1784E:255a-5: rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa'i dam tshig go //
T02TD1784E:255a-6: de dag gsung gi rdo rje yi ge che ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor pas nan tan du bya'o //
T02TD1784E:255a-7: 'di ni gsang ba zhes pa ni bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul la sogs pa rnams la brten par mi bya'o //
T02TD1784E:255a-8: rmad byung ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:255a-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:255a-10: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos rdo rje 'dzin thams cad mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ste gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:255a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:255a-12: dam tshig bzhi po bshad zin to //
T02TD1784E:255a-13: khrag dang shu kra ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas kyi dam tshig go //
T02TD1784E:255a-14: de dag rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ni mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:255a-15: brtul zhugs brtan pa ni brtul zhugs spyod pas so //
T02TD1784E:255a-16: nye bar bsdu ba bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:255a-17: sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:255a-18: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis nang du bsdus pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa gsum gyi dam tshig 'di ni zhes pa ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig yin no //
T02TD1784E:255a-20: rmad pa che ni ye shes thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:255a-21: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kun ni phung po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:255a-22: de dag gi rgas pa la sogs pa'i skyon zad par bya ba'i phyir rtag pa'o //
T02TD1784E:255a-23: de lta bu'i dam tshig rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis yang dag par blangs shing bsrung bar bya ba ni bsten par bya'o ;
T02TD1784E:255a-24: / phan yon bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:255a-25: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:255a-26: rnal 'byor pa gang gis dam tshig 'di bsrungs na de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i go 'phang thob cing lus ngag yid rim gyis sbyangs te /
T02TD1784E:255a-27: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:255b-0: dbugs dbyung @255b ba gnyis rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:255b-1: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshul la mos pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam tshig de yin te sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:255b-2: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:255b-3: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag phan tshun gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:255b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis med pa khas blangs pa bzhin du de'i chos dang ldan pa'i chos thams cad sems can rnams la ston par byed de /
T02TD1784E:255b-5: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni phyi rol gyi don 'dod pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:255b-6: shes pa nyid ni rnam pa dang bcas pa don gyi tshul du snang ba ste ;
T02TD1784E:255b-7: de bas na de dag rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa snang ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:255b-8: de tsam la gnas pa de dag rnams chos kyi sku mngon du byed pas ngag gis ston pa mi byed kyi /
T02TD1784E:255b-9: 'on kyang 'bar dang snang ba la sos pas rdzu 'phrul bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed de gang gi phyir bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa gsum gsum gsungs pa dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi'o //
T02TD1784E:255b-10: nyan thos pa rnams kyis rang gi don la zhes pas gsum med de /
T02TD1784E:255b-11: gang gi phyir de rnams ni brtul zhugs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa bdag ngal ba nyid du bsgom zhing 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa thob bo //
T02TD1784E:255b-12: lus kyi ston pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi'o //
T02TD1784E:255b-13: ngag gi ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i'o //
T02TD1784E:255b-14: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ston pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi'o //
T02TD1784E:255b-15: dper na de rnams kyi sku'i ston pa ni sprul pa'i sku spros te 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa dang ;
T02TD1784E:255b-16: gsung gi ston pa ni yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i gsung gis chos ston par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1784E:255b-17: thugs kyi ston pa ni zhags pa dang /
T02TD1784E:255b-18: lcags kyu la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i khro bo la bka' stsal pas lha la sogs pa'i snying po rjes su zhugs pas drag shul gyis dgug par mdzad cing de rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:255b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1784E:255b-21: drag po rnams la drag po'i mchog / zhi ba rnams la zhi mchog dang //
T02TD1784E:255b-22: drag shul rnams la drag shul tshul //
T02TD1784E:255b-23: dbang phyug chen po ma nan nas ni //
T02TD1784E:256a-2: lha mo au ma bkug nas ni //
T02TD1784E:256a-3: rang longs spyod kyis de nyid spyod //
T02TD1784E:256a-4: khyab 'jug yang dag mnan nas ni //
T02TD1784E:256a-5: skyon med stobs kyis cig car du //
T02TD1784E:256a-6: lha mo drug min bkug nas ni //
T02TD1784E:256a-7: de nyid rang longs spyod kyis spyod //
T02TD1784E:256a-8: skye dgu'i bdag po mnan nas ni //
T02TD1784E:256a-9: skyon med stobs kyis cig car du //
T02TD1784E:256a-10: zhi ba'i lha mos bkug nas ni //
T02TD1784E:256a-11: de nyid rang longs spyod kyis spyod //
T02TD1784E:256a-12: 'dod pa'i lha nyid mnan nas ni //
T02TD1784E:256a-13: skyon med stobs kyis cig car du //
T02TD1784E:256a-14: dga' dang bde ma bkug nas ni //
T02TD1784E:256a-15: de nyid rang longs spyod kyis spyod //
T02TD1784E:256a-16: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mi mnyam //
T02TD1784E:256a-17: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' can te //
T02TD1784E:256a-18: rdo rje las kyi mchog gis gnon //
T02TD1784E:256a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:256a-20: spyod lam gyi zhugs pa ni sku'i ston pa dang /
T02TD1784E:256a-21: bstan pa'i zhugs pa ni gsung gi ston pa dang /
T02TD1784E:256a-22: ting nge 'dzin gyi zhugs pa dang so so yang dag par bzhugs pa'i zhugs pa ni thugs kyi ston pa ste /
T02TD1784E:256a-23: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rim pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:256a-24: de nyid kyi phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyis lus kyis bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:256a-25: de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:256a-26: rdo rje sku ni lha'i ste /
T02TD1784E:256a-27: de la rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:256a-28: dper na snying gar zla ba'i rdo rje las 'od zer 'khor lo spros te /
T02TD1784E:256a-29: de nyid kyis rang gi lus gsal bar byas la /
T02TD1784E:256a-30: nam mkha'i khams kyang gsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:256a-31: de nyid kyi sems can gzung ba ni 'od zer spro bas sems rnams snang bar byas la /
T02TD1784E:256a-32: de'i mthus de rnams lam la gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:256a-33: dam tshig mchog tu brtag pa ni 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'o zhes ston te /
T02TD1784E:256a-34: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang bsgrub pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:256a-35: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas nyan thos pa'i dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:256a-36: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:256a-37: dge ba bcu'i las ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa las ldog pa ste /
T02TD1784E:256a-38: de rnams ye shes spangs pa rnams ni de kho na nyid la ma zhugs pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:256a-39: las dang po pa dag gis byed pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:256a-40: de nyid kyi dman par mos pa thams cad ni nyan thos pa rnams 'jug pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:256b-0: dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che ni de'i lam gyis dbang bskur thob nas rdo rje 'chang nyid mngon du byed @256b pa'o ;
T02TD1784E:256b-1: / dper na dkyil 'khor la slob ma zhugs par byas la rigs lnga'i dam tshig gi 'og tu /
T02TD1784E:256b-2: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02TD1784E:256b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang 'dra ba'i bslab pa'i gnas nyan du bcug na sngags kyi theg pa chen po la de rnams kyi dad pa bskyed cing de la zhugs shing thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa'i rim pas nyan thos pa'i rigs can de rnams kyi rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:256b-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD1784E:256b-5: tshangs pa ni skye dgu'i bdag po'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ste gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:256b-6: gti mug lam ni yi ge aom gyi sgo nas de nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rjes /
T02TD1784E:256b-7: las ni snyoms par zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid can byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:256b-9: 'jigs shing mi sdug pa ni nyan thos pa rnams la sdom pa nyams pa'i 'jigs pas skrag par byed pa yin na yang sngags pa la sangs rgyas byang chub ni rnam par snang mdzad nyid de ston pa ni ster bar byed pa ste 'gro ba rnams rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing la bzhag cing sku rdo rje 'dzin cing thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:256b-11: rang gi bdag nyid cig car du rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:256b-12: rang gi rig ma'i padma'i nang du yi ge aom las byung ba mdog dkar po /
T02TD1784E:256b-13: gdong bzhi pa dang lag pa bzhi pa /
T02TD1784E:256b-14: zhi ba'i rang bzhin dang ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD1784E:256b-15: lag pa bzhi la dbyig pa dang spyi blugs dang /
T02TD1784E:256b-16: phreng ba dang padma 'dzin pa ngang pa'i stan la 'dug pa dang /
T02TD1784E:256b-17: zhi ba'i lha mo phang par 'dzin cing de'i nu ma reg par byed pa'i tshangs pa bsgoms te /
T02TD1784E:256b-18: de la byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur gsol zhing ye shes kyi lha mo'i zhal nas spros te /
T02TD1784E:256b-19: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis tshangs pas gdul bya gti mug gi rigs can 'jig rten gyi khams chos bstan pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing la bzhag cing slar yang bsdus te /
T02TD1784E:256b-20: de dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:256b-21: de nyid sku'i rdo rje nyid du gyur pa ni rang dang gzhan rnams rnam par snang mdzad nyid du byed pa'o zhes ston te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:256b-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD1784E:256b-23: drag pos gdul bya rnams la drag po'i dam tshig gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:257a-0: @257a * // de la khams gsum la gnas pa'i bud med ji srid yod pa de rnams rdo rje gsum 'byung ba ni ri dags mo dang /
T02TD1784E:257a-2: glang mo ste dbye ba gsum gyi gnas pa gang yin pa de dag rnam pa gsum gyis longs spyod ni lus ngag yid kyi longs spyod kyis mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:257a-3: dam tshig ni drag po la mos pa dang ldan pa dang 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi sems can rnams kyi dam tshig 'di yin no //
T02TD1784E:257a-5: rmad du byung ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi go 'phar thob par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:257a-7: re zhig dang por rang gi bdag nyid cig car du ngag gi dbang phyug bsams la /
T02TD1784E:257a-8: rang gi rig ma'i padma'i nang du yi ge a'a las byung ba'i kha dog dmar po /
T02TD1784E:257a-9: gdong gsum lag pa drug pa /
T02TD1784E:257a-11: lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa na rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa lag pa lhag ma rnams rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:257a-12: 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma 'dzin pa /
T02TD1784E:257a-13: mgo bo la zla ba phyed kyis brgyan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:257a-14: ral pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa sgeg pa'i ro dang bcas pa'i phang par lha mo au ma 'dzin cing de'i nu ma reg par byed pa'i drag po bsams la /
T02TD1784E:257a-15: de la snga ma bzhin du byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ba gsol zhing spros te /
T02TD1784E:257a-16: de nas gdul bya'i 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi sems can gyi khams bstan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:257a-17: smin pa la sogs pas rnam par sbyangs la snang ba mtha' yas kyi zhing la bzhag cing khams gsum na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad lha mo au ma la thim zhing de nye bar spyod cing de rnams slar yang bsdus te /
T02TD1784E:257a-18: rang gi bdag nyid de dang dbyer med par bsams nas /
T02TD1784E:257a-19: de'i tshe gsung rdo rje'i dngos grub rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:257a-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas khyab 'jug gi dam tshig gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:257a-21: zhe sdang gi rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dam tshig 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:257a-22: khams gsum na gnas pa'i ji snyed sems can gyi rigs yod pa de rnams bsam gtan rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin gyis gsad par bya ba ni nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:257a-23: yang na khams gsum yang cig car du'o zhes khyab 'jug gi dam tshig go //
T02TD1784E:257a-25: re zhig dang po rang gi bdag nyid mi bskyod par bsams la /
T02TD1784E:257b-0: m'a ma @257b k'i'i padma'i nang du yi ge h'um las byung ba'i kha dog ljang gu /
T02TD1784E:257b-1: gdong gsum pa lag pa bzhi pa /
T02TD1784E:257b-2: gdong g-yas pa dang g-yon pa ni phag dang mi dang seng ge ste /
T02TD1784E:257b-3: lag pa bzhi la 'khor lo dang be con dang /
T02TD1784E:257b-4: dung dang padma 'dzin pa nam mkha' lding la gnas pa /
T02TD1784E:257b-5: ral pa'i cod pan gyi steng du sna tshogs pa'i rin po ches byas pa'i rgyan 'dzin pa /
T02TD1784E:257b-6: phang pa g-yon pa la lha mo padma 'dzin cing de'i nu ma reg pa'i sbyor bas gnas pa'i khyab 'jug bsams te /
T02TD1784E:257b-7: snga ma bzhin du dbang bskur zhing phyi rol du spros te /
T02TD1784E:257b-8: zhe sdang gi rigs kyi sems can rnams bstan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:257b-9: smin pa la sogs pas rnam par sbyang zhing mngon par dga' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la bzhag cing khams gsum skye bo rnams dang bral zhing ston par bltas la slar yang bsdus te /
T02TD1784E:257b-10: de dang dbyer med pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:257b-12: sku yi rdo rje tshangs par gyur //
T02TD1784E:257b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:257b-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnod sbyin mo'i dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:257b-15: khrag dang sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:257b-16: gnod sbyin mo rnams ni khrag dang sha za ba dang /
T02TD1784E:257b-18: de rnams rdo rje 'chang chen po ni rnal 'byor pas dam tshig de rnams nyid kyis mnyes par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:257b-19: de yang le'u bcu drug pa las bshad zin to //
T02TD1784E:257b-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas klu mo'i dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:257b-21: 'o ma 'thung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:257b-22: klu mo de rnams ni phra ma'i tshig gi gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:257b-23: 'o ma 'thung ba dang me tog dang dri la sogs pa la dga' ba ste /
T02TD1784E:257b-24: de rnams 'o ma 'thung ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig de rnams nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:257b-25: gal te de ltar mi byed na de'i tshe nyon mongs 'gyur ba ni rnal 'byor pa des klu mo'i dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:257b-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas lha ma yin gyi du mo'i dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:257b-27: khro zhing rgyal zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams khro bo'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:257b-28: bud med gzhan la chags pa la phrag dog byed pa dang /
T02TD1784E:257b-29: me tog dang dri la sogs pa la dga' ba ste /
T02TD1784E:257b-30: de rnams rdo rje 'jigs byed dang /
T02TD1784E:258a-0: rdo rje sa 'og gi sbyor bas @258a * //
T02TD1784E:258a-1: sa 'og tu zhugs pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:258a-2: dpal rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud kyi rgyal po las kyang /
T02TD1784E:258a-3: phag dang 'bigs byed ri bo las //
T02TD1784E:258a-4: 'og dang steng du sgo chen te //
T02TD1784E:258a-6: mdor bsdus pas ni rab bshad bya //
T02TD1784E:258a-7: svi ta mthong bar 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1784E:258a-8: gang du spre'u rnams zhugs pa ste //
T02TD1784E:258a-9: gang du spre'u yi bdag po rnams //
T02TD1784E:258a-10: mun par zla gcig bskor ba'o //
T02TD1784E:258a-11: lha yi gzugs can 'od mo che //
T02TD1784E:258a-12: ri rab mdog mtshungs kyi bu mo //
T02TD1784E:258a-13: rang snang zhes bya'i bu mo de //
T02TD1784E:258a-14: de tshe de rnams kyis thob bo //
T02TD1784E:258a-16: bu mos de rnams de las phyung ;
T02TD1784E:258a-17: / sgo ni gzhan gyis skad cig mas //
T02TD1784E:258a-18: rgya mtshor phyin par gyur pa dang //
T02TD1784E:258a-19: lha min rgyal po ma la ya'i //
T02TD1784E:258a-20: gser zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod //
T02TD1784E:258a-21: gser gyi khang bzangs phreng ba rnams //
T02TD1784E:258a-22: grong khyer der ni yod pa de //
T02TD1784E:258a-24: lha yi bcud len de bzhin du //
T02TD1784E:258a-25: sna tshogs 'grub pa'i rdzas rnams te //
T02TD1784E:258a-26: sngon ni ma yin byas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:258a-27: nyi khri chig stong grangs ldan pa'i //
T02TD1784E:258a-28: mchog gi bud med des gnas te //
T02TD1784E:258a-29: gser gyi mdog 'dra'i mchog de rnams //
T02TD1784E:258a-30: sgrub po mchog gis thob par bya //
T02TD1784E:258a-31: der ni sgrub pa pos bzhugs bya //
T02TD1784E:258a-32: rang snang bu mo thob pa'i phyir ;
T02TD1784E:258a-33: / bzhin bzangs de ni lha yi ni //
T02TD1784E:258a-34: gnas kyi mchog la gnas pa ste //
T02TD1784E:258a-35: sgrub pa pos ni der phyin nas //
T02TD1784E:258a-37: bskyed bzangs des yang de mchod nas //
T02TD1784E:258a-38: grong khyer de ni bstan byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:258a-39: ji srid zla ba skar ma'i bar //
T02TD1784E:258a-40: de dang lhan cig der gnas byas //
T02TD1784E:258a-41: mar me dang ni rkang mgyogs dang //
T02TD1784E:258a-42: bza' ba mig sman gyis zhugs bya //
T02TD1784E:258a-43: lha min gsod pa'i dod pa yis //
T02TD1784E:258a-44: grong khyer dbang pos sngon 'jig ste //
T02TD1784E:258a-45: de nas brtsams te grong khyer de //
T02TD1784E:258a-47: star ka yi ni pags pa dang /
T02TD1784E:258a-48: bu mo'i sa bon dang bcas te //
T02TD1784E:258a-49: zan du gu gul rgya skyegs bcas //
T02TD1784E:258a-50: des ni dbyig pa gos par bya //
T02TD1784E:258a-51: pad rtsa'i skud pas bsgril nas ni //
T02TD1784E:258a-53: sngags kyis 'bar bar byas nas ni //
T02TD1784E:258a-54: zhag ni mang po yongs bskor bya //
T02TD1784E:258a-55: shing ni ma da na 'bras dag //
T02TD1784E:258a-56: ga g'a dz'a nga gha dkar po dang //
T02TD1784E:258b-0: ba ni @258b dkar mo'i mar dang ni //
T02TD1784E:258b-1: yang na kye bu ser mo yin //
T02TD1784E:258b-2: ka ba na da'i khu ba bcas //
T02TD1784E:258b-3: de ni rkang mgyogs yang dag yin //
T02TD1784E:258b-4: rdo rje sprin ni thams cad dang //
T02TD1784E:258b-5: sa yi 'dab ma chu rnams dang //
T02TD1784E:258b-6: me 'obs thams cad kun rnams su //
T02TD1784E:258b-8: rdo rje'i 'bras dag blangs nas ni //
T02TD1784E:258b-9: n'a ga yi ni sa bon bcas //
T02TD1784E:258b-10: ka'i de'i sa bon dang bcas pa'i //
T02TD1784E:258b-11: mkhas pas thug pa bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1784E:258b-12: mar bcas 'grangs pa de zos nas //
T02TD1784E:258b-13: bkres bral zla ba gnyis kyi bar //
T02TD1784E:258b-14: sa bon dang ni phug rnams su //
T02TD1784E:258b-16: mig sman rnams ni gang bshad pa //
T02TD1784E:258b-17: de yis dngos po ji bzhin gsungs //
T02TD1784E:258b-18: khong gseng gtso bo rnams zhugs la //
T02TD1784E:258b-19: de ni cho ga yang dag bshad //
T02TD1784E:258b-21: grong khyer de ni bshad par te //
T02TD1784E:258b-22: sa yi bye brag so so ru //
T02TD1784E:258b-23: der ni sgrub pa pos mthong 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:258b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pa'am rim pa gzhan gyis lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:258b-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:258b-26: thod rus zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1784E:258b-27: srin mo de rnams la thod pa'i nang du mi'i rus pa'i phye ma'i spos ni dgug par bya ba'i phyir byin te mi'i mar khu'i mar me dang /
T02TD1784E:258b-29: rang byung ba'i me tog gi aargham byin te dga' bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:258b-30: de nyid kyi phyir 'byung po kun ni srin po rnams kyi dam tshig dag byed pa ni /
T02TD1784E:258b-32: don chen byed pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed pa'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:258b-33: mkha' 'gro ma sgrub pa ni 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:258b-34: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD1784E:258b-35: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:258b-36: bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:258b-37: bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi rnams de rnams la gtor mar phul te /
T02TD1784E:258b-38: rang gis kyang spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:258b-39: sha chen de la la sogs pa la yang de rnams la phul te rang gis kyang btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:258b-40: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ba des gsang bya ni bla ma smod pa la sogs pa la mngon spyod bya'o //
T02TD1784E:259a-0: gang gis she na gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni sngags la sogs pa'i sgrub pa po rnams kyis @259a * //
T02TD1784E:259a-2: / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa 'di rnams ngo bo nyid kyi phyir sku 'byung ba ni /
T02TD1784E:259a-3: rdo rje 'chang gi bkas 'jig rten rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir rgya che ba'i spyod pa la dmigs te /
T02TD1784E:259a-4: khams gsum na spyod pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:259a-5: de'i phyir rgya che ba kho na'i spyod pa la brten te /
T02TD1784E:259a-6: de rnams kyi dam tshig rang dang gzhan la dngos grub thams cad 'dod pa'i phyir spyod na des ni nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:259a-7: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sgrub pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:259a-8: khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig rnams te /
T02TD1784E:259a-9: de rnams kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i khyab par byed pa nyid gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1784E:259a-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas lus kyi dngos grub 'grub par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:259a-11: dam tshig rdo rje ni rdo rje bzhin du brtan pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:259a-12: lus kyi rnam gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:259a-13: lus kyi rnam gsum ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1784E:259a-14: de nyid rdo rje las byung ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo gal te byed na de'i tshe sems can gyi khams dang rang gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi sku nyid du thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:259a-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ngag gi dngos grub ni tha mal pa'i ngag log pas dam tshig ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:259a-16: de gsungs te tshig gi las gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:259a-17: tshig gi las gnas ni ngag gi bya ba ste /
T02TD1784E:259a-18: ma lus pa ni rnam pa bzhi'i dge ba'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:259a-19: de nyid khams gsum dri med ni snang ba mtha' yas te de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni de nyid du gzung bar byas na /
T02TD1784E:259a-20: de ni tshig gi dngos grub ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ngag thob par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:259a-21: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD1784E:259a-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems rdo rje ni sems nyid de /
T02TD1784E:259a-23: de'i dngos grub ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i go 'phang thob pa ste /
T02TD1784E:259a-24: de'i don du dam tshig ni rnam pa gsum gyis sems 'dul ba ste /
T02TD1784E:259b-0: de gsungs @259b pa yid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:259b-1: yid kyi rdo rje dam tshig ni rdo rje bzhin du mi phyed pa'i mnar sems la sogs pa las ldog pa ste /
T02TD1784E:259b-2: de dag thams cad brtan par rdo rje 'dzin ni mi bskyed pas rnam par dag pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:259b-3: rdo rje gsum gyis mi phyed pa'i gzugs gang la yod pa de ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:259b-5: dam tshig ni lus la sogs pa bcu ste /
T02TD1784E:259b-6: de rnams kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gang las byung ba de ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal te zhes dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1784E:259b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngags thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:259b-9: de dag gi rdo rje dam tshig ni phyag btsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:259b-10: de nyid gsungs pa sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:259b-11: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1784E:259b-12: sangs rgyas la sogs pa la sku gsung thugs ni tha mal pa'i lus la sogs pas phyag mi bya'o //
T02TD1784E:259b-13: gal te byed na de'i tshe ma rung ba ni tha mal pa'i so so'i skye bo nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:259b-14: de bas na rang gi lha'i nga rgyal la dmigs te /
T02TD1784E:259b-15: rang dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa de rnams la phyag 'tshal bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:259b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig bshad par bya ba'i phyir kun du rdo rje sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:259b-17: sku gsung thugs ni dkyil 'khor gsum dang /
T02TD1784E:259b-19: de ltar na dkyil 'khor bzhi de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:259b-20: rdo rje gsum sbyor ba ni 'jug pa la sogs pa /
T02TD1784E:259b-21: bsam gtan ni sna'i rtse mor spro ba ste /
T02TD1784E:259b-22: sngags kyi 'khor lo ni yi ge gsum gyis bskor bar bya ba ste /
T02TD1784E:259b-23: g-yas pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas kha dog dmar po la sogs pas bya ba ste /
T02TD1784E:259b-24: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:259b-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:259b-26: sngags thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:259b-27: sdom pa ni phyag 'tshal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:260a-1: gsungs pa mdor na sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:260a-2: sems can khams rnams ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams te /
T02TD1784E:260a-3: de rnams mdor bsdus pas gcig tu byas na ye shes gsum 'byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:260a-4: de rnam rdo rje ni 'od gsal bas bskul ba ni bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260a-5: rdo rje gsum gyis phyag 'tshal ba de /
T02TD1784E:260a-6: mchog ni shin tu phul du byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:260a-7: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis spang bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1784E:260a-8: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:260a-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnyed pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa'i dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:260a-10: rdo rje bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam mkha' ni shes rab dang dbyings ni thabs te /
T02TD1784E:260a-11: de dag gi sbyor bas bshang gci ni padma dang rdo rje ste de dag gcig tu bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260a-12: de'i rjes la rdo rje h'um dang /
T02TD1784E:260a-13: phat la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis yongs su gang ba ni byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1784E:260a-14: rnam par bsam pa ni bskyod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260a-15: de'i rjes la dus gsum rdo rje ni 'dod chags la sogs pa gsum po ste /
T02TD1784E:260a-16: de rnams dbul ba ni bzhi pa la thim par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260a-17: dam tshig ni bsgom pa'i khyad par 'di /
T02TD1784E:260a-18: rab ni rang rig pa dang /
T02TD1784E:260a-19: rtag pa ni mi g-yo ba'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no zhes ston te /
T02TD1784E:260a-20: rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
T02TD1784E:260a-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje mi snang ba ni rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa dang bral ba'i dam tshig ni bsgom pa'i rim pa gsungs pa ste dus bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:260a-22: dus bzhi ni bcom ldan 'das yi ge h'um cha bzhi dang ldan pa sgom par byed pa ni snying gal sogs pa'i gnas bzhi po la dgod cing bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260a-24: nyin re ni nyin mo dang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1784E:260a-25: de la snying gar ni mgo med ha dang /
T02TD1784E:260a-27: gsang ba ni zhabs kyu dang /
T02TD1784E:260a-29: de lta bu'i bsgom pa byas nas /
T02TD1784E:260a-30: rdzas ni rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi mtshan nyid can gyis sems 'phrog pa ni 'jig par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260a-31: dam tshig 'di rdo rje ni sgrub pa po'i rdzogs byed de bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:260a-32: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-0: yang dus bzhi @260b ni stong pa bzhi ste /
T02TD1784E:260b-1: nyin re ni skad cig ma la sogs pa la spyod pa ni bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:260b-2: de'i tshe rdzas ni rang bzhin gyi tshogs /
T02TD1784E:260b-3: 'phrog pa ni nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-4: dam tshig rdo rje rdzogs byed pa ni 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'i dam tshig 'di yin no zhes ston te /
T02TD1784E:260b-5: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-6: yang na dus bzhi ni go bzlog pa ste /
T02TD1784E:260b-7: thams cad stong pa nas brtsams te stong pa'i bar du'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-8: mchog bzhin ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
T02TD1784E:260b-9: rdzas ni lha'i spyod pa ni ldang bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:260b-10: 'phrog pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnam par rtog pa spang bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-11: dam tshig 'di rdo rje ni khams gsum pa'i rdzogs byed ni bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:260b-12: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-13: yang na dus bzhi ni 'dod chags la sogs pa gsum po dang /
T02TD1784E:260b-15: de dag spyod pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa gsum po rnam par sbyang bar bya ba'am ro gcig par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-16: gal te brtan par mi 'gyur na de'i tshe rdzas ni ril por 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:260b-17: rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis po la 'phrog pa ni dmigs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-18: dam tshig rdo rje ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa rdzogs pa'i byed pa'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:260b-19: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-20: yang na dus bzhi ni rim pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-21: de ltar byas nas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rdo rje'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-22: rdzas ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa ste /
T02TD1784E:260b-23: de 'phrog pa ni gnyis su med par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-24: dam tshig rdo rje ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i rdzogs byed ni mthar thob par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:260b-25: de'i 'og tu slob bzhin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:260b-26: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:260b-27: rlung gi de nyid go rims kyis //
T02TD1784E:260b-28: sngags kyi de nyid la 'jug bya //
T02TD1784E:260b-31: slar zhing cung zad mi slob po ;
T02TD1784E:260b-32: / zhes 'byung ste zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:260b-33: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:260b-34: nam mkha' rig 'dzin ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ste /
T02TD1784E:260b-35: de'i dam tshig ni sgom pa gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:260b-36: sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:261a-0: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad la @261a * //
T02TD1784E:261a-1: sogs ba'i rnal 'byor ba rnams te /
T02TD1784E:261a-2: de dag gis rang gi bdag nyid gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur bsam ste /
T02TD1784E:261a-3: dbu brgyan ni cod pan du de rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:261a-4: de ltar byed na rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ni khams gsum na gnas pa'i drag po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:261a-5: khros pa de rnams kyis kyang sgrub pa po de rnams thub par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:261a-6: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:261a-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:261a-8: sngags pa thams cad 'dzin pa ni sgrub pa po rnams te /
T02TD1784E:261a-9: de rnams kyi las dang po'i dam tshig ni slob bzhin pa'i bslab pa gsungs ba ste /
T02TD1784E:261a-10: sku yi rdo rje kha zas la //
T02TD1784E:261a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:261a-12: zan za ba'i dus su lus tshim par bya ba'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:261a-13: de bzhin du phyi rol ni sna tshogs pa'i bsam pa rnams la rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rang gi bdag nyid mi bskyod par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:261a-14: de bzhin du mdo sde la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos klog pa'i dus su /
T02TD1784E:261a-15: rdo rje chos ni rang gi bdag nyid snang ba mtha' yas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:261a-16: snyoms par zhugs pa dang mchod pa'i dus su rang gi bdag nyid rin chen 'byung ldan dang don yod grub par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:261a-17: le'u drug pa las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:261a-18: ngo bo nyid dag pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to zhes dang sbyar te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:261a-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:261a-20: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos /
T02TD1784E:261a-21: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid ni sku la sogs pa'i ro mnyam par 'gyur ba nyid bstan pa'i nus pa thob pa gzhan gyi sems mkhyen pa'i bdag nyid che bas thob par dgongs te /
T02TD1784E:261a-22: da ni bstan pa gzhan gyis ci bgyi'o zhes dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur te /
T02TD1784E:261a-23: 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la cig car du zhugs so zhes bya ba ni tshig gi don to //
T02TD1784E:261b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung pa nyid rtogs nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa @261b rnams la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad gsol to //
T02TD1784E:261b-1: brjod du med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:261b-2: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:261b-3: kye bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams gzhal bya ma rdzogs pas 'di lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:261b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:261b-5: de ci'i slad du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te /
T02TD1784E:261b-6: gang gi phyir ston pa rnams ni gzhal bya phyed gsungs pas de 'joms par mdzad pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:261b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi bskyod pa la sogs pas 'di skad bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:261b-8: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:261b-9: kye byang chub sems dpa' rnams bcom ldan 'das 'di glo bur pa'i ngal ba la sogs pa mi spyod pa'am /
T02TD1784E:261b-10: phrag dog gi dbang gis cang mi gsung bar gyur pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:261b-11: 'on kyang le'u bcu gsum pa las gsungs pas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid de /
T02TD1784E:261b-12: de nyid rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:261b-13: yi ge ni mi 'gyur ba dang 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gyi khams gsum pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir gnas te /
T02TD1784E:261b-14: de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can /
T02TD1784E:261b-15: yi ge ni mi 'gyur ba'i de kho na nyid la dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te /
T02TD1784E:261b-16: de kho na nyid mngon du mdzad pa'o ;
T02TD1784E:261b-17: / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de nyid bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:261b-18: rigs kyi bu'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:261b-19: rigs kyi bu ni rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'i byams pa la sogs pa rnams /
T02TD1784E:261b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di dgongs nas 'di snyam du gyur pa ni 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par rtog pa zhi ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1784E:261b-22: sku mi 'gyur ba ma skyes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:262a-0: sku ni lus nyid mi 'gyur ba ni yi ge bzhin du brjod pa @262a * //
T02TD1784E:262a-2: ma skyes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i phyir dang po nas ma skyes pa'o //
T02TD1784E:262a-3: de bzhin du gsung dang thugs ni ngag dang sems kyang mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1784E:262a-4: de la ngag ni gzhan rtog par byed pa nyid de /
T02TD1784E:262a-5: brjod bya dang rjod byed kyi ngo bos brtan par byed pa nyid dang ;
T02TD1784E:262a-6: sems ni chos thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
T02TD1784E:262a-7: de dag thams cad don dam pas dpyad na mi rigs so //
T02TD1784E:262a-8: dper na re zhig lus ni gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa kho na yin no //
T02TD1784E:262a-9: ngag kyang sgra'i bdag nyid de /
T02TD1784E:262a-10: sgra ni brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig pa'i phyir don dang de de la 'brel ba med do //
T02TD1784E:262a-11: gang gi phyir sgra dang don la de'i bdag nyid 'brel pa'am /
T02TD1784E:262a-12: de las byung ba'i 'brel pa yod ce na /
T02TD1784E:262a-13: re zhig dang po ni mi rigs te /
T02TD1784E:262a-14: sgra dang don ni tha dad pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:262a-15: sgra ni kha la dmigs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:262a-16: don kyang phyi rol du ste /
T02TD1784E:262a-17: gang gi phyir tha mi dad pas de'i phyir bdag nyid rigs pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:262a-18: shing dang sha pa bzhin du'o //
T02TD1784E:262a-19: bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa'i dngos po ni rnam par rtog pa'i gzhan sel gyi blos tha snyad bya ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:262a-20: de las byung ba'i 'brel pa yang med pa ste /
T02TD1784E:262a-21: gang gi phyir de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su 'brang bas 'byung ba ni me dang du ba bzhin du ste /
T02TD1784E:262a-22: me yod na du ba byung ba dang me med na du ba shi ba la sogs pa /
T02TD1784E:262a-23: gzhan rnams nus pa so sor 'gags pas du ba mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:262a-24: de bas na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par gyur pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i gnas skabs bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:262a-25: 'dir ni rnam pa deng dang 'dra ba yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:262a-26: don yod na yang gzhan dang 'brel pa'i sems la sgra mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:262a-27: don med na yang rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i sgra rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:262a-28: de bas na don dang lhan cig tu sgra rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa med pa ste /
T02TD1784E:262a-29: sgra'i tha snyad 'di 'khrul pa yin no /
T02TD1784E:262a-30: 'o na rnam par rtog pa dang lhan cig tu sgra rnams la de las byung ba'i 'brel pa yod pa kho na yin te /
T02TD1784E:262a-32: sgra ni rnam par rtog rgyu dang //
T02TD1784E:262a-33: rnam rtog sgra yi rgyu yin no //
T02TD1784E:262a-35: de bas na rnam par rtog pa ni don mthong ba med pa ma yin pas 'byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:262b-0: 'brel pa @262b yod pa de kho na yin te /
T02TD1784E:262b-1: 'brel pa can gyi 'brel pas sgra dang don la 'brel pa yod pa kho na yin no zhe na /
T02TD1784E:262b-2: de skad ma zer cig / gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa yang don mthong bar 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:262b-3: rgyun du rgyu ba'i rnam par shes pa rnams don la mi ltos pas 'byung ba'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:262b-4: dran pa dang ngo shes pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams don la mi ltos bas 'byung ba'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:262b-5: dran pa dang ngo shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:262b-6: rnam par rtog pa rnams ni thog ma med pa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyi 'byung bar gyur ba ste /
T02TD1784E:262b-7: don gyi rnam par rtog pa de rnams la cung zad kyang phan par gyur pa ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:262b-8: gzhan yang na le ke ra'i gling na gnas pa rnams la dngos po'i don mthong na yang rnam par rtog pa gang yang mi 'byung zhe na /
T02TD1784E:262b-9: de yang mi rigs te nges par dngos po ma yin pa'i yul can yul dang dus kyi bye brag ma nges pa'i dngos po dang 'dra ba'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:262b-10: sngar nyams su myong ba'i na le ke ra'i shing mthong ba'i khyad par bzhin du'o //
T02TD1784E:262b-11: ci'i phyir sngar nyams su myong ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i don med ma yin pa'i yul nyid yin te /
T02TD1784E:262b-12: ngag rnams ni yul med pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:262b-13: ha cang thal bar gyur pas chog go //
T02TD1784E:262b-14: sems kyang dngos po gzung bar byed pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:262b-15: gang gi phyir phyi'i dngos po ni re zhig gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:262b-16: de bas na gzung ba med na 'dzin pa yang med pa ste /
T02TD1784E:262b-17: sems ni rig par byed pa ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:262b-18: gzhan yang gal te phyi rol gyi dngos pos sems skyed par byed pa yin na /
T02TD1784E:262b-19: 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa'am da ltar byung ba des bskyed pa ma yin zhe na /
T02TD1784E:262b-20: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag ni med pa'i phyir de dag la skyed par byed pa'i nus pa med do //
T02TD1784E:262b-21: da ltar byung ba yang skad cig ma gnyis kyis gnon pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin ta /
T02TD1784E:262b-22: des kyang sems bskyed par mi nus so ;
T02TD1784E:262b-23: /'on gal te dus gcig tu don gyi skad cig mas sems kyi skad cig ma skyed par byed na de'i tshe sems don gyi yul ci'i phyir ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:262b-24: de bas na sems gzung ba dang don 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:263a-0: gal te don bems po yin pa'i phyir 'dzin ba ma yin na 'o na de rnams tha @263a * //
T02TD1784E:263a-2: de bas na ba'i rva gnyis bzhin du gang yang skyed par byed pa ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:263a-3: de'i phyir 'dzin pa nyid med pas sems kyi mtshan nyid med pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:263a-4: de bas na lus ngag sems kyi mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02TD1784E:263a-5: nam mkha'i rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba ste ;
T02TD1784E:263a-6: de nyid rtog pa ni de las 'byung ba'i lha'i gzugs te /
T02TD1784E:263a-7: log par gzung ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdus pa'i phyir 'ja' tshon bzhin snang bar 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:263a-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:263a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gsan ma thag tu 'jam dpal la sogs pas 'di skad gsol te /
T02TD1784E:263a-10: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsol ba gdab pa 'jam dpal nye bar gzung ba ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pas rno ba nyid bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:263a-11: bcom ldan 'das ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:263a-12: mi'i sgra ni dgag pa la'o//
T02TD1784E:263a-13: gsung rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstan pa'i gsung de ltar phyin ci log ba ni bden pa ma yin par /
T02TD1784E:263a-14: mi rtag tu gsol ba ni rtag par ma mdzad cig ces pa ste /
T02TD1784E:263a-15: gang zhig lus la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1784E:263a-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na pa ni gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sngar bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs te /
T02TD1784E:263a-17: de nyid kyi gang zhig rdo rje dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni ye shes lnga ste /
T02TD1784E:263a-18: de rnams kyi spyod pa ni mngon du byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:263a-19: de la rjes su 'gro ba ni zhugs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:263a-20: 'ong ba ni de las bzhengs shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:263a-21: rdo rje 'chang chen po re zhig khams gsum pa la phan pa mdzad par rab tu grags pa'o //
T02TD1784E:263a-22: de nyid kyi zab pa'i gsung ci'i slad du brdzun du gsung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:263a-23: de ci'i slad du zhes pa ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:263a-24: byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:263a-25: mngon par shes pa thob pa ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams te /
T02TD1784E:263a-26: de dag kyang rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa'i chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni dngos po'i rang bzhin mi shes pa ste /
T02TD1784E:263a-27: zab pa'i phyir mi rtogs na /
T02TD1784E:263b-0: bdag cag smos ci @263b dgos zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul gyis bstan par byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:263b-1: de rnams kyang rang gi sems la rnam par rtog pa 'di ltar byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:263b-2: rdo rje 'chang chen po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lus la sogs pa dang ye shes rnams te /
T02TD1784E:263b-3: de dag gi de kho na nyid ni don dam pa ste ;
T02TD1784E:263b-4: de nyid yongs su zhes pa ni yang dag par rtogs nas gsang ba'i yi ge ni rdo rje'i tshul gyis chos bstan par mdzad pa'am /
T02TD1784E:263b-5: yang na ma rtogs nas mdzad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:263b-6: de lta bu'i rnam par rtog par byed pa'i tshangs pa la sogs mkhyen nas de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir rdo rje 'chang gis 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las cig car du bzhengs te /
T02TD1784E:263b-7: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku blang bar mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:263b-8: zab pa'i don ma rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la /
T02TD1784E:263b-9: mi bskyod pa la sogs pas 'di skad gsungs te /
T02TD1784E:263b-10: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i bod pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:263b-11: de nyid rgyud kyi rigs pas bskor te /
T02TD1784E:263b-12: byang chub sems dpa' ni tshangs pa la sogs pa ste mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:263b-13: de rnams smos ci dgos te /
T02TD1784E:263b-14: nyid ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa yang /
T02TD1784E:263b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po'o//
T02TD1784E:263b-16: gsang ba'i mi 'gyur ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid de /
T02TD1784E:263b-17: de rnyed pa ni thos nas sku gsung thugs kyi byang chub ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku yongs su bzung ba dang /
T02TD1784E:263b-18: 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid mi shes ni mngon du byed par ma gyur to //
T02TD1784E:263b-19: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa ni skye ba med pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rnam par shes pa thams cad rang bzhin gyi tshogs 'gags pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi thams cad stong pa ste /
T02TD1784E:263b-20: de nyid mngon par byang chub ni rim pa gzhan gyis phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1784E:263b-21: ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su 'jog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur ba ste /
T02TD1784E:263b-22: ngo bo nyid med pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi dri ma dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba las 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyis ngo bor grags pa'o //
T02TD1784E:263b-23: de lta bu'i chos nyid nges kyis kyang mngon du byed par dka' ba yin na /
T02TD1784E:263b-24: tshangs pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams lta smos ci dgos zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:263b-26: dbu ma'i lam ni de nyid dang //
T02TD1784E:264a-1: rnams bdag med de nyid dang //
T02TD1784E:264a-2: yang dag mtha' dang de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1784E:264a-3: stong pa nyid kyang de nyid do //
T02TD1784E:264a-4: mnyam pa nyid dang grol ba nyid //
T02TD1784E:264a-5: rnam par rig tsam de nyid do //
T02TD1784E:264a-6: chos kun nang du 'gro ba'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:264a-7: yun ring ma yin nye ba min //
T02TD1784E:264a-8: de bzhin nyid de rtogs dka'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:264a-9: phra bar gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi //
T02TD1784E:264a-10: phra phyir rang gis rig 'gyur te //
T02TD1784E:264a-11: rags pa'i blo can nged rnams kyis //
T02TD1784E:264a-12: rang gnas na yang mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:264a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:264a-14: chad pa'i lta ba sel ba'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:264a-15: byang chub de yang rnyed par mi dka' ste /
T02TD1784E:264a-16: ci'i phyir rigs kyi bu zhes bya la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:264a-17: ji srid sems can ni 'gro ba rnams te /
T02TD1784E:264a-18: de dag sems can gyi khongs su gtogs pa ni rnam pa bzhis bsdu ba ste /
T02TD1784E:264a-19: de dag thams cad byang chub ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid dang po nas thob cing gnas par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:264a-20: chos nyid ni rang bzhin gyis grub pas bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:264a-21: bskyed par bya ba yin na 'dus byas pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:264a-22: 'on ci'i phyir sems can rnams grol bar ma gyur zhe na /
T02TD1784E:264a-23: de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:264a-24: sku gsung thugs ni de rnams nye bar sdud par byed pa'i rdo rje ye shes ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir lam dang bla ma'i zhal las thob nas sems de dag sku gsung rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:264a-25: de'i chos nyid ni don dam pa'i 'od gsal ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:264a-26: de bas na glo bur ba'i dri ma sel bar bya ba'i phyir lam dang /
T02TD1784E:264a-27: bla ma rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba yin te /
T02TD1784E:264a-28: de kho na nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:264a-29: de bas na de kho na nyid ni rnyed par sla ba yin pa dang /
T02TD1784E:264a-30: rnyed par dka' ba yang ngo //
T02TD1784E:264a-31: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis de kho na nyid mngon du mdzad pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur te /
T02TD1784E:264a-32: mi mkhyen pa la sogs ba gzhan gyis yin no zhes khyed rnams la the tshom ma bskyed cig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:264a-34: rnal 'byor rig pas rnams kyang ni //
T02TD1784E:264a-35: thar par yun ring sems mi bya //
T02TD1784E:264a-36: kun brtags ngo bos stong pa yi //
T02TD1784E:264a-37: bdag nyid mthong ba thar pa yin //
T02TD1784E:264b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub @264b sems dpa' rnams kyi drin lan gsan nas don de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos /
T02TD1784E:264b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:264b-2: rang bzhin dag cing bdag med la //
T02TD1784E:264b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:264b-4: rang bzhin dag pa ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos 'di rnams thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:264b-5: gnas med pa ni yongs su brtags pa'i so sor nges ba dang ldan pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1784E:264b-6: de bzhin du gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:264b-8: 'on byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gro ba'i don ji ltar mdzad ce na /
T02TD1784E:264b-9: rtog pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD1784E:264b-10: des rdo rje 'ja' tshon dang 'dra ba'i sku blang ba ste /
T02TD1784E:264b-11: de las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba rnams so //
T02TD1784E:264b-12: de bas na sgyu ma lta bu'i sku la brten te bya ba thams cad dang /
T02TD1784E:264b-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams smra bar byed pa ni brjod pa kun rdzob kyis bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:264b-14: 'od gsal ba la dmigs te rang rig pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:264b-15: smra ba yin na de rnams brjod du mi nus pa ste /
T02TD1784E:264b-16: lha dang dmyal ba pa rnams kyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshor ba ston pa bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:264b-17: bu mo'i dga' ba bzhin du ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD1784E:264b-18: sems rnam par dag pa dang mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD1784E:264b-19: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:264b-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa ste /
T02TD1784E:264b-21: kye bcom ldan 'das gang zhig sngar zhi ba la sogs pa'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams gsungs pa de rnams gang las byung ba dang gang du gnas pa lags zhes dris pa de'i dgos pa 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:264b-22: re zhig 'od gsal ba dang sgyu ma'i sku dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa nyid yin te /
T02TD1784E:264b-23: gang zhig dngos grub 'di rnams de ltar spros pa mang pos bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
T02TD1784E:264b-24: de rnams de las byung ba'am der gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes the tshom gyi sa bon no //
T02TD1784E:264b-25: rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1784E:264b-26: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:265a-1: thugs kyi rdo rje ni rang gi 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD1784E:265a-2: de las byung ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni sgyu ma'i sku ste /
T02TD1784E:265a-3: dngos grub de rnams de la gnas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:265a-4: de nyid la brten te 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:265a-6: 'di ni shin tu nyung ba bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:265a-7: khams gsum pa de dag kyang 'di nyid du gnas pa dang de nyid las 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:265a-8: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:265a-9: rlung gi sbyor ba med pa yis //
T02TD1784E:265a-10: sems kyi rang bzhin gzung mi 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:265a-11: rang bzhin rgyur gyur sems las ni //
T02TD1784E:265a-12: las dang skye ba yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1784E:265a-13: rlung dang bcas pa de nyid ni //
T02TD1784E:265a-14: rnam par shes pa gsum po las //
T02TD1784E:265a-15: rnal 'byor pa yi sku skyes te //
T02TD1784E:265a-16: sgyu ma'i sku ni de bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:265a-17: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD1784E:265a-18: thams cad de dang 'dra bar mthong //
T02TD1784E:265a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:265a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol pa /
T02TD1784E:265a-21: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams thob pa dang /
T02TD1784E:265a-22: khams gsum ni sku gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:265a-23: de dag gang nas byung ba dang gang du gnas zhes 'dri ba'o //
T02TD1784E:265a-25: nam mkha' ni 'od gsal ba la gnas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:265a-26: de nyid las byung ba dang /
T02TD1784E:265a-27: thams cad ni de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:265a-29: nam mkha' gang na gnas zhes pa ni dri ba'o //
T02TD1784E:265a-30: gang na yang ma yin no zhes pa ni khyab par byed pa'i phyir so sor nges pa dang ldan pa med pas nam mkha' dang 'dra ba yin no zhes dgongs ba'o //
T02TD1784E:265a-31: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:265a-32: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jam dpal la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:265a-33: de rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni thos pa dang /
T02TD1784E:265a-34: rmad du gyur pa ni bsams pa dang de'i 'og tu don 'di nyid bsgoms pas 'di ltar gsungs pa ste ;
T02TD1784E:265a-35: ae ma ho zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:265a-36: ae ma ho rdo rje zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba dang /
T02TD1784E:265a-37: yar ae ma ho rdo rje ni de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dang /
T02TD1784E:265a-38: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:265a-39: rdo rje ni de las byung ba'i sgyu ma lta bu'i sku ste /
T02TD1784E:265b-0: de nyid bstan pa ni rab tu bstan pa ste de ni ngo mtshar @265b ba'o ;
T02TD1784E:265b-2: gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:265b-3: 'od gsal ba gang du lus ni snang ba'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1784E:265b-4: ngag ni snang ba mched pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD1784E:265b-5: sems ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:265b-6: de ru zhes pa ni de nyid las gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku'i rnam pa rnam par sgom pa ni khyad par du 'gro ba'i don du spro bar bya ba yin te /
T02TD1784E:265b-7: de ni shin tu ngo mtshar ba ste /
T02TD1784E:265b-8: sems rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:265b-9: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:265b-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin gzhan gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:265b-11: rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:265b-12: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02TD1784E:265b-13: rnam par shes pa gsum mi snang bar mdzad pas na ston pa'o //
T02TD1784E:265b-14: sangs rgyas kun ni rang bzhin gyi tshogs te /
T02TD1784E:265b-15: de dag gis phyag byas pa ni bral ba'o //
T02TD1784E:265b-16: rdo rje gsum yang yin la blang bar bya ba'i phyir mchog kyang yin pas rdo rje gsum mchog ste stong pa dang /
T02TD1784E:265b-17: shin tu stong pa dang stong pa chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:265b-18: de rnams kyi mchog ni thams cad stod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:265b-19: des mchog ni de'i go 'phang thob pas dam pa'o //
T02TD1784E:265b-20: rdo rje gsum ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:265b-22: de rnams kyi mchog ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:265b-23: dangs grub thabs cad ni stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i bsdu ba ni bsdu bar gyur pa /
T02TD1784E:265b-25: de las byung ba'i skyes bu ni ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin gyi lha'i sku'i rnam par bshad par mdzad pa ni gsungs te sdud pa po'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:265b-26: de ni sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:265b-27: dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas mkha' dbyings ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:265b-28: thams cad stong ba'i mtshan nyid de nyid chos thams cad kyi nang du chud pas na rdo rje de'i dbus gnas pa de'i nang du nye bar bsdus pa /
T02TD1784E:265b-29: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni ye shes gsum bsgom pa ni bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:265b-30: de bzhin du sku dang rdo rje ni sku rdo rje ste lus dang ngag go //
T02TD1784E:265b-31: de dag gi spyi bor ni de'i rjes la rdo rje ste sems so //
T02TD1784E:265b-32: rab tu bsgom pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems khyab par byed pa rang bzhin gyi tshul du de nyid du zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:266a-1: shes rab dang thabs dang nye bar thob pa'i ngo bo sku gsum las byung ba ni khams gsum bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rang bzhin rnams te /
T02TD1784E:266a-2: de rnams kyang rnam par 'phro ba ni de nyid du gsal ba'i ngo bor gyur pa dri ma med par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:266a-3: de ltar 'od gsal ba thob cing rdo rje la sogs pa nyid thob pa'i sgyu ma'i sku bsam pa ni spro zhing myur du ni cig car /
T02TD1784E:266a-4: byang chub ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:266a-5: rigs kyi bye brag ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis /
T02TD1784E:266a-6: tha snyad ni gzugs la sogs pa dang spyod lam bzhin bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:266a-7: gsang ba ni rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T02TD1784E:266a-8: gzhan du ni ting nge 'dzin spong zhing rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rim gyis /
T02TD1784E:266a-9: mchog ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub mi 'gyur ni dga' bas 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:266a-10: rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'di skad bka' stsal to zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02TD1784E:266a-11: de ni sems rnam par dag pa dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dag go //
T02TD1784E:266a-12: de bzhin du rgyal po che ni yi ge dang tshig dang ngag dang ngag chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa yi ge phyi mo bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o //
T02TD1784E:266a-14: dbyings gyur pa ni khrag dang sha dag gi rang bzhin gyi srog dang rtsol ba dag gi rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:266a-15: de nyid yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid du mnyes par byed pa ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas rgyu ba bsams pa ni bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:266a-16: de ltar byas na khyu mchog ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams mnyes par gyur pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:266a-17: rdo rje sku gsum ni chos kyi sku la sogs pa gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:266a-18: des mtshan pa ni de rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:266a-19: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:266a-20: gang zhig ces pa ni rtag pa'i rnal 'byor pa'am rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ba ste /
T02TD1784E:266a-21: byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:266a-22: grags chen ni mchog gi spyod pa rtogs pas grags pa thob pas bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di bsgoms na /
T02TD1784E:266b-0: de ni zhag bdun ni dkyil 'khor @266b bzhi la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rig pa gsum pos sku gsum dngos grub ni sngar bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:266b-2: gzi che ba ni sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa yin no zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:266b-3: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:266b-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:266b-5: sku gsung thugs ni 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1784E:266b-6: 'dod chags bar pa ste de rnams sbyangs pa'i thabs rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:266b-7: de nyid bsdus pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang 'dres pa ste /
T02TD1784E:266b-8: de nyid gsang ba ni rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi yul ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:266b-9: de nyid 'bras bur gyur pa gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:266b-10: sku gsung thugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:266b-11: sku gsung thugs ni dus mtshams dang mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes rnams te /
T02TD1784E:266b-12: de dag phyi'i mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas gang du gcig tu gyur pa de ni sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ste /
T02TD1784E:266b-13: bzhi pa'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD1784E:266b-14: de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:266b-15: de nyid kyi don ni gsum pa dang bral ba'i khyad par ni skad cig ma ste /
T02TD1784E:266b-16: de bstan pa ni bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:266b-17: kun ni de dag thams cad cho ga bzhin ni smig rgyu la sogs pa'i mtshan ma lnga nye bar mtshon pa sngon du 'gro bar sgom pa ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi mngon par byang chub la zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:266b-18: de'i tshe skad cig ni skad cig ma bzhi ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:266b-19: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:266b-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sgrub pa po thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi lus ngag sems gsang ba ni phyi rol gyi phyag rgya ma la sogs pa'i spros pa dang bral ba nyid gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:266b-21: gal te byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:266b-22: lag pa'i phyag rgya ni de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa 'gugs pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD1784E:266b-23: de bcing par mi bya ste /
T02TD1784E:266b-24: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa nyid kyi sku ni rdo rje 'chang nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:267a-0: gal te byang chub mchog ni rdo rje 'chang @267a * //
T02TD1784E:267a-1: nyid 'dod de'i tshe dam tshig 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras te dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las dbang bskur ba rnams kyis spang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1784E:267a-2: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
T02TD1784E:267a-3: glang po rnyed nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
T02TD1784E:267a-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig ni sku rdo rje'i dam tshig gsungs pa ste /
