T02TD1784E:267a-6: bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:267a-7: bshang gci la sogs pa de rnams smad par mi bya ste /
T02TD1784E:267a-8: 'on kyang cho ga bzhi ni sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:267a-9: rdo rje gsum 'byung ni lus la sogs pa dag par byed pa'i de kho na nyid de sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:267a-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi dam tshig gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:267a-11: khams gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:267a-12: khams gsum zhes pa bud med rnams ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma dang gcig tu byas la cho ga bzhi ni sngags kyis 'dus byas pa sngon du 'gro bar spyad pa ni nye bar spyod pa bya'o //
T02TD1784E:267a-13: gsung gi rdo rje ni de las byung ba'i snang ba mtha' yas mi smad pa ni lces bldag par bya'o zhes ston te sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:267a-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:267a-15: rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:267a-16: ji srid sems can ni sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba rnam pa bzhi'i sems can gyi rigs te /
T02TD1784E:267a-17: de rnams rdo rje gsum las byung ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sprul pa las 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1784E:267a-18: de rnams rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ni phyi dang gsang ba dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi mchod pa rnams kyis mgu zhing tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:267a-19: de rnams kyi thugs ni rang gi sems kyang mi smad pa ni smad par mi bya ste /
T02TD1784E:267a-20: 'on kyang de'i bdag nyid kyis rdo rje 'chang bzhin du mthong bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:267a-22: pha rol smra ba yang dag rung //
T02TD1784E:267a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:267a-24: rdo rje gsum po rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:267a-25: de rnams kyi dam tshig gang las byung ba de ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos bkal stsal te sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:267b-0: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsang ba rdo rje ni phung po dang khams dang skye @267b mched rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD1784E:267b-1: de gsungs pa mdor na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:267b-2: gang zhig tha ma la pa'i phung po ni gzugs la sogs pa 'di rnams snang bar gyur pa de nyid rnam par dag na /
T02TD1784E:267b-3: sangs rgyas lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:267b-4: rnam par snang mdzod la sogs pa'i rang bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:267b-5: de bzhin du gang zhig rdo rje skye mched ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po 'di rnams drug ste /
T02TD1784E:267b-6: de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog ni phul du byung ba'i tshogs su zhes par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:267b-7: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rigs brgya'i dbye bas rnam par dben pa 'di yin no //
T02TD1784E:267b-8: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sems kyi mos pa ni khams gsum pa 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1784E:267b-10: rnam par dag pa ni rnam pa gnyis te khyab par byed pa dang nyi tshe ba'o //
T02TD1784E:267b-11: de la khyab par byed pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dang /
T02TD1784E:267b-12: nyi tshe ba ni phyogs gcig pa ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1784E:267b-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD1784E:267b-14: khams gsum gyi dam tshig ni sa la sogs pa'i khams rnams te /
T02TD1784E:267b-15: de rnams kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:267b-16: sa ni spyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:267b-17: sa la sogs pa khams bzhi po 'di rnams lha mo spyan la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:267b-18: gang zhig nam mkha'i khams 'di de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen por shes par bya'o ;
T02TD1784E:267b-19: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched de /
T02TD1784E:267b-20: de rnams kyi yang dag pa ni de kho na nyid de /
T02TD1784E:267b-21: sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du shes pa'o //
T02TD1784E:267b-22: de'i dbang phyug ni bdag po ste mngon du byed pa rdo rje sems dpas de skad bka' stsal to zhes pa dang sbyar te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:267b-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1784E:267b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:268a-0: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsung ba dang de'i rang bzhin bsgoms pas mnyam pa nyid ni 'od gsal ba @268a * //
T02TD1784E:268a-1: chen po'i chos nyid rtogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:268a-2: de nyid spyod pa ni ji lta ba bzhin du thugs la brtags pa ste /
T02TD1784E:268a-3: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas slar 'di ba'i skabs gsol ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pa rtse gcig pa nyid la zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:268a-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas rgyud ma rdzogs par rtogs shing /
T02TD1784E:268a-5: byang chub sems dpa' byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la 'di skad gsol to //
T02TD1784E:268a-6: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:268a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs ni slob dpon dang gsang ba dang shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba gsum po dang /
T02TD1784E:268a-8: rdo rje gsang ba ni de yang de bzhin bzhi pa'o zhes bya bas gang zhig dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di la dbang bskur ba ni dbang thob pa'i slob dpon ni rdo rje slob dpon te /
T02TD1784E:268a-9: de nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis ji ltar blta ba ni ji ltar shes par gyis zhes dris pa'o //
T02TD1784E:268a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1784E:268a-11: rigs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:268a-13: byang chub kyi sems ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chad ste /
T02TD1784E:268a-14: de dang slob dpon rdo rje'i bla ma ste /
T02TD1784E:268a-15: de dag gnyis po gcig yin no zhes shes par gyis shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:268a-16: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:268a-18: phyogs bcu la gang zhig 'jig rten gyi khams ni skye bo'i gnas rnams te /
T02TD1784E:268a-19: de ji srid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khod pa ni thob pa dang /
T02TD1784E:268a-21: skyong ba ni bsgoms pa ste /
T02TD1784E:268a-22: de rnams thams cad dus gsum mtshan mo dang nyin mo la mchod pa rnam pa ldas snang bar mi 'gyur pas slob dpon de la mchod la /
T02TD1784E:268a-23: bdag cag gi 'di pha dang ma ste /
T02TD1784E:268a-24: ji srid 'di nyid ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes ngag brjod cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:268a-25: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:268b-0: phyogs @268b bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsan pa la sogs pa'i rim pa rnams rang dang gzhan gyi don mdzad pa /
T02TD1784E:268b-1: ji snyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni bsod nams kyi tshogs /
T02TD1784E:268b-2: de yang slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig tsam dang mnyam pa ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:268b-4: de'i drin gyis byang chub kyi sems ni don dam pa'i 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:268b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes ni me long lta bu la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:268b-6: de rnams kyi snying por gyur pa ni 'bras bur gyur pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:268b-7: slob dpon de nyid las 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:268b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob nas 'jigs shing skrag pa ni ngo tsha ba'i dbang gis so //
T02TD1784E:268b-9: rdo rje 'chang dang slob dpon gcig yin pas de la the tshom med pa yin na /
T02TD1784E:268b-10: 'dri ba'i rgyud gang yang med pa ste /
T02TD1784E:268b-12: de bas na cang mi smra bar gyur to ;
T02TD1784E:268b-13: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byams pa cang mi smra bar gyur pas the tshom ma sel bar mkhyen nas /
T02TD1784E:268b-14: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje 'dzin thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:268b-15: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa dang /
T02TD1784E:268b-16: 'khor lo 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
T02TD1784E:268b-17: de rnams kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa ni dbang bskur ba'i rim pa ste /
T02TD1784E:268b-18: de la rdo rje ni rdo rje slob dpon te /
T02TD1784E:268b-19: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byams pa la sogs pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD1784E:268b-20: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa khyed rnams ni byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon cig gang zhig phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:268b-21: de rnams kyang rdo rje slob dpon de la mchod cing phyag mdzad ba'o ;
T02TD1784E:268b-22: / gang gi phyir de dang rdo rje 'chang mnyam pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:268b-23: spros pa smra ba ste gnyis su bcing ba ni legs par bcing bar 'gyur ba'i zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
T02TD1784E:268b-25: lam bzhin rdo rje khyod nyon cig /'khor las rgal ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1784E:269a-1: dang phyag rgya la sogs mkhas //
T02TD1784E:269a-2: slob dpon dag ni gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1784E:269a-3: bcom ldan ji ltar blta bya ste //
T02TD1784E:269a-4: slob dpon yon tan ji ltar lags //
T02TD1784E:269a-5: slob dpon sbyor ba ji ltar dang //
T02TD1784E:269a-6: bla ma zhes bya ji ltar lags //
T02TD1784E:269a-7: yang dag byang chub kun mtshan nyid //
T02TD1784E:269a-8: de nyid phyag na rdo rje nyon //
T02TD1784E:269a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad 'di yi sku //
T02TD1784E:269a-10: byang chub yan lag yan lag gnas //
T02TD1784E:269a-11: ba sbu'i bu ga'i grangs bcom ste //
T02TD1784E:269a-12: rigs ni lnga po dbu yin no //
T02TD1784E:269a-14: gzi brjid gnod sbyin bdag po nyid //
T02TD1784E:269a-15: de ltar yon tan rang bzhin sku //
T02TD1784E:269a-16: rtag tu rnal 'byor pas blta bya //
T02TD1784E:269a-17: ye shes zhes bya mtshan nyid yin //
T02TD1784E:269a-18: gang gi mtshan nyid rab bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:269a-19: dul ba dang ni zhi ba'i tshul //
T02TD1784E:269a-20: sems can kun la mi 'jigs stsol //
T02TD1784E:269a-21: sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor mkhas pas //
T02TD1784E:269a-22: rnal 'byor sgyu rtsal la sogs mkhas //
T02TD1784E:269a-23: ngag kun 'jam pa nyid smra dang //
T02TD1784E:269a-24: sems can kun la bu bzhin byed //
T02TD1784E:269a-25: sbyin pa la sogs la dga' ba //
T02TD1784E:269a-26: rnal 'byor bsam gtan la sogs stsol //
T02TD1784E:269a-27: bden par smra dang 'tshe med pa //
T02TD1784E:269a-28: snying rje 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan //
T02TD1784E:269a-29: thugs ni mnyam pa nyid byung ba //
T02TD1784E:269a-30: sems can rnams kyi mgon por gyur //
T02TD1784E:269a-31: de nyid bcu la gang mkhas pa //
T02TD1784E:269a-32: de ni slob dpon zhes bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:269a-34: de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i slob dpon la sangs rgyas la sogs pas mchod pa mdzad pa yin gyi /
T02TD1784E:269a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos ma thag tu /
T02TD1784E:269a-38: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang zhu ba ste /
T02TD1784E:269a-39: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:269a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
T02TD1784E:269a-41: de rnams ci la gnas zhes 'dri ba'o //
T02TD1784E:269a-43: rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus la sogs pa la gnas pa ste /
T02TD1784E:269a-44: de nyid las de rnams thos pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:269a-45: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba /
T02TD1784E:269b-0: gal te de ltar lags na lus ngag sems rdo rje de rnams @269b gang la gnas zhes 'dri ba ste /
T02TD1784E:269b-1: gang la yang mi gnas so zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin du len yin te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:269b-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:269b-3: de ltar rdo rje slob dpon dang rdo rje 'chang gnyis su med par bstan nas /
T02TD1784E:269b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cang mi gsung par gyur te /
T02TD1784E:269b-5: de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyang ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni rdo rje 'chang dang slob dpon dbyer med pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:269b-6: rmad du gyur pa ni de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:269b-7: cang mi smra bar 'khod pa ni the tshom sel ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:269b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje 'chang chen pos ting nge 'dzin gzhan gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:269b-9: gsang ba rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:269b-10: de nyid las bzhengs pa ni cig car du sad nas de rnams la bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:269b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:269b-12: dkyil 'khor chen po ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1784E:269b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rtsa lnga dang /
T02TD1784E:269b-15: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02TD1784E:269b-16: de las kun 'byung ba la yod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:269b-17: rdo rje ni mi 'jigs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:269b-18: rdul tshon la sogs pa la mi ltos pa'o ;
T02TD1784E:269b-19: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la pa sogs pas gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02TD1784E:269b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:269b-21: nam mkha'i dbyings ni rang gi rig ma'i padma ste /
T02TD1784E:269b-22: de'i dbus su gnas pa gru bzhi pa ni rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1784E:269b-23: rab tu mdzes pa ni 'dod pa'i gdugs zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:269b-24: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas ni shu kra la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga ste de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni tshogs te /
T02TD1784E:269b-25: de dang sbyor ba ni gang ba ste /
T02TD1784E:269b-26: bsam gtan rdo rje ni de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa'i rab bskul ba ni rdo rjes bskyod par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:269b-27: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni rang gi rdo rje'i rtsa lnga'i dkyil 'khor yang 'khor lo can kun ni shu kra la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rten ni bzhi bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:270a-0: de ltar na dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi ting @270a * //
T02TD1784E:270a-2: kha sbyor bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:270a-3: mchod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:270a-4: cho ga de nyid ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu'i mchod pa ni snyoms par zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:270a-5: gang gis she na blo dang ldan pa ni phyag rgya ma dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pas so //
T02TD1784E:270a-6: slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:270a-7: re zhig slob dpon gyi dbang bskur bar 'dod pa 'od zer gyi lcags kyu rnams kyis 'gugs shing snying ga ni rdo rje dang padma'i nang du bsgoms la dbang bskur ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun rnams kyis spyi bo dang kha la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:270a-8: sangs rgyas kun ni bshang ba la sogs pa bdud rtsi rnams kyis nam mkha' dbyings ni rdo rje dang padma yongs su gang bar bsams la /
T02TD1784E:270a-9: slob ma de'i khar dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:270a-10: dbang bskur ba'i gnas gsum ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1784E:270a-12: de rnams kyang ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma dang snyoms par zhugs pas sgom pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:270a-13: 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bkur bas byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang nyid slob mas thob par 'gyur te rang gi don to //
T02TD1784E:270a-14: sems can kun la phan 'dod pa ni 'gro ba'i don yang byed pa ste gzhan gyi don to //
T02TD1784E:270a-15: de bzhin du dngos grub kun gyis ngo mtshar ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyis ngo mtshar bar 'gyur ba'i sku gsung thugs 'grub par 'gyur ba ni thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:270a-16: rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
T02TD1784E:270a-17: byang chub thams cad kyi don ni dam tshig na ldi ste /
T02TD1784E:270a-18: de rnams kyi 'khor lo ni rdo rje dang padma ste /
T02TD1784E:270a-19: de la bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo ni slob ma la dbang bskur ba re bya ba'i phyir nang gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor 'di yin te las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02TD1784E:270a-20: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1784E:270a-21: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi bshad bya ba //
T02TD1784E:270a-22: yid 'od rtse gcig mnyan par gyis //
T02TD1784E:270a-23: dkyil 'khor lus zhes bshad pa dang //
T02TD1784E:270a-24: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa dang //
T02TD1784E:270a-25: byang chub kyi sems dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1784E:270b-0: dkyil 'khor gsum ni rab @270b tu brtag / rtag tu tshogs kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:270b-1: gang du gtso bo yang dag spyod //
T02TD1784E:270b-2: phung po rnams kyi sangs rgyas bshad //
T02TD1784E:270b-3: 'byung ba rig ma rnams brtan pa //
T02TD1784E:270b-4: 'dod pa lcags kyu yin pa dang //
T02TD1784E:270b-5: zhags pa padma la zhugs pa //
T02TD1784E:270b-6: kha lo'i byed lcags sgrog ste //
T02TD1784E:270b-8: sbos ni bshad par bshad pa ste //
T02TD1784E:270b-9: chang ni khrag ces bshad pa yin //
T02TD1784E:270b-10: rkang dang tshil ni mar me ste //
T02TD1784E:270b-11: dri ni shu kra yin par bshad //
T02TD1784E:270b-12: sgeg pa mtshan ma bstan pa dang //
T02TD1784E:270b-13: me tog bha ga yin par bshad //
T02TD1784E:270b-14: rtag tu kha sbyor sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:270b-15: dbugs dang dbyung ba ni lung bstan to //
T02TD1784E:270b-16: de nyid kun du brtags pa ni //
T02TD1784E:270b-17: bha ga kun du bzang po yin //
T02TD1784E:270b-18: byams pa la sogs bcu drug ni //
T02TD1784E:270b-19: cha ni bcu drug rab tu brtags //
T02TD1784E:270b-20: sngar bshad pa yid dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1784E:270b-21: rang gi bdag nyid yin par bshad //
T02TD1784E:270b-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:270b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba ni 'dus pa las skyes pa rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD1784E:270b-25: re zhig dang po rus pa dang sha la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te rang gi lus ni /
T02TD1784E:270b-26: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa ste rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas /
T02TD1784E:270b-27: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bha a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1784E:270b-28: zhes pa'i sngags kyis stong bar bsgoms la /
T02TD1784E:270b-29: h'um hr'i: kham zhes bya ba sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i kha dog nag po yi ge gsum las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang bsams te /
T02TD1784E:270b-30: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo je h'um mdzad /
T02TD1784E:270b-31: drag po ni thugs kyis khros pa /
T02TD1784E:270b-32: mi sdug pa ni sku yis 'jigs pa /
T02TD1784E:270b-33: khros pa ni gsung gis ha ha dang hi hi'i sgra sgrogs pa autpala sngon po ni sku gnag pa /
T02TD1784E:270b-36: g-yas pa na rtse gsum dang /
T02TD1784E:270b-38: g-yon pas rdo rje phur bu dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02TD1784E:270b-40: rkang ba mnyam par gnas pa /
T02TD1784E:270b-41: ri r'i li l'i ra zhes bya ba yi ge lnga yongs su gyur pa las 'od zer lnga'i rang bzhin gyi lce dang ldan pa bsams te /
T02TD1784E:270b-42: de nas 'od zer gyi gzugs can yi ge lnga spro zhing /
T02TD1784E:270b-43: bsgrub bya'i lus kyi mgo bo la sogs pa la dgod de /
T02TD1784E:271a-0: sbrul gyi kha dang 'dra ba lcags kyu'i rnam pa des yan lag @271a * //
T02TD1784E:271a-1: thams cad kyi tshigs rnams kyi khrag dgug cing thod pa de nyid la bzhag ste /
T02TD1784E:271a-2: bdag nyid btung bar byed par bsams na de'i tshe gdug pa'i lus kyi khrag med par 'gyur ro zhes dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dang las kyi rgyal ba mchog rnams so//
T02TD1784E:271a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas za ba'i rnam par dag pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:271a-4: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa spro ba dang bcas pa'i spyod pas 'grub pa dang spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'i sgo nas ci snyed pa dang /
T02TD1784E:271a-5: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pas nags tshal gyi lha mo rnams kyis byin pa de thams cad sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis bdud rtsi ru byas nas spyad par bya ste las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02TD1784E:271a-6: de nyid nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga yin te /
T02TD1784E:271a-7: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las 'di skad du /
T02TD1784E:271a-8: dkyil 'khor rnams ni bshad zin pas //
T02TD1784E:271a-9: sbyin sreg las ni mnyan par gyis//
T02TD1784E:271a-10: phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1784E:271a-11: sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis su bshad //
T02TD1784E:271a-12: phyi rol gyi ni sngar bshad zin //
T02TD1784E:271a-13: nang gi bdag nyid nyan par gyis //
T02TD1784E:271a-14: padma bzhi po'i kha sbyor ni //
T02TD1784E:271a-15: lus kyi nang du rnam par gnas //
T02TD1784E:271a-16: me nyid dang ni rlung nyid dang //
T02TD1784E:271a-17: dbang chin dang ni de nyid chu //
T02TD1784E:271a-18: rlung gis me ni spar ba dang ;
T02TD1784E:271a-19: / chus ni yongs su smin par byed //
T02TD1784E:271a-20: dbang chen dkyil 'khor gnas su ni //
T02TD1784E:271a-21: gang du khyab bdag rab tu spyod //
T02TD1784E:271a-22: bza' ba btung ba gang yang rung //
T02TD1784E:271a-23: de kun des ni 'dzin par byed //
T02TD1784E:271a-24: kha yi padmas bza' ba dang //
T02TD1784E:271a-26: lte ba'i padmar gnas pa ni ;
T02TD1784E:271a-27: / kha sbyor rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:271a-28: gsang ba'i padma las byung ba'i //
T02TD1784E:271a-29: mthar ni thal ba brtan par bya //
T02TD1784E:271a-30: rtag tu nyin re bya ba ni //
T02TD1784E:271a-31: de nyid bdag gis rab tu bshad //
T02TD1784E:271a-32: thams cad za zhing spyod byed na //
T02TD1784E:271a-34: rgas pa ma yin skra dkar min //
T02TD1784E:271a-35: 'chi ba ma yin nad rnams min //
T02TD1784E:271a-36: dus min 'chi ba ma yin dang //
T02TD1784E:271a-39: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas spros pa dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pas mchod pa bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:271b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung @271b thugs ni sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod pa de gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:271b-1: mchod pa thams cad ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad kyis brgyan pa las dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te /
T02TD1784E:271b-2: de dag bsdu zhing lha khang sum brtsegs la mchod pa'i spyod pa ste sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:271b-4: sbyin sreg las ni bshad zin dang //
T02TD1784E:271b-5: mchod pa'i las ni mnyen par gyis //
T02TD1784E:271b-6: dri dang me tog gos dang ni //
T02TD1784E:271b-7: spos dang dri dang lha bshos dang //
T02TD1784E:271b-8: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1784E:271b-9: rang gi bdag nyid mchod par bya //
T02TD1784E:271b-10: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1784E:271b-11: de yang sras kyang thams cad de //
T02TD1784E:271b-12: de phyir padma thams cad kyis //
T02TD1784E:271b-13: rang gi bdag nyid mchod par bya //
T02TD1784E:271b-14: bsgom pa la sogs rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1784E:271b-15: gang zhig las ni byed pa ste //
T02TD1784E:271b-16: bza' ba btung ba gos rnams dang //
T02TD1784E:271b-17: dri dang phreng ba de bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:271b-18: rig pa'i gnas kyis rnam brgyan pa //
T02TD1784E:271b-19: ngo bo dam pa bsgom par bya //
T02TD1784E:271b-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la spros pa med pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i mchod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:271b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni spros pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:271b-23: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rang dang gzhan gyi 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i mchod pa'i gsang ba ni bdag gi mchod pa gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:271b-24: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis sme sha can dang khrus mkhan dang gar mkhan gyi bu mo rnams 'du byas pa ji snyed pa'i zas kyis tshi ma zhing sbyor ba las byung pa'i shu kra'i thig les mchod par bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:271b-25: sogs pa'i sgras ni bdud rtsi lnga btung ba dang /
T02TD1784E:271b-26: gzhan ni sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin du mchod par byas na mchod pa po byang chub rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur te sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:271b-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i mchod pa bshad pa bya ste /
T02TD1784E:271b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni bsam gtan gyi bza' ba can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:271b-29: de rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa ni sku la sogs pa'i dam tshig ste /
T02TD1784E:272a-2: sems can gyi khams ni mtha' yas pa'i khams gsum gyi ma ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyi lha mo de nyid dam tshig 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD1784E:272a-3: bla na med pa'i mngon par byang chub pa ster ba phyi rol gyi zas la ma ltos pa'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ni sku gsum gyi spyad par bya ba bsten par bya ba de ni dam tshig ste /
T02TD1784E:272a-4: mchod pa'i rim pa'i rmad byung che ste /
T02TD1784E:272a-5: ngo mtshar du gyur cing dngos grub ster ba yin zhes sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:272a-6: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i mchod pa'i rim pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:272a-7: lus la sogs pa'i longs spyod ni yul dang dbang po bsdus pa las byung ba sems kyi dga' ba gang yin pa de dag gsang ba gsum gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga gcig tu byas pa las 'byung ba bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:272a-8: bdag rnal 'byor pa bzang po ste yul dang dbang po nye bar spyod pa'i sgo nas rdo rje 'chang nyid bsgrub par bya ba ni thob par bya'o zhes sems la bzhag cing gang gi tshe spyod na de'i tshe 'jig pa ni tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa zad par 'gyur ro zhes rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD1784E:272a-9: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi thun mong tshim pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:272a-10: spyi bo nas mtho gang tsam gyi steng du cha bcu drug yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge aom bkod cing phung po lnga la bdud rtsi phab na de'i tshe gzi brjid dang kha dog dang lus la sogs pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te /
T02TD1784E:272a-11: las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
T02TD1784E:272a-12: yang na rig ma'i padma'i nang du lte ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD1784E:272a-13: mtho gang tsam gyis spags te lte ba gang yin pa de'i spyi bor ni steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub kyi sems brtag pa ni gnas so //
T02TD1784E:272a-14: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de aom gyi ngo bor mos te /
T02TD1784E:272a-15: rtsa lnga dbab pa ni gzhib par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:272a-16: de ltar na gzi brjid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni sa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:272a-17: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi spyod pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:272b-0: sngags 'dzin pa thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i lus la sogs pa'i gsang ba ni lus la sogs pa'i @272b spyod pa de gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:272b-1: mchod rten gyi las ni sa la sogs pa las byas pa'i s'atstsha ste /
T02TD1784E:272b-2: de mi bya ste bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis dkyil 'khor yang dang yang spro zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad skad cig ma gcig gis byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:272b-3: 'ba' zhig tu ngag ngal bar byed pa glegs bam bklag par mi bya ste /
T02TD1784E:272b-4: ma ning gi bzlas pa nyid kyis sngags kyi dbye ba bdun khri nyis stong gi de kho na nyid rtogs pas so //
T02TD1784E:272b-5: ba byung la sogs pas kyang dkyil 'khor mi bya ste /
T02TD1784E:272b-6: dkyil 'khor bzhi gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:272b-7: rdo rje gsum la phyag mi bya ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas mar la mar bzhugs pa bzhin du rdo rje 'chang gi de'i bka' nyid la zhugs pa'i phyogs yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:272b-8: sems can gyi don du de byed na skyon med pa dang bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la gnang ngo zhes khyad par ro //
T02TD1784E:272b-9: de ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1784E:272b-10: sems rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:272b-11: rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:272b-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:272b-13: dug thams cad ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dug rnams te /
T02TD1784E:272b-14: de rnams 'byin pa dang sel ba dang gnon pa ni de nyid du bzhag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:272b-15: 'dren pa ni gnas gzhan las gzhan du spo ba nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1784E:272b-16: bsgrub bya'i snying ga'i dbus su 'khor lo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dgod pa 'od zer dkar po 'bar ba'i phreng ba can yi ge h'um bsams te /
T02TD1784E:272b-17: de gyen du 'dren pa'i tshe dug dgug pa ni bsgoms na nad pa de dug skyug par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:272b-18: de bzhin du rkang gi bu gar dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje ra bas bskor zhing 'od zer ser pos 'khrigs pa ni khyab par bsams na de'i tshe dug rengs par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:272b-19: de bzhin du le'u bco lnga pa las gsungs pa'i rim gyis du ba dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyis dug bkug la gdug pa'i lus la zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:272b-20: yi ge a'a: yang snying gar dgod par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:272b-21: ser po lta bu ni ser nag bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:272b-23: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:272b-24: rdor gsum 'od zer dam tshig gis //
T02TD1784E:273a-2: kha dog gsum dang yi ge gsum gyis gsang ba ni dug sel ba la sogs pa 'byung ba shes par bya ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:273a-3: da ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:273a-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lus ngag sems ni bsgrub bya rnams kyi lus la sogs pa bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir 'khor lo'i nang du bris pa'i sngags gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:273a-5: aom hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:273a-6: sngags 'di nyid sna tshogs rdo rje'i nang du gur gum dang gi wang gis bris pa'i rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bkra shis pa'i zhag la yi ge hri dgod cing /
T02TD1784E:273a-7: hu lu hu lu la sogs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyis bskor te /
T02TD1784E:273a-8: za ma tog la sogs par bzhag cing mchod de bsgrub bya'i dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:273a-9: 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi bsgrub bya rnams te /
T02TD1784E:273a-10: de dag gi gsang ba gsum ni lus te /
T02TD1784E:273a-11: de'i skyon sel bas zhi ba la sogs pa bsdus pa'i phyir bsdus pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:273a-13: rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bris te /
T02TD1784E:273a-14: 'khor lo dbus ma'i rtsibs la yi ge ham dgod cing de'i rjes la dzin dzi ka ces bya ba'i sngags kyis bsgrub bya'i ming bris la 'khor lo'i shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sngags rnams dgod cing /
T02TD1784E:273a-15: grva rnams la lha mo spyan la sogs pa'i sngags rnams dgod de /
T02TD1784E:273a-16: shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs kyi gnas rnams la cung zad rgyab tu gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo bzhi po'i phyung ba'i sngags rnams dgod cing /
T02TD1784E:273a-17: phyi rol du hu lu hu lu la sogs pas bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD1784E:273a-18: la la na re dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba'i yi ge ham dang /
T02TD1784E:273a-19: rtsibs rnams la hu lu hu lu la sogs pa bri bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD1784E:273a-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje mig sman gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:273a-21: lam gyi bzhi mdo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gnas rnams rab tu grags pa'o //
T02TD1784E:273a-22: tshil chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:273a-23: padma dang aarga'i skud pa bu mos bkal ba'i sdong bu byas la /
T02TD1784E:273b-0: de nyid bdud rtsi lngas gsher zhing mar @273b ngo'i tshes brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi pa la gshin rje gshed la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba'i khro bo'i sku 'dzin cing tshil chen po'i mes spar zhing khro bo'i sngags kyis thod par brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te /
T02TD1784E:273b-1: gcer bu dang skra dkrol bas phyogs bcing zhing rgun chang gis ra ro ba'i rnal 'byor pas thod pa'i sgyed pu gsum la mig sman de 'bab par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:273b-2: de nas de blangs te drod 'bab pa dang /
T02TD1784E:273b-3: du ba 'byung ba dang 'bab par gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:273b-5: de'i 'og tu za ma tog la sogs pa'i nang du khro bo'i sngags kyis mchod cing blangs te /
T02TD1784E:273b-6: mig gnyis la bskus nas dngos grub rnam pa gsum ni mkha' la spyod pa'i dngos grub ni 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs dang /
T02TD1784E:273b-7: sa spyod kyi dngos grub ni dbang dang dgug pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:273b-8: sa 'og na spyod pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub ni sa 'og tu zhugs pas lha ma yin gyi bu mo la sogs pa nye bar spyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:273b-10: kun du bzang po ni dngos grub thams cad kyi bde ba stsol ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad gsungs so zhes pa dang sbyar te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:273b-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpal gsang ba 'dus ba'i rgyud la zhugs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhus pa ste /
T02TD1784E:273b-12: kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po gsang ba'i yi ge du zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams byin gyis brlab par 'gyur /
T02TD1784E:273b-13: gang gis dpal gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la dad pa ni dad pa sngon du 'gro ba thos pa dang bsam pa de bzhin du sgom pa ni mngon du byed pa'o //
T02TD1784E:273b-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1784E:273b-15: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:273b-16: gsang ba'i yi ge gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD1784E:273b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1784E:273b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:273b-21: sku rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis so sor ni dgongs pa 'di yin te /
T02TD1784E:274a-1: su rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-2: bsam pa'i dus su snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-3: bsgom pa'i dus su mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-4: ji srid bsgom pa rdzogs pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'chang chen por 'gyur ro zhes ston te bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:274a-5: yang na rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i sgom pas gsung rdo rje dang sems rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-6: mngon par byang chub pa'i sgom pas thugs rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-7: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-8: zung 'jug sgom pas sku rdo rje byin gyis brlab par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:274a-9: rdo rje bzlas pa sems rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-10: mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-11: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-12: zung 'jug gi rim pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:274a-13: yang na rang bzhin dang rgyu'i sgom pas sku rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-14: lam sgom pas gsung rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-15: 'bras bu sgom pas thugs rdo rjes brlab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:274a-16: so sor sdud pa dang bsam gtan dang 'dzin pa'i sgom pas thugs rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-17: srog dang rtsol ba'i sgom pas gsung rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-18: ting nge 'dzin dang rjes su dran pa'i sgom pas sku rdo rje byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:274a-19: phra mo rnal 'byor gyi thig le sgom pas thugs rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-20: dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi sgom pas sku rdo rje dang /
T02TD1784E:274a-21: las rgyal ba mchog gi sgom pas gsung rdo rje byin gyis brlab par 'gyur te tshig gi don bcu drug go //
T02TD1784E:274a-22: de nas zhes bya la sogs pas dang pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas /
T02TD1784E:274a-24: byang chub sems dpa' rnams cad mi gsung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:274a-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud kyi bdag nyid che ba bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams dgug cing rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:274a-26: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:274a-27: kye bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba'i 'khor lo la thog ma med pa'i phyir bskal pa ni bskal ba bzang po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:274b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa @274b zhes bya bas bskal pa de rnams kyi grangs med pa bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:274b-1: brjod kyis mi lang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:274b-2: de la thig le bcu drug ni bskal pa grangs med pa'o zhes chos 'don pa rnams zer ro //
T02TD1784E:274b-3: la la na re rgas pa dang 'chi ba med pa'i skyes bus mi zad pa'i gos kyis ri rab kyi rgyal po 'dar ba ste /
T02TD1784E:274b-4: de nyid du ji tsam gyis zad par gyur pa ni bskal pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T02TD1784E:274b-5: de dang 'dra ba'i skyes bus rgya mtsho'i 'gram du 'dug la khab kyi rtse mos chu'i thig le re re 'gram du gtor ba de ni dus ji srid kyis zad par gyur pa de ni bskal pa yin te mdo sde pa rnams so //
T02TD1784E:274b-6: se gol gtogs pa ni skad cig ma'o //
T02TD1784E:274b-7: skad cig ma drug ni thad cig go //
T02TD1784E:274b-8: thang cig drug ni yud tsam mo //
T02TD1784E:274b-9: yud tsam drug ni mig btsums pa'o //
T02TD1784E:274b-10: mig btsums pa drug ni thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:274b-11: thal mo sbyar ba drug ni dbugs so //
T02TD1784E:274b-13: cha drug cu ni tsha sha ka'o ;
T02TD1784E:274b-14: / tsha sha ka drug cu ni chu tshod do //
T02TD1784E:274b-15: chu tshod drug cu ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo'o //
T02TD1784E:274b-16: de rnams sum cu ni zla ba gcig / de rnams bcu gnyis ni mi'i lo gcig ste /
T02TD1784E:274b-17: de nyid rgyal po chen po bzhi'i zhag gcig yin no //
T02TD1784E:274b-18: de'i grangs kyi lo gcig ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i zhag gcig go //
T02TD1784E:274b-19: de'i lo gcig ni 'thab bral ba rnams kyi zhag gcig go //
T02TD1784E:274b-20: de'i lo gcig ni dga' ldan pa rnams kyi zhag gcig go //
T02TD1784E:274b-21: de'i lo gcig la 'phrul dga' pa rnams kyi zhag gcig go //
T02TD1784E:274b-22: de'i lo gcig ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi zhag gcig go //
T02TD1784E:274b-23: de'i grangs kyi lo gcig ni gzugs kyi khams kyi zhag gcig go //
T02TD1784E:274b-24: de'i grangs kyi lo gcig ni gzugs med pa'i khams kyi zhag gcig go //
T02TD1784E:274b-25: de'i lo gcig ni bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhag gcig go //
T02TD1784E:274b-26: de'i grangs kyi lo 'bum phrag nyi shu ni rdzogs ldan no //
T02TD1784E:274b-27: lo 'bum phrag bco lnga ni sum ldan no //
T02TD1784E:274b-28: 'bum phrag bcu ni gnyis ldan no //
T02TD1784E:274b-29: 'bum phrag lnga ni rtsod ldan no //
T02TD1784E:274b-30: de rnams nyid bskal ba bzhi yin te /
T02TD1784E:274b-31: de lta bu'i tshad dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i bskal ba rnams zad par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:275a-1: pa re re bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos ston pa dang 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T02TD1784E:275a-2: de rnams kyi grangs ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:275a-3: de nas dus phyi ma'i lnga brgya'i bskal pa dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:275a-4: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi sems can sa ya phrag bcu mngon par byang chub pa thob par mdzad cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02TD1784E:275a-5: de'i rjes la rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas de goo ta ma'i rigs te rgyal rigs so //
T02TD1784E:275a-6: de'i grong khyer ni skya rengs ldan ma dang /
T02TD1784E:275a-7: yab ni skya rengs can dang /
T02TD1784E:275a-9: zhabs 'bring ba mya ngan med pa'o //
T02TD1784E:275a-10: bcom ldan 'das de kun du sdong bu can zhes bya ba'i s'a la'i shing gi rgyal po'i drung du sangs rgyas so /
T02TD1784E:275a-11: de la tshogs pa bzhi yod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:275a-12: dang po drug khri mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang /
T02TD1784E:275a-13: gnyis pa la bdun khri dang /
T02TD1784E:275a-14: gsum pa la brgyad khri dang /
T02TD1784E:275a-15: bzhi pa la 'bum dang khri mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:275a-16: bsdus na 'bum phrag gsum dang nyi khri'o //
T02TD1784E:275a-17: de'i 'og tu bskal pa sum cu pa la de rnams dang lhan cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
T02TD1784E:275a-18: dus de la mi'i tshe tshad ni brgyad khri'o //
T02TD1784E:275a-19: lo ma'i panytsi ka de rnams kyi bgo ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:275a-20: de'i 'og tu gtsug tor can zhes bya ba sangs rgyas te /
T02TD1784E:275a-21: goo ta ma'i rigs te rgyal rigs so //
T02TD1784E:275a-22: de'i grong khyer ni gnyen can dang /
T02TD1784E:275a-23: yab ni gnyen ldan dang yum ni nor gyi blo gros ma dang /
T02TD1784E:275a-24: zhabs 'bring ba ni bde byed de /
T02TD1784E:275a-25: pa ta la'i shing gi drung du mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:275a-26: snga ma bzhin du 'bum phrag gsum dang khri mngon par sangs rgyas par mdzad do //
T02TD1784E:275a-27: mi'i tshe'i tshad ni de bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:275a-28: de'i 'og tu dus 'das pa la gtsug tor can de chags pa dang bral ba rnams dang lhan cig tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
T02TD1784E:275a-29: de'i 'og tu thams cad skyob ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas de goo ta ma'i rigs te rgyal rigs so //
T02TD1784E:275a-30: de'i yab ni legs par rtogs pa zhes bya /
T02TD1784E:275a-31: yum ni grags can ma dang /
T02TD1784E:275b-0: grong khyer ni skya @275b rengs can dang /
T02TD1784E:275b-1: zhabs 'bring ba ni zhi ba zhes bya ste /
T02TD1784E:275b-2: punda r'i ki'i shing gi drung du mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:275b-3: de la tshogs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa gcig mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:275b-4: de'i tshe'i tshad ni drug khri'o //
T02TD1784E:275b-5: de dang bcas te dus gcig tu mya ngan las 'das so //
T02TD1784E:275b-6: de nas log par dad sel zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas byung ba de ni bram ze'i rigs te /
T02TD1784E:275b-7: de'i yab ni me bzhin zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:275b-8: yum ni dkar mo zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:275b-9: de'i grong khyer bde byed ces bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:275b-10: zhabs 'bring ba ni thigs pa'i ros 'tsho ba ste /
T02TD1784E:275b-11: shi ri sha'i shing gi drung du mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:275b-12: de'i tshogs pa dge slong brgyad khri mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:275b-13: de nas gser thub ces bya ba sangs rgyas te /
T02TD1784E:275b-14: goo ta ma'i rigs te rgyal rigs so //
T02TD1784E:275b-17: zhabs 'bring ba ni yid gnyis bral ba ste /
T02TD1784E:275b-18: au du mw'a ra'i shing gi drung du mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:275b-19: gcig tu tshogs pas nyan thos pa bzhi khri mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:275b-20: mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo bzhi khri ste /
T02TD1784E:275b-21: de rnams dang lhan cig tu mya ngan las 'das so //
T02TD1784E:275b-22: de nas 'od srungs zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas te /
T02TD1784E:275b-23: ka shya pa'i rigs te bram ze'i rigs so //
T02TD1784E:275b-24: de'i grong khyer ni w'a r'a na s'i dang /
T02TD1784E:275b-25: yab ni tshangs pa'i grags pa dang /
T02TD1784E:275b-27: zhabs 'bring ba ni kun gyi bshes gnyen te /
T02TD1784E:275b-28: shing n+ya gro dha'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:275b-29: gcig tu tshogs pas nyan thos pa nyi khri yang dag par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:275b-30: sangs rgyas de ni de rnams dang lhan cig tu 'das pa'i dus la yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
T02TD1784E:275b-31: phyi ma'i dus kyi phyi ma'i tshe lo lnga brgya la khyud mo lcags ri nas khyud mo lcags ri'i bar du rdzu 'phrul dang dam pa'i chos nub pas bskal pa du ma'i bar du sangs rgyas med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:275b-32: de'i tshe bskal pa bzang po 'di la sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:275b-34: de'i grong khyer ni ser skya zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:275b-36: yum ni sgyu ma chen mo dang /
T02TD1784E:275b-37: zhabs 'bring ba ni kun dga' bo ste /
T02TD1784E:276a-0: shing aa shvdtha'i drung du dge slong stong sum brgya lnga bcu dang lhan cig @276a * //
T02TD1784E:276a-1: tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1784E:276a-2: de'i dus su mi'i tshe'i tshad ni lo brgya 'phel 'grib bam cung zad kyang ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:276a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
T02TD1784E:276a-4: de'i 'og tu byams pa 'tshang rgya par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:276a-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams sangs rgyas te mya ngan las 'das so //
T02TD1784E:276a-6: gang zhig 'od srungs zhes bya ba drug pa bskal pa 'di las sngon du mngon par sangs rgyas te /
T02TD1784E:276a-7: de'i dus su yang dpal gsang pa 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di ma bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:276a-9: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:276a-10: gang gi phyir dus de la sems can rnams spyin pa dang tshul khrims pa la sogs pa la rtsol pa dang ldan pa'i phyir chags pa dang bral pa'i lam la brten nas /
T02TD1784E:276a-11: mgo bo la sogs pa sbyin pa la chags pa ste /
T02TD1784E:276a-12: pha rol du phyin pa'i lam la brten nas 'jug pas dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i man ngag sgom pa'i snod ma yin pa ste /
T02TD1784E:276a-13: rigs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:276a-14: de'i phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis de rnams kyis byang chub thob par gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:276a-15: de'i phyir dus de la gsang pa 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di ma bstan to //
T02TD1784E:276a-17: dge slong dngos por gang gnas dang /
T02TD1784E:276a-18: rtog gel dga'i mi gang rnams /
T02TD1784E:276a-19: rgas pa'i dngos por gang gnas te /
T02TD1784E:276a-20: de la de nyid brten mi bya //
T02TD1784E:276a-22: nyan thos mang du zhag bdun gnas /
T02TD1784E:276a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rtsa pa'i lhung pa'i rgyur gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:276a-24: de'i dus sngags kyi tshul bstan pa ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:276a-25: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:276a-26: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la ni bod pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1784E:276a-27: rtsod ldan gyi dus 'di 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas 'khrugs pas sems kyi rgyud yin na'ang 'on kyang rna bar zhugs pa'i chu chu gzhan gyis sel pa'i rigs pa bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa kho na'i thabs rnams kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa sel par gyur te zhes bya ba'i rigs pa la brten cing skad cig dang /
T02TD1784E:276a-29: yud tsam gyis byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po thos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:276b-0: @276b sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:276b-1: sngar bshad pa rnams la khyad par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:276b-2: gangga'i bye ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dang po'i bskal pa las byung pa la gang zhig nyan thos la sogs pa la mos pa dang ldan pa rnams chu bo gnga'i bye ma dang 'dra pa mtha' yas pa'i bskal pa rnams kyis 'bad pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa dag gis so //
T02TD1784E:276b-4: byang chub ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis thob par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:276b-5: nyan thos pa rnams ni thabs med pa dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams ni thabs mi mkhas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:276b-6: dper na mi sdug pa'i sgom pas thob ma nas ma skyes pa'i de kho na nyid thob par mi 'gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:276b-7: nyon mongs pa spangs na yang de rnams kyi gang zag bdag med pa 'grub par 'gyur pa yin gyi /
T02TD1784E:276b-8: chos bdag med pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:276b-9: de'i phyir nyan thos de rnams la thabs med cing thabs las byung pa yang med pa'o //
T02TD1784E:276b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang zag dang chos bdag med pa kho na nyid bstan na yang de rnams thabs la mi mkhas pa'o //
T02TD1784E:276b-11: dper na de rnams ni sems can gcig gi phyir rang gi lus byin te /
T02TD1784E:276b-12: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bgyi'o zhes rtogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:276b-13: de yang pha rol du phyin par ma gyur te /
T02TD1784E:276b-14: phyogs gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:276b-15: de bas na yang bskyed cing de bzhin du spyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:276b-16: bskal pa grags med pa gsum gyis byang chub thog par 'gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:276b-17: de pas na de rnams thabs la mi mkhas pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:276b-18: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yang sbyar par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:276b-19: sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dang por spyor pa la sogs po'i ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis rigs brgya'i dbye pas lus rnams par dben par byed pa dang /
T02TD1784E:276b-20: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pas ngag rnam par dben pa dang /
T02TD1784E:276b-21: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pas sems rnam par dben pa dang /
T02TD1784E:276b-22: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD1784E:277a-0: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas don @277a * //
T02TD1784E:277a-1: dam pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa mngon du byas pa tshe 'di nyid de mthong pa'i chos la /
T02TD1784E:277a-2: gsang pa 'das pa dga' pa ni dpal la gsang pa 'dus pa'i man ngag sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sngags pa rnams 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang la /
T02TD1784E:277a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga nyid dang /
T02TD1784E:277a-4: sangs rgyas ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid de /
T02TD1784E:277a-5: de zhes bya ba'i grangs ni de'i go 'phang ste /
T02TD1784E:277a-6: dbus su byung pa nyid mngon du byed pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:277a-7: de nas 'das pa'i bskal pa rnams la ma bstan pa dang /
T02TD1784E:277a-8: byams pas dbang mdzad pa'i ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa la yang bstan par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:277a-9: shin tu dka' pa nyid bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:277a-10: de bas na rang gi skyon rnams spangs te /
T02TD1784E:277a-11: dge pa'i bshes gnyen pa la bsnyen bkur byas shing de kho na nyid rtogs par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:277a-13: skyon gyi ngo bos rang skyon rnams ni mi shes dang //
T02TD1784E:277a-14: yon tan rnams kyang log cing nga rgyal gyis yon tan //
T02TD1784E:277a-15: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la gang gis smod byed pa /
T02TD1784E:277a-16: des ni de nyid ji ltar mngon du mthong par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:277a-18: tshig gi don bcu drug go //
T02TD1784E:277a-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:277a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos nas byams pa la sogs pas dus so //
T02TD1784E:277a-21: de rnams la gzigs nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pas bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1784E:277a-23: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang gsol pa /
T02TD1784E:277a-24: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:277a-25: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:277a-26: ji ltar mi ngu par gyi zhes bya ba ni rab tu du par bgyi ba'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:277a-27: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gsum ni lus la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal ji ltar mi sgom par bgyis na 'chang par bgyi'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:277a-29: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi phyir ded rnams sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas gsang pa'i yi ge gsum ni dpal gsang pa 'dus pa'i skal pa ma mchis pa ni rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:277a-30: de yang lan cig bzhag ste /
T02TD1784E:277b-0: ji srid ming tsam yang thos pa'i snod de rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba la gang zhig bcom ldan 'das @277b kyis gsungs pa de ni nged rnams kyis thos pa ma thos pa bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:277b-1: bsams pa ma bsams pa bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:277b-2: bsgoms pa ma bsgoms pa bzhin dang /
T02TD1784E:277b-3: ji srid thams cad byas pa ma byas dang dang 'dra par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:277b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1784E:277b-5: de skad ma zer cig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:277b-6: gsang pa'i yi ge gsum gyis zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1784E:277b-7: gsang pa gsum ni sku gsung thugs te /
T02TD1784E:277b-8: de rnams kyi yi ge ni stong pa nyid de /
T02TD1784E:277b-10: de'i 'og tu lha'i sku rdzogs par bya pa'i yi ge gsum gsang pa gsum gyis yi ge ste /
T02TD1784E:277b-12: sku la sogs pa gsum po byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir yi ge gsum gsum dgod pa ni gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge ste las rgyal pa mchog go //
T02TD1784E:277b-13: rtsa pa gsum ni gsang pa gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:277b-14: de nyid las yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi kham 'byung pa ste /
T02TD1784E:277b-16: gsang pa gsum ni sna gsum gyi rtse mor yi ge phra ba'i thig le bsgom pa ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:277b-17: 'jug pa la sogs pa gsum po ni gsang ba gsum po ste /
T02TD1784E:277b-18: de thos pa'i yi ge ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:277b-19: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:277b-20: ye shes gsum po sbyang bar byed pa'i yi ge ni gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge ste /
T02TD1784E:277b-21: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:277b-22: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa dag nyid kyi sgyu ma'i sku blang ga gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge ste /
T02TD1784E:277b-23: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:277b-24: 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral pa dang ;
T02TD1784E:277b-25: 'dod chags par ma gsum po bzhi pas sbyar par bya pa'am 'dres pa gsang pa gsum gyi ye ge ste mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:277b-26: khams gsum pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge ste zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:277b-27: gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge byin gyis brlabs shing shin tu 'dus byas pa'i shes rab dang thabs gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge ste rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:277b-28: sku gsung thugs gcig tu byed pa'i rdo rje dang padma gsang pa gsum ste /
T02TD1784E:277b-29: de dag gi yi ge ni rdo rje skyil mo krung ste rgyu'o //
T02TD1784E:278a-0: @278a * // yi ge gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs pa de dag nyid bskyed pa gsang pa gsum gyi ye ge ste las so //
T02TD1784E:278a-1: 'dod chags la sogs pa gsum po'i rnam par rtog pa'i gsang pa gsum ni mi dmigs par mi 'gyur pa gsang pa gsum gyi ste 'bras bu'o //
T02TD1784E:278a-2: dman pa dang bar ma dang gya nom pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul nye par spyod pa'i gsang pa gsum gyi ye ge ste so sor sdud pa'o //
T02TD1784E:278a-3: gsang pa gsum gyis bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de rnams mos pa gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge ste bsam gtan no //
T02TD1784E:278a-4: khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid kyi yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyi thig le steng dang 'og tu 'gro ba dang 'od ba la sbyor ba gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge ste srog dang rtsol ba'o //
T02TD1784E:278a-5: srog dang thur du sel ba dang me dang mnyam pa rnams thig le'i rang bzhin du padma'i lte bar 'dzin pa gsang ba gsum gyi yi ge ste 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1784E:278a-6: rigs kyi bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spros pa gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge ste rjes su dran pa'o //
T02TD1784E:278a-7: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gzugs rdzogs pa gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge ste ting nge 'dzin te de ltar rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD1784E:278a-8: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig bsrung pa gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge'o //
T02TD1784E:278a-9: ye ge gsum gyis spyad pa'i bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba gsang pa gsum gyi yi ge ste sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:278a-10: de ltar na tshig gi don bcu drug go //
T02TD1784E:278a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1784E:278a-12: kye rigs kyi bu rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstan pa ni shin tu zab pa ste /
T02TD1784E:278a-13: dper na gsang pa'i yi ge ni de kho na nyid ji ltar khyed rnams kyis ma thos pa dang /
T02TD1784E:278a-14: mi shes pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul du dpyod par ma gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:278a-15: 'on kyang rang gi dang gis bcom ldan 'das la mar me bzhin du brjod pa kun rdzob kyi mngon du byas pa bzhin du de rnams kyis kyang /
T02TD1784E:278b-0: gsang ba'i yi ge ni de kho na nyid de nge nyid ma thob pa @278b ni rnam par rtogs pa dang bcas pa'i dngos pos thos pa ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:278b-1: de bzhin nyid du nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub bzhin du dus yun ring dang bag chag dang bcas pas mngon par sangs rgyas pa ni mngon du byed pa ma yin no //
T02TD1784E:278b-2: 'on kyang rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i dpe'i bde pa spangs la /
T02TD1784E:278b-3: rnam par rtog pa dang bral pa dang /
T02TD1784E:278b-4: 'dod chags la sogs pa med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:278b-5: sa bcu gnyis pa la gzhag par byed pa'i dpe las byung pa'i kho na nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po las thob pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:278b-7: gsang pa'i yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:278b-8: gang gi phyir gsang pa ni de kho na nyid de /
T02TD1784E:278b-9: de'i gnas ni khyed rnams dang nged rnams snod yin te /
T02TD1784E:278b-10: rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i rigs yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1784E:278b-11: nyan thos pa bzhin du dman pa'i mos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:278b-12: de med pa ni sngags kyi tshul la phul du byung pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:278b-13: gzhan du na dad pa med na rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs shing dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ci'i phyir khyed rnams kyi thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:278b-15: du ba las ni mer shes dang //
T02TD1784E:278b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:278b-17: de bas na khyed rnams chos nyid la skal pa dang ldan pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:278b-18: ded bzhin du mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:278b-19: de bzhin du yi ge ni 'od gsal pa'i de kho na nyid de /
T02TD1784E:278b-20: de khyab pa'i byed pa'i phyir rgyal rnam par dag pa yin pas khams gsum pa yang de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1784E:278b-21: de kho na nyid rang gis thob pa dang /
T02TD1784E:278b-22: gang gis ma thob pa ste /
T02TD1784E:278b-23: phra mo'i lta pas 'gro pa rnams par dpyad na rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:278b-24: 'on kyang gang zhig nyan thos la sogs pa snod ma yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa de dag thams cad kun rdzob tu bstan pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:278b-25: gang gi phyir de rnams bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'od zer gyi 'khor los bskul nas sangs rgyas nyid kho na thob pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:278b-27: snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:278b-28: 'di rnams rang don la rtsol pa //
T02TD1784E:278b-29: rang rgyal pa dag nyan thos rnams //
T02TD1784E:279a-0: @279a * // rang gi lam gyis nges tshig pa //
T02TD1784E:279a-1: byang chub sems dpa'i nang du ni /
T02TD1784E:279a-2: skyes pa dbul po bzhin nas //
T02TD1784E:279a-3: mi shes nyon mongs med spong phyir //
T02TD1784E:279a-4: phyi nas sangs rgyas kyis bskul pa /
T02TD1784E:279a-5: bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags nas ni /
T02TD1784E:279a-8: de bas na kun mkhyen gyi ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis bskul pa de rnams phyag rgya chen po 'jug pa'i rim pa'i sangs rgyas nyid mngon par rdzogs par byed par byed pa ste mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1784E:279a-9: de bzhin du gzhan las kyang /
T02TD1784E:279a-10: chos dang chos min brtul zhugs stong //
T02TD1784E:279a-11: sdom pa dka' thub 'dul ba nyid /
T02TD1784E:279a-12: dud 'gro dmyal pa yi dags rnams //
T02TD1784E:279a-13: lha dang bcas pa'i mi rnams nyid //
T02TD1784E:279a-15: khams rnams thub pa'i bstan pa nyid /
T02TD1784E:279a-16: ston pa dang ni nyan thos te /
T02TD1784E:279a-17: thams cad kun rdzob ston pa'o //
T02TD1784E:279a-18: las dang po pa'i 'jig rten dag / don dam pa la 'jug pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:279a-19: thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD1784E:279a-20: skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs /
T02TD1784E:279a-21: mthar ni thams cad 'jig bya pa'i //
T02TD1784E:279a-23: brjod med snang par mi 'gyur pa /
T02TD1784E:279a-24: gang yang gzhan dag rab snang gyur //
T02TD1784E:279a-26: de bzhin du rgyud la sogs pa'i rigs pa bzhis 'gro pa gdul par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi rol mo bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:279a-27: dpal gsang pa thun mong ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02TD1784E:279a-28: da ni gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:279a-29: dper na rgyal po chen po zas tsang ni 'jam dpal yin no ;
T02TD1784E:279a-30: / lha mo sgyu ma chen mo ni 'jig rten dbang phyung yin no //
T02TD1784E:279a-31: grags 'dzin ma ni dpal gyi lha mo'o /
T02TD1784E:279a-32: sgra gcan 'dzin ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1784E:279a-33: sha ra dva ti'i bu ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa'o //
T02TD1784E:279a-34: 'phags pa gnas brtan kun dga' bo ni kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD1784E:279a-35: gnas brtan lha sbyin ni lha'i dbang po'o //
T02TD1784E:279a-36: dpal sh'akya ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te rnam par snang mdzad chen po yin no //
T02TD1784E:279a-38: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das min //
T02TD1784E:279a-39: chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:279a-40: sems can kun rnams 'dul pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:279a-41: mya ngan las 'das ner bstan pa'o //
T02TD1784E:279b-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa @279b gsungs so //
T02TD1784E:279b-1: de pas na byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams kyang 'od gsal pa rtogs pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:279b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin no zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:279b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:279b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos nas 'od gsal pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te /
T02TD1784E:279b-5: brjod du mi nus pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mi smra par gyur te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:279b-6: bstan pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid bstan nas de nyid mngon du mdzad pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:279b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:279b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:279b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs btsun mo'i bha ga ni le'u dang po las bshad pa ste /
T02TD1784E:279b-10: de la zhugs pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bde pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la bltas te /
T02TD1784E:279b-11: de nyid du zhugs shing mar gyi bum pa bzhin du chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'i nang du thim par 'gyur ro zhes ston to /
T02TD1784E:279b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyang bya ba rdzogs pa'i phyir dang kyang rdzogs pa'i phyir 'o ma dang chu bzhin du re bhya rdo rje ma dang ro gcig par gyur cing thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gyur to zhes 'dir bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:279b-13: gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:279b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor bzhugs na lha mo spyan la sogs pa gang la bzhengs su gsol pa'i phyir bskul //
T02TD1784E:279b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa la zhe na /
T02TD1784E:279b-16: de yang dag pa ma yin te /
T02TD1784E:279b-17: gtso bo spangs nas gtso bo ma yin pa bskul pa mi rigs so /
T02TD1784E:279b-18: de bas na gtso bo nyid du gyur pa gang gis 'gro pa'i don mdzad pa de nyid kyi spro pa dang bsdu pa mdzad pa rigs pa yin no //
T02TD1784E:279b-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gro pa'i don chags pa'i 'jigs pas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi lha mo spyan la sogs pas las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po bskul pa'o //
T02TD1784E:279b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1784E:279b-21: de'i sku gsung thugs kyi btsun mo ni lha byams pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha mo spyan te /
T02TD1784E:279b-22: des bha ga ni stong pa nyid de /
T02TD1784E:279b-23: de la zhugs pas na bcom ldan 'das te de la bstod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:279b-24: bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:280a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni btsun mo'i bha ga @280a * //
T02TD1784E:280a-1: la bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:280a-2: de rnams kyi bdag po ro gcig pa nyid du bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:280a-3: de bzhin du rdo rje ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
T02TD1784E:280a-4: de 'dzin pa ni de'i ngo bos bzhus pas na rdo rje 'dzin no /
T02TD1784E:280a-5: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das la dga' bas bstod pa ni sems can thams cad don mdzad pa la rjes su chags pas bskul pa ste /
T02TD1784E:280a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal pa mchog go //
T02TD1784E:280a-7: sems can khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la khyod ces pa ni yid kyis brtags nas bod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:280a-8: thams cad du de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1784E:280a-9: rdo rje ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
T02TD1784E:280a-10: de thugs gang la yod de rdo rje thugs so /
T02TD1784E:280a-11: gnas ni sa'i khams te de'i dbang phyug ni de rnams par dag pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:280a-12: de bzhin du sems can gyi khams kyi dbang phyug kyang yin te zhi par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:280a-13: bdag ni lha mo spyan la skyabs su gsol pa ni srung par mdzod cig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:280a-15: dga' ba ni sems can gyi khams la brten te byams pas bsdus pa ste /
T02TD1784E:280a-16: sgyur pa de nyid kyis gang zhig don chen ni byang chub thob par byed pa dang /
T02TD1784E:280a-17: yid 'ong ni bde ba ster par ba ste /
T02TD1784E:280a-18: 'dod pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lha nye par spyod pa ste sems can gyi khams la gsol pa'i de rnams kyis so //
T02TD1784E:280a-19: de bzhin du bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol pa ni bdag byams pa rdzogs pa mdzod cig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:280a-20: sems can yab ni skyed par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:280a-21: chen po byang chub thob par mdzad pa'i phyir sems can de nyid kyi gnyen mchog ni phan mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:280a-22: gal te bdag gson par bzhed na de'i tshe mgon po ni bdag po kye bzhengs su gsol zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02TD1784E:280a-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas m'a ma k'i sa bskul pa ste /
T02TD1784E:280a-24: rdo rje sems can gyi khams te /
T02TD1784E:280a-25: de'i 'dod pa ni snying rje ste /
T02TD1784E:280a-26: de nyid 'gro pa mnyes par bya pa'i phyir mchod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:280a-27: de gtso bor gyur pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i tshig ni bstod pa'i tshig gis bskul pa'o //
T02TD1784E:280a-28: rdo rje sku khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa la chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis rdo rje sku thob pas rdo rje sku'o //
T02TD1784E:280a-29: sems can kun ni khams gsum pa ste /
T02TD1784E:280a-30: de la thugs rjes yang dag par sdud par mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02TD1784E:280b-0: sems @280b can kun la phan no //
T02TD1784E:280b-1: bka'i 'khor los 'gro pa'i bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir bka' 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1784E:280b-2: sangs rgyas don du byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid de /
T02TD1784E:280b-3: des don dam ni de kho na nyid dang phan pa ni bde pa rjes su ston pa ni sems can rnams la gang gis rab tu ston par mdzad pa de ni de bzhin no //
T02TD1784E:280b-4: 'dod chags ni phyi rol gyi dga' ba 'am snying rje dam tshig chags pa ni 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'am //
T02TD1784E:280b-5: 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin 'gro pa yang dag par sdud par mdzad pa bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol pa ni rol pa'am bsnams par mdzod cig pa'o ;
T02TD1784E:280b-6: / mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no /
T02TD1784E:280b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jig rten dbang phyug ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
T02TD1784E:280b-8: de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje can ni gos dkar mos te /
T02TD1784E:280b-9: de pas 'dod pa la nye par longs spyod pa'i dam tshig phul du byung pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i gtso bor gyur pa'i tshig gis bstod pa ni bskul pa'o //
T02TD1784E:280b-10: khyod ni rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yan lag dgug pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir rdo rje gsung ngo //
T02TD1784E:280b-11: kun ni 'gro pa kun la dga' bas phan zhing thugs brtse pa'o //
T02TD1784E:280b-12: de bzhin du 'dod chags ye shes kyis 'dod chags nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyang pas rtag tu ni dus gsum du 'jig rten dag gi dgongs pa'i don ni 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can gyi khams rnam par spyang bam ste /
T02TD1784E:280b-14: bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes pa ni dgongs shing snyoms par zhugs par mdzod cig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:280b-15: rab dga'i spyod pa ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa ste /
T02TD1784E:280b-16: de nyid kyis kun du bzang po ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob par mdzod cig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:280b-17: mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no /
T02TD1784E:280b-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dam tshig rdo rje don yod grub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:280b-19: de nyid kyi btsun mo ni btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin gyi lha mo sgrol ma ste /
T02TD1784E:280b-20: des yid bde pa'i dga' pa'i thugs dang gsung dang sku dgyes par byed pa'i tshig gam /
T02TD1784E:280b-21: bde pa dang yid dga' ba ni btang snyoms kyis stong pa ni bskul pa'o //
T02TD1784E:281a-1: pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:281a-2: rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1784E:281a-3: de nyid 'dod pa ni btang snyoms kyi tshangs pa'i gnas kyis mngon du mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:281a-4: dam tshig ni las thams cad de de rnams kyi mchog ni gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:281a-5: che ba ni sems can gyi khams te de'i phrag dog rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir don che ba'o //
T02TD1784E:281a-6: bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la mchog ni mdzes par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1784E:281a-7: mnyam pa nyid ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gnyi ga dang bral ba'i thugs te btang snyoms so //
T02TD1784E:281a-8: des thugs brtse ba ni 'gro ba la gzigs par mdzad pas na mnyam pa nyid thugs brtse ba'o //
T02TD1784E:281a-9: bdag la dgyes mdzod pa ni rol par mdzod cig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:281a-11: yon tan gter ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dang rin chen mang po ni smin pa dang grol ba la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams te /
T02TD1784E:281a-12: de dag gi rgyur gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:281a-13: bdag la brten nas 'gro ba'i don rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02TD1784E:281a-14: mgon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD1784E:281a-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:281a-17: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byams pa la sogs pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la dbang du gyur pas de'i rang bzhin gyi lha mo bzhis bskul ba bcom ldan 'das kyis rmi lam bzhin du gsan te /
T02TD1784E:281a-18: 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la cig car du bzhengs nas /
T02TD1784E:281a-19: 'dod chags thams cad ni aa lingga na la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:281a-20: de rnams nye bar longs spyod pa ni nyams su myong pa ste /
T02TD1784E:281a-21: de nyid rdo rje ni mi 'jigs pa bde ba chen po thob par byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:281a-22: des dpal ni rang dang gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo ni lha mo spyan la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:281b-0: de rnams la dam tshig gi 'khor lo ni aa lingga na la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags bar ma'i rim pas bzhi pa'i de kho na nyid nye bar mtshon cing nor bu'i nang du 'gro ba de nyid brtan par mdzad @281b nas de nyid ro gcig par mdzad la /
T02TD1784E:281b-1: 'dod pa spyod pa ni nyams su myong zhing cang mi gsung bar gyur pa ni de la rtsol ba mi ldan par gyur pa ste /
T02TD1784E:281b-2: rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu rnams so //
T02TD1784E:281b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad ni ji srid khams gsum pa'i snod kyi 'jig rten te /
T02TD1784E:281b-4: de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i mthus aa lingga na la sogs pa la 'byung ba'i dga' ba las skyes pa lha mo'i bde ba'i sgra dang de'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi thugs rtse gcig par gyur pas rdo rje 'chang bzhin du snang ba dkar ba dam tshig gi khu bas chus bum pa bzhin du yongs su gang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:281b-5: nam mkha'i dbyings la gnas pa'i gang zhig sems can rnams de yang de lta bu'i rdo rje 'chang gi rdo rje dpal gyis reg pa tsam gyis rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:281b-6: de gcig pu ma yin gyi de nas brtsams te kun du bzang po'i go 'phang thob par gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:281b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:281b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro ba dang de bzhin du dbyer med par gyur te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:281b-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bde ba chen po'i nyams su myong ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de dang 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin ston par mdzad pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:281b-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams bod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:281b-12: khyed rnams kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phung po la sogs pa dang khams gsum pa'i mnyam pa nyid ni bde ba chen po'i sku kho bos ro gcig tu mthong ba ni nyams su myong ba yin nam /
T02TD1784E:281b-13: gang zhig nga yis rab du ston pa yin no zhes dgongs ba'o ;
T02TD1784E:281b-14: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs can gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:281b-15: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:282a-1: gshegs pa zhes pa ni bka' drin la tshig gnyis te mthong lags so //
T02TD1784E:282a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni khyod de /
T02TD1784E:282a-3: de'i rdo rje ye shes ni 'od gsal ba de'i spyod pa ni shin tu spos pa med pa'i sbyong ba ste /
T02TD1784E:282a-4: gzhan sma ba cang med pa ste bdag cag rnams the tshom dang bral ba'o zhes ston to //
T02TD1784E:282a-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang zhig mi bskyod pa la sogs pa chos 'byung la zhugs pa de rnams nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis spros te /
T02TD1784E:282a-6: de'i sgo nas de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo ston pa yin te //
T02TD1784E:282a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:282a-8: btsun mo'i bha ga ni bcom ldan 'das ma reg bya rdo rje ma'i bha ga las byung zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1784E:282a-9: gang 'dod chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ngo mtshar ba ni 'bras bu la'o //
T02TD1784E:282a-10: 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig ni 'dod chags kyi chos spyod pa rnams kyis kyang gang zhig byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par gyur pa de ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD1784E:282a-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje 'chang gis 'dod chags kyi tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa'i phyir de nyid the tshom med pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1784E:282a-12: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02TD1784E:282a-14: 'dod chags kyi spyod pas byang chub rjes su rtogs pa yin no zhes de skad ma zer cig /'dod chags spyod pa ni ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD1784E:282a-15: phung po la sogs pa thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin no //
T02TD1784E:282a-17: gang zhig chos 'di rnams ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ste /
T02TD1784E:282a-18: thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:282a-19: de lta bu'i chos rnams nyan thos pa la sogs pas mngon du byed par mi nus te /
T02TD1784E:282a-20: 'di lta bu'i spyod pas de rnams skad cig mas rtogs par 'gyur te /
T02TD1784E:282a-21: gzugs kyi phung po chos ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas phung po lnga rang bzhin med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:282a-22: khams ma yin zhes bya ba khams bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:282a-23: skye mched ma yin zhes bya bas dbang po dang yul rnams rang bzhin med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:282b-0: 'dod chags ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs @282b pa rnams rang bzhin med pa dang /
T02TD1784E:282b-1: chos ma yin chos ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes bya bas sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten nam kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag rang bzhin med pa ston to //
T02TD1784E:282b-3: gzugs ni dbu ba 'dra bar bshad //
T02TD1784E:282b-4: ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /
T02TD1784E:282b-5: sems ni ma yin chos rnams min ;
T02TD1784E:282b-6: / lus kyang ma yin khams rnams min //
T02TD1784E:282b-7: 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i lam //
T02TD1784E:282b-8: de nyid rig pa yang dag brjod //
T02TD1784E:282b-10: dbang po'i tshogs la 'dod chags min //
T02TD1784E:282b-11: don la ma yin sems la min //
T02TD1784E:282b-12: gzhan la mi gnas bdag gnas min //
T02TD1784E:282b-13: de ni yod min med ma yin //
T02TD1784E:282b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:282b-15: dngos po rnams ni gos bzhin du shes par bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:282b-16: sems can snod ces ming can 'di //
T02TD1784E:282b-17: 'jig rten gnyis po bsregs nas ni //
T02TD1784E:282b-18: bdag nyid kyang der de nyid 'dir //
T02TD1784E:282b-19: me sgron bzhin du shi bar 'gyur //
T02TD1784E:282b-20: stong nyid me yis bsregs pa yi //
T02TD1784E:282b-21: de ltar 'gro ba gsum bltas te //
T02TD1784E:282b-22: 'khor bar rnam par spyod na yang //
T02TD1784E:282b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02TD1784E:282b-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad the tshom dang bral ba'i phyir chos nyid kyi ngo bo de nyid dgongs shing cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
T02TD1784E:282b-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos rgyud 'di gtang pa yin te /
T02TD1784E:282b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1784E:282b-28: byang chub sems dpa' ni byams pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:282b-29: de rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1784E:282b-30: kye sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid thob par byed pa'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud gzhung dang don gyi bsgom pa ni 'dzin pa dang grags par gyis shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:282b-31: gang gi phyir sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas sems can rnams skal ba dang ldan pa'i phyir yin no //
T02TD1784E:282b-32: de ltar spyi'i gtad pa mdzad nas gang gi lag tu rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di shin tu bsrung bar 'gyur pa dang /
T02TD1784E:283a-0: gang zhig dbang po rno ba yin pa'i phyir grags par byed nus pa'i rdo rje chos de la rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa @283a * //
T02TD1784E:283a-2: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:283a-3: kye phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig sku la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams dang /
T02TD1784E:283a-4: de kho na nyid de don dam pa ste /
T02TD1784E:283a-5: de ltar rim pa gnyis gtso bor gyur ba'i rgyud 'di khyod kyis zung shig ces pa ni gzhung dang don gyis gzung bar gyis shig pa dang /
T02TD1784E:283a-6: ji bzhin skal ba dang ldan ba rnams la bstan par gyis shig pa'o //
T02TD1784E:283a-7: khyod kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:283a-8: de ring nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba yin no zhes gsung gis dbang bskur ba gsol zhing glegs bam gtang ba yin no //
T02TD1784E:283a-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chos kyis bdag la rjes su gzung ba dam pa yin no zhes yid kyis bsam zhing cang mi smra bar gyur te /
T02TD1784E:283a-10: de khas blangs ba'i phyir dang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1784E:283a-11: de'i phyir phyag na rdo rje ni rgyud thams cad kyi sdud ba po yin no ;
T02TD1784E:283a-12: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtad pa yongs su rdzogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la zhugs par gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:283a-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:283a-14: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mnyam pa nyid ni sku dang dbyer med ba nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te khams gsum thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gnas ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:283a-15: de las sku'i rang bzhin du zhugs par gyur ro //
T02TD1784E:283a-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin du gsung rdo rje dang thugs rdo rje dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la dmigs nas /
T02TD1784E:283a-17: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsung dang thugs dag la de'i bdag nyid zhugs par gyur to //
T02TD1784E:283a-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:283a-19: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni khams gsum pa thams cad dang dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la dmigs nas de'i ngo bo nyid kyis cang mi smra bar gyur pa ni 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas chu bo'i rgyun rgyu ba bzhin du de nyid la dgong sa shing bzhugs bar gyur te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1784E:283b-0: 'di @283b skad ces bka' stsal to zhes pa ni tshig gi don bcu drug gis bshad pa gtso bor gyur pa bsdus pas na rim pa 'dis ston par byed pa'i dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD1784E:283b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du ma 'ongs pa'i sems can gyi khams rjes su gzung bar mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02TD1784E:283b-2: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02TD1784E:283b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa drug pas de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes sdud pa po ste tshig gi don bcu drug go //
T02TD1784E:283b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1784E:283b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas te /
T02TD1784E:283b-6: de rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni rim pa gnyis kyis sgrub pa ste /
T02TD1784E:283b-7: de gtso bor gyur pa gang zhig gsang ba 'dus pa zhes pa la /
T02TD1784E:283b-8: gsang ba ni bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1784E:283b-9: 'dus pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu byed pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02TD1784E:283b-10: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1784E:283b-11: de rnams kyi gang zhig bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig dang sdom pa ste /
T02TD1784E:283b-12: de rnams nyid spang bar mi bya ba'i phyir rdo rje ste /
T02TD1784E:283b-13: de'i byin gyis rlob pa ni mngon du byed pa ste /
T02TD1784E:283b-14: de nyid kyi rgyal po ni thams cad las phul du byung ba ste /
T02TD1784E:283b-15: de ston par byed pa'i gzhung gi tshogs ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD1784E:283b-16: le'u zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags rnams 'don par byed pa dang /
T02TD1784E:283b-17: rdo rje 'chang nyid ster bar byed pas na le'u ste sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1784E:283b-18: rgyud 'grel las le'u bcu bdun pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
T02TD1784E:283b-19: le'u bcu bdun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni bdun brgya brgyad cu'o //
T02TD1784E:283b-20: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyud 'grel zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1784E:283b-21: rdo rje theg pa chen po pa slob dpon chen po dpal klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1784E:283b-23: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i t'a ra ka la sha'i sras pandi ta ku m'a ra ka la sha'i dpon po mantra ka la sha zhes bya ba nyid kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o /
